fr.title: Redout: Enhanced Edition
fr.description: Redout est une pure course en apesanteur, un hommage aux monstres des courses classiques d’arcade. Il est conçu pour être une expérience sans concession, rapide, difficile et plaisante, baignée par la sensation de vertige qui caractérise le genre.
fr.short_description: Redout is designed to be an uncompromising, fast, tough and satisfying driving experience, soaked in that vertigo that stands at the core of the arcade racing genre.

en.title: Redout: Enhanced Edition
en.description:
Redout is a tribute to the old racing monsters such as F-Zero, WipeOut, Rollcage, and POD.
It is designed to be an uncompromising, fast, tough and satisfying driving experience, soaked in that vertigo that stands at the core of the arcade racing genre.
en.short_description: Redout is designed to be an uncompromising, fast, tough and satisfying driving experience, soaked in that vertigo that stands at the core of the arcade racing genre.

de.title: Redout: Enhanced Edition
de.description: Mit Redout erlebst du dank Anti-Gravity-Feature futuristischen, schwerelosen Rennsport der Spitzenklasse. Als Tribut an die klassischen Arcade-Rennspiele konzipiert, bietet dir Redout ein Rennerlebnis, das alle deine Wünsche nach schneller, harter und kompromissloser Action befriedigt, ohne dass du dabei auf das prägende Elemente des Genres verzichten musst: das Schwindelgefühl.
de.short_description: Redout is designed to be an uncompromising, fast, tough and satisfying driving experience, soaked in that vertigo that stands at the core of the arcade racing genre.

it.title: Redout: Enhanced Edition
it.description: Redout è un omaggio a mostri sacri delle corse quali F-Zero, Wipeout, Rollcage e POD. È progettato per garantire un'esperienza di guida veloce, tosta e soddisfacente, imbevuta di quella vertigo che è l'essenza del genere racing arcade.
it.short_description: Redout is designed to be an uncompromising, fast, tough and satisfying driving experience, soaked in that vertigo that stands at the core of the arcade racing genre.

es.title: Redout: Enhanced Edition
es.description: Redout es un tributo a F-Zero, WipeOut, Rollcage y POD. Está diseñado para ser una experiencia de conducción rápida, dura y satisfactoria, empapado en ese vértigo que está en el centro del género de las carreras de arcade.
es.short_description: Redout is designed to be an uncompromising, fast, tough and satisfying driving experience, soaked in that vertigo that stands at the core of the arcade racing genre.

pt.title: Redout: Enhanced Edition
pt.description: Redout é um tributo ao F-Zero, WipeOut, Rollcage e POD. Foi concebido para ser uma experiência de condução rápida, dura e satisfatória, mergulhada nessa vertigem que está no centro do género das corridas arcade.
pt.short_description: Redout is designed to be an uncompromising, fast, tough and satisfying driving experience, soaked in that vertigo that stands at the core of the arcade racing genre.

sl.title: Redout: Enhanced Edition
sl.description: Redout je poklon starim dirkaškim mojstrovinam, kot so F-Zero, WipeOut, Rollcage in POD. Igra je zasnovana kot brezkompromisna, hitra, težka in nadvse zadovoljiva vozniška izkušnja, prava uspešnica v žanru arkadnih dirk.
sl.short_description: Redout is designed to be an uncompromising, fast, tough and satisfying driving experience, soaked in that vertigo that stands at the core of the arcade racing genre.

zt.description: 科幻競速：有別於以往的賽車遊戲如F-Zero, WipeOut, Rollcage, 及POD，帶來不妥協、超快速、極好及令人滿意的駕駛體驗。
zt.title: 紅視 : 增強版
zt.short_description: Redout is designed to be an uncompromising, fast, tough and satisfying driving experience, soaked in that vertigo that stands at the core of the arcade racing genre.

name: Redout: Enhanced Edition
copyright: Copyright by 34BigThings srl, 2017.

fr.title: Battle vs Chess
fr.description: BATTLE vs. CHESS fait appel à un plumeau interactif, affrétant le principe d'une partie d'échecs réussie jusqu'à nos jours. Des figurines de fantaisie animées s'assemblent dans des mondes magiques et attendent votre commande !
fr.short_description: Commanders, assemble your armies! Animated fantasy figurines assemble in magical worlds and await your command!

en.title: Battle vs Chess
en.description: Commanders, assemble your armies! BATTLE vs. CHESS calls for an interactive feather duster, chartering the successful chess game principle into the present day multimedia world. Animated fantasy figurines assemble in magical worlds and await your command!
en.short_description: Commanders, assemble your armies! Animated fantasy figurines assemble in magical worlds and await your command!

de.title: Battle vs Chess
de.description: Kommandanten, stellt eure Armeen zusammen! BATTLE vs. CHESS fordert einen interaktiven Staubwedel, der das erfolgreiche Schachspielprinzip in die Gegenwart chartert. Animierte Fantasiefiguren versammeln sich in magischen Welten und warten auf Ihren Befehl!
de.short_description: Commanders, assemble your armies! Animated fantasy figurines assemble in magical worlds and await your command!

it.title: Battle vs Chess
it.description: BATTLE vs. CHESS richiede uno spolverino di piume interattivo, che ha portato il principio del gioco di scacchi di successo ai giorni nostri. Le statuette di fantasia animate si riuniscono in mondi magici e attendono il tuo comando!
it.short_description: Commanders, assemble your armies! Animated fantasy figurines assemble in magical worlds and await your command!

es.title: Battle vs Chess
es.description: ¡Comandantes, reúnan sus ejércitos! BATALLA vs. AJEDREZ requiere un plumero interactivo, que fleta el exitoso principio de juego de ajedrez hasta el día de hoy. Figuras de fantasía animadas se reúnen en mundos mágicos y esperan tus órdenes!
es.short_description: Commanders, assemble your armies! Animated fantasy figurines assemble in magical worlds and await your command!

pt.title: Battle vs Chess
pt.description: Comandantes, reúnam os vossos exércitos! BATTLE vs. CHESS pede um espanador de penas interativo, fretando o princípio do jogo de xadrez bem sucedido para os dias de hoje. Figuras de fantasia animadas se reúnem em mundos mágicos e aguardam seu comando!
pt.short_description: Commanders, assemble your armies! Animated fantasy figurines assemble in magical worlds and await your command!

zt.description: 指揮官，集結您的軍隊，等待您發號施令！本遊戲是將西洋棋透過遊戲及動畫來呈現！
zt.title: 戰鬥版西洋棋
zt.short_description: Commanders, assemble your armies! Animated fantasy figurines assemble in magical worlds and await your command!

sl.title: Battle vs Chess
sl.description: Poveljniki, zberite svoje vojske! BATTLE vs. CHESS zahteva interaktivnost in šah odlično prestavi v današnji multimedijski svet. Animirane fantazijske figurice se zbirajo v čarobnih svetovih in čakajo na vaš ukaz!
sl.short_description: Commanders, assemble your armies! Animated fantasy figurines assemble in magical worlds and await your command!

name: Battle vs Chess
copyright: © 2007 - 2017 TopWare Interactive ACE. All rights reserved. Developed by Targem Games. Battle vs Chess, Check vs Mate, TopWare Interactive and the related logos are trademarks and/or registered trademarks of TopWare Interactive ACE eK. All rights reserved.

fr.title: Toybox Turbos
fr.description: Avec Toybox Turbos de Codemasters, les courses vidéoludiques 'vue de dessus' font un retour fracassant ! Dénichez 35 véhicules et customisez-les, sillonnez 18 circuits et envoyez vos adversaires dans le décor grâce à des power-ups (mines, mitrailleuses, marteau géant...) !
fr.short_description: Collect & customise 35 vehicles, take on 18 crazy tracks & send your rivals into a spin with awesome power-ups, including mines, machine guns & giant car-mounted hammers!

en.title: Toybox Turbos
en.description: Codemasters reboots the classic table top racing experience in Toybox Turbos! Collect & customise 35 vehicles, take on 18 crazy tracks & send your rivals into a spin with awesome power-ups, including mines, machine guns & giant car-mounted hammers!
en.short_description: Collect & customise 35 vehicles, take on 18 crazy tracks & send your rivals into a spin with awesome power-ups, including mines, machine guns & giant car-mounted hammers!

de.title: Toybox Turbos
de.description: Codemasters sorgt mit Toybox Turbos für klassischen Spielzeugauto-Rennspielspaß! Sammle und gestalte 35 Fahrzeuge, beweise dich auf 18 verrückten Strecken und bring deine Gegner mit coolen Power-Ups wie Minen, MGs oder riesigen Hämmern ins Schleudern!
de.short_description: Collect & customise 35 vehicles, take on 18 crazy tracks & send your rivals into a spin with awesome power-ups, including mines, machine guns & giant car-mounted hammers!

it.title: Toybox Turbos
it.description: Codemasters ripropone i classici giochi di guida dall'alto con Toybox Turbos! Ottieni e personalizza 35 veicoli, gareggia su 18 circuiti stravaganti e colpisci i tuoi avversari con splendidi power-up, tra cui mine, mitragliatrici ed enormi martelli!
it.short_description: Collect & customise 35 vehicles, take on 18 crazy tracks & send your rivals into a spin with awesome power-ups, including mines, machine guns & giant car-mounted hammers!

es.title: Toybox Turbos
es.description: Codemasters reinicia la experiencia clásica de las carreras de mesa en Toybox Turbos! Recoge y personaliza 35 vehículos, enfréntate a 18 pistas de locos y envía a tus rivales a una vuelta con increíbles potenciadores!
es.short_description: Collect & customise 35 vehicles, take on 18 crazy tracks & send your rivals into a spin with awesome power-ups, including mines, machine guns & giant car-mounted hammers!

pt.title: Toybox Turbos
pt.description: Codemasters reinicia a experiência clássica de corrida de mesa em Toybox Turbos! Colete e personalize 35 veículos, pegue 18 pistas loucas e envie seus rivais para uma rodada com incríveis power-ups!
pt.short_description: Collect & customise 35 vehicles, take on 18 crazy tracks & send your rivals into a spin with awesome power-ups, including mines, machine guns & giant car-mounted hammers!

sl.title: Toybox Turbos
sl.description: Codemasters na novo zažene klasično namizno dirkalno izkušnjo v različici Toybox Turbos! Zberite in prilagodite 35 vozil, zapeljite se po 18 norih stezah in svoje tekmece popeljite na avanturo z izjemnimi nadgradnjami, minami, mitraljezi in velikanskimi kladivi, nameščenimi na avtomobil!
sl.short_description: Collect & customise 35 vehicles, take on 18 crazy tracks & send your rivals into a spin with awesome power-ups, including mines, machine guns & giant car-mounted hammers!

zt.description:
(temp synopsis)
Codemasters 在Toybox Turbos中再次啟動經典的桌面競速體驗。收集個性化的35輛賽車，挑戰18條瘋狂賽道，用超讚的道具（包括地雷、機槍和巨型車頂錘）把你的對手整得暈頭轉向！
zt.title: 極速玩具車
zt.short_description: Collect & customise 35 vehicles, take on 18 crazy tracks & send your rivals into a spin with awesome power-ups, including mines, machine guns & giant car-mounted hammers!

name: Toybox Turbos
copyright: © 2014 The Codemasters Software Company Limited ("Codemasters"). All other copyrights or trademarks are the property of their respective owners and are being used under license. Developed and published by Codemasters.

fr.title: AWAY: Journey to the Unexpected
fr.description:
Une aventure colorée où se mêlent action, négociation et randomisation.
 
Vous incarnez un minot qui n’est ni un héros, ni un guerrier. Pourtant, grâce au pouvoir de l’amitié, vous surmonterez tous les obstacles qui se dresseront sur votre route !
fr.short_description: You play as a kid that is neither a hero nor a warrior. Yet with the power of friendship, you will overcome every obstacle in your way!

en.title: AWAY: Journey to the Unexpected
en.description:
Welcome to a feel-good FPS! A colorful adventure combining action, negotiation and rogue-lite elements.

You play as a kid that is neither a hero nor a warrior. Yet with the power of friendship, you will overcome every obstacle in your way!
en.short_description: You play as a kid that is neither a hero nor a warrior. Yet with the power of friendship, you will overcome every obstacle in your way!

de.title: AWAY: Journey to the Unexpected
de.description:
Ein farbenfrohes Abenteuer, das Action-, Verhandlungs- und Schurken-Elemente miteinander kombiniert.

Ihr spielt als Kind, das weder Held noch Krieger ist. Und dennoch könnt ihr mit der Macht der Freundschaft jedes Hindernis überwinden, auf das ihr stoßt!
de.short_description: You play as a kid that is neither a hero nor a warrior. Yet with the power of friendship, you will overcome every obstacle in your way!

it.title: AWAY: Journey to the Unexpected
it.description:
Un'avventura colorata che mischia azione, negoziazione ed elementi roguelike.

Vesti i panni di un bambino che non è né un eroe né un guerriero, ma che, con il potere dell'amicizia, supererà ogni ostacolo che incontrerà durante il suo cammino.
Jogará com uma criança que não é um herói nem um guerreiro. Ainda assim, com o poder da amizade, irá vencer todos os obstáculos que encontrar no seu caminho!"
it.short_description: You play as a kid that is neither a hero nor a warrior. Yet with the power of friendship, you will overcome every obstacle in your way!

es.title: AWAY: Journey to the Unexpected
es.description:
Una colorida aventura que combina acción, negociación y elementos de mazmorras. 

Juegas en el papel de un niño que no es un héroe ni un guerrero. Sin embargo, con el poder de la amistad, superarás todos los obstáculos que se interpongan en tu camino.
es.short_description: You play as a kid that is neither a hero nor a warrior. Yet with the power of friendship, you will overcome every obstacle in your way!

pt.title: AWAY: Journey to the Unexpected
pt.description:
Uma aventura colorida que combina ação, negociação e elementos de masmorras. 

Jogará com uma criança que não é um herói nem um guerreiro. Ainda assim, com o poder da amizade, irá vencer todos os obstáculos que encontrar no seu caminho!
pt.short_description: You play as a kid that is neither a hero nor a warrior. Yet with the power of friendship, you will overcome every obstacle in your way!

sl.title: AWAY: Journey to the Unexpected
sl.description:
Utrite si pot skozi različne stopnje, vživite se v zabavno in lahkotno zgodbo ter predvsem pridobite zaveznike. Vse nenavadne in močne like, ki jih srečate, lahko igrate v prvi osebi, na vas pa je, da jih prepričate, naj se pridružijo vaši ekipi.
Čaka vas potovanje po pisanem svetu z edinstvenimi vizualnimi elementi in 2D-liki, ki živijo v 3D-svetu.
sl.short_description: You play as a kid that is neither a hero nor a warrior. Yet with the power of friendship, you will overcome every obstacle in your way!

zt.title: 遠離：未知之旅
zt.description: 通過關卡選擇道路，發現有趣的故事，最重要的是招募盟友。遇到的所有古怪而有力的角色都可以第一人稱扮演，這取決於您找到合適的答案來加入你的團隊！
zt.short_description: You play as a kid that is neither a hero nor a warrior. Yet with the power of friendship, you will overcome every obstacle in your way!

name: AWAY: Journey to the Unexpected
copyright: © Plug In Digital. Made in France.

fr.title: Boiling Bolt
fr.description: Il y a bien longtemps, une guerre ravagea le monde, ne laissant de la Terre que des îles volantes grâce à la force de leurs cristaux. La vie reprit son cours, oubliant ce triste passé. Un millénaire plus tard, l’attaque d’une étrange femme à Scire va mettre fin à cet équilibre fragile. Incarnez June, soldat luttant pour défendre son île face à cette organisation voulant puiser son énergie. Ses décisions s’avèreront cruciales pour le destin de ce monde en ruine.
fr.short_description: Use your powers and find your playstyle to survive in Boiling Bolt, an immersive and explosive shoot-em-up! Slow down the time to make combos and enjoy the stunning 3D graphics.

en.title: Boiling Bolt
en.description: Use your powers and find your playstyle to survive in Boiling Bolt, an immersive and explosive shoot-em-up! Slow down the time to make combos and enjoy the stunning 3D graphics. Help June to save the world alone or with a friend.
en.short_description: Use your powers and find your playstyle to survive in Boiling Bolt, an immersive and explosive shoot-em-up! Slow down the time to make combos and enjoy the stunning 3D graphics.

de.title: Boiling Bolt
de.description: Vor langer Zeit wütete ein unerbittlicher Krieg auf Erden, der alles in Schutt und Asche legte. Lediglich einige schwebende Inseln blieben zurück, die der Zerstörung dank der Stärke ihrer Kristalle standhalten konnten. Langsam kehrte wieder Normalität ein und die schmerzliche Vergangenheit schien vergessen. Ein Millennium später wagte eine seltsame Frau jedoch einen weiteren Angriff auf Scire, der das fragile Gleichgewicht erneut zerschlug.
de.short_description: Use your powers and find your playstyle to survive in Boiling Bolt, an immersive and explosive shoot-em-up! Slow down the time to make combos and enjoy the stunning 3D graphics.

it.title: Boiling Bolt
it.description: Molto tempo fa una guerra devastò il mondo, lasciando solo isole volanti sopra la Terra, grazie all’energia dei loro cristalli. La vita riprese il suo corso, dimenticando l’oscuro passato. Un millennio più tardi, una strana donna attaccò Scire, mettendo fine a un fragile equilibrio.
it.short_description: Use your powers and find your playstyle to survive in Boiling Bolt, an immersive and explosive shoot-em-up! Slow down the time to make combos and enjoy the stunning 3D graphics.

es.title: Boiling Bolt
es.description: Usa tus poderes y encuentra tu estilo de juego para sobrevivir en Boiling Bolt, un shoot-em-up inmersivo y explosivo! Reduzca el tiempo para hacer combos y disfrutar de los impresionantes gráficos en 3D. Ayuda a June a salvar el mundo solo o con un amigo.
es.short_description: Use your powers and find your playstyle to survive in Boiling Bolt, an immersive and explosive shoot-em-up! Slow down the time to make combos and enjoy the stunning 3D graphics.

pt.title: Boiling Bolt
pt.description: Use seus poderes e encontre seu estilo de jogo para sobreviver em Boiling Bolt, um tiroteio imersivo e explosivo! Abrande o tempo para fazer combos e desfrutar dos deslumbrantes gráficos 3D. Ajude June a salvar o mundo sozinho ou com um amigo.
pt.short_description: Use your powers and find your playstyle to survive in Boiling Bolt, an immersive and explosive shoot-em-up! Slow down the time to make combos and enjoy the stunning 3D graphics.

sl.title: Boiling Bolt
sl.description: Uporabite svoje moči in najdite svoj način igranja, da preživite v Boiling Bolt, poglobljeni in eksplozivni strelski igri! Upočasnite čas in uživajte v osupljivi 3D-grafiki. Sami ali s prijateljem Junom pomagajte rešiti svet.
sl.short_description: Use your powers and find your playstyle to survive in Boiling Bolt, an immersive and explosive shoot-em-up! Slow down the time to make combos and enjoy the stunning 3D graphics.

zt.description:
(temp synopsis)《Boiling Bolt》是一款具有沉浸感和爆炸感的 2.5D 雙桿射擊遊戲，提供了精緻的 3D 圖形和特效。
地球分崩離析，通過水晶的力量變成了多個浮空島嶼。人們的生活頓時退化到那痛苦不堪的年代。千年後，玩家扮演 June，一名反叛軍士兵，力爭保護自己的島嶼，對抗吸取水晶能量的組織。
zt.title: 熱力戰機
zt.short_description: Use your powers and find your playstyle to survive in Boiling Bolt, an immersive and explosive shoot-em-up! Slow down the time to make combos and enjoy the stunning 3D graphics.

name: Boiling Bolt
copyright: NA

fr.title: Bombing Bastards
fr.description: Bombardez des tonnes de créatures dans une série de 30 labyrinthes ! Vaincre les boss infernaux ! Jouez en solo ou entre amis dans des combats impitoyables ! Embarquez pour un voyage avec le Dr Wallow pour conquérir la galaxie dans ce jeu d'arcade amusant !
fr.short_description: Have a blast! Bomb tons of nasty critters in a series of 30 wicked mazes! Defeat hellish bosses! Play solo or with friends in merciless battles!

en.title: Bombing Bastards
en.description: Have a blast! Bomb oodles of nasty critters in a series of 30 wicked mazes! Defeat hellish bosses in heroic fights! Play solo or with friends, offline or online, in merciless battles! Embark on a hilarious journey with the witty Dr. Wallow to conquer the galaxy in this explosively fun arcade game!
en.short_description: Have a blast! Bomb tons of nasty critters in a series of 30 wicked mazes! Defeat hellish bosses! Play solo or with friends in merciless battles!

de.title: Bombing Bastards
de.description: Bombardiere Tonnen von Kreaturen in einer Serie von 30 Labyrinthen! Besiege Bosse! Spiele allein oder mit Freunden in gnadenlosen Schlachten! Begib dich auf eine Reise mit dem geistreichen Dr. Wallow, um die Galaxie in diesem lustigen Arcade-Spiel zu erobern!
de.short_description: Have a blast! Bomb tons of nasty critters in a series of 30 wicked mazes! Defeat hellish bosses! Play solo or with friends in merciless battles!

it.title: Bombing Bastards
it.description: Bomba tonnellate di creature in una serie di 30 labirinti! Sconfiggi i boss! Gioca da solo o con gli amici in battaglie spietate! Imbarcarsi in un viaggio con lo spiritoso Dr. Wallow per conquistare la galassia in questo divertente gioco arcade!
it.short_description: Have a blast! Bomb tons of nasty critters in a series of 30 wicked mazes! Defeat hellish bosses! Play solo or with friends in merciless battles!

es.title: Bombing Bastards
es.description: Bombardear toneladas de bichos en una serie de 30 laberintos! ¡Derrota a los jefes! Juega solo o con amigos en batallas despiadadas! Embárcate en un viaje con el ingenioso Dr. Wallow para conquistar la galaxia en este divertido juego de arcade!
es.short_description: Have a blast! Bomb tons of nasty critters in a series of 30 wicked mazes! Defeat hellish bosses! Play solo or with friends in merciless battles!

pt.title: Bombing Bastards
pt.description: Bombeie toneladas de criaturas numa série de 30 labirintos! Derrote os bosses! Jogue sozinho ou com amigos em batalhas impiedosas! Embarque em uma viagem com o engraçado Dr. Wallow para conquistar a galáxia neste divertido jogo arcade!
pt.short_description: Have a blast! Bomb tons of nasty critters in a series of 30 wicked mazes! Defeat hellish bosses! Play solo or with friends in merciless battles!

sl.title: Bombing Bastards
sl.description: Uživajte na kvadrat! Bombandirajte na tisoče nesramnih bitji v 30 različnih labirintih! Premagajte peklenske šefe! Neusmiljene bitke igrajte samostojno ali s prijatelji. Odpravite se na nenavadno zabavno ppotovanje z duhovitim dr. Wallowom in zavzemite galaksijo v tej eksplozivni in zabavni arkadni igri!
sl.short_description: Have a blast! Bomb tons of nasty critters in a series of 30 wicked mazes! Defeat hellish bosses! Play solo or with friends in merciless battles!

zt.description: 盡情狂歡！ 在一系列30個邪惡的迷宮中炸毀成噸的令人討厭的小動物！ 打敗地獄老闆！ 獨自玩耍或與朋友一起進行無情的戰鬥！ 在這個爆炸性的有趣街機遊戲中，與機智的Wallow博士一起踏上熱鬧的征服銀河的旅程！
zt.title: 爆破剋星
zt.short_description: Have a blast! Bomb tons of nasty critters in a series of 30 wicked mazes! Defeat hellish bosses! Play solo or with friends in merciless battles!

name: Bombing Bastards
copyright: © 2014 Sanuk Games. All rights reserved.

fr.title: Chariot
fr.description: Embarquez dans cette aventure épique et offrez à Sa Majesté la balade de sa mort. Guidez un chariot contenant la dépouille du Roi dans un réseau de grottes souterraines, grâce à un système d'éléments physiques à pousser, tirer, glisser et balancer.
fr.short_description: Embark on a journey to give his majesty the ride of his afterlife. Guide a chariot containing the King's remains through underground caves using physics-based mechanics.

en.title: Chariot
en.description: Embark on a journey to give his majesty the ride of his afterlife. Guide a chariot containing the King's remains through underground caves using physics-based mechanics such as pushing, pulling, riding and swinging.
en.short_description: Embark on a journey to give his majesty the ride of his afterlife. Guide a chariot containing the King's remains through underground caves using physics-based mechanics.

de.title: Chariot
de.description: Begib dich auf eine Reise, um seiner Majestät den Ritt durch sein Leben nach dem Tod zu ermöglichen. Führen Sie einen Wagen, der die Überreste des Königs enthält, durch unterirdische Höhlen, wobei Sie Physikmechaniken wie Schieben, Ziehen, Reiten und Schwingen verwenden.
de.short_description: Embark on a journey to give his majesty the ride of his afterlife. Guide a chariot containing the King's remains through underground caves using physics-based mechanics.

it.title: Chariot
it.description: Imbarcarsi in un viaggio per dare a Sua Maestà il viaggio della sua vita ultraterrena. Guida un carro contenente le spoglie del re attraverso grotte sotterranee utilizzando meccaniche fisiche come spingere, tirare, guidare e oscillare.
it.short_description: Embark on a journey to give his majesty the ride of his afterlife. Guide a chariot containing the King's remains through underground caves using physics-based mechanics.

es.title: Chariot
es.description: Embárcate en un viaje para darle a su majestad el viaje de su vida después de la muerte. Guiar un carro que contiene los restos del Rey a través de cuevas subterráneas utilizando mecánicas físicas como empujar, tirar, montar a caballo y balancearse.
es.short_description: Embark on a journey to give his majesty the ride of his afterlife. Guide a chariot containing the King's remains through underground caves using physics-based mechanics.

pt.title: Chariot
pt.description: Embarque numa viagem para dar a Sua Majestade a boleia da sua vida após a morte. Guie uma carruagem contendo os restos mortais do Rei pelas cavernas subterrâneas usando mecânica física como empurrar, puxar, montar e balançar.
pt.short_description: Embark on a journey to give his majesty the ride of his afterlife. Guide a chariot containing the King's remains through underground caves using physics-based mechanics.

sl.title: Chariot
sl.description: Odpravite se na potovanje, na katerem boste njegovemu veličanstvu omogočili najboljšo vožnjo v posmrtnem življenju. Popeljite voz s posmrtnimi ostanki kralja skozi podzemne jame z uporabo mehanike, ki temelji na fiziki: potiskanje, vlečenje, jezdenje in zibanje.
sl.short_description: Embark on a journey to give his majesty the ride of his afterlife. Guide a chariot containing the King's remains through underground caves using physics-based mechanics.

zt.title: 皇室戰輪
zt.description: 皇室戰輪是一款 2D 動作解謎遊戲。講述一位勇敢的公主和未婚夫，為了替去世國王找尋合適的葬身場所，帶著國王靈魂與戰輪一同穿梭各種神祕洞穴遺跡的遊戲。玩家可以站在戰輪上，跳往高處或是隨著戰輪滑行。還可以收放戰輪繩，來越過各種溝壑，挑戰高難度的動作冒險。
zt.short_description: Embark on a journey to give his majesty the ride of his afterlife. Guide a chariot containing the King's remains through underground caves using physics-based mechanics.

name: Chariot

en.title: Disney Epic Mickey 2: The Power of Two
en.description: Join Mickey and Oswald in an epic battle to save the magical world of Wasteland and change it forever. Interact with your favorite characters like never before in the most heroic adventure yet.
en.short_description: Unleash the power of the brush in an all new co-op adventure. Join Mickey and Oswald in an epic battle to save the magical world of Wasteland and change it forever.

sl.title: Disney Epic Mickey 2: The Power of Two
sl.description: Sprostite moč čopiča v popolnoma novi avanturi. Pridružite se Mickeyju in Oswaldu v junaški bitki ter rešite čarobni svet Wasteland in ga spremenite.za vedno. Kot še nikoli poprej sodelujte s svojimi najljubšimi liki v nadvse junaški pustolovščini.
sl.short_description: Unleash the power of the brush in an all new co-op adventure. Join Mickey and Oswald in an epic battle to save the magical world of Wasteland and change it forever.

fr.description: Disney Epic Mickey : Le Retour des Héros revient, avec Mickey Mouse et Oswald le lapin chanceux, dans le Monde de la désolation, un univers alternatif rempli de 80 années de personnages oubliés et parcs d'attractions Disney.
fr.title: Disney Epic Mickey : Le Retour des Héros
fr.short_description: Unleash the power of the brush in an all new co-op adventure. Join Mickey and Oswald in an epic battle to save the magical world of Wasteland and change it forever.

de.description: Entfalten Sie die Kräfte des Farbpinsels in einem völlig neuen Coop-Abenteuer. Begleiten Sie Micky und Oswald auf einer epischen Schlacht, um die magische Welt von Wasteland zu retten und sie für alle Ewigkeit zu verwandeln. Schlüpfen Sie im heldenhaftesten Abenteuer aller Zeiten wie nie zuvor in die Rolle Ihrer Lieblingscharaktere.
de.title: Disney Micky Epic 2: Die Macht der Zwei
de.short_description: Unleash the power of the brush in an all new co-op adventure. Join Mickey and Oswald in an epic battle to save the magical world of Wasteland and change it forever.

it.description:
Gioca nei panni di Topolino e, per la prima volta, in quelli di Oswald il coniglio fortunato, la prima star dei cartoni animati di Walt Disney, in una nuovissima avventura ricca di creatività e scoperte!

In Disney Epic Mickey 2: L'Avventura di Topolino e Oswald, Topolino e Oswald tornano a Rifiutolandia, una dimensione alternativa che riunisce 80 anni di attrazioni e personaggi Disney dimenticati.

Questa volta, però, Topolino e Oswald uniranno le loro forze come dei veri alleati: il pennello di Topolino, con pittura e solvente, e il potentissimo telecomando di Oswald, che gli permette di controllare l'elettricità.
it.title: Disney Epic Mickey 2
it.short_description: Unleash the power of the brush in an all new co-op adventure. Join Mickey and Oswald in an epic battle to save the magical world of Wasteland and change it forever.

es.description: Desata el poder del pincel en una nueva aventura cooperativa. Únete a Mickey y Oswald en una batalla épica para salvar el mundo mágico de Wasteland y cambiarlo para siempre. Interactúa con tus personajes favoritos como nunca antes en la aventura hasta ahora.
es.title: Disney Epic Mickey : El retorno de dos héroes
es.short_description: Unleash the power of the brush in an all new co-op adventure. Join Mickey and Oswald in an epic battle to save the magical world of Wasteland and change it forever.

pt.description: Liberta o poder do pincel numa nova aventura da cooperativa. Junte-se a Mickey e Oswald em uma batalha épica para salvar o mundo mágico do deserto e mudá-lo para sempre. Interaja com seus personagens favoritos como nunca antes na aventura mais heróica ainda.
pt.title: Disney Epic Mickey: O Regresso dos Heróis
pt.short_description: Unleash the power of the brush in an all new co-op adventure. Join Mickey and Oswald in an epic battle to save the magical world of Wasteland and change it forever.

zt.description: 畫筆的力量釋放在一個全新的冒險合作，加入米奇和奧斯華史詩般的戰鬥拯救荒地的神奇世界並永遠改變它。與你最喜歡的卡通人物互動,經歷未曾有過的英勇冒險。
zt.title: 傳奇米奇2 : 二人之力
zt.short_description: Unleash the power of the brush in an all new co-op adventure. Join Mickey and Oswald in an epic battle to save the magical world of Wasteland and change it forever.

fr.title: Disney Universe
fr.description: Disney Universe est un jeu d'action/aventure complètement déjanté mêlant pour la première fois plusieurs univers Disney et Disney/Pixar. Disney Universe a été piraté par Hex, un virus maléfique, et vous seul pouvez le libérer ! Enfilez le costume de votre personnage Disney préféré et partez pour une aventure multi-joueurs délirante (jusqu'à 4 joueurs). En coopération avec vos amis ou l'un contre l'autre, affrontez vos adversaires, résolvez les puzzles et faites évoluer votre personnage pour sauver Disney Universe.
fr.short_description: For the first time, suit up in a multiplayer adventure where iconic Disney characters and legendary Disney worlds collide.

en.title: Disney Universe
en.description: For the first time, suit up in an off-the-wall multiplayer adventure where iconic Disney characters and legendary Disney worlds collide. Discover the mixed-up humor of this ever-expanding universe as you team up with friends to overcome challenges and defeat enemies.
en.short_description: For the first time, suit up in a multiplayer adventure where iconic Disney characters and legendary Disney worlds collide.

de.title: Disney Universe
de.description: Disney Universe ist ein non-stop Mehrspieler-Action-Adventure, in dem die Welten und Charaktere von Disney zum ersten Mal aufeinandertreffen. Schlüpf in einzigartige Charakterkostüme und stell dich Herausforderungen in den legendären Disney-Welten. Spieler können Gegner besiegen, Münzen und Power-Ups sammeln, neue Kostüme freischalten und die bunt gemischte Spielwelt mit Freunden erkunden.
de.short_description: For the first time, suit up in a multiplayer adventure where iconic Disney characters and legendary Disney worlds collide.

it.title: Disney Universe
it.description: Disney Universe è un'avventura ricca di azione non stop, in cui personaggi e universi Disney si fondono per la prima volta. Calati nei panni di personaggi iconici e affronta avvincenti sfide nei leggendari mondi Disney. Potrai sconfiggere nemici, collezionare monete e power-up, sbloccare nuovi costumi e lanciarti all'esplorazione con i tuoi amici in un mix di mondi.
it.short_description: For the first time, suit up in a multiplayer adventure where iconic Disney characters and legendary Disney worlds collide.

es.title: Disney Universe
es.description: Vistete en una aventura multijugador donde los personajes de Disney y los mundos de Disney chocan. Descubre el humor mezclado de este universo en constante expansión mientras te unes a tus amigos para superar desafíos y derrotar a tus enemigos.
es.short_description: For the first time, suit up in a multiplayer adventure where iconic Disney characters and legendary Disney worlds collide.

pt.title: Disney Universe
pt.description: Vista-se em uma aventura multiplayer onde personagens da Disney e mundos Disney colidem. Descobre o humor misto deste universo em constante expansão e junta-te a amigos para ultrapassar desafios e derrotar inimigos.
pt.short_description: For the first time, suit up in a multiplayer adventure where iconic Disney characters and legendary Disney worlds collide.

sl.title: Disney Universe
sl.description: Prvič se udeležite pustolovščine za več igralcev, kjer trčijo sloviti Disneyjevi liki in legendarni Disneyjevi svetovi. Odkrijte nori humor tega vedno večjega sveta, v katerem se združite s prijatelji in z njimi premagujete izzive ter sovražnike.
sl.short_description: For the first time, suit up in a multiplayer adventure where iconic Disney characters and legendary Disney worlds collide.

zt.description:
(temp synopsis)
迪士尼世界玩家在遊戲中扮演一名迪士尼虛擬主題樂園中的測試員。有一個邪惡的駭客入侵了這個虛擬世界，造成了一片混亂，而玩家的工作便是要阻止他。玩家可以變裝成迪士尼卡通人物，闖過關卡來達成這個目標。
zt.title: 迪士尼瘋狂世界
zt.short_description: For the first time, suit up in a multiplayer adventure where iconic Disney characters and legendary Disney worlds collide.

name: Disney Universe
copyright: © Disney ©Disney/Pixar

fr.title: Ethan: Meteor Hunter
fr.description: Vous êtes Ethan, frappé par des météorites qui vous ont donné un super pouvoir: vous pouvez arrêter le temps et grâce à l’écran tactile, ou l’écran arrière, manipuler le monde qui vous entoure pour terminer les niveaux de la manière que VOUS voulez. Lorsqu’un platformer exigeant et des puzzles physiques ne font qu'un, vous mourrez beaucoup, mais vous allez adorer ça!

en.title: Ethan: Meteor Hunter
en.description:
Your name is Ethan, a rat that got touched by meteorites giving him the power of telekinesis: freezing time and moving objects around him. He is now looking for more meteorites that fell in his surroundings to get more power and his revenge against his neighbor who destroyed Ethan's house!

Freeze time and manipulate the world with endless possibilities: build the solution YOU want where nothing is scripted and levels can be solved in multiple ways. When Super Meat Boy meets Braid, you may die repeatedly and enjoy it! With its unique blend of precision platforming and time-stopping physics-based puzzles, feel like a hero when you succeed!

de.title: Ethan: Meteor Hunter
de.description:
Ihr könnt die Zeit einfrieren und die Welt mit dynamischer Spielphysik beeinflussen, was euch unendlich viele Möglichkeiten bietet: Bewältigt anspruchsvolle Ebenen und schwierige Rätsel auf eure eigene Art und Weise.

Nichts ist vorbestimmt, jeder Level hat viele verschiedene Lösungsmöglichgkeiten. Wer das „Ein Treffer tötet”-Gameplay erfolgreich meistert, kann sich als echter Held fühlen!

it.title: Ethan: Meteor Hunter
it.description: Potete fermare il tempo e manipolare il mondo con una fisica dinamica che apre infinite possibilità: potrete superare gli enigmi e le piattaforme nel modo che preferite. Nulla è precalcolato e i livelli possono essere risolti in tantissimi modi.

es.title: Ethan: Meteor Hunter
es.description: Congele el tiempo y manipule el mundo, construya la solución que USTED desea donde los niveles pueden ser resueltos de múltiples maneras. Cuando Super Meat Boy se encuentra con Braid, ¡puedes morir repetidamente y disfrutarlo!

pt.title: Ethan: Meteor Hunter
pt.description: Congelar o tempo e manipular o mundo, construir a solução que VOCÊ quer onde os níveis podem ser resolvidos de várias maneiras. Quando o Super Meat Boy encontra o Braid, podes morrer repetidamente e desfrutar dele!

sl.title: Ethan: Meteor Hunter
sl.description: Ime vam je Ethan in ste podgana, ki je ob stiku z meteoriti prejela moč telekineze. Zdaj lahko zamrznete čas in premikate predmete okoli sebe, iščete pa še druge meteorite, ki so padli v okolici, da bi pridobili še več moči in se maščevali sosedu, ki vam je uničil hišo.

zt.description: 您將扮演一隻名為Ethan的老鼠，因為被神秘的隕石集中，而有了超能力：凍結時間，以及移動物體。現在開始尋找更多隕石，以獲取更多能量，並對摧毀您房屋的鄰居展開報復！
zt.title: 伊森 : 隕石獵人

name: Ethan: Meteor Hunter
copyright: © Seaven Studio. Made in Ch'nord.

fr.title: F1 RACE STARS ™
fr.description: Découvrez les voitures, les équipes et les circuits de FORMULA ONE™ sous un tout nouveau jour dans F1 RACE STARS™, le jeu de courses pour tous. Retrouvez toutes les stars de FORMULA ONE et profitez de nombreux modes de jeu, dont plusieurs championnats, des contre-la-montre, des courses pour 4 joueurs sur écran partagé et du multijoueur en ligne. Avec F1 RACE STARS, la FORMULA ONE prend son envol !
fr.short_description: F1 RACE STARS™ is a brand new world of FORMULA ONE™ fun as you’ve never seen it before!

en.title: F1 RACE STARS ™
en.description: Get ready to experience FORMULA ONE™ cars, teams and circuits like never before with F1 RACE STARS™, a fast-to-the-fun game for all ages. Officially licensed to feature the full cast of FORMULA ONE stars and packing an extensive range of game modes, including numerous Championships, Time Trials, 4-player split-screen racing and online multiplayer, F1 RACE STARS takes FORMULA ONE over the top!

Spoznajte popolno zasedbo zvezd iz formule ena in široko paleto igralnih načinov, vključno s številnimi prvenstvi, časovnimi preizkušnjami, dirkanjem z razdeljenimi zasloni s štirimi igralci in spletno igro več igralcev.

fr.title: Gravel
fr.description:
Gravel, c'est l'expérience tout-terrain par excellence. Le jeu de course le plus extrême qui vous permettra d'expérimenter des cascades hallucinantes dans les endroits les plus sauvages de la planète !Du divertissement à l'état pur, des décors spectaculaires et une compétition impitoyable où chaque course donne lieu à un combat mémorable !
Prenez part au show le plus déjanté de la chaîne Web Gravel Channel, voyagez à travers le monde pour découvrir l'immense variété des environnements et admirer la qualité des graphismes !
Profitez de quatre disciplines différentes - Cross Country, Wild Rush, Stadium et Speed Cross - pour vivre la conduite à bord des véhicules les plus sensationnels sur tout type de terrain.
fr.short_description: Gravel is the ultimate off-road experience. The most extreme racing game that will let you try out amazing stunts in the wildest places on the planet!

en.title: Gravel
en.description:
Gravel is the ultimate off-road experience. The most extreme racing game that will let you try out amazing stunts in the wildest places on the planet!
Pure fun, spectacular scenery and no-holds barred competition where each race will turn into a memorable battle!
Take part in the wildest show on the Gravel Channel web TV, travel around the world to discover the wide variety of environments and be amazed by the visually impressive quality!
Enjoy four different disciplines – Cross Country, Wild Rush, Stadium and Speed cross – to live the driving experience with the most extreme vehicles on any type of terrain.
en.short_description: Gravel is the ultimate off-road experience. The most extreme racing game that will let you try out amazing stunts in the wildest places on the planet!

de.title: Gravel
de.description:
Gravel bietet das ultimative Off-road-Erlebnis. In diesem verrückten Rennspiel kannst du Stunts an den wildesten Orten des Planeten ausführen!
Purer Spaß, spektakuläre Landschaften und kompromisslose Wettbewerbe, bei denen aus jedem Rennen ein unvergesslicher Kampf wird!
Mach beim Web-TV auf dem Gravel Channel mit, entdecke auf deiner Reise um die Welt eine Vielzahl an Umgebungen und lass dich von der beeindruckenden Grafik verzaubern!
Erlebe die Rennen mit den extremsten Fahrzeugen auf verschiedenen Terrains in vier Disziplinen: Cross Country, Wild Rush, Stadium und Speed Cross.
de.short_description: Gravel is the ultimate off-road experience. The most extreme racing game that will let you try out amazing stunts in the wildest places on the planet!

it.title: Gravel
it.description:
Gravel è l’esperienza off-road definitiva. Il gioco di racing più estremo che ti porta a fare cose incredibili nei luoghi più selvaggi del mondo!
Divertimento puro, spettacolarità e una competizione senza esclusioni di colpi in cui ogni gara diventerà una lotta memorabile!
Partecipa allo show più pazzo in onda sulla web tv Gravel Channel, fai un giro attorno al mondo e scopri la varietà di ambienti dalla qualità visiva impressionante!
Quattro diverse discipline - Cross Country, Wild Rush, Stadium e Speed cross – per vivere le sensazioni di guida di veicoli estremi in qualsiasi tipologia di terreno.
it.short_description: Gravel is the ultimate off-road experience. The most extreme racing game that will let you try out amazing stunts in the wildest places on the planet!

es.title: Gravel
es.description: Gravel es lo último en experiencia fuera de la carretera. El juego de carreras más extremo que te permitirá probar increíbles acrobacias en los lugares más salvajes del planeta!
es.short_description: Gravel is the ultimate off-road experience. The most extreme racing game that will let you try out amazing stunts in the wildest places on the planet!

pt.title: Gravel
pt.description: Gravel é a derradeira experiência todo-o-terreno. O jogo de corrida mais extremo que lhe permitirá experimentar acrobacias incríveis nos lugares mais selvagens do planeta!
pt.short_description: Gravel is the ultimate off-road experience. The most extreme racing game that will let you try out amazing stunts in the wildest places on the planet!

sl.title: Gravel
sl.description: Gravel je vrhunska terenska izkušnja. Ta ekstremna dirkalna igra vam bo omogočila, da preizkusite neverjetne podvige v najbolj divjih krajih na planetu!
sl.short_description: Gravel is the ultimate off-road experience. The most extreme racing game that will let you try out amazing stunts in the wildest places on the planet!

zt.description:
Gravel是終極的越野體驗。最極端的賽車遊戲，將讓您在地球上最荒涼的地方嘗試驚人的特技！
純粹的樂趣，壯觀的風景和無限制的比賽，每場比賽都將變成一場難忘的戰鬥！
參加Gravel Channel網絡電視上最瘋狂的節目，環遊世界去發現各種各樣的環境，並為視覺上令人印象深刻的質量感到驚艷！
享受四種不同的風格－越野跑、狂奔，體育館和越野賽-可以在任何類型的地形上體驗最極端的車輛帶來的駕駛體驗。
zt.title: 砂礫賽車
zt.short_description: Gravel is the ultimate off-road experience. The most extreme racing game that will let you try out amazing stunts in the wildest places on the planet!

fr.title: Moto Racer 4
fr.description:
Dans un monde où le freestyle et la prise de risque dominent, imposez votre style de pilotage aux quatre coins du monde. impressionnez vos adversaires et remportez vos courses avec classe !
Maitrisez drifts, wheelings, embardées et d'autres techniques pour monter sur le podium !
fr.short_description: Pick from a cast of riders and get a taste of freestyle on the race course. Hone your skills to win the championship and send your enemies of the road or into traffic for spectacular crashes.

en.title: Moto Racer 4
en.description:
In a world where freestyle and risk-taking dominate, impose your riding style all around the world.
Impress your opponents and win races with class!
Master drifting, wheelies, sharp turns and other techniques to earn a place on the podium!
en.short_description: Pick from a cast of riders and get a taste of freestyle on the race course. Hone your skills to win the championship and send your enemies of the road or into traffic for spectacular crashes.

de.title: Moto Racer 4
de.description:
Zwinge einer Welt, in der Freestyle und Risikobereitschaft dominieren, deinen eigenen Fahrstil auf. Beeindrucke deine Gegner und beenden deine Rennen als Sieger!
Meistere Driften, Wheelies, enge Kurven und andere Techniken, um dir einen Platz auf dem Podium zu verdienen!
de.short_description: Pick from a cast of riders and get a taste of freestyle on the race course. Hone your skills to win the championship and send your enemies of the road or into traffic for spectacular crashes.

it.title: Moto Racer 4
it.description:
In un universo in cui il freestyle e l'assunzione del rischio dominano, imponete il vostro stile di guida ai quattro angoli del mondo. Impressionate i vostri avversari e vincete le vostre gare con classe!
Gestite drift, wheeling, sbandate e altre tecniche per salire sul podio!
it.short_description: Pick from a cast of riders and get a taste of freestyle on the race course. Hone your skills to win the championship and send your enemies of the road or into traffic for spectacular crashes.

es.title: Moto Racer 4
es.description: Elige entre un elenco de pilotos y disfruta de la carrera de estilo libre. Muéstrales a los demás lo que puedes hacer con tus derivas y trucos! Perfecciona tus habilidades para ganar el campeonato!
es.short_description: Pick from a cast of riders and get a taste of freestyle on the race course. Hone your skills to win the championship and send your enemies of the road or into traffic for spectacular crashes.

pt.title: Moto Racer 4
pt.description: Escolha entre um elenco de cavaleiros e experimente a corrida de freestyle. Mostre aos outros o que você pode fazer com seus drifts e truques! Aperfeiçoe suas habilidades para ganhar o campeonato!
pt.short_description: Pick from a cast of riders and get a taste of freestyle on the race course. Hone your skills to win the championship and send your enemies of the road or into traffic for spectacular crashes.

sl.short_description: Pick from a cast of riders and get a taste of freestyle on the race course. Hone your skills to win the championship and send your enemies of the road or into traffic for spectacular crashes.

zt.description: 從眾多車手中挑選，並在比賽路線上自由騎行。向其他人展示您的技巧！ 磨練您的技能來贏得冠軍，並將您的敵人送上路。

fr.title: Super Dungeon Bros
fr.description: Super Dungeon Bros est un Donjon-RPG rock, où un groupe de rockeurs doit naviguer dans le royaume de Rökheim et ses donjons infernaux pour trouver un butin épique, combattre des hordes de morts-vivants et découvrir les légendes perdues des rockstars.
fr.short_description: This is a rock-themed dungeon brawler where a band of mighty rock bros must navigate the fantasy realm of Rökheim and its hellish dungeons to seek out epic loot and fight hordes of evil undead

en.title: Super Dungeon Bros
en.description: Super Dungeon Bros is a rock-themed dungeon brawler where a band of mighty rock bros must navigate the fantasy realm of Rökheim and its hellish dungeons to seek out epic loot, fight hordes of evil undead and uncover the legends of long lost fabled Rock Stars!
en.short_description: This is a rock-themed dungeon brawler where a band of mighty rock bros must navigate the fantasy realm of Rökheim and its hellish dungeons to seek out epic loot and fight hordes of evil undead

de.title: Super Dungeon Bros
de.description: Super Dungeon Bros ist ein Dungeon-RPG-Felsen, in dem eine Gruppe von Rockern durch das Königreich Rökheim und seine höllischen Dungeons navigieren muss, um epische Beute zu finden, Horden von Untoten zu bekämpfen und verlorene Rockstar-Legenden zu entdecken.
de.short_description: This is a rock-themed dungeon brawler where a band of mighty rock bros must navigate the fantasy realm of Rökheim and its hellish dungeons to seek out epic loot and fight hordes of evil undead

it.title: Super Dungeon Bros
it.description: Super Dungeon Bros è un Dungeon-RPG rock, dove un gruppo di rocker deve navigare nel regno di Rökheim e le sue infernali segrete per trovare bottino epico, combattere orde di non morti e scoprire leggende rock star perdute.
it.short_description: This is a rock-themed dungeon brawler where a band of mighty rock bros must navigate the fantasy realm of Rökheim and its hellish dungeons to seek out epic loot and fight hordes of evil undead

es.title: Super Dungeon Bros
es.description: Super Dungeon Bros es un Dungeon-RPG, donde un grupo de rockeros debe navegar por el reino de Rökheim y sus infernales mazmorras para encontrar un botín épico, luchar contra las hordas de los zombis y descubrir las leyendas de las estrellas de rock perdidas.
es.short_description: This is a rock-themed dungeon brawler where a band of mighty rock bros must navigate the fantasy realm of Rökheim and its hellish dungeons to seek out epic loot and fight hordes of evil undead

pt.title: Super Dungeon Bros
pt.description: Super Dungeon Bros é uma rocha de Dungeon-RPG, onde um grupo de roqueiros deve navegar pelo reino de Rökheim e suas masmorras infernais para encontrar saques épicos, combater hordas de mortos-vivos e descobrir lendas perdidas de estrelas do rock.
pt.short_description: This is a rock-themed dungeon brawler where a band of mighty rock bros must navigate the fantasy realm of Rökheim and its hellish dungeons to seek out epic loot and fight hordes of evil undead

sl.title: Super Dungeon Bros
sl.description: Super Dungeon Bros je arkadna pustolovska igra, v kateri si mora skupina mogočnih rokerskih bratov utirati pot po domišljijskem kraljestvu Rökheima in njegovih peklenskih ječah. Pri tem se borijo proti skupinam zlih nemrtvecev in odkrivajo legende o davno izgubljenih legendarnih rokovskih zvezdnikih.
sl.short_description: This is a rock-themed dungeon brawler where a band of mighty rock bros must navigate the fantasy realm of Rökheim and its hellish dungeons to seek out epic loot and fight hordes of evil undead

zt.description: 超級地牢兄弟（Super Dungeon Bros）是一個以岩石為主題的地牢戰鬥者，在這裡，一群強大的搖滾兄弟必須穿越Rökheim及其地獄般的幻想世界，以尋找史詩般的戰利品，與邪惡的亡靈進行戰鬥，並揭開久違的傳說中的搖滾明星的傳說！
zt.title: 超級地牢兄弟
zt.short_description: This is a rock-themed dungeon brawler where a band of mighty rock bros must navigate the fantasy realm of Rökheim and its hellish dungeons to seek out epic loot and fight hordes of evil undead

fr.title: Castles
fr.description: Castles conte l'histoire de l'ambitieux roi Harold, dont la tour que vous construisez sera la plus grande entreprise. À mesure que la tour grandit, vous devrez faire face à des défis de plus en plus corsés.
fr.short_description: Castles tells the story of the ambitious King Harold, whose greatest achievement will be the tower you are constructing.

en.title: Castles
en.description: Castles tells the story of the ambitious King Harold, whose greatest achievement will be the tower you are constructing. As the tower grows taller and taller, more and more challenges arise along with it. Unpredictable weather combined with the efforts of the jealous and vengeful King Edmund, King Harold’s nemesis, may thwart your upward progress.
en.short_description: Castles tells the story of the ambitious King Harold, whose greatest achievement will be the tower you are constructing.

de.title: Castles
de.description: In Castles geht es um die Geschichte des ehrgeizigen Königs Harold, dessen größter Erfolg der Turm ist, den Sie bauen. Je größer der Turm wird, desto mehr Herausforderungen stellen sich Ihnen. Das unvorhersehbare Wetter sowie die Anstrengungen des eifersüchtigen und rachsüchtigen Königs Edmund, Erzfeind von König Harold, können den Bau Ihres Turms behindern.
de.short_description: Castles tells the story of the ambitious King Harold, whose greatest achievement will be the tower you are constructing.

it.title: Castles
it.description: Castles racconta la storia dell'ambizioso Re Harold la cui conquista più grande sarà la torre che tu stesso costruirai. Man mano che la torre cresce aumenteranno anche le sfide da affrontare.
it.short_description: Castles tells the story of the ambitious King Harold, whose greatest achievement will be the tower you are constructing.

es.title: Castles
es.description: Castillos cuenta la historia del ambicioso Rey Harold, cuya torre que está construyendo será la mayor empresa. A medida que la torre crece, se enfrentarán a retos cada vez más difíciles.
es.short_description: Castles tells the story of the ambitious King Harold, whose greatest achievement will be the tower you are constructing.

pt.title: Castles
pt.description: Castles conta a história do ambicioso Rei Harold, cuja torre você está construindo será a maior empresa. À medida que a torre cresce, você enfrentará desafios cada vez mais desafiadores.
pt.short_description: Castles tells the story of the ambitious King Harold, whose greatest achievement will be the tower you are constructing.

sl.title: Castles
sl.description: Castles prinaša zgodbo o ambicioznem kralju Haroldu, največji dosežek pa bo stolp, ki ga gradite.
sl.short_description: Castles tells the story of the ambitious King Harold, whose greatest achievement will be the tower you are constructing.

zt.description:
(temp synopsis)
城堡講述了雄心勃勃的哈羅德國王的故事，您正在建造的塔樓將成為哈羅德國王的最大成就。隨著塔樓越來越高，隨之而來的挑戰也越來越多。變幻莫測的天氣，再加上嫉妒哈羅德國王的埃德蒙國王，他將盡力來阻礙您的前進。
zt.title: 城堡
zt.short_description: Castles tells the story of the ambitious King Harold, whose greatest achievement will be the tower you are constructing.

name: Castles
copyright: NA

fr.title: Pankapu
fr.description: Pankapu est un jeu de plateformes/action narratif prenant place dans les rêves de Djaha'rell, un enfant perturbé par un tragique incident. Vous jouez Pankapu, un petit guerrier choisi par Iketomi, le Dieu des rêves, pour combattre les Cauchemars envahissant son monde.
fr.short_description: Pankapu takes place in the dreams of Djaha’rell. Upgrade your skills, find new powers, and switch your Aegis in real time in order to get rid of Nightmare's invasion.

en.title: Pankapu
en.description: Pankapu is a narrative action-platformer that takes place in the dreams of Djaha’rell, a child troubled by a tragic incident. Upgrade your skills, find new competencies, switch your Aegis in real time in order to get rid of Nightmare's invasion.
en.short_description: Pankapu takes place in the dreams of Djaha’rell. Upgrade your skills, find new powers, and switch your Aegis in real time in order to get rid of Nightmare's invasion.

de.title: Pankapu
de.description: Pankapu ist ein narrativer 2D-Action-Plattformer, angesiedelt in den Träumen von Djaha'rell, einem Kind, dem einst Schreckliches widerfahren ist. Schlüpfe in die Rolle von Pankapu, dem kleinen Krieger, der vom Gott der Träume auserwählt wurde, um die Traumwelt von der Albtrauminvasion zu befreien.
de.short_description: Pankapu takes place in the dreams of Djaha’rell. Upgrade your skills, find new powers, and switch your Aegis in real time in order to get rid of Nightmare's invasion.

it.title: Pankapu
it.description: Pankapu è un gioco d'azione narrativo ambientato nei sogni di Djaha’rell, un bambino dal passato tragico. Acquisisci e potenzia nuove abilità e cambia la tua Egida in tempo reale per fermare l'invasione degli Incubi: "Combatti per la tua terra, Guardiano dei Sogni"
it.short_description: Pankapu takes place in the dreams of Djaha’rell. Upgrade your skills, find new powers, and switch your Aegis in real time in order to get rid of Nightmare's invasion.

es.title: Pankapu
es.description: Pankapu es una acción-plataforma narrativa que tiene lugar en los sueños de Djaha'rell. Mejora tus habilidades, encuentra nuevos poderes y cambia tu Aegis en tiempo real para deshacerte de la invasión de Nightmare.
es.short_description: Pankapu takes place in the dreams of Djaha’rell. Upgrade your skills, find new powers, and switch your Aegis in real time in order to get rid of Nightmare's invasion.

pt.title: Pankapu
pt.description: Pankapu é uma narrativa de ação-plataforma que acontece nos sonhos de Djaha'rell. Atualize suas habilidades, encontre novos poderes e troque sua Aegis em tempo real para se livrar da invasão de Nightmare.
pt.short_description: Pankapu takes place in the dreams of Djaha’rell. Upgrade your skills, find new powers, and switch your Aegis in real time in order to get rid of Nightmare's invasion.

sl.title: Pankapu
sl.description: Pankapu je pripovedni akcijski platformer, ki se odvija v sanjah Djaha’rella. Nadgradite svoje veščine, poiščite nove moči in v realnem času uporabite ajgis, da se znebite nočne more.
sl.short_description: Pankapu takes place in the dreams of Djaha’rell. Upgrade your skills, find new powers, and switch your Aegis in real time in order to get rid of Nightmare's invasion.

zt.description:
(temp synopsis)
潘卡普是一個發生在賈哈爾的夢中的敘事動作平臺,。升級你的技能,尋找新的力量,並即時切換你的宙斯盾,以擺脫噩夢的入侵。

zt.short_description: Pankapu takes place in the dreams of Djaha’rell. Upgrade your skills, find new powers, and switch your Aegis in real time in order to get rid of Nightmare's invasion.

fr.title: Steredenn: Binary Stars
fr.description:
Steredenn: Binary Stars mélange le shoot'em up et le roguelike et enrobe le tout dans des gros pixels pour des batailles épiques face à des boss redoutables.
Pilotez seul ou avec un ami en co-op et affrontez ce que l'univers vous réserve de pire dans un incroyable combat pour votre survie.
Steredenn: Binary Stars est la version massivement améliorée et corrigée du jeu acclamé et primé par la critique, Steredenn.
Appréciez la rejouabilité infinie et le gameplay sans merci à travers des affrontements intenses, des niveaux générés aléatoirement et des événements spéciaux complètement tordus. Frayez vous un chemin grâce à votre arsenal dévastateur et améliorez votre vaisseau. Forgez votre propre voie dans cet univers impitoyable.
fr.short_description: Steredenn is a frenetic and chaotic space shooter, carved in big beautiful pixels, with insane boss battles.

en.title: Steredenn: Binary Stars
en.description:
Steredenn: Binary Stars is an award-winning mashup of a classic shmup and a rogue-like, carved in big beautiful pixels, with insane boss battles. Fly solo or co-op with a friend, fighting off the worst scourges of space in a never-ending struggle for survival.
Steredenn: Binary Stars is the hugely expanded version of the acclaimed Steredenn. Enjoy infinite replayability and unforgiving gameplay through intense boss fights, (almost) randomly generated environments, twisted space events and a massive arsenal of weapons. Enhance your ship during your flight with upgrades aplenty, and forge your own path across the universe!
en.short_description: Steredenn is a frenetic and chaotic space shooter, carved in big beautiful pixels, with insane boss battles.

de.title: Steredenn: Binary Stars
de.description:
Steredenn: Binary Stars ist eine preisgekrönte Kombination aus einem klassischen Shoot ‘em up und einem Rogue-like, eingebettet in große, wunderschöne Pixel, mit wahnsinnigen Bosskämpfen. Fliege alleine oder mit einem Freund und bekämpfe die schlimmsten Geißeln des Weltalls in einem niemals endenden Überlebenskampf.

Steredenn: Binary Stars ist die umfassend erweiterte Version des gefeierten Steredenn. Erlebe eine endlose Wiederbespielbarkeit und ein gnadenloses Gameplay in intensiven Bosskämpfen, mit (fast) zufällig generierten Umgebungen, verrückten Weltraumereignissen und einem massiven Waffenarsenal. Verbessere dein Schiff auf deiner Reise mit unzähligen Upgrades und schmiede deinen eigenen Pfad durch das Weltall!
de.short_description: Steredenn is a frenetic and chaotic space shooter, carved in big beautiful pixels, with insane boss battles.

it.title: Steredenn: Binary Stars
it.description: Steredenn: Binary Stars è un acclamato mash up tra un classico sparatutto e un roguelike, con un splendida grafica a pixel vecchio stile e battaglie adrenalitiche con boss spietati. Vola da solo o in co-op con un amico e combatti contro terribili minacce spaziali in una lotta infinita per la sopravvivenza.
it.short_description: Steredenn is a frenetic and chaotic space shooter, carved in big beautiful pixels, with insane boss battles.

es.title: Steredenn: Binary Stars
es.description: Steredenn es un disparador espacial frenético y caótico, tallado en grandes y hermosos píxeles, con batallas de jefes locos. Embárcate en tu barco y lucha contra los espantosos piratas espaciales en un combate interminable por tu supervivencia.
es.short_description: Steredenn is a frenetic and chaotic space shooter, carved in big beautiful pixels, with insane boss battles.

pt.title: Steredenn: Binary Stars
pt.description: Steredenn é um atirador espacial frenético e caótico, esculpido em grandes e belos pixels, com batalhas de bosses loucas. Embarque em sua nave e participe da luta contra piratas espaciais terríveis em um combate sem fim para sua sobrevivência.
pt.short_description: Steredenn is a frenetic and chaotic space shooter, carved in big beautiful pixels, with insane boss battles.

sl.title: Steredenn: Binary Stars
sl.description: Steredenn je podivjana in kaotična vesoljska strelska igra, ustvarjena z velikimi čudovitimi piksli, prinaša pa nore šefovske bitke. Vkrcajte se na svojo ladjo in se v neskončnem boju za preživetje borite proti strašnim vesoljskim piratom.
sl.short_description: Steredenn is a frenetic and chaotic space shooter, carved in big beautiful pixels, with insane boss battles.

zt.description: Steredenn是一款激烈的、不規則的射擊類遊戲，嵌入大幅漂亮的像素，擁有瘋狂的終極戰鬥。登上您的戰艦並加入到永不停止對抗可怕的空間海盜的生存之戰中。
zt.title: Steredenn : 雙星
zt.short_description: Steredenn is a frenetic and chaotic space shooter, carved in big beautiful pixels, with insane boss battles.

name: Steredenn: Binary Stars
copyright: © Plug In Digital. All bullets reserved.

fr.title: Tennis World Tour : Roland-Garros Edition
fr.description: Jouez en tant qu'un parmis 30 joueurs de tennis professionnels, apprenez tous les coups, maîtrisez chaque type de surface et découvrez un mode carrière réaliste. Définissez votre style de jeu et votre tactique pour devenir n°1 mondial !
fr.short_description: Play as one of 30 professional tennis players, learn all the shots, master each type of surface and experience a realistic career mode. Define your style of play and tactics to become n°1!

網球世界巡迴賽是一款忠實模擬網球運動的遊戲作品，遊戲內還有一個能讓玩家藉由戰術、體能及心理來訂製比賽策略的獨特系統。另外，遊戲中還收錄羅傑·費德勒、加埃爾·孟菲爾斯、安潔莉克·克伯、加比涅·穆古魯薩、卡洛琳·瓦芝妮雅琪、尼克·基爾喬斯、亞歷山大·茲維列夫及約翰·伊斯內爾等 30 名網球明星供玩家挑選。

fr.title: WRC 6 FIA World Rally Championship
fr.description: Sur circuit, c’est la voiture qui fait la différence, en rallye, c’est le pilote. WRC 6 vous met à l’épreuve : brouillard, boue, crevaisons, courses de nuit, pannes mécaniques… rien ne vous est épargné. WRC 6 c’est aussi tout le contenu officiel 2016,  11 Super Spéciales à échelle réelle, le multi local en écran partagé et toute la saison eSportss WRC 2017 en accès gratuit !
fr.short_description: On a race track, the car makes all the difference. In a rally, it's the driver. Fog, mud, punctures... you have to deal with it all.

en.title: WRC 6 FIA World Rally Championship
en.description: On a race track, the car makes all the difference. In a rally, it's the driver. Fog, mud, punctures... you have to deal with it all. WRC 6 includes all of the official 2016 content, 11 Super Special Stages on a 1:1 scale, local split-screen multiplayer and free access to the entire 2017 eSports WRC.
en.short_description: On a race track, the car makes all the difference. In a rally, it's the driver. Fog, mud, punctures... you have to deal with it all.

de.title: WRC 6 FIA World Rally Championship
de.description:
Auf Rennstrecken macht das Auto den Unterschied, in einer Rallye der Fahrer. WRC 6 fordert dich heraus: Nebel, Schlamm, Reifenschäden, Nachtrennen, Motorschäden ... du musst dich allem stellen.
WRC 6 bietet außerdem alle offiziellen Inhalte von 2016, 11 Super-Wertungsprüfungen im Maßstab 1:1, lokalen Split-Screen-Multiplayer und Gratiszugang zur gesamten eSports WRC 2017!
de.short_description: On a race track, the car makes all the difference. In a rally, it's the driver. Fog, mud, punctures... you have to deal with it all.

it.title: WRC 6 FIA World Rally Championship
it.description: In pista conta la vettura, nei rally il pilota. Nebbia, fango, forature... sarai tu a dover trovare una soluzione. WRC 6 include tutti i contenuti ufficiali 2016, 11 super tappe speciali in scala 1:1, multigiocatore locale a schermo condiviso e accesso gratuito a tutta la stagione eSports WRC 2017.
it.short_description: On a race track, the car makes all the difference. In a rally, it's the driver. Fog, mud, punctures... you have to deal with it all.

es.title: WRC 6 FIA World Rally Championship
es.description: En una pista de carreras, el coche marca la diferencia. En un rally, es el conductor. Niebla, barro, pinchazos... tienes que lidiar con todo. La CMR 6 incluye todo el contenido oficial de 2016, y muchas actualizaciones desde el contenido de 2017.
es.short_description: On a race track, the car makes all the difference. In a rally, it's the driver. Fog, mud, punctures... you have to deal with it all.

pt.title: WRC 6 FIA World Rally Championship
pt.description: Numa pista de corrida, o carro faz toda a diferença. Num rali, é o piloto. Nevoeiro, lama, furos... é preciso lidar com tudo. A WRC 6 inclui todo o conteúdo oficial de 2016 e muitas atualizações desde o conteúdo de 2017.
pt.short_description: On a race track, the car makes all the difference. In a rally, it's the driver. Fog, mud, punctures... you have to deal with it all.

sl.title: WRC 6 FIA World Rally Championship
sl.description: Na dirkališču šteje avtomobil. Pri reliju pa je to voznik. Megla, blato, predrte gume ... z vsem se je treba znati spoprijeti. Igra WRC 6 vključuje vse uradne vsebine iz leta 2016 in veliko nadgradenj iz leta 2017.
sl.short_description: On a race track, the car makes all the difference. In a rally, it's the driver. Fog, mud, punctures... you have to deal with it all.

在世界拉力錦標賽中盡情馳騁，玩家需要在不同環境、氣候的地方展示他們的駕駛技巧，

fr.title: Yono and the Celestial Elephants
fr.description: Les Éléphants sont de puissants protecteurs du monde à qui les étoiles donnent naissance une fois par millénaire. Nous sommes à l'ère de l’Éléphant Yono. Yono est encore très jeune cependant, et dans un royaume habité par des Humains féodaux, des Bonewights (les squelettes morts-vivants) et des robots Mekani, ce n’est pas facile de tirer sa trompe du jeu.
fr.short_description: Yono and the Celestial Elephant is a grand adventure, featuring carefully designed puzzles, treasure hunts, a sprinkling combat and a world full of people.

en.title: Yono and the Celestial Elephants
en.description: Elephants are a mighty protectors of the world, born from the stars once per millennium. This is the age of Elephant Yono. But Yono is still so very young and in a kingdom inhabited by feudal Humans, undead Bonewights and robotic Mekani, it's not easy to keep one's trunk out of trouble.
en.short_description: Yono and the Celestial Elephant is a grand adventure, featuring carefully designed puzzles, treasure hunts, a sprinkling combat and a world full of people.

de.title: Yono and the Celestial Elephants
de.description: Elefanten sind mächtige Beschützer der Welt, die einmal im Jahrtausend aus den Sternen geboren werden. Dies ist das Zeitalter von Elefant Yono. Yono ist noch so jung und in einem Königreich, dass von feudalen Menschen, untoten Knochengeschöpfen und Mechani Robotern bewohnt wird, ist es nicht einfach den Rüssel sauber zu halten.
de.short_description: Yono and the Celestial Elephant is a grand adventure, featuring carefully designed puzzles, treasure hunts, a sprinkling combat and a world full of people.

it.title: Yono and the Celestial Elephants
it.description: Yono and the Celestial Elephant è una fantastica avventura che unisce rompicapi accuratamente disegnati, cacce al tesoro, un pizzico di combattimento e un modo pieno di gente. Vesti i panni di un giovane elefante a cui è stato affidato il compito di salvare un mondo mai visto prima e scopri l'avvincente storia di un regno in cui umani, zombie e robot vivono fianco a fianco.
it.short_description: Yono and the Celestial Elephant is a grand adventure, featuring carefully designed puzzles, treasure hunts, a sprinkling combat and a world full of people.

es.title: Yono and the Celestial Elephants
es.description: Yono y el Elefante Celestial es una gran aventura, con rompecabezas cuidadosamente diseñados, búsquedas de tesoros, un combate por aspersión y un mundo lleno de gente.
es.short_description: Yono and the Celestial Elephant is a grand adventure, featuring carefully designed puzzles, treasure hunts, a sprinkling combat and a world full of people.

pt.title: Yono and the Celestial Elephants
pt.description: Yono e o Elefante Celestial é uma grande aventura, com puzzles cuidadosamente desenhados, caça ao tesouro, um combate de aspersão e um mundo cheio de gente.
pt.short_description: Yono and the Celestial Elephant is a grand adventure, featuring carefully designed puzzles, treasure hunts, a sprinkling combat and a world full of people.

sl.title: Yono and the Celestial Elephants
sl.description: Yono and the Celestial Elephant je velika pustolovščina s skrbno sestavljenimi miselnimi ugankami, lovom na zaklad, spopadi in svetom, polnem ljudi.
sl.short_description: Yono and the Celestial Elephant is a grand adventure, featuring carefully designed puzzles, treasure hunts, a sprinkling combat and a world full of people.

zt.description: 大象是世界上強大的保護者，每千年一次從星星出生。這是大象Yono的時代。但Yono仍然非常年輕，在封建的人類，不死的Bonewights和機器人Mekani居住的王國中，讓象鼻擺脫困境並不容易。
zt.title: Yono 和天空之象
zt.short_description: Yono and the Celestial Elephant is a grand adventure, featuring carefully designed puzzles, treasure hunts, a sprinkling combat and a world full of people.

fr.title: Deliver Us The Moon
fr.description:
Deliver Us The Moon est un thriller de science-fiction se déroulant dans un futur apocalyptique où les ressources naturelles de la Terre sont épuisées. Dans l’espoir de résoudre la crise énergétique, les grandes puissances ont créé la World Space Agency et ont découvert une nouvelle source d’énergie prometteuse sur la lune.

La World Space Agency a colonisé et exploité la lune jusqu’à cette nuit fatidique où toutes les communications avec la Terre ont cessé et que la source d'énergie fut perdue. Des années plus tard, vous endossez le rôle de l’ultime astronaute de la Terre dans une mission de la dernière chance afin de découvrir ce qu’il s’est passé et de sauver l’humanité.
fr.short_description: In this Sci-Fi thriller set in an apocalyptic near future, a lone astronaut is sent to the moon on a critical mission to save humanity from extinction.

en.title: Deliver Us The Moon
en.description:
Deliver Us The Moon is a Sci-Fi thriller set in an apocalyptic near future where Earth's natural resources are depleted. In an effort to solve the energy crisis, global powers created the World Space Agency and secured a promising new source of energy on the moon.

The World Space Agency colonized and operated from the moon until one fateful night all communications with Earth ceased and the energy source was lost. Now, years later, you assume the role of Earth's last astronaut on a do-or-die mission to investigate what happened and save humanity.
en.short_description: In this Sci-Fi thriller set in an apocalyptic near future, a lone astronaut is sent to the moon on a critical mission to save humanity from extinction.

de.title: Deliver Us The Moon
de.description: Deliver Us The Moon ist ein Science-Fiction-Thriller in einer apokalyptischen Zukunft, in der die natürlichen Ressourcen der Erde erschöpft sind. Ein einsamer Astronaut wird auf eine Mission zum Mond geschickt, um die Menschheit vor dem Aussterben zu bewahren.
de.short_description: In this Sci-Fi thriller set in an apocalyptic near future, a lone astronaut is sent to the moon on a critical mission to save humanity from extinction.

it.title: Deliver Us The Moon
it.description: Deliver Us The Moon è un thriller di fantascienza ambientato in un futuro apocalittico dove le risorse naturali della Terra sono esaurite. Un astronauta solitario viene inviato in missione sulla Luna per salvare l'umanità dall'estinzione.
it.short_description: In this Sci-Fi thriller set in an apocalyptic near future, a lone astronaut is sent to the moon on a critical mission to save humanity from extinction.

es.title: Deliver Us The Moon
es.description: Deliver Us The Moon es un thriller de ciencia ficción ambientado en un futuro apocalíptico donde se agotan los recursos naturales de la Tierra. Un astronauta solitario es enviado en una misión a la Luna para salvar a la humanidad de la extinción.
es.short_description: In this Sci-Fi thriller set in an apocalyptic near future, a lone astronaut is sent to the moon on a critical mission to save humanity from extinction.

pt.title: Deliver Us The Moon
pt.description: Deliver Us The Moon é um thriller de ficção científica situado num futuro apocalíptico onde os recursos naturais da Terra estão esgotados. Um astronauta solitário é enviado numa missão à Lua para salvar a humanidade da extinção.
pt.short_description: In this Sci-Fi thriller set in an apocalyptic near future, a lone astronaut is sent to the moon on a critical mission to save humanity from extinction.

sl.title: Deliver Us The Moon
sl.description: Igra Deliver Us The Moon je znanstvenofantastični triler, postavljen v bližnjo apokaliptično prihodnost, kjer so naravni viri Zemlje že povsem izčrpani. Osamljenega astronavta pošljejo na Luno s pomembno nalogo, da reši človeštvo pred izumrtjem.
sl.short_description: In this Sci-Fi thriller set in an apocalyptic near future, a lone astronaut is sent to the moon on a critical mission to save humanity from extinction.

zt.description:
Deliver Us The Moon是一部科幻驚悚片，背景是世界末日，地球的自然資源已被耗盡。為了解決能源危機，全球大國創建了世界太空總署，並確保了月亮上有希望的新能源。
世界太空總署在月球開始殖民並運作，直到一個決定性的夜晚，與地球的一切通訊都中斷，能源也消失了。數年後的現在，您承擔著地球上最後一位宇航員的角色，該任務是“死而復生”，以調查發生的事情和拯救人類。
zt.title: 飛向月球
zt.short_description: In this Sci-Fi thriller set in an apocalyptic near future, a lone astronaut is sent to the moon on a critical mission to save humanity from extinction.

fr.description:
The ABC Murders est un jeu d'aventure et d'enquête à la 3e personne, adapté du célèbre roman d'Agatha Christie.

Dans la peau du célèbre détective privé Hercule Poirot, vous affronterez un mystérieux adversaire se faisant appeler « ABC ». Vos talents de fin limier seront mis plus que jamais à contribution !
fr.title: Agatha Christie - The ABC Murders
fr.short_description: You are the famous private detective Hercule Poirot and, once again, you find yourself up against a mysterious serial killer who goes by the name of "ABC".

en.description: The ABC Murders is an adventure and investigation game adapted from the classic Agatha Christie novel. The player embodies the famous Hercule Poirot in a 3rd person perspective adventure game packed with mysteries. Once again, the private detective will find himself up against a mysterious opponent who goes by the name of 'ABC'. Your intelligence will never have been so challenged!
