es.title: Among the Sleep - Enhanced Edition
es.description: Among the Sleep es una galardonada aventura de terror en primera persona en la que juegas a un niño pequeño en busca de tu madre después de sonidos ominosos que te despiertan en medio de la noche.
es.short_description: In  Among the Sleep you play as a small child trapped in a weird nightmare where you go looking for your mom.

pt.title: Among the Sleep - Enhanced Edition
pt.description: Among the Sleep e um jogo premiado à primeira pessoa de terror em que você joga, uma criança à procura da sua mãe depois de ter sido acordado no meio de uma noite.
pt.short_description: In  Among the Sleep you play as a small child trapped in a weird nightmare where you go looking for your mom.

zt.description: 《睡夢之中》是由Krillbite Studio開發第一人稱視角恐怖冒險遊戲。與大多數恐怖冒險類遊戲不同，玩家是扮演一位兩歲小嬰兒，在半夜睡醒後發現媽媽不在身旁，進而開始帶著夥伴泰迪熊一同展開尋找媽媽的異世界冒險旅程。
zt.title: 睡夢之中
zt.short_description: In  Among the Sleep you play as a small child trapped in a weird nightmare where you go looking for your mom.

sl.title: Among the Sleep - Enhanced Edition
sl.description: Among the Sleep: Enhanced Edition je nova in izboljšana različica nagrajene prvoosebne grozljivke. Igro igrate v vlogi majhnega otroka, ujetega v čudno nočno moro, v kateri išče mamo.
sl.short_description: In  Among the Sleep you play as a small child trapped in a weird nightmare where you go looking for your mom.

name: Among the Sleep - Enhanced Edition
copyright: © Copyright Shmopyright - Krillbite Studio - No rights reserved, but please don't steal our stuff.

fr.title: Anarcute
fr.description:
Anarcute est le plus mignon des jeux d’émeute, avec un style visuel trop choupi et un gameplay de Beat’em all-foule unique!

L’heure est grave. Un groupe de terribles corporations domine les principales villes du Monde. À travers les médias qu’ils contrôlent, ils ont lavé le cerveau de la police et dictent sans complexe la manière dont les citoyens doivent vivre leurs vies depuis leurs immenses gratte-ciel.
Il est temps d'agir ! Prenez le contrôle de la révolution pour faire face à la terrible Brainwash Patrol qui malmène le monde !
fr.short_description: Anarcute is a rampaging riot simulator, combining adorable aesthetics with huge-scale chaos, colourful destruction and crowd-beat’em all gameplay!

en.title: Anarcute
en.description:
Anarcute is a rampaging riot simulator, combining adorable aesthetics with huge-scale chaos, colourful destruction and crowd-beat’em all gameplay!


These are dark times. A group of evil corporations has taken over the major cities of the world. They took control of the media, brainwashed the police and now shamelessly dictate the citizens' lives from the heights of their skyscrapers.
It is time to act! Take control of the revolution to face the terrible Brainwash Patrol who’s dominating the world.
en.short_description: Anarcute is a rampaging riot simulator, combining adorable aesthetics with huge-scale chaos, colourful destruction and crowd-beat’em all gameplay!

de.title: Anarcute
de.description:
Anarcute ist das niedlichste Krawallspiel und verzaubert mit einer einprägsamen künstlerischen Gestaltung und einem einzigartigen Beat'em all-Gameplay!


Es herrschen düstere Zeiten. Eine Gruppe niederträchtiger Korporationen hat die Metropolen der Welt erobert. Sie übernahmen die Kontrolle über die Medien, haben die Polizei einer Gehirnwäsche unterzogen und entscheiden nun schamlos aus der Sicherheit ihrer Wolkenkratzer über das Leben der Bürger.
Zeit, zu handeln! Nimm die Revolution selbst in die Hand und stelle dich der üblen Brainwash Patrol, die sich die Herrschaft über den Planeten unter den Nagel gerissen hat.
de.short_description: Anarcute is a rampaging riot simulator, combining adorable aesthetics with huge-scale chaos, colourful destruction and crowd-beat’em all gameplay!

it.title: Anarcute
it.description:
Anarcute è il gioco di rivolta più simpatico al mondo, con un'interfaccia artistica accattivante e una soluzione tutto-in-uno!

Sono tempi oscuri. Un gruppo di aziende malvagie ha conquistato le principali città del mondo. Ha preso il controllo dei mezzi di comunicazione, ha fatto il lavaggio del cervello alla polizia e, adesso, controlla la vita dei cittadini dall'alto dei loro grattacieli.
È tempo di reagire! Prendi il controllo della rivolta e affronta il terribile Brainwash Patrol che sta dominando il mondo.
it.short_description: Anarcute is a rampaging riot simulator, combining adorable aesthetics with huge-scale chaos, colourful destruction and crowd-beat’em all gameplay!

es.title: Anarcute
es.description: Anarcute es un simulador de disturbios desbocado, que combina una estética adorable con un caos a gran escala, una destrucción llena de colorido y un modo de juego para derrotar a la multitud.
es.short_description: Anarcute is a rampaging riot simulator, combining adorable aesthetics with huge-scale chaos, colourful destruction and crowd-beat’em all gameplay!

pt.title: Anarcute
pt.description: Anarcute é um simulador de tumultos que combina uma estética adorável com o caos em grande escala, a destruição colorida e a jogabilidade de todos eles!
pt.short_description: Anarcute is a rampaging riot simulator, combining adorable aesthetics with huge-scale chaos, colourful destruction and crowd-beat’em all gameplay!

sl.title: Anarcute
sl.description:
Pretepaška igra Anarcute simulira divje izgrede, v kaos in uničenje pa preplete čudovito estetiko.
Pred nami so temni časi. Skupina zlobnih korporacij je prevzela nadzor nad večjimi svetovnimi mesti. Obvladujejo medije, sprali so možgane policiji in zdaj iz svojih prostorov v visokih nebotičnikih državljanom brezsramno narekujejo življenje.
Čas je za ukrepanje! Prevzemite vlogo v revoluciji in se soočite s strašno patruljo, ki nadvladuje svet.
sl.short_description: Anarcute is a rampaging riot simulator, combining adorable aesthetics with huge-scale chaos, colourful destruction and crowd-beat’em all gameplay!

zt.description: Anarcute是一款暴動模擬遊戲，集合了可愛的混亂，多彩的毀壞與獨特的遊戲玩法！
zt.title: 暴動萌軍
zt.short_description: Anarcute is a rampaging riot simulator, combining adorable aesthetics with huge-scale chaos, colourful destruction and crowd-beat’em all gameplay!

name: Anarcute
copyright: © Plug In Digital. Made in Ch'nord.

fr.title: BlazBlue: Calamity Trigger
fr.description:
BlazBlue. La nouvelle reference jeu de combat 2D haute definition, propose des combats sur un rythme effréné, en s'appuyant sur un casting de personnages hétéroclites. Préparez vous a des combats hallucinants !

Découvrez les 12 combattants. Héros torturé, ninja hyperactif, brute surdimensionnée ou anti-héros psychopathe, il y en a forcément un qui vous conviendra. Découvrez leur histoire propre aux secrets totalement étonnants...
fr.short_description: BlazBlue is a traditional 2D fighter where two characters duel. The story involves dissent and destruction among a powerful council, known as "the Library".

en.description: BlazBlue is a traditional 2D fighter where two characters participate in a duel. The story of the game involves dissent and destruction among a powerful council, known unofficially as "the Library," which controls a great power that once saved humanity, but which now wields its power in protective, some say repressive, ways.
en.title: BlazBlue: Calamity Trigger
en.short_description: BlazBlue is a traditional 2D fighter where two characters duel. The story involves dissent and destruction among a powerful council, known as "the Library".

de.title: BlazBlue: Calamity Trigger
de.description: BlazBlue ist ein klassisches 2-D-Kampfspiel, bei dem sich zwei Charaktere duellieren. Die Geschichte des Spiels dreht sich um Zwietracht und Zerstörung innerhalb eines mächtigen Rates, der inoffiziell auch als «die Bibliothek» bekannt ist und eine grosse Macht kontrolliert, welche einst die Menschheit gerettet hat, aber nun ihre Stärke auf schützende oder gar – wie manche behaupten – unterdrückende Weise ausübt.
de.short_description: BlazBlue is a traditional 2D fighter where two characters duel. The story involves dissent and destruction among a powerful council, known as "the Library".

it.title: BlazBlue: Calamity Trigger
it.description: BlazBlue è un tradizionale picchiaduro 2D dove due personaggi si affrontano in duello. La storia del gioco riguarda vicende di dissenso e distruzione in un potente consiglio, conosciuto ufficiosamente come «la Biblioteca», che controlla un grande potere che una volta ha salvato l'umanità, ma che ora esercita in modo difensivo, secondo alcuni repressivo.
it.short_description: BlazBlue is a traditional 2D fighter where two characters duel. The story involves dissent and destruction among a powerful council, known as "the Library".

es.title: BlazBlue: Calamity Trigger
es.description: BlazBlue es un luchador 2D tradicional en el que dos personajes se baten en duelo. La historia involucra el disenso y la destrucción entre un poderoso consejo, conocido como "la Biblioteca", que controla un gran poder que una vez salvó a la humanidad.
es.short_description: BlazBlue is a traditional 2D fighter where two characters duel. The story involves dissent and destruction among a powerful council, known as "the Library".

pt.title: BlazBlue: Calamity Trigger
pt.description: BlazBlue é um lutador tradicional 2D onde dois personagens duelam. A história envolve dissidência e destruição entre um poderoso conselho, conhecido como "a Biblioteca", que controla um grande poder que uma vez salvou a humanidade.
pt.short_description: BlazBlue is a traditional 2D fighter where two characters duel. The story involves dissent and destruction among a powerful council, known as "the Library".

zt.title: 蒼翼默示錄：厄運扳機
zt.description: 蒼翼啟示錄是一款2D對戰格鬥遊戲，遊戲的故事涉及虛空情報統制機構委員會之間的異議和破壞，該議會被非正式地稱為“圖書館”，該議會控制著曾經拯救人類的巨大力量，但現在以保護性（有人說是壓制性）的方式運用其權力。
zt.short_description: BlazBlue is a traditional 2D fighter where two characters duel. The story involves dissent and destruction among a powerful council, known as "the Library".

sl.title: BlazBlue: Calamity Trigger
sl.description: BlazBlue je tradicionalna dvodimenzionalna igra, v kateri se bojujeta dva lika. Zgodba prinaša nesoglasja in uničenje močnega sveta, ki nadzoruje veliko moč, ki je nekoč rešila človeštvo.
sl.short_description: BlazBlue is a traditional 2D fighter where two characters duel. The story involves dissent and destruction among a powerful council, known as "the Library".

name: BlazBlue: Calamity Trigger
copyright: © ARC SYSTEM WORKS Co., Ltd. Published and distributed by H2 Interactive Co., Ltd. with permission from ARC SYSTEM WORKS.

fr.title: Bombslinger
fr.description:
Enfilez le poncho du Bombslinger, un bandit impitoyable passé paisible fermier, qui veut maintenant venger le meurtre de sa dame et la destruction de son ranch par son ancienne clique.
Explosez des hordes d'ennemis et maîtrisez le gameplay classique du lanceur de bombes dans une aventure solo aux niveaux générés aléatoirement, aux personnages possédant des compétences à améliorer et tout un arsenal d'objets défensifs et offensifs.

Et quand vous voulez faire une pause dans votre aventure solo, faites venir vos amis dans un match à mort frénétique pour 4 !
fr.short_description: A Bomberman-inspired Wild West action game with bombs! A solo hardcore reinvention of the iconic explosive action!

en.description:
Bombslinger is a Wild West action game filled with explosive single player action and hectic 4 player deathmatch battles!

Wear the poncho of the Bombslinger, a ruthless bandit turned peaceful rancher on a quest to avenge the murder of his missus and destruction of his ranch at the hands of his former posse.
Bomb your way through hordes of enemies and master the classic bomb-slinging gameplay in a solo adventure with procedurally generated levels, character progression with skill upgrades, and a variety of offensive and defensive items.
And when you want a break from the solo adventure, take the fight to your friends in hectic 4-player deathmatch battles!
en.title: Bombslinger
en.short_description: A Bomberman-inspired Wild West action game with bombs! A solo hardcore reinvention of the iconic explosive action!

de.description:
Bombslinger ist ein actiongeladenes Western-Spiel voller explosiver Einzelspieler-Action und hektischen 4-Spieler-Deathmatch-Schlachten!

Trage den Poncho des Bombslingers, ehemals ein rücksichtsloser Bandit, dann friedlicher Rancher, auf der Mission den Mord an seiner Frau und die Zerstörung seiner Ranch durch seine ehemaligen Posse zu rächen.

Bombardiere dir einen Weg durch Horden von Feinden und beherrsche das klassische Bombenangriffsspiel in einem Solo-Abenteuer mit linear erzeugten Levels, Charakterentwicklung mit Skill-Upgrades und einer Vielzahl von Offensiv- und Defensiv-Items.

Und wenn du eine Pause vom Solo-Abenteuer willst, bring den Kampf zu deinen Freunden in hektischen 4-Spieler-Deathmatch-Schlachten!
de.title: Bombslinger
de.short_description: A Bomberman-inspired Wild West action game with bombs! A solo hardcore reinvention of the iconic explosive action!

it.description:
Bombslinger è un gioco d'azione stile Far West con una modalità in singolo ricca d'azione esplosiva e frenetiche battaglie deathmatch a 4 giocatori.

Indossa il poncho del Bombslinger, uno spietato bandito diventato un tranquillo contadino, che vuole vendicarsi dell'assassinio della sua amata e della distruzione del suo ranch per mano della sua vecchia banda.

Fai esplodere orde di nemici e affina le tue abilità di lanciabombe in un'avventura in solitaria con livelli generati casualmente, personaggi con potenziamenti di abilità e una varietà di oggetti offensivi e difensivi.

E quando vuoi fare una pausa, sfida i tuoi amici in frenetiche battaglie deathmatch a 4 giocatori!
it.title: Bombslinger
it.short_description: A Bomberman-inspired Wild West action game with bombs! A solo hardcore reinvention of the iconic explosive action!

es.title: Bombslinger
es.description: Un juego de acción del Salvaje Oeste inspirado en Bomberman con bombas! Una reinvención hardcore en solitario de la icónica acción explosiva!
es.short_description: A Bomberman-inspired Wild West action game with bombs! A solo hardcore reinvention of the iconic explosive action!

pt.title: Bombslinger
pt.description: Um jogo de ação inspirado em Bomberman Wild West com bombas! Uma reinvenção hardcore solo da ação explosiva icônica!
pt.short_description: A Bomberman-inspired Wild West action game with bombs! A solo hardcore reinvention of the iconic explosive action!

zt.description: 《Bombslinger》以美國西部開拓時代作為背景，玩家則是武裝強盜團「Bombslinger」的一員，為了替妻子報仇而向仇家報復，使用自己特製的炸彈對付敵人。

zt.short_description: A Bomberman-inspired Wild West action game with bombs! A solo hardcore reinvention of the iconic explosive action!

sl.description: Bomberslinger je z divjim zahodom navdahnjena akcijska igra, ki vključuje bombe. Samostojna igra je na novo poustvarjena legendarna eksplozivna akcija!
sl.short_description: A Bomberman-inspired Wild West action game with bombs! A solo hardcore reinvention of the iconic explosive action!

fr.title: Citrouille: Sweet Witches
fr.description: Citrouille : Sweet Witches est une version moderne de vieux classiques d'arcade. Bravez les dangers et couvrez le monde de fleurs à l'aide de vos échelles magiques. Jouez seul, ensemble ou en VS pour redécouvrir le défi du bon vieux temps.
fr.short_description: Citrouille: Sweet Witches is a modern spin on old arcade classics. Brave danger and cover the world with flowers using your magic ladders.

en.title: Citrouille: Sweet Witches
en.description: Citrouille: Sweet Witches is a modern spin on old arcade classics. Brave danger and cover the world with flowers using your magic ladders. Play alone, together or settle the score in versus to rediscover the challenge of the good old days.
en.short_description: Citrouille: Sweet Witches is a modern spin on old arcade classics. Brave danger and cover the world with flowers using your magic ladders.

de.title: Citrouille: Sweet Witches
de.description: Pumpkin: Sweet Witches ist eine moderne Version alter Arcade-Klassiker. Wage die Gefahren und bedecke die Welt mit Blumen mit deinen magischen Leitern. Spielen Sie allein, zusammen oder in VS, um die Herausforderung der guten alten Zeiten wieder zu entdecken.
de.short_description: Citrouille: Sweet Witches is a modern spin on old arcade classics. Brave danger and cover the world with flowers using your magic ladders.

it.title: Citrouille: Sweet Witches
it.description: zucca: dolci streghe è una versione moderna di vecchi classici arcade. Coraggiosi i pericoli e coprire il mondo con i fiori usando le tue scale magiche. Gioca da solo, insieme o in VS per riscoprire la sfida dei bei tempi andati.
it.short_description: Citrouille: Sweet Witches is a modern spin on old arcade classics. Brave danger and cover the world with flowers using your magic ladders.

es.description: Calabaza: Sweet Witches es una versión moderna de los antiguos clásicos de arcade. Enfréntate a los peligros y cubre el mundo con flores usando tus escaleras mágicas. Juega solo, junto o en VS para redescubrir el reto de los buenos tiempos.

pt.description: Abóbora: Sweet Witches é uma versão moderna dos antigos clássicos arcade. Enfrente os perigos e cubra o mundo com flores usando suas escadas mágicas. Jogue sozinho, juntos ou em VS para redescobrir o desafio dos bons velhos tempos.

sl.description: Citrouille: Sweet Witches je sodobna izpeljanka stare arkadne klasike. Spopadite se z nevarnostjo in prekrijte svet s cvetjem, pri tem pa uporabite čarobne lestve. Igrajte sami, skupaj ali popravite rezultat iz preteklosti ter se polotite izziva iz dobrih starih časov.
sl.short_description: Citrouille: Sweet Witches is a modern spin on old arcade classics. Brave danger and cover the world with flowers using your magic ladders.

zt.description: Citrouille: Sweet Witches是一款街機平台遊戲，講的是可愛的小女巫完成尋找糖果的任務。儘管外表很可愛，但遊戲玩法卻毫不留情。遊戲中沒有跳躍，你必須依靠你的魔法梯子、魔咒和道具來完成。勇敢面對危險，面對你的宿敵，讓鮮花遍佈世界，並獲得你應得的獎賞！

fr.title: Cubikolor
fr.description:
Faites évoluer votre cube en jouant sur la correspondance entre les couleurs de vos faces et les couleurs du plateau pour arriver à bout de chaque niveaux.
Découvrez de nombreuses cases spéciales aux effets surprenants, et évoluez au travers des différentes ambiances de jeu, en mode Classik ou en HardKore.
Soyez plus malin que la machine et utilisez ses pièges à votre avantage. Seuls les meilleurs sauront en venir à bout.
fr.short_description: Armed only with your logic and your Kube, move through the 150 levels outwitting the traps in the System, an evil, scheming entity, to confront the machine and pass the test!

en.description: Will you achieve the highest score? Move your Kube by matching the kolors of the sides and the platform to complete each level. Discover lots of special Kubes with some surprising effects, and advance through the different game backdrops in Classik or Hardkore mode. Outsmart the System and use its traps to your advantage. Only the best will survive.
en.title: Cubikolor
en.short_description: Armed only with your logic and your Kube, move through the 150 levels outwitting the traps in the System, an evil, scheming entity, to confront the machine and pass the test!

de.title: Cubikolor
de.description: Überliste in 150 Leveln die Fallen des Systems, eines bösartigen und listigen Wesens, tritt dann gegen die Maschine an und bestehe den Test! Dabei bist du nur mit deinem logischen Denken und deinem Kubus gerüstet.
de.short_description: Armed only with your logic and your Kube, move through the 150 levels outwitting the traps in the System, an evil, scheming entity, to confront the machine and pass the test!

it.title: Cubikolor
it.description: Sposta il tuo Kubo abbinando i kolori delle facce a quelli della piattaforma per completare ogni livello. Scopri tanti Kubi speciali dagli effetti sorprendenti ed esplora i vari scenari di gioco nelle modalità Classika e Hardkore.
it.short_description: Armed only with your logic and your Kube, move through the 150 levels outwitting the traps in the System, an evil, scheming entity, to confront the machine and pass the test!

es.title: Cubikolor
es.description: Armado sólo con tu lógica y tu Kube, muévete a través de los 150 niveles superando a las trampas del Sistema, una entidad malvada e intrigante, para enfrentarte a la máquina y pasar la prueba!
es.short_description: Armed only with your logic and your Kube, move through the 150 levels outwitting the traps in the System, an evil, scheming entity, to confront the machine and pass the test!

pt.title: Cubikolor
pt.description: Armado apenas com sua lógica e seu Kube, mover-se através dos 150 níveis ultrapassando as armadilhas no sistema, uma entidade maligna, planejando, para confrontar a máquina e passar no teste!
pt.short_description: Armed only with your logic and your Kube, move through the 150 levels outwitting the traps in the System, an evil, scheming entity, to confront the machine and pass the test!

zt.description:
在這個 3D 世界，玩家必須在上百個層級中匹配正確的顏色才能移動。遊戲中不同的消除方式有不同的玩法效果，如時間限制等。
在經典模式和核心模式下獲得高分和獎牌。 《彩色方塊》的遊戲場景非常漂亮，原聲音樂和沈浸式的內容都不錯。你在玩這款魔術方塊解謎遊戲時會發現一些向經典魔術方塊致敬的地方。
zt.title: 彩色方塊
zt.short_description: Armed only with your logic and your Kube, move through the 150 levels outwitting the traps in the System, an evil, scheming entity, to confront the machine and pass the test!

sl.title: Cubikolor
sl.description: Z uporabo logike se prebijte čez 150 stopenj igre. Prelisičite pasti v sistemu in zlobno, spletkarsko entiteto ter opravite preizkušnjo.
sl.short_description: Armed only with your logic and your Kube, move through the 150 levels outwitting the traps in the System, an evil, scheming entity, to confront the machine and pass the test!

name: Cubikolor

fr.title: Disney Planes
fr.description:
Incarnez Dusty, Skypper et tous les héros du film Planes, pour participer à de virevoltantes péripéties aériennes, et volez en compétition, au milieu des avions les plus rapides au monde.

Faites des courses à travers le monde en participant au Grand Prix Mondial.
fr.short_description: Disney’s Planes takes players on a high-flying, action-packed animated comedy adventure with Dusty Crophopper, a big-hearted, speed-loving crop duster.

en.description: From above the world of “Cars”, Disney’s Planes takes players on a high-flying, action-packed animated comedy adventure with Dusty Crophopper, a big-hearted, speed-loving crop duster, voiced by actor and comedian Dane Cook. Take to the skies with Dusty and friends as they embark on global missions and grand adventures around the world.
en.title: Disney Planes
en.short_description: Disney’s Planes takes players on a high-flying, action-packed animated comedy adventure with Dusty Crophopper, a big-hearted, speed-loving crop duster.

de.title: Disney Planes
de.description: Disney's Planes nimmt die Spieler mit auf ein hochfliegendes, actiongeladenes Animationskomödienabenteuer mit Dusty Crophopper, einem großherzigen, geschwindigkeitsliebenden Staubwedel. Begib dich auf globale Missionen und große Abenteuer auf der ganzen Welt.
de.short_description: Disney’s Planes takes players on a high-flying, action-packed animated comedy adventure with Dusty Crophopper, a big-hearted, speed-loving crop duster.

it.title: Disney Planes

it.short_description: Disney’s Planes takes players on a high-flying, action-packed animated comedy adventure with Dusty Crophopper, a big-hearted, speed-loving crop duster.

es.description: Disney's Planes lleva a los jugadores a una aventura de comedia animada, repleta de acción, con Dusty Crophopper, un fumigador de gran corazón y amante de la velocidad. Embárcate en misiones globales y grandes aventuras alrededor del mundo.
es.short_description: Disney’s Planes takes players on a high-flying, action-packed animated comedy adventure with Dusty Crophopper, a big-hearted, speed-loving crop duster.

pt.title: Disney Planes
pt.description: Disney's Planes leva os jogadores numa aventura de comédia animada cheia de acção com Dusty Crophopper, um espanador de culturas de grande coração e amante da velocidade. Embarque em missões globais e grandes aventuras ao redor do mundo.
pt.short_description: Disney’s Planes takes players on a high-flying, action-packed animated comedy adventure with Dusty Crophopper, a big-hearted, speed-loving crop duster.

zt.description: 迪士尼的《飛機總動員》帶領玩家們進行了一場高飛、動感十足的動畫喜劇冒險,由電影兼喜劇演員丹尼·庫克(Dane Cook)配音,這是這是一款充滿驚奇的動作冒險故事。趕快在世界各地執行全球任務和環球飛行大賽吧。
zt.title: 迪士尼飛機總動員
zt.short_description: Disney’s Planes takes players on a high-flying, action-packed animated comedy adventure with Dusty Crophopper, a big-hearted, speed-loving crop duster.

sl.title: Disney Planes
sl.description: Disney's Planes igralce popelje v visokooktansko akcijsko animirano komično pustolovščino z Dusty Crophopperjem, velikodušnim letalom za škropljenje posevkov, ki mu je glas posodil igralec in komik Dane Cook. Odpravite se na misije in velike dogodivščine po vsem svetu.
sl.short_description: Disney’s Planes takes players on a high-flying, action-packed animated comedy adventure with Dusty Crophopper, a big-hearted, speed-loving crop duster.

name: Disney Planes
copyright: © Disney/Pixar

fr.description:
Rejoignez la CHROME Academy avec les héros de Cars 2 et foncez pour être le meilleur.

Participez à des aventures d'espionnage et à des courses de classe mondiale contre les membres de votre famille et vos amis, grâce à un mode d'écran partagé pour quatre joueurs.

Incarnez vos personnages préférés, notamment la vedette des courses de voitures Flash McQueen et l'incomparable Martin.

Faites des courses à travers le monde en participant au Grand Prix Mondial.

fr.title: Dogfight 1942
fr.description: Pilotage d'un large éventail d'avions, les joueurs s'engagent dans des combats aériens et des missions dangereuses de chasseurs à travers les principaux théâtres de guerre pendant la Seconde Guerre mondiale.
fr.short_description: Piloting a wide range of aircraft, players engage in aerial dogfights and dangerous fighter missions across the major theaters of war during WWII.

en.title: Dogfight 1942
en.description: Piloting a wide range of aircraft, players engage in aerial dogfights and dangerous fighter missions across the major theaters of war during WWII. Featuring realistic aircraft, DOGFIGHT 1942 introduces cutting-edge flight dynamics with unprecedented arcade accessibility. Fly over 40 historically accurate planes, ranging from the fabled P-38 Lightning and Britain's Spitfire, to the feared Messerschmitt 109 and Japanese Kate.
en.short_description: Piloting a wide range of aircraft, players engage in aerial dogfights and dangerous fighter missions across the major theaters of war during WWII.

de.short_description: Piloting a wide range of aircraft, players engage in aerial dogfights and dangerous fighter missions across the major theaters of war during WWII.

fr.title: DragoDino
fr.description:
DragoDino, l’aventure épique dans un univers procédural où combattre pour monter est le challenge !

En jouant un DragoDino, vous devrez retrouver l’oeuf perdu de Bob, logé au sommet de l’arbre géant, en gravissant les 10 niveaux du Royaume de la Forêt.

Explorez et combattez afin d’obtenir vos pouvoirs d’ascension et une multitude d’autres qui vous aideront dans votre quête. Mais attention, les gardiens rencontrés sur votre passage ne vous laisserons pas faire.

Combinez vos pouvoirs, incarnez divers DragoDinos et adaptez vous aux caractéristiques de chacun. Profitez de 2 modes de difficulté et d’un mode libre pour vous perfectionner. En solo ou en coopération, relevez le défi !
fr.short_description: Meet Bob, a DragoDino, and guide him through the 10 levels of the Forest Kingdom in a quest to recover his lost egg stuck atop a giant tree.

en.description:
Fight your way to the top in DragoDino, an epic adventure set in an ever changing world!

Meet Bob, a DragoDino, and guide him through the 10 levels of the Forest Kingdom in a quest to recover his lost egg stuck atop a giant tree.

Explore and fight enemies to reach ever higher, collecting powers on your way up to help you in your quest. But be careful, the guardians you'll meet won't let you through that easily.

Mix and match power ups, play as various DragoDinos, taking advantage of each one's abilities. Enjoy 2 difficulty modes, plus a free mode to practice and improve. In solo or in co-op, rise to the challenge!
en.title: DragoDino
en.short_description: Meet Bob, a DragoDino, and guide him through the 10 levels of the Forest Kingdom in a quest to recover his lost egg stuck atop a giant tree.

de.title: DragoDino
de.description:
Erlebe mit DragoDino ein episches Abenteuer in einer sich ständig verändernden Welt! Kämpfe dich an die Spitze!


Führe den DragoDino Bob durch die 10 Level im Waldreich und findet zusammen sein verlorenes Drachenei wieder, das sich auf der Spitze eines gigantischen Baumes befindet.

Erkunde die Welt und bekämpfe Gegner, um noch höher zu gelangen. Sammle Power-ups, die dir bei deinem Abenteuer helfen werden. Aber sei auf der Hut! Du wirst Wächter treffen, die alles daransetzen werden, dich auf deinem Weg nach oben aufzuhalten.

Kombiniere deine Power-ups, spiele mit verschiedenen DragoDinos und nutze ihre entsprechenden Fähigkeiten. Freue dich auf 2 Schwierigkeitsgrade und einen Übungsmodus. Ob im Einzel- oder Koop-Modus, stell dich der Herausforderung!
de.short_description: Meet Bob, a DragoDino, and guide him through the 10 levels of the Forest Kingdom in a quest to recover his lost egg stuck atop a giant tree.

it.title: DragoDino
it.description:
DragoDino, un'avventura epica in un universo sempre mutevole, dove la sfida è salire sempre più in alto!

Diventa amico di Bob, un DragoDino, e guidalo attraverso i 10 livelli del Reame della Foresta, in una missione per recuperare l'uovo che ha perso e che si trova in cima a un albero gigantesco.

Esplora e affronta nemici per salire sempre di più, mentre collezioni poteri che ti aiuteranno a completare la tua missione. Ma attenzione ai guardiani che incontrerai: non ti faranno passare facilmente.

Mescola e combina poteri, impersona vari DragoDini sfruttando le abilità di ciascuno. Gioca in 2 livelli di difficoltà, più una modalità libera per allenarti e migliorare. In modalità singola o cooperativa, mostra quello che sai fare!
it.short_description: Meet Bob, a DragoDino, and guide him through the 10 levels of the Forest Kingdom in a quest to recover his lost egg stuck atop a giant tree.

es.title: DragoDino
es.description: DragoDino es un juego de plataformas 2D en PC/Mac/Linux.
es.short_description: Meet Bob, a DragoDino, and guide him through the 10 levels of the Forest Kingdom in a quest to recover his lost egg stuck atop a giant tree.

pt.title: DragoDino
pt.description: DragoDino é um platformer desonestos 2D em PC/Mac/Linux.
pt.short_description: Meet Bob, a DragoDino, and guide him through the 10 levels of the Forest Kingdom in a quest to recover his lost egg stuck atop a giant tree.

zt.description:
在不斷變化的世界中進行史詩般的冒險，在DragoDino中奮勇登頂！
與DragoDino的Bob見面，並引導他穿越森林王國的10個等級，以尋找他遺留在巨樹上的失蛋。
探索並與敵人戰鬥，以達到更高的境界，並在前進的過程中收集力量以幫助您完成任務。 但請注意，您將遇到的守護者不會輕易讓您通過。
混合並搭配力量道具，發揮每個DragoDino的能力，充分利用每個人的能力。 享受2種難度模式，以及免費模式進行練習並提升技巧。無論是單打還是合作，接受挑戰吧！
zt.title: 護蛋龍
zt.short_description: Meet Bob, a DragoDino, and guide him through the 10 levels of the Forest Kingdom in a quest to recover his lost egg stuck atop a giant tree.

sl.description: DragoDino je dvodimenzionalni pustolovski platformer.
sl.short_description: Meet Bob, a DragoDino, and guide him through the 10 levels of the Forest Kingdom in a quest to recover his lost egg stuck atop a giant tree.

fr.title: F1™ 2018
fr.description:
F1® 2018 est le jeu vidéo officiel du CHAMPIONNAT DU MONDE DE FORMULE 1 2018 DE LA FIA™.

Forgez votre réputation sur le circuit mais aussi en dehors, avec des conférences de presse chronométrées qui influenceront votre carrière dans la F1. Maîtrisez-vous plutôt l'art de la course ou l'art de la scène ? Emmènerez-vous votre écurie au sommet, ou allez-vous envoyer votre agent prendre pour cible une écurie rivale et son pilote ? Prenez votre destin en main dans F1 2018.
Encore plus de voitures de F1 classiques qu'avant. Des graphismes spectaculaires et de nouveaux circuits pour 2018 : Paul Ricard et Hockenheim
fr.short_description: Become immersed in the world of Formula 1® more than ever before.Build your reputation both on and off the track, with time-pressured media interviews that influence your F1 career path.

en.title: F1™ 2018
en.description:
F1® 2018 is the official videogame of the 2018 FIA FORMULA ONE WORLD CHAMPIONSHIP™. Become immersed in the world of Formula 1® more than ever before.
Build your reputation both on and off the track, with time-pressured media interviews that influence your F1 career path. Do you exhibit sportsmanship or showmanship? Will you develop your team to the top or send your agent to target a rival team and driver? F1 2018 puts you in control of your destiny.
More classic F1 cars than ever before. Stunning graphics and new circuits for 2018: Paul Ricard and Hockenheim
en.short_description: Become immersed in the world of Formula 1® more than ever before.Build your reputation both on and off the track, with time-pressured media interviews that influence your F1 career path.

de.title: F1™ 2018
de.description:
F1® 2018 ist das offizielle Videospiel zur FORMEL-1-WELTMEISTERSCHAFT 2018. Tauche tiefer denn je ein in die Welt der Formel 1.

Mache dir nicht nur einen Namen auf der Strecke, sondern auch unter Zeitdruck in Interviews, die deine Karriere in der Formel 1 beeinflussen. Beweist du Sportsgeist oder bist du ein Meister der Selbstdarstellung? Schaffst du es mit deinem Team an die Spitze oder wird sich dein Agent gegnerischen Teams und Fahrern zuwenden? In F1® 2018 hast du dein Schicksal in der Hand. 
Mehr historische Formel-1-Rennwagen denn je.  Fantastische Grafik und neue Rennstrecken für 2018: Paul Ricard und Hockenheim
de.short_description: Become immersed in the world of Formula 1® more than ever before.Build your reputation both on and off the track, with time-pressured media interviews that influence your F1 career path.

it.title: F1™ 2018
it.description:
Comprensivo di tutte le scuderie ufficiali, i piloti e tutti i 21 circuiti del campionato 2018, F1 2018 vede il ritorno del Gran Premio di Francia™ per la prima volta dal 2008, presso il circuito Paul Ricard, che ha ospitato per l'ultima volta il Gran Premio di Francia nel 1990. Il Gran Premio di Germania torna a far parte del Campionato dopo un'assenza di un anno: Hockenheimring infatti ospiterà la gara a luglio.

Accresci la tua reputazione sia sul tracciato che fuori, con interviste in tempi stretti che possono influenzare il percorso della tua carriera su F1. Vuoi farti notare per la tua sportività, o per la tua abilità sotto i riflettori? Svilupperai la tua scuderia per farla diventare la migliore, o invierai i tuoi agenti per colpire una scuderia e un pilota rivali? Mettiti al volante del tuo destino con F1 2018.
Più auto classiche di F1, come mai prima d'ora. Grafiche sbalorditive e nuovi circuiti del 2018: Paul Ricard e Hockenheim.
it.short_description: Become immersed in the world of Formula 1® more than ever before.Build your reputation both on and off the track, with time-pressured media interviews that influence your F1 career path.

es.title: F1™ 2018
es.description: Sumérgete más que nunca en el mundo de la Fórmula 1®. Construye tu reputación dentro y fuera de la pista, con entrevistas en los medios de comunicación que influyen en tu trayectoria profesional en la Fórmula 1.
es.short_description: Become immersed in the world of Formula 1® more than ever before.Build your reputation both on and off the track, with time-pressured media interviews that influence your F1 career path.

sl.description: F1® 2018 je uradna videoigra prvenstva Formule ena iz leta 2018. Zapeljite se v svet formule 1 in si ustvarite ugled tako na progi kot zunaj nje, vašo karierno pot v F1 pa naj tlakujejo tudi  intervjuji v raznih medijih.
sl.short_description: Become immersed in the world of Formula 1® more than ever before.Build your reputation both on and off the track, with time-pressured media interviews that influence your F1 career path.

zt.description: 在F1®2018中成為頭條新聞。F1®2018是2018 FIA FORMULA ONE WORLD CHAMPIONSHIP™的官方視頻遊戲。 比以往任何時候都更沉浸在一級方程式世界中。通過時間緊迫的媒體採訪來影響您的F1職業發展道路，無論在賽場內還是賽場外，您都可以建立自己的聲望。

zt.short_description: Become immersed in the world of Formula 1® more than ever before.Build your reputation both on and off the track, with time-pressured media interviews that influence your F1 career path.

fr.title: Ginger: Beyond the Crystal
fr.description: Un monde dévasté par l'explosion d'un cristal, une menace mystérieuse planant sur ses habitants et une déesse créant un héros. Bienvenue dans Ginger: Beyond The Crystal. Les villes sont en ruine et leurs habitants se sont volatilisés, mais tout espoir n'est pas perdu. Ginger doit rétablir le lien avec la déesse en purifiant les cristaux corrompus qui se sont répandus à travers les mondes.

en.description:
Ginger: Beyond the Crystal is an adventure platformer in which you have to rebuild and restore balance to a world devastated by the explosion of a mystical crystal.
Face quests and challenges set over 3 worlds and gain powerful new skills, costumes and powers that will help you to defeat the fiercest enemies.
Explore, rescue and rebuild!
en.title: Ginger: Beyond the Crystal

de.title: Ginger: Beyond the Crystal
de.description: Ginger: Beyond the Crystal” ist ein Adventure-Platformer, in welchem du eine Welt wiederaufbauen und die Balance wiederherstellen musst, die durch die verherrende Explosion eines mystischen Kristalls zerstört wurde.

it.title: Ginger: Beyond the Crystal
it.description:
Un mondo distrutto da un'esplosione cristallina, una misteriosa minaccia che incombe sui suoi abitanti e una dea che crea un eroe. Questo è Ginger: Beyond The Crystal.
I villaggi sono devastati e gli abitanti dispersi, ma c'è ancora speranza. Ginger deve ristabilire la connessione con la dea, purificando i cristalli corrotti sparsi per i mondi. Non sarà facile; i mondi sono pieni di nemici e trappole, su 15 diversi livelli. Fortunatamente non sarai solo. Alcuni personaggi ti doneranno abilità speciali che ti aiuteranno a risolvere enigmi e a sconfiggere i tuoi nemici. Ci sono tre diversi mondi da scoprire, ognuno con nemici speciali e livelli bonus incredibilmente divertenti, che metteranno alla prova le tue capacità.

es.title: Ginger: Beyond the Crystal
es.description: Ginger: Beyond the Crystal es un juego de plataformas de aventura en el que debes reconstruir un mundo y restaurar el equilibrio destruido por la gloriosa explosión de un cristal místico.

pt.title: Ginger: Beyond the Crystal

zt.description:
Ginger：超越水晶是一款冒險的平台遊戲，這個世界因神秘水晶的爆炸而毀滅，您必須透過探索、營救、重建，恢復世界平衡。
面對設置在3個世界上的任務和挑戰，並獲得強大的新技能、服裝和力量，將幫助您戰勝最兇猛的敵人。

sl.title: Ginger: Beyond the Crystal
sl.description:
(temp synopsis)
Ginger: Beyond the Crystal je pustolovski platformer, v katerem morate obnoviti in obnoviti ravnovesje v svet, ki ga je opustošila eksplozija mističnega kristala.
Soočite se z nalogami in izzivi, postavljenimi v treh svetih, in pridobite močne nove veščine, kostume in moči, ki vam bodo pomagale premagati najhujše sovražnike.
Raziščite, rešite in obnovite!

name: Ginger: Beyond the Crystal
copyright: NA

fr.title: Heart&Slash
fr.description:
Heart&Slash est une histoire d'amour en 3D entre robots bagarreurs qui se déroule dans un monde où tout ce qu'il reste de la civilisation humaine sont les machines.
Vous incarnez Heart, un robot doué de raison qui se bat pour échapper à l'emprise des QuAsSy (Quality Assurance Systems) omniscients et malveillants. Ne vous trompez pas, Heart&Slash, c'est pas du gâteau. La mort est permanente et vous force à recommencer dans un niveau aléatoire, avec différents objets et armes à utiliser, de nouveaux ennemis à combattre et secrets à explorer. Ce jeu offre nouveauté et défi, car il ne s'agit pas de maîtriser un seul système, mais de s'adapter à ce qui vous est donné.

en.description:
Heart&Slash is a 3D brawler that is set in a world where machines are all that remains from the Human civilization. 

You play as Heart, an innocent robot fighting to escape the grip of the evil and all seeing machine QuAsSy (Quality Assurance Systems). 

But make no mistake Heart&Slash is a hard game. Every death is permanent and means a new randomly generated level for you to start over with a different set of weapons and items you can use, new enemies to fight and secrets to explore. 

Heart&Slash is an indie game developed by a small but passionate team. We have a tiny budget but big hearts, and we are giving it all to make this game the best we can. 

Features: 
-3 worlds to explore and fight in. Each world includes its unique enemies an bosses. 
-Dozens of different weapons and equipment pieces (more than 100 in total) to customize Heart and your play style. 
-Perma-death, but a persistent progression system that gives you more options as you play the game.
en.title: Heart&Slash

de.title: Heart&Slash
de.description: Heart&Slash ist eine Rogue-like Roboterliebesgeschichte in einer Welt, in der von der menschlichen Zivilisation nur noch Maschinen übrig sind. Du spielst den empfindsamen Roboter Heart, der sich aus den Fängen des Bösen und der allgegenwärtigen Maschine QuAsSy (das Qualitätssicherungssystem) befreien muss. Fehler begehen verboten! Heart&Slash ist kein Spaziergang. Jeder Tod ist dauerhaft und bedeutet ein neues, zufällig erzeugtes Level, in dem du noch einmal neu startest, mit anderen Waffen und Elementen gegen neue Feinde kämpfst und Geheimnisse aufdeckst. Heart&Slash ist anders und herausfordernd, da nicht nur ein System besiegt werden muss, sondern der Spieler sich an die Begebenheiten anpassen und das Beste daraus machen muss.

it.title: Heart&Slash
it.description:
Heart&Slash è una storia d’amore robotica picchiaduro e roguelike in 3D, ambientata in un mondo dove le macchine sono tutto ciò che resta della civiltà umana.
Giocherai nei panni di Heart, un robot senziente che lotta per scappare dalle grinfie del male e dall'onnisciente macchina QuAsSy (Sistema di controllo qualità). Non commettere nessun errore, Heart&Slash non è una passeggiata. Ogni morte è permanente e rigenererà un nuovo livello casuale da cui dovrai cominciare da capo, con una serie di armi e oggetti differenti da usare, nuovi nemici da affrontare e segreti da esplorare. Heart&Slash offre ai giocatori un mondo tutto nuovo e stimolante. L’obiettivo non è dominare un sistema, ma adattarsi a ciò che si ha a disposizione e dare il meglio di sé.

es.title: Heart&Slash
es.description: Fight as Heart, un robot inocente que lucha por escapar de las garras de las máquinas sin sentido en un futuro en el que los humanos ya no existen. Una peleadora 3D de ritmo rápido con elementos pícaros ambientados en un mundo colorido y desolado.

pt.title: Heart&Slash
pt.description: Lute como Coração, um robô inocente lutando para escapar do controle de máquinas sem mente em um futuro onde os humanos não são mais. Um brawler 3D de ritmo acelerado com elementos roguelike ambientado em um mundo colorido e desolado.

Heart＆Slash是一個3D格鬥遊戲，它設置在一個世界中，機器是人類文明遺留下來的。

Heart & Slash je 3D prepiralec, ki je postavljen v svet, kjer so stroji vse, kar je ostalo od človeške civilizacije.

fr.title: MXGP - The Official Motocross Videogame
fr.description: Jetez-vous dans la compétition, affrontez les champions dans le MXGP, la catégorie reine du Championnat du monde de motocross. Incarnez l'octuple champion du monde Antonio Cairoli et montrez ce dont vous êtes capable. Enfourchez votre moto, alignez-vous au départ et terminez en tête. Courez sur les circuits officiels pour la première fois très fidèlement reproduits dans un jeu de motocross.
fr.short_description: Race on 1:1 scale official championship tracks. Career mode takes you from Debut Season to MX1. The game physics and dual stick control allow for separate control of bike and rider.

en.description: Race on the official championship tracks, faithfully reproduced for the first time in a Motocross game. Get yourself noticed in your Debut Season to attract offers from the official teams and launch your career in MX2. Race your way through the events and, with the right results, you'll be able to aspire to an offer in MX1 to take on the heroes of Motocross.
en.title: MXGP - The Official Motocross Videogame
en.short_description: Race on 1:1 scale official championship tracks. Career mode takes you from Debut Season to MX1. The game physics and dual stick control allow for separate control of bike and rider.

de.title: MXGP - The Official Motocross Videogame
de.description: Fahr die offiziellen Strecken, die erstmalig für ein Videospiel detailgetreu umgesetzt wurden. Lass dich in deiner Debut Season entdecken, um Angebote von offiziellen Teams zu bekommen und deine Karriere in der MX2 zu starten. Fahr alle Events, und wenn deine Ergebnisse stimmen, bekommst du ein Angebot für die MX1, wo du es mit den Helden des Motocross aufnehmen kannst.
de.short_description: Race on 1:1 scale official championship tracks. Career mode takes you from Debut Season to MX1. The game physics and dual stick control allow for separate control of bike and rider.

it.title: MXGP - The Official Motocross Videogame
it.description:
Finalmente ritorna il Motocross ufficiale! Mettiti alla prova correndo nei due campionati MXGP con tutti i piloti e le moto della categoria MX1 e MX2! Accetta la sfida delle giovani promesse del MX2 ed i campioni del MX1, c’é posto anche per te!
Corri sulle piste ufficiali del campionato, per la prima volta riprodotte fedelmente in un gioco di Motocross. Fatti notare nella Debut Season per ricevere offerte dai team ufficiali ed inizare la tua carriera in MX2. Gara dopo gara, grazie ai tuoi risultati, potrai ambire a un' offerta in MX1 per sfidare gli eroi del Motocross.
it.short_description: Race on 1:1 scale official championship tracks. Career mode takes you from Debut Season to MX1. The game physics and dual stick control allow for separate control of bike and rider.

es.short_description: Race on 1:1 scale official championship tracks. Career mode takes you from Debut Season to MX1. The game physics and dual stick control allow for separate control of bike and rider.

pt.title: MXGP - The Official Motocross Videogame
pt.description: O videogame oficial do MXGP: todos os pilotos e motos do MX1 e MX2! Corre em pistas oficiais, o modo Career leva-te da temporada de estreia ao MX1. A física do jogo e o controlo duplo do stick permitem um controlo separado da moto e do piloto.
pt.short_description: Race on 1:1 scale official championship tracks. Career mode takes you from Debut Season to MX1. The game physics and dual stick control allow for separate control of bike and rider.

zt.description: 越野摩托車錦標賽(MXGP)的官方遊戲，您可以控制MX1和MX2的所有騎手和越野摩托車！ 在1：1比例的官方冠軍賽道上比賽。 職業模式可將您從首次登場到進入MX1大獎賽，遊戲中的物理特性可以透過搖桿來進行控制。

fr.title: Outcast - Second Contact
fr.description: Incarnez Cutter Slade, un soldat d’élite au caractère bien trempé, envoyé en mission de la dernière chance sur une planète extraterrestre. Explorez un monde grandiose mêlant science et magie, découvrez d’exotiques cités autochtones, affrontez des ennemis redoutables et tentez de percer les secrets d’une civilisation avancée. Faites les bons choix ce monde vivant doté de son propre écosystème, car de votre succès dépend le destin de deux univers.
fr.short_description: Take the role Cutter Slade, a tried and tested elite soldier, and explore the planet Adelpha with complete freedom. The destiny of two universes depend on your success.

en.description: Take the role Cutter Slade, a tried and tested elite soldier, and explore the planet Adelpha with complete freedom. As you journey in this magnificent world, where magic and science mix, discover exotic cities, face fierce enemies and attempt to learn the secrets of an advanced civilization. Make the correct choices in this systemic, living world, because the destiny of these two universes depends on your success.
en.title: Outcast - Second Contact
en.short_description: Take the role Cutter Slade, a tried and tested elite soldier, and explore the planet Adelpha with complete freedom. The destiny of two universes depend on your success.

de.title: Outcast - Second Contact
de.description: Schlüpfe in die Rolle des erfahrenen Elitesoldaten Cutter Slade und begib dich auf dem fremden Planeten Adelpha völlig frei auf Erkundungstour. Bei deiner Reise durch diese atemberaubende Welt, auf der Magie und Wissenschaft fließend ineinander übergehen, wirst du exotische Städte entdecken, auf erbitterte Feinde stoßen und die Geheimnisse einer hochentwickelten außerirdischen Zivilisation ans Licht bringen. Doch wähle jeden Schritt, jede Entscheidung in dieser komplexen, lebendigen Welt mit Bedacht – das Schicksal zweier Welten hängt von deinem Erfolg ab.
de.short_description: Take the role Cutter Slade, a tried and tested elite soldier, and explore the planet Adelpha with complete freedom. The destiny of two universes depend on your success.

it.title: Outcast - Second Contact

Man mano che ti addentrerai in questo magnifico mondo, in cui c'è un confine labile tra magia e scienza, scoprirai città esotiche, affronterai nemici agguerriti e cercherai di svelare i segreti di una civiltà avanzata. Prendi le decisioni giuste in questo mondo vivente sistemico, perché il destino di questi due universi dipende dal tuo successo.

Med potovanjem po tem čudovitem svetu, v katerem se prepletata magija in znanost, odkrivajte eksotična mesta, se spoprimite z neusmiljenimi sovražniki in odkrivajte skrivnosti napredne civilizacije. V sistemskem, živem svetu se odločajte pravilno, kajti usoda dveh vesolij je odvisna od vašega uspeha.

fr.title: R.A.W. Realms of Ancient War
fr.description: Avez-vous ce qu'il faut pour survivre aux royaumes de l'Ancienne Guerre ? Prenez le contrôle d'un guerrier redoutable, d'un magicien puissant ou d'un voyou, et plongez dans une grande quête pleine d'action !
fr.short_description: Do you have what it takes to survive the Realms of Ancient War? Take control of a fearsome Warrior, a powerful Wizard or a Rogue, and plunge into a grand quest full of action!

en.title: R.A.W. Realms of Ancient War
en.description:
The explosive Hack’n’Slash (action/role-playing game) R.A.W takes you, alone or with a friend in co-operative mode, on a fantasy world ruined by an ancient and violent war.
    Level your heroes up, collect more powerful weapons and armor, unlock new and more devastating spells, and exterminate by the dozens at once the hordes of enemies that are standing in your way.
    Thanks to your talent of incarnation, take control of your most powerful opponents to unleash their power and seed destruction among your enemy’s legions!
en.short_description: Do you have what it takes to survive the Realms of Ancient War? Take control of a fearsome Warrior, a powerful Wizard or a Rogue, and plunge into a grand quest full of action!

sl.title: R.A.W. Realms of Ancient War
sl.description:
Eksplozivni Hack’n’Slash (akcijska igra / igra vlog) R.A.W ​​vas popelje samega ali s prijateljem v zadružnem načinu v fantazijski svet, ki ga je uničila starodavna in nasilna vojna.
    Izravnajte svoje junake, zberite močnejše orožje in oklep, odklenite nove in bolj uničujoče uroke in iztrebite za desetine hord sovražnikov, ki vam stojijo na poti.
 (temp synopsis)
   Zahvaljujoč svojemu talentu inkarnacije prevzemite nadzor nad svojimi najmočnejšimi nasprotniki, da sprostite njihovo moč in uničenje semen med sovražnikovimi legijami!
sl.short_description: Do you have what it takes to survive the Realms of Ancient War? Take control of a fearsome Warrior, a powerful Wizard or a Rogue, and plunge into a grand quest full of action!

升級您的英雄，收集更強大的武器和盔甲，解鎖新的和更具破壞性的咒語，並立即消滅成群阻礙您前進的敵人。
多虧您的化身天賦，可以控制您最強大的對手，並在敵人的軍隊中釋放他們擁有的力量和破壞種子！”

fr.title: Seasons after Fall
fr.description: Seasons After Fall est un jeu de plateformes en 2D faisant la part belle à l'exploration d'un monde gouverné par la nature et la magie. Vous y incarnez un renard sauvage dont les pouvoirs vous permettent de manipuler à volonté les quatre saisons du temps. Bondissez de plateforme en plateforme dans un monde aux graphismes 2D sublimes, habité par les mélodies envoûtantes d'un quatuor à cordes.
fr.short_description: Seasons After Fall is a 2D platform-puzzler game that will let you dive into a captivating universe and explore a land governed by magic and nature.

en.title: Seasons after Fall
en.description: Seasons After Fall is a 2D platform-puzzler game that will let you dive into a captivating universe and explore a land governed by magic and nature. As a wild fox you are sent on a perilous journey aided only by your ability to change the seasons at will, manipulating a gorgeous 2D world backed by an enchanting live string quartet.

fr.title: Snake Pass
fr.description: Lorsqu'un mystérieux intrus perturbe le calme qui règne sur Haven Tor, seul le plus improbable des héros peut encore s'interposer ! Avec Noodle le serpent et Doodle le colibri, son ami hyperactif, retrouvez les pierres disparues et replacez-les dans les portails magiques qui confèrent à Haven Tor sa puissance mythique. Jeu de plateforme/puzzle basé sur la physique et unique en son genre, Snake Pass met le joueur au défi de "penser comme un serpent" et de résoudre des énigmes délicates réservées aux reptiles. Serpentez dans l'herbe, enroulez-vous autour de bambous et évitez les pièges du dernier jeu du studio indépendant primé Sumo Digital !
fr.short_description: Slither, coil and climb your way to the top of Haven Tor in this one of a kind physics based, puzzle platform adventure from award winning independent studio Sumo Digital!

en.title: Snake Pass
en.description: When the tranquillity of Haven Tor is interrupted by a mysterious interloper only the unlikeliest of heroes can save the day! Meet Noodle the Snake and his hyperactive best friend, Doodle the Hummingbird, who together must reunite the missing Keystones with the magical gates that give Haven Tor its mythical power. A unique, physics-based puzzle platform game, Snake Pass challenges players to ‘think like a snake’ as they tackle precarious puzzles as only a snake can. Slither through long grass, coil around bamboo and climb out of trouble in the latest game from award-winning independent studio Sumo Digital!
en.short_description: Slither, coil and climb your way to the top of Haven Tor in this one of a kind physics based, puzzle platform adventure from award winning independent studio Sumo Digital!

de.title: Snake Pass
de.description: Als die Ruhe von Haven Tor von einem mysteriösen Eindringling gestört wird, kann nur ein unfreiwilliger Held alles wieder ins Lot bringen! Noodle die Schlange und ihr bester Freund, Doodle der Kolibri, müssen zusammen die Schlüsselsteine zurück zu den magischen Toren bringen, die Haven Tor seine geheimnisvolle Kraft verleihen. Snake Pass ist ein einzigartiges, physikbasiertes Rätsel-Jump'n'Run, in dem Spieler schwierige Rätsel lösen müssen, wie es nur eine Schlange kann. Schlängel dich durchs Gras und um Bambus und klettere im neuesten Spiel von Sumo Digital aus den Schwierigkeiten!
de.short_description: Slither, coil and climb your way to the top of Haven Tor in this one of a kind physics based, puzzle platform adventure from award winning independent studio Sumo Digital!

it.title: Snake Pass
it.description: Quando la tranquillità di Haven Tor è interrotta da un misterioso intruso, solo il più improbabile degli eroi può salvare la situazione! Fai la conoscenza di Noodle il serpente e del suo iperattivo amico Doodle il colibrì: insieme devono riunire le perdute chiavi di pietra con i cancelli magici, che conferiscono a Haven Tor il suo mitico potere. Gioco di piattaforme unico e basato su rompicapo fisici, Snake Pass sfida i giocatori a "pensare come un serpente", mentre affrontano rompicapo instabili come solo un serpente può fare. Striscia nell'erba alta, avviluppati al bambù e togliti dai guai nell'ultimo gioco dell'acclamato studio indipendente Sumo Digital!
it.short_description: Slither, coil and climb your way to the top of Haven Tor in this one of a kind physics based, puzzle platform adventure from award winning independent studio Sumo Digital!

es.title: Snake Pass
es.description: Deslízate, enrólate y sube hasta la cima de Haven Tor en esta aventura de plataforma de rompecabezas única en su género basada en la física que te ofrece el galardonado estudio independiente Sumo Digital.
es.short_description: Slither, coil and climb your way to the top of Haven Tor in this one of a kind physics based, puzzle platform adventure from award winning independent studio Sumo Digital!

pt.title: Snake Pass
pt.description: Slither, bobina e subir até ao topo de Haven Tor nesta aventura de plataforma baseada em física e puzzle do premiado estúdio independente Sumo Digital!
pt.short_description: Slither, coil and climb your way to the top of Haven Tor in this one of a kind physics based, puzzle platform adventure from award winning independent studio Sumo Digital!

sl.title: Snake Pass
sl.description: Zdrsnite, zvijte in povzpnite se na vrh Haven Tora v tej edinstveni logični platformski pustolovščini, ki temelji na fizikalnih zakonih - iz nagrajenega neodvisnega studia Sumo Digital!
sl.short_description: Slither, coil and climb your way to the top of Haven Tor in this one of a kind physics based, puzzle platform adventure from award winning independent studio Sumo Digital!

zt.description: Snake Pass是一款以蛇為主角的冒險遊戲，玩家在遊戲中像蛇一樣在漂浮的島嶼上玩耍。儘管是平台遊戲，但玩家不能跳躍，而必須像真正的蛇一樣移動。
zt.title: 蛇道
zt.short_description: Slither, coil and climb your way to the top of Haven Tor in this one of a kind physics based, puzzle platform adventure from award winning independent studio Sumo Digital!

fr.title: Spike Volleyball
fr.description:
50 équipes nationales, masculines et féminines, réunies dans une simulation de volley en salle fidèle à ce sport. Vitesse, réflexe, collectif : tous les ingrédients sont réunis pour une expérience sportive spectaculaire !
Gérez votre propre équipe et faites-la monter en puissance. Participez à de nombreux tournois internationaux, adaptez votre tactique pour surprendre l’adversaire et devenez champion du monde !
Smash, bloc, service flottant… Maîtrisez les gestes techniques du volley-ball et vivez toutes les sensations d’un des sports collectifs les plus complexes, fidèlement reproduit grâce à la puissance de l’Unreal Engine 4.
fr.short_description: With 50 men's and women's national teams, Spike Volleyball draws you deep into the realistic action of one of the most complex and spectacular team sports played today.

en.title: Spike Volleyball
en.description:
50 national teams, men's and women's, go head to head in a realistic indoor volleyball simulation. Speed, reflexes, teamwork: all the elements needed for success are there for a spectacular sports experience.
Manage your own team and take it to the highest level. Enter multiple international tournaments, change your tactics to catch your opponent off guard and become world champions!
Spikes, blocks, floaters… Master the skills of volleyball and experience all the thrills of one of the most complex team sports played today, realistically reproduced with the powerful Unreal Engine 4.
en.short_description: With 50 men's and women's national teams, Spike Volleyball draws you deep into the realistic action of one of the most complex and spectacular team sports played today.

de.title: Spike Volleyball
de.description:
50 Nationalmannschaften − Männer und Frauen − tritt in einer realistischen Indoor-Volleyballsimulation gegen andere an. Schnelligkeit, Reflexe, Teamarbeit: Alle für den Erfolg notwendigen Elemente sind für ein spektakuläres Sporterlebnis vorhanden.
Manage dein eigenes Team und bringe es auf die höchste Stufe. Nimm an mehreren internationalen Turnieren teil, ändere deine Taktiken, um deinen Gegner zu überrumpeln und Weltmeister zu werden!
Schmetterbälle, Blöcke, Flatter-Aufschläge ... Meistere die Fertigkeiten des Volleyballs und erlebe den Nervenkitzel einer der komplexesten Mannschaftssportarten, die heutzutage gespielt werden, realistisch wiedergegeben dank der leistungsstarken Unreal Engine 4.
de.short_description: With 50 men's and women's national teams, Spike Volleyball draws you deep into the realistic action of one of the most complex and spectacular team sports played today.

it.title: Spike Volleyball
it.description:
50 squadre nazionali, maschili e femminili, si sfidano in una simulazione della pallavolo indoor realistica. Velocità, riflessi, gioco di squadra: troverai tutti gli elementi fondamentali di questa disciplina, riuniti in un'esperienza sportiva davvero spettacolare.
Gestisci la tua squadra e portala ai massimi livelli. Partecipa a diversi tornei internazionali, studia la tattica migliore per cogliere di sorpresa l'avversario e conquista il titolo mondiale!
Schiacciate, muri, battute flottanti… Padroneggia le tecniche del volley e vivi tutte le emozioni di uno sport di squadra tanto spettacolare quanto complesso, riprodotto realisticamente grazie al potente Unreal Engine 4.
it.short_description: With 50 men's and women's national teams, Spike Volleyball draws you deep into the realistic action of one of the most complex and spectacular team sports played today.

es.title: Spike Volleyball
es.description: Domina las habilidades y tácticas del voleibol de interior! Con 50 equipos nacionales, Spike Volleyball te sumerge en la acción realista del Voleibol!
es.short_description: With 50 men's and women's national teams, Spike Volleyball draws you deep into the realistic action of one of the most complex and spectacular team sports played today.

pt.title: Spike Volleyball
pt.description: Domine as habilidades e táticas do vôlei de salão! Com 50 equipas nacionais, o Spike Voleibol atrai-te profundamente para a acção realista do Voleibol!
pt.short_description: With 50 men's and women's national teams, Spike Volleyball draws you deep into the realistic action of one of the most complex and spectacular team sports played today.

sl.title: Spike Volleyball
sl.description:
50 ženskih in moških reprezentanc se znajde v realistični simulaciji odbojke v dvorani. Hitrost, odzivnost in ekipno delo so sestavine, ključne za uspeh in spektakularno športno izkušnjo.
Upravljajte lastno ekipo in jo popeljite na najvišjo raven. Udeležite se več mednarodnih turnirjev in spremenite taktiko, s katero boste presenetili nasprotnika in postali svetovni prvaki!
Napadalni udarci, bloki, servisi ... Obvladujte odbojkarske elemente in izkusite enega najbolj zapletenih in razburljivih ekipnih športov, ki se dandanes igrajo. Realistična upodobitev z zmogljivim pogonom Unreal Engine 4.
sl.short_description: With 50 men's and women's national teams, Spike Volleyball draws you deep into the realistic action of one of the most complex and spectacular team sports played today.

zt.description: 50 支男子與女子國家隊將在超逼真自然的室內網球模擬賽場中展開巔峰對決。巧妙融合了排球比賽制勝的三大關鍵要素：速度、反應能力與團隊合作，呈現精彩絕倫的運動體驗感。
zt.title: 巔峰排球
zt.short_description: With 50 men's and women's national teams, Spike Volleyball draws you deep into the realistic action of one of the most complex and spectacular team sports played today.

name: Spike Volleyball
copyright: © 2018 Published by Bigben Interactive and developped by Black Sheep.

fr.description:
Splasher est un jeu de plateformes 2D au gameplay original, orienté arcade et action. Il propose aux joueurs un défi relevé mélant adresse, reflexes et vitesse dans un univers délirant résolument cartoon.

Les Splashers sont en danger ! Le boss diabolique de la mega-usine de peinture Inkorp, l’infâme Docteur, est prêt à tout pour maximiser ses profits et promet un destin funeste à tous ses employés.
fr.title: Splasher
fr.short_description: Splasher is a fun and challenging 2D Platformer filled with humor and surprises. Armed with a paint cannon, you’ll face the dangers of the Inkorp factory and its evil Doctor.

en.description:
Splasher is a 2D platformer with unique arcade/action gameplay. It offers gamers challenges that require agility, speed and fast reflexes, and is set in a crazy cartoon universe.

The Splashers are in great danger! The quiet and peaceful workers from Inkorp are being led to their doom by the greedy Docteur, the paint factory's evil boss.
en.title: Splasher
en.short_description: Splasher is a fun and challenging 2D Platformer filled with humor and surprises. Armed with a paint cannon, you’ll face the dangers of the Inkorp factory and its evil Doctor.

de.title: Splasher
de.description:
Splasher ist ein 2D Plattformer im einzigartigen Arcade-Stil, in einem verrückten Cartoon Universum spielend.

Bekämpfe den Fabrikboss – Le Docteur – und rette die Splashers. Deine Farbkanone gewährt dir farbenfrohe Superkräfte. Teste deine Fähigkeiten und behaupte dich gegen die Fabrik.
de.short_description: Splasher is a fun and challenging 2D Platformer filled with humor and surprises. Armed with a paint cannon, you’ll face the dangers of the Inkorp factory and its evil Doctor.

it.title: Splasher
it.description: Splasher è uno stimolante videogioco a piattaforma in 2D ricco di sorprese e umorismo. Armati del tuo cannone spara-vernice e preparati a sfidare la mega fabbrica Inkorp per salvare i tuoi amici Splasher e sventare i perfidi piani del malvagio boss Le Docteur.
it.short_description: Splasher is a fun and challenging 2D Platformer filled with humor and surprises. Armed with a paint cannon, you’ll face the dangers of the Inkorp factory and its evil Doctor.

es.title: Splasher
es.description: Splasher es un divertido y desafiante juego de plataformas 2D. Armado con un cañón de pintura, te enfrentarás a los peligros de la fábrica de Inkorp para salvar a tus compañeros y poner fin a los malvados proyectos del malvado Doctor.
es.short_description: Splasher is a fun and challenging 2D Platformer filled with humor and surprises. Armed with a paint cannon, you’ll face the dangers of the Inkorp factory and its evil Doctor.

pt.title: Splasher
pt.description: Splasher é uma plataforma 2D divertida e desafiadora. Armado com um canhão de tinta, você enfrentará os perigos da fábrica de Inkorp para salvar seus companheiros e acabar com os projetos maléficos do malvado Doutor.
pt.short_description: Splasher is a fun and challenging 2D Platformer filled with humor and surprises. Armed with a paint cannon, you’ll face the dangers of the Inkorp factory and its evil Doctor.

zt.description:
Splasher是一款2D平台遊戲，具有獨特的街機/動作遊戲。 它為遊戲玩家提供了要求敏捷，快速和快速反應的挑戰，並且設置在瘋狂的卡通世界中。

濺水器處於極大危險中！ 來自Inkorp的那些安靜祥和的工人正被貪婪的Docteur（他們是塗料廠的邪惡老闆）引向滅頂之災。
zt.title: 噴射俠
zt.short_description: Splasher is a fun and challenging 2D Platformer filled with humor and surprises. Armed with a paint cannon, you’ll face the dangers of the Inkorp factory and its evil Doctor.

sl.title: Splasher
sl.description:
Splasher je dvodimenzionalni platformer z edinstvenim arkadnim/akcijskim igranjem. Igralcem ponuja izzive, ki zahtevajo gibčnost, hitrost in dobre reflekse, igra pa je umeščena v izjemno animirano vesolje.

Splasherji so v veliki nevarnosti! Tihe in miroljubne delavce iz Inkorpa v pogubo vodi pohlepni Docteur, hudobni šef tovarne barv.
sl.short_description: Splasher is a fun and challenging 2D Platformer filled with humor and surprises. Armed with a paint cannon, you’ll face the dangers of the Inkorp factory and its evil Doctor.

name: Splasher
copyright: © Plug In Digital. All paints reserved.

fr.title: Split/Second: Velocity
fr.description: Split/Second est un jeu de course de style arcade à l'action explosive, se déroulant dans l'univers d'une émission télévisée à gros budget. Les concurrents se battent pour le titre de champion de la saison dans une ville reconstituée pour la télévision, construite pour être détruite et bourrée d'explosifs que vous contrôlez vous-même : ponts, bâtiments, véhicules, rien n'est à l'abri. Les explosions dévastatrices démoliront vos adversaires et même le circuit, créant de nouveaux passages et obstacles. Combinant cascades époustouflantes, destructions à grande échelle et courses palpitantes, Split/Second est un must pour les amateurs de vitesse et de sensations fortes ! Attachez votre ceinture, ça va chauffer !
fr.short_description: Split/Second is an action racing game set in a reality TV show.Players don’t just collide with others to knock them off the track, but can also trigger events that alter the race.

en.description: Split/Second is an intense action racing game set within a reality TV show. Competitors vie to be the first to the finish line in a set rigged to blow. Players don’t just collide with other vehicles to knock them from the track, but can also trigger devastating events that alter the race dynamics.
en.title: Split/Second: Velocity
en.short_description: Split/Second is an action racing game set in a reality TV show.Players don’t just collide with others to knock them off the track, but can also trigger events that alter the race.

de.title: Split/Second: Velocity
de.description: Split/Second ist ein packender Arcade-Racer vor dem Hintergrund einer megateuren Reality-Serie. Die Teilnehmer liefern sich dramatische Rennen durch eine zur Zerstörung freigegebene, für die Serie gebaute Stadt. Ihr Ziel: Meister der laufenden Staffel zu werden. Die Stadt ist gespickt mit Sprengsätzen und du bestimmst, wann es knallt - Brücken werden einstürzen, Häuser werden gesprengt und Autos in Stücke gerissen. Verheerende Explosionen zerstören deine Gegner, verändern die Strecke und erschaffen gemeine Hindernisse. Halsbrecherische Stunts, pure Zerstörung und ein atemberaubendes Rennen sorgen für das ultimative Rennerlebnis! Schnall dich an ... da draußen wird's ungemütlich!
de.short_description: Split/Second is an action racing game set in a reality TV show.Players don’t just collide with others to knock them off the track, but can also trigger events that alter the race.

it.title: Split/Second: Velocity
it.description:
Split/Second è un intenso gioco di corse arcade, ambientato in un innovativo reality show ad altissimo budget. I concorrenti si sfidano in una città costruita appositamente per essere distrutta, cercando di vincere il campionato stagionale. Il complesso urbano brulica di cariche esplosive: sta a voi scatenare l'azione! Vedrete ponti crollare al suolo, edifici inabissarsi tra nubi di polvere e auto saltare in aria. Le devastanti esplosioni non solo decimeranno gli avversari, ma modificheranno il circuito stesso e creeranno insidiosi ostacoli. Acrobazie e demolizioni spettacolari si uniscono all'adrenalina tipica delle corse estreme!
Allacciate bene le cinture: lo spettacolo pirotecnico sta per cominciare!
it.short_description: Split/Second is an action racing game set in a reality TV show.Players don’t just collide with others to knock them off the track, but can also trigger events that alter the race.

es.title: Split/Second: Velocity
es.description: Split/Second' es un juego de carreras de acción ambientado en un reality TV. Los competidores compiten por ser los primeros en llegar a la línea de meta, pero no sólo chocan con otros, sino que pueden desencadenar eventos que alteran la carrera.
es.short_description: Split/Second is an action racing game set in a reality TV show.Players don’t just collide with others to knock them off the track, but can also trigger events that alter the race.

pt.title: Split/Second: Velocity
pt.description: Split/Second' é um jogo de corrida de ação ambientado em um reality TV. Os competidores competem para serem os primeiros a chegar à linha de chegada, mas não colidam apenas com outros, eles podem desencadear eventos que alteram a corrida.
pt.short_description: Split/Second is an action racing game set in a reality TV show.Players don’t just collide with others to knock them off the track, but can also trigger events that alter the race.

zt.description: Split/Second是一款真人秀電視節目中的激烈動作賽車遊戲。 競爭對手爭先恐後地衝向終點線。 玩家不僅會與其他車輛相撞將其從賽道上撞開，還可能引發破壞性事件，從而改變比賽的動力。
zt.title: 瞬間爆發
zt.short_description: Split/Second is an action racing game set in a reality TV show.Players don’t just collide with others to knock them off the track, but can also trigger events that alter the race.

sl.title: Split/Second: Velocity
sl.description: Split/Second je akcijska dirkalna igra, ki se odvija v resničnostni oddaji. Tekmovalci skušajo priti prvi do cilja, ob tem pa naletijo na mnoge eksplozije. Igralci poskušajo tekmece spraviti s steze s trki, lahko pa tudi sprožijo dogodke, ki spremenijo dirko.
sl.short_description: Split/Second is an action racing game set in a reality TV show.Players don’t just collide with others to knock them off the track, but can also trigger events that alter the race.

fr.description:
Quand la fantasy médiévale rencontre le dodgeball.
Strikers Edge est un jeu de baston dans lequel d'anciens guerriers s'affrontent à distance. Envoyez lances et dagues dans la tête de vos adversaires, combattez en multijoueur local, atteignez le sommet du classement et devenez le meilleur Striker !
fr.title: Strikers Edge
fr.short_description: Strikers Edge is a medieval dodgeball with weapons, ancient warriors and special powers. Challenge your opponents in online and local multiplayer, ascend to the top of the ladder and become the best!

de.description: Strikers Edge ist ein Fernkampftitel, bei dem historische Krieger sich auf dem Schlachtfeld gegenüberstehen. Schalte deinen Gegner mit einem gekonnten Wurf deiner Speere und Dolche aus. Kämpfe online oder im lokalen Multiplayer, klettere an die Spitze der Ranglisten und werde zum besten Striker!

Scaglia le tue lance e i tuoi pugnali per stendere il tuo avversario. Combatti online o in modalità multiplayer locale e sali di livello per diventare lo striker più forte!

fr.description: La saga Star Wars® continue avec Star Wars®: The Force Unleashed™ II, la suite très attendue du jeu Star Wars le plus vendu de tous les temps. Dans Star Wars: The Force Unleashed, le monde a découvert l'apprenti désormais en fuite de Dark Vador, Starkiller, héros improbable qui a allumé les flammes de la rébellion dans une galaxie qui avait tant besoin d'un champion.
fr.title: STAR WARS™: The Force Unleashed™ II
fr.short_description: Betrayed by Darth Vader for the last time, Starkiller has escaped and faces a new journey to find his true identity.

en.description: Continue the epic saga as Starkiller, Darth Vader’s fugitive apprentice in Star Wars: The Force Unleashed II. Star Wars: The Force Unleashed II is again set during the unexplored era between the two Star Wars movie trilogies and will feature a brand-new story from the award-winning minds of the original game. Haunted by dark memories and compelled by confused emotions, Starkiller embarks on a thrilling journey of self-discovery and spectacular over-the-top action with even bigger, amped-up Force powers and dual Light saber moves.
en.title: STAR WARS™: The Force Unleashed™ II
en.short_description: Betrayed by Darth Vader for the last time, Starkiller has escaped and faces a new journey to find his true identity.

de.title: STAR WARS™: The Force Unleashed™ II
de.description: Die Star Wars® Saga wird mit Star Wars®: The Force Unleashed™ II weitergeführt - dem mit Spannung erwarteten Nachfolger zum am schnellsten verkauften Star Wars Spiel aller Zeiten. In Star Wars: The Force Unleashed bekamen Sie das erste mal Darth Vaders ehemaligen, sich nun auf der Flucht befindlichen, Lehrling Starkiller zu Gesicht. Er schürte die Flammen des Aufruhrs in der Galaxis, die sich verzweifelt nach einem Helden wie ihm gesehnt hatte.
de.short_description: Betrayed by Darth Vader for the last time, Starkiller has escaped and faces a new journey to find his true identity.

it.title: Star Wars: Il Potere della Forza II
it.description: Tradito da Darth Vader per l'ultima volta, Starkiller è fuggito e affronta una nuova avventura alla ricerca della sua vera identità. Scatena la tua furia, brandisci due spade laser e usa nuovi poteri della Forza per annientare i tuoi nemici. Scopri la verità nel seguito della pluripremiata storia che continua l'epica saga di Star Wars.
it.short_description: Betrayed by Darth Vader for the last time, Starkiller has escaped and faces a new journey to find his true identity.

es.title: STAR WARS™: The Force Unleashed™ II
es.description: La saga de Star Wars® continúa con Star Wars®: The Force Unleashed™ II, la muy esperada secuela del juego de Star Wars más vendido jamás creado.
es.short_description: Betrayed by Darth Vader for the last time, Starkiller has escaped and faces a new journey to find his true identity.

pt.title: STAR WARS™: The Force Unleashed™ II
pt.description: A Saga Star Wars® continua com Star Wars®: The Force Unleashed™ II, a sequela altamente antecipada do jogo Star Wars mais vendido de sempre.
pt.short_description: Betrayed by Darth Vader for the last time, Starkiller has escaped and faces a new journey to find his true identity.

zt.title: STAR WARS™: The Force Unleashed™ II
zt.description: 星際大戰續集《星際大戰®:原力釋放™II》,是有史以來最暢銷的《星際大戰》遊戲。
zt.short_description: Betrayed by Darth Vader for the last time, Starkiller has escaped and faces a new journey to find his true identity.

sl.title: STAR WARS™: The Force Unleashed™ II
sl.description:
(temp synopsis)
Nadaljujte epsko sago kot Starkiller, ubežni vajenec Darth Vaderja v Vojni zvezd: Sila, sproščena II. Vojna zvezd: Sila sproščena II je spet postavljena v neraziskano obdobje med obema filmskima trilogijama Vojna zvezd in bo vsebovala povsem novo zgodbo nagrajenih misli prvotne igre. Preganjajo ga temni spomini in silijo zmedena čustva, Starkiller se poda na vznemirljivo potovanje samoodkrivanja in spektakularne vrhunske akcije s še večjimi, razširjenimi močmi sile in dvojnimi potezami sablje Light.
sl.short_description: Betrayed by Darth Vader for the last time, Starkiller has escaped and faces a new journey to find his true identity.
