fr.title: Styx: Shards of Darkness
fr.description:
Styx revient dans un tout nouveau jeu d’infiltration !
Explorez d’immenses environnements, et faites usage de vos redoutables compétences et de votre arsenal d’assassin pour vous infiltrer ou éliminer silencieusement vos ennemis – Humains, Elfes, Nains – ainsi que de terribles et colossales créatures.

Gravissez les vertigineuses cités elfiques, infiltrez les hostiles territoires nains, et survivez à des dangers bien plus terrifiants alors que vous explorez des terres inexplorées pour mener à bien votre mission… un échec aura de lourdes conséquences pour votre espèce.
fr.short_description: Explore and master huge open environments, sneak past or assassinate new enemies and bosses, and experiment with the new array of lethal abilities and weapons in your goblin assassin's arsenal.

en.title: Styx: Shards of Darkness
en.description:
Styx returns in a new stealth adventure!
Explore and master huge open environments, sneak past or assassinate new enemies and bosses, and experiment with the new array of lethal abilities and weapons in our goblin assassin's arsenal.

Climb the dizzying Elven city, traverse the perilous territory of the Dwarfs, and survive vast unexplored lands filled with lethal dangers to fulfill your mission… failure to succeed could have huge consequences for your kin.
en.short_description: Explore and master huge open environments, sneak past or assassinate new enemies and bosses, and experiment with the new array of lethal abilities and weapons in your goblin assassin's arsenal.

de.description: Styx kehrt in ein neues Tarnabenteuer zurück! Erkunden und meistern Sie offene Umgebungen, schleichen Sie sich an Feinden und Bossen vorbei oder ermorden Sie sie, und experimentieren Sie mit der neuen Reihe tödlicher Fähigkeiten und Waffen aus dem Arsenal unseres Goblins.
de.short_description: Explore and master huge open environments, sneak past or assassinate new enemies and bosses, and experiment with the new array of lethal abilities and weapons in your goblin assassin's arsenal.

it.title: Styx: Shards of Darkness
it.description: Styx ritorna in una nuova avventura stealth! Esplora e padroneggia gli ambienti aperti, supera di nascosto o uccide nemici e boss, e sperimenta la nuova serie di abilità letali e armi del nostro arsenale di goblin.
it.short_description: Explore and master huge open environments, sneak past or assassinate new enemies and bosses, and experiment with the new array of lethal abilities and weapons in your goblin assassin's arsenal.

es.short_description: Explore and master huge open environments, sneak past or assassinate new enemies and bosses, and experiment with the new array of lethal abilities and weapons in your goblin assassin's arsenal.

pt.description: Styx retorna em uma nova aventura furtiva! Explore e domine ambientes abertos, passeie ou assassine inimigos e bosses, e experimente com o novo conjunto de habilidades letais e armas do arsenal do nosso duende.
pt.short_description: Explore and master huge open environments, sneak past or assassinate new enemies and bosses, and experiment with the new array of lethal abilities and weapons in your goblin assassin's arsenal.

sl.title: Styx: Shards of Darkness
sl.description: Styx se vrača v novi pustolovščini, polni domislic! Raziščite in obvladajte ogromne odprte svetove. Pretihotapite se mimo novih sovražnikov in šefov ali jih ubijte ter se poslužite nove palete smrtonosnih veščin in orožja v arzenalu našega goblinskega morilca.
sl.short_description: Explore and master huge open environments, sneak past or assassinate new enemies and bosses, and experiment with the new array of lethal abilities and weapons in your goblin assassin's arsenal.

zt.description: Styx暗影大師回來了！探索龐大的開放環境，透過潛行來暗殺新的敵人和頭目，並在哥布林刺客的武器庫中探索一系列新的致命能力和武器。爬上令人眼花撩亂的精靈城，穿越充滿危險的矮人領地，並在廣闊未開發充滿致命危險的土地上生存，完成您的任務。成功或是失敗將對您的種族帶來巨大的影響！

fr.title: Syberia 3
fr.description: Kate Walker est retrouvée mourante sur un rivage par la tribu Youkole, un peuple nomade accompagnant leurs autruches des neiges en pleine migration. Ensemble, coincés et prisonniers de la ville de Valsembor, ils devront trouver un moyen de poursuivre leur périple, dans une course-poursuite contre leurs ennemis et des obstacles insoupçonnés. Sans compter l'ancienne vie de Kate qui commence à la rattraper...
fr.short_description: Syberia 3 takes you inside an enchanting, mysterious universe full of life for you to explore in 3D. Plunged into the heart of a world inhabited by a cast of interesting characters.

en.description: The limitless imagination of Benoît Sokal continues in Syberia 3, focusing on an entirely new adventure. After abandoning the island, Kate is found dying on the edge of a river by the Youkole tribe, a nomadic people migrating with their snow ostriches. Stuck in Valsembor village, together they must find a way to continue their journey in a race against their enemies and unexpected obstacles, not to mention Kate's past, which catches up with her.
en.title: Syberia 3
en.short_description: Syberia 3 takes you inside an enchanting, mysterious universe full of life for you to explore in 3D. Plunged into the heart of a world inhabited by a cast of interesting characters.

de.title: Syberia 3
de.description: Der Schwerpunkt von Syberia 3, das auch diesmal wieder aus der Feder von Autor Benoit Sokal stammt, liegt auf einer vollkommen neuen Reise. Nachdem sie die Insel verlassen hatte, wird Kate vom Stamm der Youkole, einem Nomadenstamm, der seine Schneestrauße auf deren Wanderung begleitet, sterbend an einem Küstenstrich aufgefunden. In die Enge getrieben und als Gefangene der Stadt Valsembor müssen sie gemeinsam eine Möglichkeit finden, um ihre Reise fortzusetzen, auf einer Verfolgungsjagd gegen ihre Feinde und ungeahnte Hindernisse. Zumal Kate darüber hinaus von ihrem alten Leben eingeholt wird ...
de.short_description: Syberia 3 takes you inside an enchanting, mysterious universe full of life for you to explore in 3D. Plunged into the heart of a world inhabited by a cast of interesting characters.

it.title: Syberia 3
it.description: Syberia 3, sempre nato dall'immaginazione dell'autore Benoit Sokal, si concentra su un viaggio completamente nuovo. Dopo aver lasciato l'isola, Kate è stata ritrovata in fin di vita su una riva dalla tribù Youkole, un popolo nomade che accompagna i propri struzzi delle nevi in piena migrazione. Intrappolati, prigionieri della città di Valsembor, essi dovranno trovare insieme un sistema per proseguire insieme il loro periplo, in un inseguimento contro i loro nemici e degli ostacoli insospettati. Senza contare la vecchia vita di Kate che tenta di raggiungerla...
it.short_description: Syberia 3 takes you inside an enchanting, mysterious universe full of life for you to explore in 3D. Plunged into the heart of a world inhabited by a cast of interesting characters.

es.title: Syberia 3
es.description: Syberia 3 te lleva dentro de un universo misterioso. Sumergido en el corazón de un mundo habitado por un elenco de interesantes personajes, descubrirás y experimentarás un fabuloso relato imaginado por Benoit Sokal.
es.short_description: Syberia 3 takes you inside an enchanting, mysterious universe full of life for you to explore in 3D. Plunged into the heart of a world inhabited by a cast of interesting characters.

pt.title: Syberia 3
pt.description: A Syberia 3 leva-te para dentro de um universo misterioso. Mergulhado no coração de um mundo habitado por um elenco de personagens interessantes, vais descobrir e experimentar um conto fabuloso como o imaginado por Benoit Sokal.

zt.short_description: Syberia 3 takes you inside an enchanting, mysterious universe full of life for you to explore in 3D. Plunged into the heart of a world inhabited by a cast of interesting characters.

sl.title: Syberia 3
sl.description:
(temp synopsis)
Brezmejna domišljija Benoîta Sokala se nadaljuje v Syberia 3 in se osredotoča na povsem novo dogodivščino. Potem ko je Kate zapustila otok, je pleme Youkole, nomadsko ljudstvo, ki se seli s svojimi snežnimi noji, umira na robu reke. Zataknjeni v vasi Valsembor morajo skupaj najti način, kako nadaljevati pot v tekmi s sovražniki in nepričakovanimi ovirami, da ne omenjamo Kateine ​​preteklosti, ki jo dohiti.

fr.title: The Surge
fr.description: Bienvenue chez CREO, la méga-corporation qui va sauver le monde ! Une catastrophe inattendue survient lors de votre tout premier jour de travail, et vous vous réveillez, équipé d’un exosquelette industriel, au milieu du complexe en ruine. Machines incontrôlables, ouvriers-augmentés devenus fous, IA imprévisible... tous veulent votre mort.
fr.short_description: A catastrophic event has knocked you out during the first day on the job… you wake up equipped with a heavy-grade exoskeleton, in a destroyed section of the complex.

en.title: The Surge
en.description:
Welcome to CREO, the megacorporation saving the world! A catastrophic event has knocked you out during the first day on the job… you wake up equipped with a heavy-grade exoskeleton, in a destroyed section of the complex. Robots gone haywire, insane augmented co-workers and rogue AI - everything wants you dead.

Defy deadly enemies and huge bosses in tight, visceral melee combat. Target and slice specific limbs off your foes, with a next-gen loot system where you loot what you dismember. Equip, upgrade and craft new weapons and armors sliced from enemies, and make yourself stronger through a fresh take on leveling-up.
en.short_description: A catastrophic event has knocked you out during the first day on the job… you wake up equipped with a heavy-grade exoskeleton, in a destroyed section of the complex.

de.title: The Surge
de.description: Willkommen bei CREO, dem Megakonzern, der die Welt rettet! Ein katastrophales Ereignis hat Sie am ersten Arbeitstag erschüttert.... Sie wachen mit einem schwerfälligen Exoskelett in einem zerstörten Teil des Komplexes auf.
de.short_description: A catastrophic event has knocked you out during the first day on the job… you wake up equipped with a heavy-grade exoskeleton, in a destroyed section of the complex.

it.description: Benvenuti a CREO, la megacorporazione che salva il mondo! Un evento catastrofico ti ha steso durante il primo giorno di lavoro..... ti svegli con un esoscheletro di grado pesante, in una sezione distrutta del complesso.
it.short_description: A catastrophic event has knocked you out during the first day on the job… you wake up equipped with a heavy-grade exoskeleton, in a destroyed section of the complex.

es.title: The Surge

es.short_description: A catastrophic event has knocked you out during the first day on the job… you wake up equipped with a heavy-grade exoskeleton, in a destroyed section of the complex.

pt.title: The Surge
pt.description: Bem-vindo ao CREO, a megacorporação que salva o mundo! Um evento catastrófico o deixou inconsciente durante o primeiro dia de trabalho... você acorda equipado com um exoesqueleto de grau pesado, em uma seção destruída do complexo.
pt.short_description: A catastrophic event has knocked you out during the first day on the job… you wake up equipped with a heavy-grade exoskeleton, in a destroyed section of the complex.

sl.title: The Surge
sl.description: Dobrodošli v megakorporaciji CREO, ki rešuje svet. Zaradi neljubega dogodka so vas že prvi dan brcnili iz službe ... v zrušenem delu kompleksa se znajdete opremljeni s težkim oklepom.
sl.short_description: A catastrophic event has knocked you out during the first day on the job… you wake up equipped with a heavy-grade exoskeleton, in a destroyed section of the complex.

zt.description: 機甲狂潮歡迎來到CREO，這是拯救世界的大型公司！災難性的事件使您在工作的第一天就被擊倒了...您醒來時，在廢墟中發現自己變成了戰鬥機甲。所有的機器都失控了，都將置您於死地，玩家必須想辦法使用戰鬥機甲與武器來戰鬥，擊敗對手後，從敵人身上取得新武器和盔甲，透過升級來增強自己的力量以存活下去...

fr.title: True Fear: Forsaken Souls - Part 1
fr.description:
Vous marchez dans une rue que vous ne reconnaissez pas. La brume vous oblige à avancer à pas prudents, alors que l’obscurité vous aveugle. Vous vous arrêtez et levez les yeux. Une maison se dresse devant vous : des bougies brillent dans chaque fenêtre, comme s’il s’agissait d’un phare. Vous grimpez les quelques marches menant à la porte d’entrée et réalisez qu’elle n’a pas été ouverte depuis des années. Elle est scellée par la rouille et à dessein. Sans vraiment comprendre pourquoi, vous savez que quelqu’un vous attend à l’intérieur, comme vous saviez que les bougies vous étaient destinées. Cette personne se trouvait déjà à l’intérieur avant que le fer commence à rouiller. Faut-il de la patience pour attendre si longtemps. Plus de deux décennies. Pour vous.

True Fear: Forsaken Souls associe les meilleurs éléments des thrillers psychologiques à des mécaniques de jeu intuitives et amusantes. Les cinématiques, les énigmes et les phases de recherche d’objets cachés ont été élaborées avec soin et trempées dans une atmosphère unique et oppressante. L’épisode 1, le premier d’une trilogie, vous marquera à jamais.
fr.short_description: True Fear: Forsaken Souls takes the best of the psychological thriller, blending in fun and intuitive gameplay mechanics. Episode 1, the first in a trilogy, will long be remembered.

en.title: True Fear: Forsaken Souls - Part 1
en.description:
You are walking down a street you don't recognize, the fog slowing your pace to a crawl as darkness blinds you. You pause and look up to see a house; candles flicker in every window, like a beacon. Climbing the few steps to the front door, you realize many years have passed since it was last opened – it has been sealed with rust and purpose. Inexplicably, just as you know the candles are for you, you know someone waits inside. Someone who has remained in that house since before the iron began to rust. They have been patient. Waiting for over two decades. Waiting for you.

True Fear: Forsaken Souls takes the best of the psychological thriller, blending in fun and intuitive gameplay mechanics. The cinematics, puzzles and hidden object phases have been carefully developed and are steeped in a unique and oppressive atmosphere. Episode 1, the first in a trilogy, will long be remembered.
en.short_description: True Fear: Forsaken Souls takes the best of the psychological thriller, blending in fun and intuitive gameplay mechanics. Episode 1, the first in a trilogy, will long be remembered.

de.title: True Fear: Forsaken Souls - Part 1
de.description:
Du läufst eine Straße entlang, die du nicht kennst, der Nebel macht dich langsamer und in der Dunkelheit kannst du kaum etwas sehen. Du hältst an und siehst vor dir ein Haus. In jedem Fenster flackern Kerzen, wie ein Signalfeuer. Du steigst die wenigen Stufen bis zur Vordertür hoch und siehst, dass sie zuletzt vor langer Zeit geöffnet wurde – sie ist rostig und nur schwer zu öffnen. Unerklärlicherweise weißt du nicht nur, dass die Kerzen für dich bestimmt sind, du weißt auch, dass jemand drinnen auf dich wartet. Jemand, der schon in diesem Haus weilte, bevor das Eisen zu rosten begann. Dieser Jemand war geduldig und hat mehr als zwei Jahrzehnte lang gewartet. Auf dich.

True Fear: Forsaken Souls vereint das Beste eines psychologischen Thrillers mit Spaß und intuitiver Gameplay-Mechanik. Die Videosequenzen, Rätsel und Wimmelbildphasen wurden mit Sorgfalt entwickelt und sind in eine einzigartige und beklemmende Atmosphäre eingebettet. Episode 1, die erste einer Trilogie, wirst du so schnell nicht mehr vergessen.
de.short_description: True Fear: Forsaken Souls takes the best of the psychological thriller, blending in fun and intuitive gameplay mechanics. Episode 1, the first in a trilogy, will long be remembered.

it.title: True Fear: Forsaken Souls - Part 1
it.description:
Stai passeggiando in una strada sconosciuta, con la nebbia che ti circonda e l'oscurità che ti avvolge. Ti fermi e vedi una casa; come un faro, ha candele che illuminano ogni finestra. Mentre sali i gradini che portano all'ingresso, ti accorgi che la porta non viene aperta da molti anni: è sigillata dalla ruggine, e nessuno ha fatto niente per evitarlo. Inspiegabilmente, proprio come sapevi che le candele erano lì per te, sai che qualcuno ti aspetta nella casa. Qualcuno che è lì da prima che il ferro diventasse ruggine. Ha avuto pazienza. Ha aspettato per oltre vent'anni. Ha aspettato te.

True Fear: Forsaken Souls unisce le qualità del thriller psicologico a meccaniche di gioco divertenti e intuitive. I filmati, i rompicapi e le scene degli oggetti nascosti sono stati sviluppati con la massima cura e sono immersi in un'atmosfera opprimente e originale. L'Episodio 1, il primo della trilogia, godrà a lungo della sua fama.
it.short_description: True Fear: Forsaken Souls takes the best of the psychological thriller, blending in fun and intuitive gameplay mechanics. Episode 1, the first in a trilogy, will long be remembered.

fr.title: Wonder Boy: The Dragon's Trap
fr.description:
Métamorphosé en affreuse créature mi-humaine mi-lézard par le Meka-Dragon, vous ne pourrez retrouver votre apparence qu’en récupérant la Croix de Salamandre, seul objet magique capable de vous débarrasser de la malédiction.

Explorez d’immenses environnements peuplés de monstres hideux et de dragons plus exotiques les uns que les autres. Attention, chaque dragon éliminé ne fera qu’empirer les choses et vous transformera en divers animaux !
fr.short_description: Boasting beautiful, hand-drawn animations and a re-orchestrated soundtrack, the cult classic returns with a unique blend of exploration, action, and adventure!

en.title: Wonder Boy: The Dragon's Trap
en.description:
Cursed into a half-human, half-lizard monstrosity by the Meka-Dragon, you are in search for a cure! The only way you can return to human form is to find the Salamander Cross, a magical item with the power to remove curses...

With each dragon slain, the curse intensifies, transforming you into different animals! Explore large, interconnected locations populated with grumpy monsters and exotic dragons!
en.short_description: Boasting beautiful, hand-drawn animations and a re-orchestrated soundtrack, the cult classic returns with a unique blend of exploration, action, and adventure!

de.title: Wonder Boy: The Dragon's Trap
de.description:
Ein Fluch des Meka-Drachen hat dich in ein Monstrum – halb Mensch, halb Echse – verwandelt, und du bist auf der Suche nach dem Salamanderkreuz, einem magischen Item, das Flüche aufheben kann …

Erkunde riesige, verschachtelte Schauplätze voller muffiger Monster und exotischer Drachen! Wenn du diese Drachen besiegst, verschärft das den Fluch und verwandelt dich in weitere Tierformen.
de.short_description: Boasting beautiful, hand-drawn animations and a re-orchestrated soundtrack, the cult classic returns with a unique blend of exploration, action, and adventure!

it.title: Wonder Boy: The Dragon's Trap
it.description:
Il Drago Meka ti ha lanciato una maledizione, trasformandoti in una mostruosità per metà umana e per metà lucertola: ti serve un antidoto! L'unico modo per tornare alla tua forma umana è trovare la Croce Salamandra, un oggetto magico capace di spezzare le maledizioni...

Esplora vasti scenari interconnessi e popolati da scorbutici mostri ed esotici draghi! Uccidendoli, la maledizione si rafforzerà, trasformandoti in diversi animali...
it.short_description: Boasting beautiful, hand-drawn animations and a re-orchestrated soundtrack, the cult classic returns with a unique blend of exploration, action, and adventure!

zt.description: 在鐵甲龍的詛咒下變成了蜥蜴人的玩家，正在努力地尋求解脫之道。回歸人類形態的的唯一方法是找到火蛇十字架，這件魔法物品能夠解除詛咒。每當殺死一頭龍，詛咒都會加重，使玩家變成各種不同的動物。玩家不妨盡快去探索相互聯通的廣袤地域，挑戰暴戾的怪物以及珍奇的惡龍。

zt.description: 您將需要控制夢遊者鮑勃的潛意識守護者Subob, 來幫助鮑勃安全的回到他的床上。 探索一個超現實的手繪夢中世界, 避開危險, 引導鮑勃能安全的回到他的床上入眠。

fr.short_description: Magic duels are the way to solve any dispute in a kingdom conquered by the cruel witch. Master the destructive power of the spheres and become the most fearsome mage ever!

fr.title: Tyler: Model 005
fr.description: Tyler: Model 005 est un jeu de plateforme, d’action et d’exploration 3D se déroulant dans les années 50, où vous pouvez personnaliser et contrôler Tyler, un minirobot intrépide. Des années après avoir été éteint, Tyler est accidentellement rallumé durant un orage. Vous devez maintenant découvrir pourquoi votre créateur a disparu et ce qui est arrivé à votre maison, envahie par les rats et les araignées.
fr.short_description: Tyler: Model 005 is a 3D action-platformer and exploration game set in the 1950s where you customize and control a robot named Tyler.

fr.description: Aide Buzz, Woody et les autres à sauver tous les jouets dans Toy Story 3: Le Jeu Vidéo. Mode Histoire - Incarne Buzz, Woody ou Jessie et cours, roule, vole à travers tes scènes favorites de Disney Pixar Toy Story 3. Mode Coffre à jouets - Laisse libre cours à ton imagination dans ce nouveau monde ouvert et joue à ta façon avec les jouets d'Andy. Incarne Buzz, Woody ou Jessie et choisis tes activités ainsi que leur ordre. Plus tu utilises ton imagination en créant ta propre histoire, plus tu es récompensé.

fr.title: DiRT 4
fr.description: Le meilleur jeu de course tout-terrain est de retour ! Dans DiRT 4, mesurez-vous aux routes et circuits les plus rudes au volant de bolides en mode rallye, rallycross et landrush. La technologie « Configuration Spéciale » vous offre des millions de parcours en Australie, en Espagne, dans le Michigan, en Suède et au pays de Galles. Découvrez 50 véhicules parmi les plus emblématiques de l'histoire du sport. Jeu officiel du Championnat du monde de rallycross FIA avec des courses en France, au Portugal, au Royaume-Uni, en Suède et en Norvège. Participez à des rallycross de Supercars, de RX2, de Super 1600 et de Group B. Courses de landrush en buggy et camions en Californie, au Nevada, et au Mexique. Perfectionnez-vous à l'académie DiRT et faites-en votre terrain de jeu ultime. Créez votre pilote et montez une équipe pour défier le monde de la course tout-terrain.
fr.short_description: DiRT 4 is all about embracing fear. It’s about loving the feeling of pushing flat out next to a sheer cliff drop, going for the gap that’s too small and seeing how much air you can get. Be Fearless.

en.title: DiRT 4
en.description:
Motorsport by its very nature is dangerous. DiRT 4 is all about embracing that danger. It’s about the thrill, exhilaration and adrenaline that is absolutely vital to off-road racing. And more than that, it’s about loving that feeling. It’s about pushing flat out next to a sheer cliff drop. Going for the gap that’s slightly too small. Seeing how much air you can get in a truck. They call it ‘being fearless’.

DiRT 4 also features a game-changing system called Your Stage; an innovative rally route creation tool that allows you to produce an almost-infinite number of unique stages at the press of a button. You choose your location and set the route parameters, then Your Stage does the hard work to create a unique rally stage that you can race, share with your friends and then challenge them to beat your time. Your Stage allows experienced rally players to create longer, more technical routes, whilst newcomers can create simpler shorter routes as they hone their skills.
en.short_description: DiRT 4 is all about embracing fear. It’s about loving the feeling of pushing flat out next to a sheer cliff drop, going for the gap that’s too small and seeing how much air you can get. Be Fearless.

de.title: DiRT 4
de.description:
Die weltweit führende Gelände-Rennreihe ist zurück! In DiRT 4 stellst du dich am Steuer der mächtigsten Maschinen den härtesten Straßen und Rennstrecken der Welt in Rallye, Rallycross & Landrush.

Die revolutionären Wertungsprüfungseinstellungen bieten dir auf Knopfdruck Millionen von Rallye-Strecken in Australien, Spanien, Michigan, Schweden & Wales.

Fahre über 50 der kultigsten Rallye-Fahrzeuge aus der Geschichte des Sports.

Das offizielle Spiel des FIA World Rallycross Championships mit Rennen in Frankreich, Portugal, dem Vereinigten Königreich, Schweden & Norwegen. Fahre Supercars, RX2, Super 1600s & Gruppe B-Rallycross.

Tolle Kurzbahn-Buggy- & Truck-Landrush-Rennen in Kalifornien, Nevada & Mexiko.

Werde an der DiRT-Akademie besser & mach sie zu deiner Spielwiese.
de.short_description: DiRT 4 is all about embracing fear. It’s about loving the feeling of pushing flat out next to a sheer cliff drop, going for the gap that’s too small and seeing how much air you can get. Be Fearless.

it.title: DiRT 4
it.description:
La miglior serie al mondo di corse off-road è tornata! DiRT 4 ti mette al volante delle auto più potenti mai create per affrontare le strade e i circuiti più duri al mondo in rally, rallycross e landrush.

L’innovativa tecnologia “Configurazione Tappa” ti offre milioni di percorsi rally in Australia, Spagna, Michigan, Svezia e Galles con un solo pulsante.

Guida oltre 50 veicoli da rally tra i più emblematici mai creati nella storia dello sport.

Il gioco ufficiale del FIA World Rallycross Championship con gare in Francia, Portogallo, Regno Unito, Svezia e Norvegia. Gareggia con Supercar, RX2, Super 1600 e rallycross Gruppo B.
Incredibili gare landrush su corto tracciato con buggy e pick-up in California, Nevada e Messico.
Affina le tue abilità alla DiRT Academy e portale al top.Crea il tuo pilota e un team con cui dominare il mondo delle gare off-road.
it.short_description: DiRT 4 is all about embracing fear. It’s about loving the feeling of pushing flat out next to a sheer cliff drop, going for the gap that’s too small and seeing how much air you can get. Be Fearless.

es.title: DiRT 4
es.description: ¡La serie líder de carreras todoterreno ha vuelto! DiRT 4 te pone al volante de los coches más potentes para hacer carreras de rally, rallycross y landrush en los caminos más duros del mundo.
es.short_description: DiRT 4 is all about embracing fear. It’s about loving the feeling of pushing flat out next to a sheer cliff drop, going for the gap that’s too small and seeing how much air you can get. Be Fearless.

pt.title: DiRT 4
pt.description: A melhor série de corridas todo-o-terreno do mundo voltou! DiRT 4 coloca-te ao volante dos mais poderosos veículos e nas pistas mais rigorosas do mundo em rally, rallycross e landrush.
pt.short_description: DiRT 4 is all about embracing fear. It’s about loving the feeling of pushing flat out next to a sheer cliff drop, going for the gap that’s too small and seeing how much air you can get. Be Fearless.

sl.title: DiRT 4
sl.description: DiRT 4 je igra, namenjena sprejemanju občutkov strahu. Prisilite se in se približajte strmi pečini, odpravite se v ozko odprtino in preverite, koliko zraka vam je na voljo. Bodite neustrašni.
sl.short_description: DiRT 4 is all about embracing fear. It’s about loving the feeling of pushing flat out next to a sheer cliff drop, going for the gap that’s too small and seeing how much air you can get. Be Fearless.

zt.description: 賽車運動本質上是危險的。 DiRT 4就是要承擔這種危險。刺激，興奮和腎上腺素對越野賽車至關重要，不僅如此，更是愛那種感覺。這是關於在陡峭的懸崖降落處平放、穿越極小的縫隙，他們稱之為“無所畏懼”。 DiRT 4還具有改變遊戲規則的系統，稱為Your Stage。一種創新的拉力賽路線創建工具，您只需按一下按鈕即可產生幾乎無限數量的獨特賽段。選擇您的位置並設置路線參數，然後Your Stage將創建一個獨特的拉力賽舞台，您可以比賽，與您的朋友分享，然後挑戰他們的時間。Your Stage可以讓經驗豐富的拉力賽選手創建更長，更多的技術路線，而新手可以在磨練自己的技能時創建更簡單的短路線。借助DiRT 4，程式管理員尋求將去年DiRT拉力賽的刺激感和真實感與無畏的興奮，可及性和腎上腺素激增的比賽相結合，在備受讚譽的前傳DiRT 2和DiRT 3中看到過以科林·麥克雷（Colin McRae）拉力賽作為基礎， FIA World Rallycross Championship的殘酷比賽，賽車和卡車的瘋狂戰鬥，以及在Joyride舉行的公開比賽的蠻橫樂趣的基礎上，玩家將面臨來自跨越三大洲地點的挑戰。
zt.title: 塵埃4
zt.short_description: DiRT 4 is all about embracing fear. It’s about loving the feeling of pushing flat out next to a sheer cliff drop, going for the gap that’s too small and seeing how much air you can get. Be Fearless.

fr.title: Aqua Moto Racing Utopia
fr.description:
Bienvenue à Utopia, un monde où le fun est roi et où vous pouvez piloter de puissants scooters des mers sur des vagues à couper le souffle. Avec Aqua Moto Racing Utopia, faites le plein de vitesse et de sensations fortes dans des lieux exotiques et paradisiaques comme l’Amazonie, les Tropiques, la Grèce et la mangrove. Découvrez le plaisir simple et gratifiant qu’apporte une cascade parfaitement exécutée dans un canal entouré par la végétation !
Préparez-vous pour la course de toute une vie !
fr.short_description: Aqua Moto Racing Utopia let's you race through both big and small waves and make death defying stunts to get that much needed boost that let's you pass your friends on the final stretch.

en.title: Aqua Moto Racing Utopia
en.description:
Aqua Moto Racing Utopia let's you race through both big and small waves and make death defying stunts to get that much needed boost that let's you pass your friends on the final stretch. A fun-packed racer with interactive waves and split screen racing!

When it all blows over you ride towards the setting sun in a perfect gaming Utopia!
en.short_description: Aqua Moto Racing Utopia let's you race through both big and small waves and make death defying stunts to get that much needed boost that let's you pass your friends on the final stretch.

de.title: Aqua Moto Racing Utopia
de.description:
Komm mit nach Utopia, in eine Welt des puren Vergnügens, in der du auf kraftvollen Wasserfahrzeugen fährst, die so ultramodern sind, dass man es erleben muss, um es zu glauben. Aqua Moto Racing Utopia entführt dich in exotische Welten, wo du Geschwindigkeit und prickelnde Spannung an Orten wie dem Amazonas, den Tropen, Griechenland und den Mangrovensümpfen erlebst. Wenn du auf einem von Mangroven gesäumten Wasserweg einen perfekten Stunt hinlegst, wirst du dir ein Grinsen nicht verkneifen können!

Mach dich bereit für den Wellenritt deines Lebens!
de.short_description: Aqua Moto Racing Utopia let's you race through both big and small waves and make death defying stunts to get that much needed boost that let's you pass your friends on the final stretch.

it.title: Aqua Moto Racing Utopia
it.description:
Scopri Utopia, un mondo di puro divertimento in cui piloterai potentissime moto d’acqua lanciate su onde talmente realistiche che rischierai di inzupparti. Aqua Moto Racing Utopia combina adrenalina pura e velocità folli catapultandoti in esotici scenari da sogno: foresta amazzonica, tropici, Grecia e perfino una palude di mangrovie. Preparati all’emozione di eseguire acrobazie mozzafiato in strettissimi canali costeggiati da mangrovie!

Preparati a cavalcare le onde come non mai!
it.short_description: Aqua Moto Racing Utopia let's you race through both big and small waves and make death defying stunts to get that much needed boost that let's you pass your friends on the final stretch.

es.title: Aqua Moto Racing Utopia
es.description:
Deja que te llevemos a Utopia, un mundo de pura diversión donde pilotarás potentes vehículos acuáticos sobre olas tan realistas que tienes que sentirlas para creerlas. Aqua Moto Racing Utopia te transporta a mundos exóticos de ensueño donde experimentarás la velocidad y una tensión electrizante en lugares como el Amazonas, los trópicos, Grecia y un manglar. ¡Conseguir la acrobacia perfecta en un estrecho canal flanqueado de mangles te dibujará una sonrisa en la cara!

¡Prepárate para estar en la cresta de la ola!
es.short_description: Aqua Moto Racing Utopia let's you race through both big and small waves and make death defying stunts to get that much needed boost that let's you pass your friends on the final stretch.

pt.title: Aqua Moto Racing Utopia
pt.description:
Mergulha connosco em Utopia, um mundo de pura diversão, onde podes pilotar poderosos veículos aquáticos em ondas tão reais que terás de senti-las para acreditar. Aqua Moto Racing Utopia transporta-te para fantásticos mundos exóticos, onde irás experimentar velocidades e emoções eletrizantes em locais como a Amazónia, os Trópicos, a Grécia e um pantanal. Concluir manobras perfeitas num estreito curso de água pantanosa vai certamente fazer-te sorrir!

Prepara-te para a maior aventura aquática da tua vida!
pt.short_description: Aqua Moto Racing Utopia let's you race through both big and small waves and make death defying stunts to get that much needed boost that let's you pass your friends on the final stretch.

zt.title: 水上摩托車 競速烏托邦
zt.description:
水上摩托車 競速烏托邦是一款具有挑戰性的水上賽車遊戲，它將極限速度，特技和最先進的水流模擬技術融合到了充滿現代感的動作遊戲體驗中。
具有職業生涯模式，其中包括三場冠軍戰役，四人分割螢幕競速以及八人連線競速模式，為遊戲帶來了無限樂趣，並添加4種創意派對模式。
您可以創建自己的獨特化身，以其強大的創建工具在線上炫耀。該工具還可以讓您設計自己的車輛，以便您在激烈的比賽中，脫穎而出。
在10種不同天氣和光照條件下的美麗環境中，提高您的騎行技巧，您將騎著完美的水上摩托車飛向夕陽！
zt.short_description: Aqua Moto Racing Utopia let's you race through both big and small waves and make death defying stunts to get that much needed boost that let's you pass your friends on the final stretch.

sl.title: Aqua Moto Racing Utopia
sl.description: V igri Aqua Moto Racing Utopia dirkate čez velike in manjše valove z vratolomnimi potezami, s katerimi pridobite potreben zagon, ki vam omogoča, da mimo svojih prijateljev odidete na zadnji odsek. Zabavna igra z interaktivnimi valovi, deljenim zaslonom in spletnimi dirkami!
sl.short_description: Aqua Moto Racing Utopia let's you race through both big and small waves and make death defying stunts to get that much needed boost that let's you pass your friends on the final stretch.

Joue Angelo, Lola, Victor et beaucoup d'autres personnages dans ce jeu de skate épique.
Parcours des niveaux inspirés des décors emblématiques de la série comme la ville, l'école, Adventure Land ou le Skate-park, dans un jeu de plateforme fun et facile à prendre en main !

Angelo-Skate Away是一款由校園搞怪王電視動畫為主角的全新遊戲！
玩家在這個滑板遊戲中扮演安吉洛、洛拉、舍伍德以及更多角色。
在有趣的平台遊戲中，享受在城市，學校，冒險樂園或滑板公園等不同場地中溜滑板的樂趣。
收集紙杯蛋糕，並使用它們來解鎖新的關卡，角色，帽子，棋盤和花樣，成為一個非常獨特的滑板手！

zt.title: 迪士尼勇敢傳說電玩遊戲
zt.description:
《勇敢傳說》是皮克斯動畫工廠首部以女性為主角的全新原創作品。玩家將扮演電影主角「梅莉達」挑戰自己的命運。穿越崎嶇的地形，在其中奔跑、跳躍、戰鬥，體驗古老的蘇格蘭風景。運用你的勇敢與睿智對抗敵人、解除咒語，最後拯救你的國家！
動畫故事舞台是以一個被山群環繞的蘇格蘭高地，主角梅莉達是一個性急躁粗魯、有著一頭紅棕色捲髮的公主，她希望成為一名出色的弓箭手，因而與母親成了對立關係，一時衝動下啟動了古老的森林魔咒，因此王國陷入無比的混亂及危機。為了彌補這個過錯，梅莉達將勇敢地面對自己的命運，一步步解除危機。
zt.short_description: Disney•Pixar Brave: The Video Game invites players to wield a sword and bow and arrow to defeat fierce enemies, break a magical curse and save a kingdom.

pt.description: Filadélfia – outrora o berço da Independência –tornou-se num gueto, onde drones de vigilância e patrulhas blindadas mantêm a população de joelhos, esmagando qualquer dissidência com uma força brutal.

zt.title: 烽火家園：革命再起
zt.description:
Homefront®：The Revolution是一個開放世界的第一人稱射擊遊戲，您必須在游擊戰中領導抵抗軍抵抗一支強大的軍事力量。
殘酷的軍事佔領四年之後，美國屈服了。
曾經是獨立發源地的費城已成為貧民窟，監視無人機和裝甲巡邏隊使居民緊隨其後，用野蠻力量壓制了任何異議人士。
她曾經引以為傲的公民生活在一個警察國家，被迫為了生存而合作，自從滅絕以來，他們就一直夢想著獲得自由。
但是在紅色區域的荒地中，在被炸毀的街道和廢棄的地鐵中，正在形成抵抗軍。 一支游擊隊，儘管機會渺茫，但決心為自由而戰，並點燃了第二次美國獨立戰爭。
但是自由總是有代價的……
zt.short_description: Homefront®: The Revolution is an open-world first person shooter where you must lead the Resistance movement in guerrilla warfare against a superior military force.

zt.title: 天國降臨：救贖
zt.description:
你是亨利，一名鐵匠之子。你被捲入激烈的內戰中，眼睜睜看著一群入侵者踐踏你的村莊，屠殺你的家人。勉強逃過這場浩劫，你拿起劍挺身反擊。為你的雙親報仇，並協助擊退侵略的勢力！
・寫實&動態的開放世界：宏偉的城堡、廣闊的原野，全都以令人驚豔的頂尖圖像呈現，充滿會對你的行動做出回應的生動人物。
・非線性的劇情：有多種方式可完成任務，你可從中選擇，並面對你的選擇帶來的後果。
・富挑戰性的戰鬥：選擇武器，並在戰鬥中施展刺激又無情的獨特連續技。
・角色發展：選擇裝備、精進技巧，獲得特殊技能。
zt.short_description: Kingdom Come: Deliverance is a story-driven open-world RPG that immerses you in an epic adventure in the Holy Roman Empire.

zt.description:
《印地安納瓊斯大冒險》的故事劇情將會根據前三部印地安納瓊斯系列電影的主要冒險情節改編而成，並且以電影中的主要場面作為背景，讓玩家親自探索和發現-與敵人戰鬥，解決難題並找出世界上最偉大的寶藏。
遊戲中共有三張冒險地圖，也就是代表前三部系列電影中的故事發生處，分別為「法櫃奇兵」、「魔宮傳奇」、及「聖戰奇兵」，而每張地圖都包含了六個章節，只有完成前一張地圖的冒險，才能夠解開下一張地圖，所以玩家將會完整體驗電影中的冒險劇情。
zt.title: 樂高印第安那瓊斯1：最初冒險
zt.short_description: Play through all three classic Indiana Jones™ movies and relive your favorite Indy adventures in the tongue-in-cheek worlds of LEGO®.

sl.title: LEGO® Indiana Jones™: The Original Adventures
sl.description: Človek s klobukom' se je vrnil – in pripravljen je dokazati, da kri ni voda. Igra LEGO Indiana Jones je postavljena v filmske dogodivščine in na komičen ter edinstven način predstavi trilogijo Lov za izgubljenim zakladom, Tempelj smrti ter Zadnji križarski pohod. Pametno in drzno vodite Indyja v vznemirljive kraje, kot so džungle Južne Amerike, indijski gorski vrhovi in še in še.

sl.title: GRIP: Combat Racing
sl.description:
GRIP je visokooktanska dirkalna igra, ki ponuja divje hitrosti in v kateri boste oboroženi do zob.
Svet v tej videoigri je surov in neusmiljen. Zgolj zmaga na dirki ni  dovolj, veličino pridobite z neusmiljenim uničenjem tekmecev.
Vozite lahko po stenah, stropih in še marsikje ... medtem pa se poslužujte trikov in izvajajte neverjetne kaskaderske vložke po vesolju. Prilagodite svoje vozilo in uporabite uničujoče orožje ter si zagotovite zmago in popolno uničenje nasprotnikov.

de.short_description: Join the Resistance, stand united and fight for freedom against an overwhelming military force.

it.title: Homefront
it.description: Hanno invaso il tuo Paese, occupato la tua città... Riuscirai a ricacciarli indietro ? Unisciti alla Resistenza in un viaggio attraverso l'America distrutta e devastata dalla guerra. Home is where the war is.

pt.title: Homefront
pt.description: O país invadido, a tua terra natal ocupada… Será que tens o que é preciso para ripostar ? Junta-te à Resistência numa aventura através de uma América deformada e destroçada pela guerra. Home is where the war is.
pt.short_description: Join the Resistance, stand united and fight for freedom against an overwhelming military force.

zt.description:
加入反抗軍，團結一致，為抵抗壓倒性的軍事力量而爭取自由。
那是2027年。在經歷了15年的經濟崩潰和自然資源日益減少的全球衝突之後，我們所知道的世界正在瓦解。
曾經一度引以為傲的美國淪陷，她的基礎設施崩潰，軍事混亂。由於遭受毀滅性的EMP罷工的打擊，美國無力抵抗野蠻的核武，大朝鮮共和國不斷擴大的佔領。
美國被其昔日的盟友所拋棄，四周是蒼茫的城牆和荒蕪的郊區。這是一個警察州，高中體育場已成為拘留中心，而購物中心則掩護裝甲攻擊車輛。 曾經一度自由的人現在是囚犯……或合作者……或革命者。
zt.title: 烽火家園
zt.short_description: Join the Resistance, stand united and fight for freedom against an overwhelming military force.

sl.title: Homefront
sl.description: Pridružite se Odporu, bodite enotni in se borite za svobodo proti ogromni vojaški sili.
sl.short_description: Join the Resistance, stand united and fight for freedom against an overwhelming military force.

fr.title: Dino Dini's Kick Off™ Revival
fr.description: Dino Dini est de retour, et Kick Off aussi ! Comme le disait la première publicité du jeu en 1989 : « C’est facile d’y jouer, ça prendra du temps pour le maîtriser - beaucoup de temps ». Prêt à relever le défi ?
fr.short_description: "Playing it is easy, mastering it will take time - A lot of time". When you score an amazing header goal in injury time to win a match after coming back from behind, it feels like nothing on earth!

en.title: Dino Dini's Kick Off™ Revival

When you score an amazing header goal in injury time to win a match after coming back from behind, it feels like nothing on earth!

zt.description:
(temp synopsis)
迪諾·迪尼（Dino Dini）又回來了！正如1989年該遊戲的原始廣告所宣稱的那樣：“玩起來容易，掌握它需要時間-很多時間”。當您在受傷時刻打進驚人的頭球進球後從後面回來贏得比賽時，感覺簡直是天壤之別！
zt.short_description: "Playing it is easy, mastering it will take time - A lot of time". When you score an amazing header goal in injury time to win a match after coming back from behind, it feels like nothing on earth!

sl.title: Dino Dini's Kick Off™ Revival
sl.description: Igra Dino Dini's Kick Off je namenjena vsem, ki občutite zadovoljstvo ob spretno izpeljanih potezah, ko ste pod pritiskom. Zahteva zagrizene igralce, saj sta uspeh in neuspeh odvisna od vas in vaše predanosti. Ima podobno filozofijo kot igre, ki temeljijo na spretnostih. Ko vam uspe neverjeten zadetek z glavo in zmagate na tekmi, se zdi, da ne more obstajati nič boljšega!
sl.short_description: "Playing it is easy, mastering it will take time - A lot of time". When you score an amazing header goal in injury time to win a match after coming back from behind, it feels like nothing on earth!

fr.title: Snow Moto Racing Freedom
fr.description: La course commence ! Enfourchez une motoneige et lancez-vous sur des circuits de Snocross ardus dans des décors hivernaux exotiques. Remportez des championnats, démontrez votre talent en ligne et devenez une légende !
fr.short_description: Snow Moto Racing Freedom lets you take your rightful place on a high-speed snowmobile on Snocross tracks or through vast beautiful winter landscapes.

en.title: Snow Moto Racing Freedom
en.description: Snow Moto Racing Freedom lets you take your rightful place on a high-speed snowmobile on Snocross tracks or through vast beautiful winter landscapes. Experience the thrill of racing so close to your opponents that you can feel the spray of the snow and hear the roar of their engines.
en.short_description: Snow Moto Racing Freedom lets you take your rightful place on a high-speed snowmobile on Snocross tracks or through vast beautiful winter landscapes.

de.title: Snow Moto Racing Freedom
de.description: Auf zum Rennen! Schnapp dir ein Schneemobil und rase über enge Snocross-Strecken und exotische Winterlandschaften. Gewinne Meisterschaften, beweise deine Fähigkeiten online und gib nicht auf, bis du ein legendärer Rennfahrer bist.
de.short_description: Snow Moto Racing Freedom lets you take your rightful place on a high-speed snowmobile on Snocross tracks or through vast beautiful winter landscapes.

it.title: Snow Moto Racing Freedom
it.description: Pronti, partenza, via! Salta su una motoslitta e corri lungo stretti tracciati da Snocross ed esotici scenari invernali. Vinci i campionati, mostra online le tue abilità e battiti per diventare un pilota leggendario.
it.short_description: Snow Moto Racing Freedom lets you take your rightful place on a high-speed snowmobile on Snocross tracks or through vast beautiful winter landscapes.

es.title: Snow Moto Racing Freedom
es.description: ¡Vamos a echar una carrera! Súbete a la moto de nieve y corre por pistas de snocross con exóticas escenas invernales. Gana campeonatos, presume de habilidades en línea y sigue luchando hasta convertirte en un corredor legendario.
es.short_description: Snow Moto Racing Freedom lets you take your rightful place on a high-speed snowmobile on Snocross tracks or through vast beautiful winter landscapes.

pt.title: Snow Moto Racing Freedom
pt.description: Toca a correr! Salta para uma moto de neve e avança por desafiantes pistas de Snocross e cenários invernais exóticos. Vence campeonatos, mostras as tuas capacidades online e dá tudo até te tornares num corredor lendário.
pt.short_description: Snow Moto Racing Freedom lets you take your rightful place on a high-speed snowmobile on Snocross tracks or through vast beautiful winter landscapes.

zt.description: Snow Moto Racing Freedom可以讓您在高速雪地摩托車上穿越廣闊美麗的冬季風景。親身體驗比賽的快感，您可以感受到對手的積雪，聽見他們引擎的轟隆聲。沿著自己獨特的路線穿越異國風光，同時將空中的特技表演串連起來，以獲得額外的速度提升，飛越對手。通過錦標賽取得進展，解鎖新的雪地摩托車並成為傳奇。在世界比賽中嶄露頭角！ 這是終極的雪地動力之旅！
zt.title: 雪地摩托自由競賽
zt.short_description: Snow Moto Racing Freedom lets you take your rightful place on a high-speed snowmobile on Snocross tracks or through vast beautiful winter landscapes.

sl.title: Snow Moto Racing Freedom
sl.description: Snow Moto Racing Freedom vam omogoča, da zasedete svoje pravo mesto na hitrih motornih sani na progah Snocross ali skozi čudovite čudovite zimske pokrajine. Doživite vznemirjenje dirkanja tako blizu nasprotnikom, da lahko začutite pršenje snega in slišite ropot njihovih motorjev.
sl.short_description: Snow Moto Racing Freedom lets you take your rightful place on a high-speed snowmobile on Snocross tracks or through vast beautiful winter landscapes.

zt.description:
"準備好迎接第三街聖徒在辛迪加上演最荒唐的遊戲情節！
在拿下了死水（Stilwater）的數年後，第三街聖徒（The Third Street Saints）已經從街頭幫派發展成了家用品牌，從聖徒運動鞋、聖徒能量飲料，到強尼．加特（Johnny Gat）搖頭娃娃，都可以在住家旁邊的商店買到。聖徒成為了死水之王，但他們的「盛名」可從沒被遺忘。在全球各地都有龐大勢力的傳奇犯罪幫派「聯合會」（Syndicate）將注意力轉向了聖徒，並要求納貢。
由於你拒絕向聯合會附首稱臣，於是戰鬥便在鋼埠展開，而這座一度繁榮的大都會現在淪落為在聯合會控制下苦苦掙扎的犯罪之城。在史上最具異國風格的場景中開著坦克跳傘、呼叫衛星島航空襲墨西哥摔角手幫派、隻身與訓練精良的軍事部隊作戰。"
zt.title: 黑街聖徒3 完整版
zt.short_description: Refusing to kneel to the Syndicate, a legendary criminal fraternity, you take the fight to Steelport, a once-proud metropolis reduced to a struggling city of sin under Syndicate control.

sl.short_description: Refusing to kneel to the Syndicate, a legendary criminal fraternity, you take the fight to Steelport, a once-proud metropolis reduced to a struggling city of sin under Syndicate control.

zt.description: 美國總統必須在有史以來最瘋狂的開放世界遊戲中使用超級大國和奇怪的武器將地球從外星霸主Zinyak手中拯救出來。他史詩般的結論改變了遊戲規則！ 聖徒已經從高樓林立的房子變成了白宮，但是地球已經入侵了，這取決於您是要讓世界脫離霸王Zinyak和他的外星帝國。 在新舊同伴的陪伴下，擁有超能力和怪異武器的武器庫，您必須在有史以來最狂野的開放世界遊戲中拯救世界！

fr.title: Saints Row: Gat Out of Hell
fr.description: Incarnez Johnny Gat ou Kinzie Kensington et semez le chaos dans les enfers au cours d’une quête pour sauver l’âme du chef des Saints.
fr.short_description: Join Johnny Gat & Kinzie Kensington as you tear apart Hell in a quest to save the Boss’ soul. Historical icons, old friends, older enemies, a talking gun, a full length musical number await!

en.title: Saints Row: Gat Out of Hell
en.description: After the space faring antics of Saints Row IV, many fans asked what we could do next… the answer? Shoot The Devil in the face. Play as either Johnny Gat or Kinzie Kensington as you tear apart Hell in a quest to save the leader of the Saints’ soul. Historical icons, old friends, older enemies, a talking gun, a full length musical number, and a whole lot of other shenanigans all await you in the open world standalone expansion playground that is Saints Row: Gat Out Of Hell.
en.short_description: Join Johnny Gat & Kinzie Kensington as you tear apart Hell in a quest to save the Boss’ soul. Historical icons, old friends, older enemies, a talking gun, a full length musical number await!

de.title: Saints Row: Gat Out of Hell
de.description: Spiele entweder als Johnny Gat oder als Kinzie Kensington, während du beim Versuch, die Seele des Anführers der Saints zu retten, die Hölle in Schutt und Asche legst.
de.short_description: Join Johnny Gat & Kinzie Kensington as you tear apart Hell in a quest to save the Boss’ soul. Historical icons, old friends, older enemies, a talking gun, a full length musical number await!

it.title: Saints Row: Gat Out of Hell
it.description: Dopo le follie nello spazio di Saints Row IV, molti si sono chiesti quale sarebbe stato il passo successivo. La risposta? Spaccare la faccia al Diavolo in persona.
it.short_description: Join Johnny Gat & Kinzie Kensington as you tear apart Hell in a quest to save the Boss’ soul. Historical icons, old friends, older enemies, a talking gun, a full length musical number await!

es.title: Saints Row: Gat Out of Hell
es.description: Después de las payasadas del viaje espacial de Saints Row IV, muchos aficionados nos preguntaron qué podríamos hacer después de aquello... ¿La respuesta? Disparar al diablo en toda la cara.
es.short_description: Join Johnny Gat & Kinzie Kensington as you tear apart Hell in a quest to save the Boss’ soul. Historical icons, old friends, older enemies, a talking gun, a full length musical number await!

pt.title: Saints Row: Gat Out of Hell
pt.description: Jogue como Johnny Gat ou Kinzie Kensington e vire o inferno de cabeça para baixo para salvar o líder dos Saints. Ícones históricos, velhos amigos e inimigos e uma arma falante aguardam você nesta expansão independente em mundo aberto.
pt.short_description: Join Johnny Gat & Kinzie Kensington as you tear apart Hell in a quest to save the Boss’ soul. Historical icons, old friends, older enemies, a talking gun, a full length musical number await!

zt.description: 在黑街聖徒4的太空滑稽表演之後，許多粉絲問我們下一步該怎麼做……答案？ 對魔鬼打臉。 玩家可以扮演約翰尼·加特（Johnny Gat）或金茲·肯辛頓（Kinzie Kensington），將地獄撕成碎片，以拯救聖徒的靈魂領袖。 歷史人物，老朋友，老敵人，以及許多其他的惡作劇都在開放世界的獨立擴展操場 黑街聖徒：逃離地獄中等待著您。
zt.title: 黑街聖徒：逃出地獄
zt.short_description: Join Johnny Gat & Kinzie Kensington as you tear apart Hell in a quest to save the Boss’ soul. Historical icons, old friends, older enemies, a talking gun, a full length musical number await!

sl.title: Saints Row: Gat Out of Hell
sl.description: *Po vesoljskih potegavščinah Saints Row IV so številni oboževalci vprašali, kaj lahko storimo naprej ... odgovor? Ustreli hudiča v obraz. Igrajte kot Johnny Gat ali Kinzie Kensington, ko razdirate pekel v prizadevanju, da rešite vodjo duše svetnikov. Zgodovinske ikone, stari prijatelji, starejši sovražniki, govorilna pištola, glasbena številka v polni dolžini in vrsta drugih sleparjev vas čakajo na samostojnem ekspanzijskem igrišču odprtega sveta, ki je Saints Row: Gat Out Of Hell.
sl.short_description: Join Johnny Gat & Kinzie Kensington as you tear apart Hell in a quest to save the Boss’ soul. Historical icons, old friends, older enemies, a talking gun, a full length musical number await!

fr.title: The Descendant - Complete Season
fr.description: Dans THE DESCENDANT, la fin du monde n'est que le début. Avec ce qui reste de l'humanité protégé dans les installations souterraines de l'Arche, votre mission est de garder les survivants en vie, tout en découvrant une conspiration enterrée dans l'Arche 01.
fr.short_description: With what remains of humanity protected in underground Ark facilities, your mission is to keep survivors alive, while discovering a far greater conspiracy buried within Ark-01.

sl.title: True Fear: Forsaken Souls Part 2
sl.description: True Fear: Forsaken Souls Part 2 je nadaljevanje ene najbolje ocenjenih strašljivih iger s pobegom, ki slovi po zgodbi in vzdušju iz grozljivk. Holly Stonehouse je sledila namigom iz stare družinske hiše in končno prispela v umobolnico Dark Falls. Toda, nekdo je tam še pred njo in jo že čaka. Nevarnost je resnična, saj bolnišnica ponoči oživi. Holly s pomočjo namigov, pregledovanjem zapiskov in fotografij, odklepanjem ugank in mnogimi pustolovskimi akcijami uspe preživeti noč in najti odgovore.

fr.title: Sniper Ghost Warrior 2
fr.description: Vous êtes le sniper le plus redoutable de l'unité d'élite Ghost Warrior. Positionné au plus profond du territoire ennemi, effectuez des tirs de précision et testez vos talents dans cette histoire épique pleine d'intrigues et de trahisons. Vivez intensément le tir en contrôlant votre respiration et expérimentez un système balistique réaliste.
fr.short_description: Sniper: Ghost Warrior 2 is the only multi-platform, first-person, modern shooter exclusively designed around the sniper experience.

en.title: Sniper Ghost Warrior 2
en.description: You are the deadliest sniper in the elite Ghost Warrior unit. Positioned deep within enemy territory, deliver precision firepower and test your skills in an epic story of intrigue and betrayal. Feel the kill as you control your breathing and experience a realistic ballistics system.
en.short_description: Sniper: Ghost Warrior 2 is the only multi-platform, first-person, modern shooter exclusively designed around the sniper experience.

de.title: Sniper Ghost Warrior 2
de.description: Als Scharfschütze ist jeder Treffer das Ergebnis eiskalter Präzision – und jeder Fehler tödlich. Hinter den feindlichen Linien musst du dich auf deine Waffe, dein Können und deinen Spotter verlassen. Knallhart, wenn du auch noch mit Intrigen und Verrat kämpfen musst.
de.short_description: Sniper: Ghost Warrior 2 is the only multi-platform, first-person, modern shooter exclusively designed around the sniper experience.

it.title: Sniper Ghost Warrior 2
it.description: Ti sei infiltrato perfettamente nel territorio nemico, i tuoi colpi sono semplicemente perfetti e ora potrai mettere alla prova le tue capacità in una storia epica di intrighi e tradimenti. Senti la preda mentre trattieni il respiro e prendi dimestichezza con un realistico sistema balistico.
it.short_description: Sniper: Ghost Warrior 2 is the only multi-platform, first-person, modern shooter exclusively designed around the sniper experience.

es.title: Sniper Ghost Warrior 2
es.description: Ponte en la piel del francotirador más letal de la élite de los Ghost Warrior. Adéntrate en territorio enemigo, dispara con precisión y pon tus dotes a prueba en esta historia llena de intriga y traición. Siente la muerte en tu gatillo y disfruta de una experiencia de lo más realista.
es.short_description: Sniper: Ghost Warrior 2 is the only multi-platform, first-person, modern shooter exclusively designed around the sniper experience.

pt.title: Sniper Ghost Warrior 2
pt.description: És o atirador furtivo mais mortal na unidade Ghost Warrior de elite. Posicionado em pleno território inimigo, aplica potência de disparo precisa e testa a tua perícia numa história épica de intriga e traição. Sente a morte enquanto controlas a tua respiração e experiencias um sistema de balística realista.
pt.short_description: Sniper: Ghost Warrior 2 is the only multi-platform, first-person, modern shooter exclusively designed around the sniper experience.

sl.title: Sniper Ghost Warrior 2
sl.description: Ste najsmrtonosnejši ostrostrelec v elitni enoti Ghost Warrior. Postavljeni globoko znotraj sovražnikovega ozemlja, zagotavljajte natančno ognjeno moč in preizkusite svoje spretnosti v epski zgodbi o spletkah in izdaji. Med nadzorom dihanja začutite uboj in doživite realističen balistični sistem.
sl.short_description: Sniper: Ghost Warrior 2 is the only multi-platform, first-person, modern shooter exclusively designed around the sniper experience.

zt.title: 狙擊之王：幽靈戰士2

zt.short_description: Sniper: Ghost Warrior 2 is the only multi-platform, first-person, modern shooter exclusively designed around the sniper experience.

fr.title: TT Isle Of Man
fr.description:
Pour les motards, il y a deux types de courses de vitesse : la TT de l’Ile de Man, et les autres. Aucune épreuve n’est plus éprouvante pour les machines et plus exigeante pour les pilotes. Retrouvez les 60.7 kilomètres du circuit fidèlement reproduits, les champions et leurs motos, et relevez le défi de la Snaefell Mountain.
110 ans d’histoire ont donné au TT le statut de légende des sports mécaniques. Mémorisez chaque tronçon de la course, maîtrisez tous les virages à la perfection, restez concentré sur les 6 tours, réalisez le meilleur temps et inscrivez votre nom à côté de ceux des plus grands champions.
fr.short_description: For bikers, there are 2 types of speed races: the Isle of Man TT and the rest. No race is more difficult. Take up the challenge of the Snaefell Mountain course: all 37.73 miles faithfully reproduced.

en.title: TT Isle Of Man
en.description:
For bikers, there are two types of speed races: the Isle of Man TT and the rest. No other race is as gruelling for the motorbikes and demanding for the riders. Take up the challenge of the Snaefell Mountain course: all 37.73 miles faithfully reproduced with the champions and their bikes.
110 years of history have made TT a motor racing legend. Memorise each section of the course, round each bend to perfection, keep your concentration throughout the 6 laps, get the best time and write your name alongside the greatest champions.
en.short_description: For bikers, there are 2 types of speed races: the Isle of Man TT and the rest. No race is more difficult. Take up the challenge of the Snaefell Mountain course: all 37.73 miles faithfully reproduced.

de.title: TT Isle Of Man
de.description: Für Biker gibt es zwei Arten von Speed-Rennen: die Isle of Man TT und den Rest. Nehmen Sie die Herausforderung des legendären Snaefell Mountain Kurses an: Alle 37,73 Meilen wurden mit den Champions und ihren Bikes originalgetreu reproduziert.
de.short_description: For bikers, there are 2 types of speed races: the Isle of Man TT and the rest. No race is more difficult. Take up the challenge of the Snaefell Mountain course: all 37.73 miles faithfully reproduced.

it.description: Per i bikers, ci sono due tipi di gare di velocità: l'Isola di Man TT e il resto. Affrontare la sfida del leggendario percorso Snaefell Mountain: tutte le 37,73 miglia riprodotte fedelmente con i campioni e le loro biciclette.
it.short_description: For bikers, there are 2 types of speed races: the Isle of Man TT and the rest. No race is more difficult. Take up the challenge of the Snaefell Mountain course: all 37.73 miles faithfully reproduced.

es.description: Para los ciclistas, hay dos tipos de carreras de velocidad: la Isla de Man TT y el resto. Acepta el desafío del legendario circuito de montaña de Snaefell: las 37,73 millas fielmente reproducidas con los campeones y sus bicicletas.
es.short_description: For bikers, there are 2 types of speed races: the Isle of Man TT and the rest. No race is more difficult. Take up the challenge of the Snaefell Mountain course: all 37.73 miles faithfully reproduced.

pt.description: Para os motociclistas, existem dois tipos de corridas de velocidade: a Ilha de Man TT e o resto. Aceite o desafio do lendário percurso Snaefell Mountain: todas as 37,73 milhas reproduzidas fielmente com os campeões e suas motos.
pt.short_description: For bikers, there are 2 types of speed races: the Isle of Man TT and the rest. No race is more difficult. Take up the challenge of the Snaefell Mountain course: all 37.73 miles faithfully reproduced.

zt.description: 共有兩種類型的速度賽：馬恩島TT和其餘的，挑戰傳奇的Snaefell山地賽道：所有37.73英里的里程均由冠軍和他們的自行車忠實複製。
zt.short_description: For bikers, there are 2 types of speed races: the Isle of Man TT and the rest. No race is more difficult. Take up the challenge of the Snaefell Mountain course: all 37.73 miles faithfully reproduced.

sl.description: Obstajata dve vrsti hitrostnih dirk za kolesarje: Isle of Man TT in ostali. Sprejmite izziv legendarne proge Snaefell Mountain: vseh 37,73 milj so zvesto reproducirali z prvaki in njihovimi kolesi.

en.description: Originally developed by one man studio Yeah Us!, Pumped BMX + sees players ride their way through increasingly challenging levels while pulling off crazy and impressive trick combinations. The game lets players choose their rider style and throw down their best stunts whilst racing through more than 500 challenges to reach the top of the leader boards.
en.title: Pumped BMX+
en.short_description: Pumped BMX + sees players ride their way through increasingly challenging levels while pulling off crazy and impressive trick combinations.

fr.description: Pumped BMX + propose des niveaux de plus en plus durs et des tricks impressionnants. Le jeu permet de choisir son style de rider et de réussir ses meilleurs enchaînements à travers plus de 500 défis pour atteindre le haut des classements.

fr.short_description: Pumped BMX + sees players ride their way through increasingly challenging levels while pulling off crazy and impressive trick combinations.

de.short_description: Pumped BMX + sees players ride their way through increasingly challenging levels while pulling off crazy and impressive trick combinations.

it.description: Sviluppato originariamente da uno studio composto da una sola persona, Yeah Us!, Pumped BMX + vede i giocatori pedalare attraverso livelli sempre più difficili e sfoggiare svariate mosse, una più folle e impressionante dell'altra.

sl.title: Pumped BMX+
sl.description: Prvotno ga je razvil studio za človeka Yeah Us !, Pumped BMX + vidi, kako se igralci prebijajo skozi vse bolj zahtevne ravni, medtem ko izrivajo nore in impresivne kombinacije trikov. Igra omogoča igralcem, da izberejo svoj slog jahača in zavržejo svoje najboljše kaskade, medtem ko dirkajo skozi več kot 500 izzivov, da dosežejo vrh lestvic voditeljev.

zt.description: Pumped BMX +最初是由一個單人工作室Yeah Us！開發的，它可以讓玩家在不斷挑戰性的關卡中前進，同時實現瘋狂和令人印象深刻的技巧組合。 該遊戲使玩家可以選擇自己的騎乘風格並投出自己的最佳特技，同時在超過500個挑戰中競賽以達到排行榜的首位。

en.description:
NECROPOLIS combines third-person action with Rogue-lite dungeon-delving for a game that’s fast-paced and addictive, 
yet diabolically hardcore. 
Adventure in a magical deathtrap that reconstructs itself each time you play.
en.title: NECROPOLIS: BRUTAL EDITION
en.short_description: NECROPOLIS combines third-person action with Rogue-lite dungeon-delving for a game that’s fast-paced and addictive. Adventure in a magical deathtrap that reconstructs itself each time you play.

en.description: Tempest is an Open World Action RPG where you rove the seas across three continents filled with dozens of colonies and forts, hundreds of quests and countless ships to plunder. Customize your ship, trade, challenge fellow pirates and face mythical monsters.
en.title: Tempest: Pirate Action RPG
en.short_description: Tempest is an Open World Action RPG where you rove the seas across three continents filled with dozens of colonies and forts, hundreds of quests and countless ships to plunder.

fr.description: Tempest est un Action RPG où vous parcourez les mers à travers les continents remplis de colonies et de forts, de nombreuses quêtes et navires à piller. Personnalisez votre bateau, commercez, défiez vos confrères pirates et affrontez des monstres mythiques!
fr.title: Tempest: Pirate Action RPG
fr.short_description: Tempest is an Open World Action RPG where you rove the seas across three continents filled with dozens of colonies and forts, hundreds of quests and countless ships to plunder.

de.description: Tempest ist eine RPG-Aktion, bei der Sie die Meere bereisen und viele Siedlungen und Festungen besuchen, viele Quests abschließen und Schiffe ausrauben. Gestalte dein Boot, tausche, fordere Piraten heraus und stelle dich mythischen Monstern!

it.short_description: Tempest is an Open World Action RPG where you rove the seas across three continents filled with dozens of colonies and forts, hundreds of quests and countless ships to plunder.

pt.title: Tempest: Pirate Action RPG
pt.short_description: Tempest is an Open World Action RPG where you rove the seas across three continents filled with dozens of colonies and forts, hundreds of quests and countless ships to plunder.

es.description: Tempest es una acción de RPG en la que viajas por los mares y visitas muchos asentamientos y fuertes, completas muchas misiones y saqueas barcos. Personaliza tu barco, comercia, desafía a otros piratas y enfréntate a monstruos míticos!
es.title: Tempest: Pirate Action RPG
es.short_description: Tempest is an Open World Action RPG where you rove the seas across three continents filled with dozens of colonies and forts, hundreds of quests and countless ships to plunder.

zt.description: 《暴風雨》(Tempest)是一款開放世界的海盜動作角色扮演遊戲，遊戲具有很高的自由度。你航行在充滿數十個殖民地, 堡壘以及有無數船隻的三大洲中。你可以建造和升級自己的海上船隊，進入公開海域去掠奪商船並與敵方戰船展開炮戰，攻占陸上要塞或是與地方勢力交易，對世界進行探索，面對神話中的怪物。
zt.title: 暴風雨 : 海盜行動 RPG
zt.short_description: Tempest is an Open World Action RPG where you rove the seas across three continents filled with dozens of colonies and forts, hundreds of quests and countless ships to plunder.

sl.description: Tempest je RPG z odprtim svetom, kjer potapljate morja po treh celinah, napolnjenih z več desetimi kolonijami in utrdbami, stotimi misijami in neštetimi ladje za plenjenje. Prilagodite svojo ladjo, trgujte, izzivajte kolege pirate in se soočite z mitskimi pošasti.

en.description:
There’s only room for one frog at the top!
Frog Climbers is a party game where you and friends play as rock climbing frogs wrestling up mountains, using all of the tricks in the book to reach the top first.
Be a douchefrog! Grab onto your opponent and use them as a ladderstep on your way to glory! Everything is allowed in love and … uh … climbing!
Climb grips, dangle from dangerous vines and throw yourself from spinning wheels in over 260 mountain combinations.
Play with up to three friends or alone! Local support for 1-4 players
Customize your climbing with 4 game modifiers that alters the rules of play
Pick your favorite frog out of 5 available amphibians.
en.title: Frog Climbers
en.short_description:
There’s only room for one frog at the top!
Frog Climbers is a party game where you and friends play as rock climbing frogs, using all of the tricks in the book to reach the top first.

fr.description:
Escalader des montagnes. Battez vos amis. Sois un crétin !
Il n'y a de place que pour une grenouille au sommet!
Frog Climbers est un jeu de société dans lequel vous et vos amis incarnez des grenouilles d'escalade qui luttent dans les montagnes, en utilisant toutes les astuces du livre pour atteindre le sommet en premier.
Soyez un crétin! Attrapez votre adversaire et utilisez-le comme une étape sur votre chemin vers la gloire! Tout est permis en amour et… euh… en escalade!
Grimpez sur les poignées, pendez-vous sur des vignes dangereuses et jetez-vous des roues qui tournent dans plus de 260 combinaisons de montagnes.
Jouez avec jusqu'à trois amis ou seul! Assistance locale pour 1 à 4 joueurs
Personnalisez votre escalade avec 4 modificateurs de jeu qui modifient les règles de jeu
Choisissez votre grenouille préférée parmi 5 amphibiens disponibles.
Mais attendez, il y a plus!
fr.title: Frog Climbers
fr.short_description:
There’s only room for one frog at the top!
Frog Climbers is a party game where you and friends play as rock climbing frogs, using all of the tricks in the book to reach the top first.

de.description:
Berge erklimmen. Schlagen Sie Ihre Freunde. Sei ein Idiot!
Oben ist nur Platz für einen Frosch!
Frog Climbers ist ein Partyspiel, bei dem Sie und Ihre Freunde als Kletterfrösche auf Bergen ringen und dabei alle Tricks des Buches anwenden, um zuerst nach oben zu gelangen.
Sei ein Dummkopf! Greifen Sie nach Ihrem Gegner und nutzen Sie ihn als Leiter auf Ihrem Weg zum Ruhm! Alles ist verliebt und… ähm… Klettern erlaubt!
Klettere auf Griffe, baumle an gefährlichen Reben und wirf dich in über 260 Bergkombinationen von drehenden Rädern.
Spiele mit bis zu drei Freunden oder alleine! Lokale Unterstützung für 1-4 Spieler
Passen Sie Ihr Klettern mit 4 Spielmodifikatoren an, die die Spielregeln ändern
Wählen Sie Ihren Lieblingsfrosch aus 5 verfügbaren Amphibien aus.
de.title: Frog Climbers
de.short_description:
There’s only room for one frog at the top!
Frog Climbers is a party game where you and friends play as rock climbing frogs, using all of the tricks in the book to reach the top first.

it.description:
Arrampicata in montagna. Battere i tuoi amici. Sii un idiota!
C'è spazio solo per una rana in alto!
Frog Climbers è un gioco di società in cui tu e i tuoi amici giocate nei panni di rane che si arrampicano su roccia che lottano sulle montagne, usando tutti i trucchi del libro per raggiungere prima la cima.
Sii un idiota! Afferra il tuo avversario e usalo come scalino verso la gloria! Tutto è permesso in amore e ... uh ... arrampicata!
Scala le prese, penzola dai rampicanti pericolosi e lanciati dalle ruote che girano in oltre 260 combinazioni di montagne.
Gioca con un massimo di tre amici o da solo! Supporto locale per 1-4 giocatori
Personalizza la tua scalata con 4 modificatori di gioco che alterano le regole del gioco
Scegli la tua rana preferita tra i 5 anfibi disponibili.
it.title: Frog Climbers
it.short_description:
There’s only room for one frog at the top!
Frog Climbers is a party game where you and friends play as rock climbing frogs, using all of the tricks in the book to reach the top first.

pt.description:
Escalar montanhas. Bater nos teus amigos. Sê um idiota!
Só há espaço para um sapo no topo!
Frog Climbers é um jogo de festa onde você e seus amigos jogam como sapos de escalada lutando por montanhas, usando todos os truques do livro para chegar ao topo primeiro.
Seja um babaca! Agarre-se ao seu oponente e use-o como escada em seu caminho para a glória! Tudo é permitido no amor e ... uh ... escalar!
Escale empunhaduras, balance em trepadeiras perigosas e se jogue em rodas giratórias em mais de 260 combinações de montanhas.
Jogue com até três amigos ou sozinho! Suporte local para 1-4 jogadores
Personalize sua escalada com 4 modificadores de jogo que alteram as regras de jogo
Escolha seu sapo favorito entre 5 anfíbios disponíveis.
pt.title: Frog Climbers
pt.short_description:
There’s only room for one frog at the top!
Frog Climbers is a party game where you and friends play as rock climbing frogs, using all of the tricks in the book to reach the top first.

es.description:
Escalar montañas. Golpea a tus amigos. ¡Sé un imbécil!
¡Solo hay espacio para una rana en la parte superior!
Frog Climbers es un juego de fiesta en el que tú y tus amigos juegan como ranas trepadoras que luchan por las montañas, utilizando todos los trucos del libro para llegar primero a la cima.
¡Sé un idiota! ¡Agarra a tu oponente y utilízalo como una escalera en tu camino hacia la gloria! Todo está permitido en el amor y ... eh ... ¡escalando!
Suba a los agarres, cuélguese de enredaderas peligrosas y láncese desde las ruedas giratorias en más de 260 combinaciones de montaña.
¡Juega con hasta tres amigos o solo! Soporte local para 1-4 jugadores
Personaliza tu escalada con 4 modificadores de juego que alteran las reglas del juego.
Elige tu rana favorita entre los 5 anfibios disponibles.
es.title: Frog Climbers
es.short_description:
There’s only room for one frog at the top!
Frog Climbers is a party game where you and friends play as rock climbing frogs, using all of the tricks in the book to reach the top first.

sl.description:
Vzpon na gore. Premagajte svoje prijatelje. Bodite žaba!
Na vrhu je prostor samo za eno žabo!
Frog Climbers je zabavna igra, v kateri se vi in prijatelji igrate kot plezalne žabe, ki se borijo po gorah, z uporabo vseh trikov v knjigi, da najprej dosežete vrh.
Bodite žaba! Zgrabi nasprotnika in ga uporabi kot lestev na poti do slave! V ljubezni in ... uh ... plezanju je vse dovoljeno!
Plezajte po prijemih, bingljajte ob nevarnih trtah in se vrzite s koles v več kot 260 gorskih kombinacijah.
Igrajte z do tremi prijatelji ali sami! Lokalna podpora za 1-4 igralce
Plezanje prilagodite s 4 modifikatorji igre, ki spreminjajo pravila igre
Izberite svojo najljubšo žabo izmed 5 razpoložljivih dvoživk.
sl.title: Frog Climbers
sl.short_description:
There’s only room for one frog at the top!
Frog Climbers is a party game where you and friends play as rock climbing frogs, using all of the tricks in the book to reach the top first.

zt.description:
頂部只有一隻青蛙的空間！
Frog Climbers是一款聚會遊戲，您和您的朋友可以像爬山蛙一樣在山上摔跤，並使用本書中的所有技巧一舉成名。
成為douchefrog！ 抓住您的對手，將它們用作通往榮耀的階梯！ 一切都允許戀愛了……呃……爬上去！
攀爬抓地力，從危險的藤蔓上懸掛下來，將自己從超過260種山地組合的紡車中甩出來。
最多可與三個朋友一起玩，或者一個人玩！ 本地支持1-4名玩家
使用4個遊戲修改器自定義您的攀登，這些遊戲修改器會改變遊戲規則
從5種可用的兩棲動物中選擇最喜歡的青蛙
但是，等等，還有更多！
單獨？ 別擔心！ 在日常的速度競賽中與世界競爭。 每天都有一座新山。 您到峰頂的旅程將是定時的。 打敗你的朋友和敵人 !
zt.title: 青蛙攀岩者
zt.short_description:
There’s only room for one frog at the top!
Frog Climbers is a party game where you and friends play as rock climbing frogs, using all of the tricks in the book to reach the top first.

en.description: PAW Patrol is on a roll! No job is too big, no pup is too small! Join the entire PAW Patrol team—including Everest and Tracker—for 16 exciting rescue missions around Adventure Bay! Help each pup use their unique abilities to help their friends and save the day!
en.title: Paw Patrol: On a Roll!
en.short_description: Join the entire PAW Patrol team—including Everest and Tracker—for 16 exciting rescue missions around Adventure Bay! Help each pup use their unique abilities to help their friends and save the day!

fr.description: La Pat’ Patrouille part en mission ! Aucune mission n’est trop dure, car mes amis, ils assurent ! Rejoins Ryder et les huit chiots de la Pat’Patrouille pour 16 missions dans 8 lieux incroyables de la Grande Vallée.
fr.title: La Pat' Patrouille: En Mission!
fr.short_description: Join the entire PAW Patrol team—including Everest and Tracker—for 16 exciting rescue missions around Adventure Bay! Help each pup use their unique abilities to help their friends and save the day!

de.description: Die Helfer auf vier Pfoten legen los! Kein Einsatz zu groß, keine Pfote zu klein! Schließe dich Ryder und allen acht Fellfreunden der Paw Patrol an und bestreitet gemeinsam 16 Missionen an 8 HUND-glaublichen Orten in der Abenteuer-Bucht.
de.title: Paw Patrol: On a Roll!
de.short_description: Join the entire PAW Patrol team—including Everest and Tracker—for 16 exciting rescue missions around Adventure Bay! Help each pup use their unique abilities to help their friends and save the day!

it.description: Al lavoro, PAW Patrol! Niente è faticoso per un cucciolo coraggioso! Unisciti a Ryder e agli otto cuccioli della PAW Patrol per 8 missioni nella fantastica Adventure Bay. Gioca con Marshall, Chase, Skye, Rubble, Everest, Rocky, Zuma o Tracker e aiutali a usare le loro abilità uniche per salvare i loro amici, completando 16 emozionanti missioni, e a risolvere la situazione!
it.title: Paw Patrol: On a Roll!
it.short_description: Join the entire PAW Patrol team—including Everest and Tracker—for 16 exciting rescue missions around Adventure Bay! Help each pup use their unique abilities to help their friends and save the day!

pt.description: A Patrulha Pata vai entrar em ação! Nenhuma missão é demasiado grande, nenhum cão é demasiado pequeno! Junta-te ao Ryder e aos 8 cães da Patrulha Pata em 16 missões, passadas em 8 cenários incríveis na Baía da Aventura. Joga como Marshall, Chase, Skye, Rubble, Everest, Rocky, Zuma ou Tracker e ajuda-os, usando as suas habilidades únicas para salvar amigos, completar 16 missões empolgantes e salvar o dia!
pt.title: Paw Patrol: On a Roll!
pt.short_description: Join the entire PAW Patrol team—including Everest and Tracker—for 16 exciting rescue missions around Adventure Bay! Help each pup use their unique abilities to help their friends and save the day!

es.description: ¡Patrulla Canina todos a una! ¡No hay nada imposible para la Patrulla Canina! ¡Acompaña a Ryder y a los ocho cachorros de la Patrulla Canina por las dieciséis misiones que se desarrollan en los ocho CANINcreíbles escenarios de Bahía Aventura! ¡Juega en el papel de Marshall, Chase, Skye, Rubble, Everest, Rocky, Zuma o Tracker y ayúdales a usar sus habilidades únicas para rescatar a sus amigos, para completar esas dieciséis misiones tan fascinantes, y para solucionarlo todo!
es.title: Paw Patrol: On a Roll!
es.short_description: Join the entire PAW Patrol team—including Everest and Tracker—for 16 exciting rescue missions around Adventure Bay! Help each pup use their unique abilities to help their friends and save the day!

zt.description:
汪汪隊出動！
面對任務絕不退縮，體型大小不是問題！加入 Ryder 和八隻汪汪隊小狗的行列，在八個 PAWsome Adventure Bay 地點完成 16 項任務。玩家可以選擇 Marshall、Chase、Skye、Rubble、Everest、Rocky、Zuma 或 Tracker，協助各個角色運用本身的獨特能力拯救朋友、完成 16 項刺激精采的任務，並且化險為夷！
zt.title: Paw Patrol: On a Roll!
zt.short_description: Join the entire PAW Patrol team—including Everest and Tracker—for 16 exciting rescue missions around Adventure Bay! Help each pup use their unique abilities to help their friends and save the day!

sl.description:
PAW Patrol je na poti!
Nobeno delo ni preveliko, noben mladič ni premajhen! Pridružite se Ryderju in vsem osmim PAW Patrol Pups za 16 misij na 8 lokacijah PAWs Adventure Bay. Igrajte kot Marshall, Chase, Skye, Rubble, Everest, Rocky, Zuma ali Tracker in jim pomagajte uporabiti svoje edinstvene sposobnosti za reševanje prijateljev, opravite 16 razburljivih misij in prihranite dan!
sl.title: Paw Patrol: On a Roll!
sl.short_description: Join the entire PAW Patrol team—including Everest and Tracker—for 16 exciting rescue missions around Adventure Bay! Help each pup use their unique abilities to help their friends and save the day!

en.description: Project CARS is the ultimate driver journey! Guided, tested, and approved by a passionate community of racing fans and real-life drivers, Project CARS represents the next-generation of racing simulation. Discover an unrivaled immersion fuelled by world-class graphics and handling that allows you to truly feel the road. Featuring a variety of motorsport & unprecedented track roster as well as a sandbox career mode, Project CARS leaves the competition behind in the dust.
en.title: Project CARS
en.short_description: Discover an unrivaled immersion fuelled by world-class graphics and handling that allows you to truly feel the road. Featuring a variety of motorsport & unprecedented track roster.

fr.description: Project CARS, c'est l'expérience de course ultime ! Testé et approuvé par une communauté de passionnés de course automobile et de pilotes, Project CARS représente la prochaine génération de simulation de course. Découvrez une sensation d'immersion inédite grâce à des graphismes et une jouabilité hyperréalistes. Project CARS distance allègrement ses concurrents en vous offrant une grande variété de véhicules et de circuits sans précédents disponibles en mode carrière libre.
fr.title: Project CARS
fr.short_description: Discover an unrivaled immersion fuelled by world-class graphics and handling that allows you to truly feel the road. Featuring a variety of motorsport & unprecedented track roster.

de.description: Project CARS ist das ultimative Rennspielerlebnis! Begleitet, getestet und unterstützt von einer leidenschaftlichen Community aus Rennspielfans und Profifahrern verkörpert Project CARS die nächste Generation der Rennsimulationen. Tauchen Sie ein in ein atemberaubendes Rennerlebnis mit erstklassiger Grafik und Spielsteuerung. Mit einer Vielzahl an Motorsportdisziplinen, einer unvergleichbaren Streckenauswahl und einem Sandbox-Karrieremodus lässt Project CARS die Konkurrenz Staub schlucken.
de.title: Project CARS
de.short_description: Discover an unrivaled immersion fuelled by world-class graphics and handling that allows you to truly feel the road. Featuring a variety of motorsport & unprecedented track roster.

pt.description: Project CARS é a derradeira experiência para pilotos! Guiado, testado e aprovado por uma comunidade dedicada de amantes das corridas e pilotos profissionais, Project CARS representa a nova geração dos simuladores de condução. Descobre uma imersão sem rival graças a um grafismo e modelo de condução de classe mundial que te permitem sentir a estrada. Com um grande número de pistas e desportos motorizados, além de um modo de carreira aberto, Project CARS está muito à frente da concorrência.
pt.title: Project CARS
pt.short_description: Discover an unrivaled immersion fuelled by world-class graphics and handling that allows you to truly feel the road. Featuring a variety of motorsport & unprecedented track roster.

es.description: ¡Project CARS es máxima emoción al volante! Orientado, testado y aprobado por una comunidad de fans y pilotos reales, Project CARS presenta la próxima generación de la simulación de carreras. Disfruta de una experiencia envolvente con la excelente calidad de los gráficos y del manejo, que te harán sentir como en la pista real. Project CARS adelanta a sus competidores, ya que cuenta con vehículos y circuitos sin precedentes, así como un modo carrera sandbox.
es.title: Project CARS
es.short_description: Discover an unrivaled immersion fuelled by world-class graphics and handling that allows you to truly feel the road. Featuring a variety of motorsport & unprecedented track roster.

zt.description: Project CARS是一款最擬真的競速遊戲，遊戲宗旨在於開發出一個最擬真的駕駛模擬，透過各種參數的調教，反映在車輛及賽道上的各種細節，將以激烈刺激的競速感帶領玩家進入自由自在的飆速世界。
zt.title: 賽車計劃
zt.short_description: Discover an unrivaled immersion fuelled by world-class graphics and handling that allows you to truly feel the road. Featuring a variety of motorsport & unprecedented track roster.

sl.description:
Projekt CARS predstavlja vrhunsko dirkaško potovanje! Projekt CARS je bil preizkušen in odobren s strani ljubiteljev dirk in resničnih voznikov. Igra predstavlja naslednjo generacijo dirkalnih simulacij.  
Odkrijte izjemno igro, ki jo poganja vrhunska grafika in vodljivost, ki vam omogoča, da resnično občutite cesto.  Projekt CARS odlikuje raznovrstnost avtomobilskih športov in številne dirke.
sl.title: Project CARS
sl.short_description: Discover an unrivaled immersion fuelled by world-class graphics and handling that allows you to truly feel the road. Featuring a variety of motorsport & unprecedented track roster.

it.short_description: Discover an unrivaled immersion fuelled by world-class graphics and handling that allows you to truly feel the road. Featuring a variety of motorsport & unprecedented track roster.
