fr.description:
Tous les gestes et toutes les tactiques sont dans Handball 17, la meilleure simulation de handball.

Retrouvez les 82 équipes officielles des plus prestigieux championnats européens : LIDL STARLIGUE et PROLIGUE en France, DKB Handball-Bundesliga et 2. Handball-Bundesliga en Allemagne et Liga ASOBAL en Espagne.

Handball 17 propose des contrôles entièrement repensés, une intelligence artificielle dynamique, des modes Saison et Carrière en solo, du jeu multi local et en ligne, et plusieurs niveaux de difficulté pour une expérience toujours plus proche de la simulation.
fr.title: Handball 17
fr.short_description: Experience all the sensations of handball thanks to the easy-to-use controls, dynamic Career mode and fast-flowing matches, in both single player and multiplayer modes.

en.description: Discover the best handball simulation! Become a handball champion playing the first simulation with 120 official teams from the 3 most prestigious leagues. Play as your favourite players and experience breathless matches with up to 4 players at the same time!
en.title: Handball 17
en.short_description: Experience all the sensations of handball thanks to the easy-to-use controls, dynamic Career mode and fast-flowing matches, in both single player and multiplayer modes.

de.title: Handball 17
de.description: Die beste Handballsimulation auf dem Markt wartet mit 82 offiziellen Teams der prestigeträchtigsten Ligen Europas auf. Der Reiz des Handballspiels wird dank einfacher Steuerung, dynamischem Karrieremodus und tollem Spielfluss perfekt eingefangen – für Einzelspieler und im Mehrspielermodus.
de.short_description: Experience all the sensations of handball thanks to the easy-to-use controls, dynamic Career mode and fast-flowing matches, in both single player and multiplayer modes.

it.description: Ritrova le 82 squadre ufficiali militanti nei più prestigiosi campionati europei in questo appassionante gioco di pallamano. Vivi in prima persona le emozioni di questo sport grazie ai controlli intuitivi, alla modalità Carriera e alle incredibili sfide in modalità giocatore singolo e multiplayer.
it.short_description: Experience all the sensations of handball thanks to the easy-to-use controls, dynamic Career mode and fast-flowing matches, in both single player and multiplayer modes.

Experimenta todas las sensaciones de este deporte gracias a controles fáciles de usar, un dinámico modo Carrera y partidos muy fluidos, tanto para un jugador como multijugador.
es.short_description: Experience all the sensations of handball thanks to the easy-to-use controls, dynamic Career mode and fast-flowing matches, in both single player and multiplayer modes.

Descobre todas as emoções do andebol graças aos controlos fáceis de utilizar, um modo de carreira dinâmico e partidas rápidas e fluidas, seja no jogador individual ou no multijogador.
pt.short_description: Experience all the sensations of handball thanks to the easy-to-use controls, dynamic Career mode and fast-flowing matches, in both single player and multiplayer modes.

zt.title: Handball 17
zt.description: 在最佳手球模拟中找到最负盛名的欧洲联赛的82支官方球队。 在单人游戏和多人游戏模式下，易于使用的控件，动态的职业生涯模式和快速进行的比赛，让您体验到手球的所有感觉。
zt.short_description: Experience all the sensations of handball thanks to the easy-to-use controls, dynamic Career mode and fast-flowing matches, in both single player and multiplayer modes.

sl.title: Handball 17
sl.description: V najboljši rokometni simulaciji poiščite 82 uradnih ekip iz najprestižnejših evropskih lig. Doživite vse občutke rokometa, zahvaljujoč enostavnim kontrolam, dinamičnemu načinu kariere in hitrim tekmam, tako v načinu za enega igralca kot tudi za več igralcev.

en.description: You’re a state-installed landlord in a totalitarian country. Place listening devices, steal and sneak into your tenants’ apartments. Use what you uncovered to report anyone capable of plotting against the state. You MUST! But WILL you?
en.title: Beholder
en.short_description: You’re a state-installed landlord in a totalitarian country. Place listening devices, steal and sneak into your tenants’ apartments. Report anyone capable of plotting against the state.

fr.description: Nommé propriétaire par le gouvernement d’un état totalitaire, votre travail est d'espionner vos locataires, leur vie, leurs conversations, de les profiler pour vous assurer du respect des lois. Toute subversion ou violation des lois DOIT être signalée. C’est votre DEVOIR ! Mais le FEREZ-VOUS ???
fr.title: Beholder
fr.short_description: You’re a state-installed landlord in a totalitarian country. Place listening devices, steal and sneak into your tenants’ apartments. Report anyone capable of plotting against the state.

de.description: Du bist ein von der Regierung eingesetzter Vermieter in einem totalitären Staat. Du musst deine Mieter ausspionieren, ihre Gespräche abhören und ein Profil von ihnen für deine Vorgesetzten anfertigen! Du MUSST! Aber WIRST DU AUCH?

it.description: Lo Stato totalitario in cui vivi ti ha collocato come Amministratore presso un condominio. Devi spiare, sbirciare, origliare e tracciare il profilo degli inquilini! Devi denunciare chiunque sia capace di complottare contro lo Stato. Tu DEVI! Ma lo FARAI?

it.short_description: You’re a state-installed landlord in a totalitarian country. Place listening devices, steal and sneak into your tenants’ apartments. Report anyone capable of plotting against the state.

pt.description: Você é um zelador que serve secretamente a um Estado totalitarista. Sua tarefa é espionar inquilinos; espreitar, interceptar e identificar indivíduos! Você também deve prestar informações sobre qualquer indivíduo que esteja conspirando contra o Estado. É sua MISSÃO! Mas será que você VAI CONSEGUIR?
pt.title: Beholder
pt.short_description: You’re a state-installed landlord in a totalitarian country. Place listening devices, steal and sneak into your tenants’ apartments. Report anyone capable of plotting against the state.

es.description: Eres el dueño de una propiedad puesto por el Estado en un Estado totalitario. ¡Debes espiar a los inquilinos, escucharlos a hurtadillas y elaborar sus perfiles! Debes reportar a cualquiera capaz de conspirar una subversión contra el Estado. ¡DEBES hacerlo! Pero, ¿lo HARÁS?
es.title: Beholder

Svoja odkritja uporabite pri prijavi tistih, ki delujejo proti državi. To morate storiti! Pa tudi resnično boste?
sl.short_description: You’re a state-installed landlord in a totalitarian country. Place listening devices, steal and sneak into your tenants’ apartments. Report anyone capable of plotting against the state.

fr.title: Semispheres

fr.title: God's Trigger
fr.description: Plongez en Coop dans un bain de sang outrancier avec un duo improbable : un ange et une diablesse. Harry, soldat des Cieux, et Judy, désertrice de l'Enfer, doivent coopérer pour tuer les quatre Cavaliers et arrêter l'Apocalypse. Au programme : action intense et exigeante, graphismes très stylisés, violence outrancière et jouabilité axée sur la coopération.
fr.short_description: Slay enemies with speed and precision in an over-the-top show of blood and explosions. Play solo or with others, make split-second decisions, dodge bullets, and use weapons and abilities.

en.title: God's Trigger
en.description: Plunge into an over-the-top co-op bloodbath starring an unlikely duo of an Angel and a She-Devil. Harry, a soldier of Heaven, and Judy, an escapee from Hell, have to work together to kill the Four Horsemen and stop the Apocalypse. Intense skill-based action, highly-stylized graphics, overdrawn violence, and teamwork-focused gameplay are all yours to enjoy.
en.short_description: Slay enemies with speed and precision in an over-the-top show of blood and explosions. Play solo or with others, make split-second decisions, dodge bullets, and use weapons and abilities.

de.title: God's Trigger
de.description: Stürze dich in ein chaotisches Koop-Blutbad mit einem ungleichen Duo aus Engel und Teufelin. Harry, ein Soldat des Himmels, und Judy, entflohen aus der Hölle, müssen zusammen gegen die apokalyptischen Reiter kämpfen und die Apokalypse stoppen. Hoch stilistische Grafik, intensive Action mit Fähigkeiten, überzeichnete Gewalt und ein teambasiertes Gameplay warten auf dich!
de.short_description: Slay enemies with speed and precision in an over-the-top show of blood and explosions. Play solo or with others, make split-second decisions, dodge bullets, and use weapons and abilities.

it.title: God's Trigger
it.description: Tuffati in un esagerato bagno di sangue co-op, protagonista l'improbabile coppia di un angelo e una diavolessa. Harry, un soldato del Paradiso, e Judy, una fuggitiva dell'inferno, devono collaborare per uccidere i Quattro Cavalieri e fermare l'Apocalisse. Ti aspettano azione intensa e frenetica, grafica stilizzata, violenza estrema e un gioco incentrato sul lavoro di squadra.
it.short_description: Slay enemies with speed and precision in an over-the-top show of blood and explosions. Play solo or with others, make split-second decisions, dodge bullets, and use weapons and abilities.

es.title: God's Trigger
es.description: Sumérgete en un baño de sangre cooperativo protagonizado por un dúo muy poco común: un ángel y una diablesa. Harry, un soldado del Cielo, y Judy, recién escapada del Infierno, tienen que trabajar juntos para matar a los Cuatro Jinetes y detener el Apocalipsis. Intensa acción basada en la habilidad, gráficos con un gran estilo, violencia desmesurada y un enfoque en la cooperación, ¡lo tiene todo!
es.short_description: Slay enemies with speed and precision in an over-the-top show of blood and explosions. Play solo or with others, make split-second decisions, dodge bullets, and use weapons and abilities.

pt.title: God's Trigger
pt.description: Mergulha numa carnificina cooperativa sem limites protagonizada por um improvável duo angélico e demoníaco. Harry é um soldado celeste, Judy está a fugir do inferno, e ambos terão de unir forças para destruir os Quatro Cavaleiros e impedir o Apocalipse. Ação intensa onde a técnica é o mais importante, visuais estilizados, violência absurda e cooperação em equipa estão todos à tua espera.
pt.short_description: Slay enemies with speed and precision in an over-the-top show of blood and explosions. Play solo or with others, make split-second decisions, dodge bullets, and use weapons and abilities.

sl.title: God's Trigger
sl.description: V vrhunski predstavi krvi in ​​eksplozij pokončajte sovražnike hitro in natančno. Igrajte samostojno ali z drugimi, odločajte se v hipu, izogibajte se kroglam in z orožjem ter svojimi veščinami na najslikovitejši način izvajajte nasilje.
sl.short_description: Slay enemies with speed and precision in an over-the-top show of blood and explosions. Play solo or with others, make split-second decisions, dodge bullets, and use weapons and abilities.

zt.description: 《神之扳機》: 在精彩爆錶的鮮血爆破秀中快速而精準地擊殺敵人。扮演獨行俠或與好友結伴同行、做出分秒必爭的決定、閃避子彈、運用武器與技能以最有創意的方式顯現你的暴戾之氣。

zt.short_description: Slay enemies with speed and precision in an over-the-top show of blood and explosions. Play solo or with others, make split-second decisions, dodge bullets, and use weapons and abilities.

fr.title: Call Of Juarez: Gunslinger
fr.description: Depuis les tréfonds obscurs d'une mine d'or jusqu'au plancher poussiéreux d'un saloon, Call of Juarez®: Gunslinger est un vibrant hommage aux légendes du Far-West. Vivez le périple grandiose d'un chasseur de primes impitoyable lancé aux trousses des hors-la-loi les plus infâmes de l'Ouest. Jalonnée de rencontres mémorables, cette aventure où se confondent l'homme et le mythe dévoile sous un jour nouveau quelques-unes des plus grandes légendes du Far-West.
fr.short_description: From the dust of a gold mine to the dirt of a saloon, live the epic and violent journey of a ruthless bounty hunter on the trail of the West’s most notorious outlaws .

en.title: Call Of Juarez: Gunslinger
en.description: From the dust of a gold mine to the dirt of a saloon, Call of Juarez®: Gunslinger is a real homage to the Wild West tales. Live the epic and violent journey of a ruthless bounty hunter on the trail of the West’s most notorious outlaws. Blurring the lines between man and myth, this adventure made of memorable encounters unveils the untold truth behind some of the greatest legends of the Old West.
en.short_description: From the dust of a gold mine to the dirt of a saloon, live the epic and violent journey of a ruthless bounty hunter on the trail of the West’s most notorious outlaws .

de.title: Call Of Juarez: Gunslinger

de.short_description: From the dust of a gold mine to the dirt of a saloon, live the epic and violent journey of a ruthless bounty hunter on the trail of the West’s most notorious outlaws .

it.title: Call Of Juarez: Gunslinger

it.short_description: From the dust of a gold mine to the dirt of a saloon, live the epic and violent journey of a ruthless bounty hunter on the trail of the West’s most notorious outlaws .

es.title: Call Of Juarez: Gunslinger
es.description: Desde el polvo de una mina de oro hasta la mugre de un saloon, Call of Juarez®: Gunslinger es todo un homenaje a las historias del Lejano Oeste. Vive la épica y violenta historia de un cazarrecompensas implacable y captura a los forajidos más famosos del Oeste. Una aventura en la que realidad y ficción se desdibujan, desvelando el pasado más oscuro de las grandes leyendas de la época.
es.short_description: From the dust of a gold mine to the dirt of a saloon, live the epic and violent journey of a ruthless bounty hunter on the trail of the West’s most notorious outlaws .

pt.title: Call Of Juarez: Gunslinger
pt.description: Do pó de uma mina de ouro até a poeira da taberna, Call of Juarez®: Gunslinger é uma verdadeira homenagem às histórias do velho oeste. Vivencie a jornada épica e violenta de um impiedoso caçador de recompensas em sua busca pelos fora da lei mais notórios do oeste. Confundindo os limites entre homem e mito, essa aventura repleta de encontros memoráveis revela a verdade oculta por trás de algumas das maiores lendas do velho oeste.
pt.short_description: From the dust of a gold mine to the dirt of a saloon, live the epic and violent journey of a ruthless bounty hunter on the trail of the West’s most notorious outlaws .

sl.title: Call Of Juarez: Gunslinger
sl.description: Call of Juarez® Gunslinger je pravi poklon zgodbam o Divjem zahodu, saj ne manjkata ne zlati rudnik ne čisto pristen saloon. Podoživite popotovanje brezobzirnega lovca na glave po sledeh najrazvpitejših odhodnikov Zahoda. Ta pustolovščina, polna nepozabnih spopadov, ki zabriše meje med človeškim in mitom, razkriva še ne povedano resnico o nekaterih največjih legendah Divjega zahoda.
sl.short_description: From the dust of a gold mine to the dirt of a saloon, live the epic and violent journey of a ruthless bounty hunter on the trail of the West’s most notorious outlaws .

fr.title: The Uncertain: Last Quiet Day
fr.description: The Uncertain est un jeu d'aventure ponctué se déroulant dans un monde post-apocalyptique. Faites l'expérience de l'ambiance de chacune des régions méticuleusement explorées, prenez des décisions importantes et élucidez les mystères qui vous permettront de connaitre la vérité qui vous a été cachée.
fr.short_description: The Uncertain is a story-driven adventure game set in a post-apocalyptic world. Solve diverse puzzles, make fateful decisions and discuss intriguing matters to find out the truth being kept from you.

en.title: The Uncertain: Last Quiet Day
en.description: The Uncertain is an story-driven adventure game set in a post-apocalyptic world. Experience the mysterious vibe of each of carefully explored locations, solve diverse puzzles, make fateful decisions and discuss intriguing matters to find out the whole truth being kept from you.
en.short_description: The Uncertain is a story-driven adventure game set in a post-apocalyptic world. Solve diverse puzzles, make fateful decisions and discuss intriguing matters to find out the truth being kept from you.

de.title: The Uncertain: Last Quiet Day
de.description: The Uncertain ist ein storybasiertes Adventure in einer postapokalyptischen Welt. Erlebe beim Erkunden der zahlreichen Schauplätze deren mysteriöse Atmosphäre, löse diverse Rätsel, triff tiefgreifende Entscheidungen und besprich faszinierende Angelegenheiten, um die ganze Wahrheit, die man dir vorzuenthalten versucht, zu erfahren.
de.short_description: The Uncertain is a story-driven adventure game set in a post-apocalyptic world. Solve diverse puzzles, make fateful decisions and discuss intriguing matters to find out the truth being kept from you.

it.title: The Uncertain: Last Quiet Day
it.description: The Uncertain è un gioco narrativo d'avventura a ambientato in un mondo postatomico. Esplora ambientazioni immerse in un'atmosfera misteriosa, risolvi una varietà di enigmi, prendi decisioni fatidiche e affronta affascinanti discussioni per svelare le verità che ti hanno negato.
it.short_description: The Uncertain is a story-driven adventure game set in a post-apocalyptic world. Solve diverse puzzles, make fateful decisions and discuss intriguing matters to find out the truth being kept from you.

es.title: The Uncertain: Last Quiet Day
es.description: The Uncertain es un juego de aventura basado en una historia, y ambientado en un mundo postapocalíptico. Experimenta el ambiente misterioso de cada lugar cuidadosamente explorado, resuelve rompecabezas, toma decisiones trascendentales y analiza temas fascinantes para descubrir toda la verdad oculta.
es.short_description: The Uncertain is a story-driven adventure game set in a post-apocalyptic world. Solve diverse puzzles, make fateful decisions and discuss intriguing matters to find out the truth being kept from you.

pt.title: The Uncertain: Last Quiet Day
pt.description: O Incerto é um jogo de aventura guiado pela história, ambientado num mundo pós-apocalíptico. Experimente a misteriosa vibração de cada um dos locais cuidadosamente explorados, resolva diversos puzzles, tome decisões fatídicas e discuta assuntos intrigantes para descobrir toda a verdade que lhe está a ser escondida.
pt.short_description: The Uncertain is a story-driven adventure game set in a post-apocalyptic world. Solve diverse puzzles, make fateful decisions and discuss intriguing matters to find out the truth being kept from you.

sl.title: The Uncertain: Last Quiet Day
sl.description: The Uncertain je pustolovska igra, postavljena v postapokaliptični svet. Izkusite skrivnostno ozračje več lokacij, rešujte različne uganke, sprejemajte usodne odločitve in razpravljajte o zanimivih zadevah, s čimer boste spoznali, da vam je bila prikrita resnica.
sl.short_description: The Uncertain is a story-driven adventure game set in a post-apocalyptic world. Solve diverse puzzles, make fateful decisions and discuss intriguing matters to find out the truth being kept from you.

zt.description: The Uncertain: Last Quiet Day是一個故事驅動的冒險遊戲，設置在後世界末日的世界中。 體驗每個經過仔細探索的地點的神秘氛圍，解決各種難題，做出決定性的決定，並討論令人著迷的問題，以找出隱藏在您身後的全部真相。
zt.title: 不確定性 : 寂靜尾聲
zt.short_description: The Uncertain is a story-driven adventure game set in a post-apocalyptic world. Solve diverse puzzles, make fateful decisions and discuss intriguing matters to find out the truth being kept from you.

fr.title: The Uncertain: Light At The End
fr.description: The Uncertain est un jeu d'aventure se déroulant sur Terre, dans un futur post-apocalyptique. Explorez ce monde mystérieux et prenez des décisions qui modifient le cours de l'histoire de votre personnage.
fr.short_description: The Uncertain is a story-driven adventure game set in a post-apocalyptic world. Together with Emily, one of the survivors, you will have to witness how people try to live in a world ruled by robots.

en.title: The Uncertain: Light At The End
en.description: The Uncertain is a story-driven adventure game set in a post-apocalyptic world. Humanity disappeared from the face of the Earth and has been replaced by robots. Together with Emily, one of the survivors, you will have to witness how people try to live in a world ruled by robots.

sl.title: The Uncertain: Light At The End
sl.description: Igra Uncertain je pustolovščina, postavljena v postapokaliptični svet. Človeštvo je izginilo z obličja Zemlje, nadomestili pa so ga roboti. Skupaj z Emily, eno od preživelih, boste izkusili, kako ljudje živijo v svetu, ki mu vladajo roboti.
sl.short_description: The Uncertain is a story-driven adventure game set in a post-apocalyptic world. Together with Emily, one of the survivors, you will have to witness how people try to live in a world ruled by robots.

fr.title: Trine 4: The Nightmare Prince
fr.description: La série Trine revient à la magie de la 2,5D avec Trine 4: The Nightmare Prince ! Les trois héros de la série d'aventure à succès sont de retour et partent à la recherche du jeune et tourmenté Prince Selius. Amadeus le Magicien, Pontius le Chevalier et Zoya la Voleuse sont à nouveau réunis dans une quête palpitante à travers des paysages féeriques grouillant de dangers.
fr.short_description: Join three iconic heroes as they set off on a quest through fantastical fairytale landscapes to save the world from the Nightmare Prince’s shadows.

en.title: Trine 4: The Nightmare Prince
en.description: The Trine series returns to the magic of 2.5D with Trine 4: The Nightmare Prince! The three heroes of the best-selling adventure series are back, sent on a quest to retrieve the troubled young Prince Selius. Amadeus the Wizard, Pontius the Knight, and Zoya the Thief are joined together once again on a thrilling quest through fantastical fairytale landscapes teeming with danger.
en.short_description: Join three iconic heroes as they set off on a quest through fantastical fairytale landscapes to save the world from the Nightmare Prince’s shadows.

de.title: Trine 4: The Nightmare Prince
de.description:
Trine kehrt mit Trine 4: The Nightmare Prince und der Magie von 2.5D zurück!

Die drei Helden in dieser Bestseller-Abenteuerserie sind wieder da und begeben sich auf eine Quest, um den armen jungen Prinzen Selius zu retten.
Der Zauberer Amadeus, der Ritter Pontius und der Dieb Zoya begeben sich gemeinsam auf eine spannende Quest durch fantastische märchenhafte Landschaften voller Gefahren.
de.short_description: Join three iconic heroes as they set off on a quest through fantastical fairytale landscapes to save the world from the Nightmare Prince’s shadows.

it.title: Trine 4: The Nightmare Prince
it.description: La serie di Trine ritorna alla magia del 2.5D con Trine 4: The Nightmare Prince! I tre eroi della serie di avventure best seller sono tornati per cercare di recuperare il tormentato principe Selius. Il mago Amadeus, il cavaliere Pontius e la ladra Zoya si ritrovano ancora una volta in un'avvincente missione attraverso incantevoli paesaggi da fiaba che pullulano di pericoli.
it.short_description: Join three iconic heroes as they set off on a quest through fantastical fairytale landscapes to save the world from the Nightmare Prince’s shadows.

es.title: Trine 4: The Nightmare Prince
es.description: ¡La serie Trine vuelve a la magia de las 2,5D con Trine 4: The Nightmare Prince! Los tres héroes de la exitosa serie de aventuras están de vuelta y emprenden una misión para recuperar al atormentado joven príncipe Selius. El mago Amadeus, el caballero Pontius y la ladrona Zoya se juntan una vez más en una emocionante aventura a través de fantásticos paisajes de cuentos de hadas llenos de peligros.
es.short_description: Join three iconic heroes as they set off on a quest through fantastical fairytale landscapes to save the world from the Nightmare Prince’s shadows.

pt.title: Trine 4: The Nightmare Prince
pt.description: A série Trine regressa à magia dos 2,5D com Trine 4: The Nightmare Prince! Os três heróis da série campeã de vendas estão de volta, numa missão para recuperar o jovem e perturbado príncipe Selius. Amadeus o Feiticeiro, Pontius o Cavaleiro e Zoya a Ladra juntam-se uma vez mais numa missão empolgante através de paisagens fantásticas e carregadas de perigos.
pt.short_description: Join three iconic heroes as they set off on a quest through fantastical fairytale landscapes to save the world from the Nightmare Prince’s shadows.

sl.title: Trine 4: The Nightmare Prince
sl.description: Serija Trine se s Trine 4: The Nightmare Prince vrača v čarobnost 2.5D! Vrnili so se trije junaki najbolj prodajane pustolovske serije, ki so jih poslali po iskanju mladega princa Selija. Čarovnik Amadeus, vitez Pontius in tat Zoya se spet združijo v vznemirljivem iskanju po fantastičnih pravljičnih pokrajinah, kjer je nevarnost.
sl.short_description: Join three iconic heroes as they set off on a quest through fantastical fairytale landscapes to save the world from the Nightmare Prince’s shadows.

zt.description: 《Trine》系列憑藉新作《Trine 4：Nightmare Prince》回歸2.5D畫面！在這款暢銷系列遊戲的新作中，三位英雄為救回身處困境的年輕王子塞利亞斯又將踏上冒險之旅。魔法師阿瑪迪亞斯、騎士龐蒂亞斯和盜賊索婭再度聯手，一起在童話般卻又危機四伏的奇幻世界中進行一次激動人心的冒險。
zt.title: 狩魔師4：惡夢王子
zt.short_description: Join three iconic heroes as they set off on a quest through fantastical fairytale landscapes to save the world from the Nightmare Prince’s shadows.

fr.title: Stealth Inc 2: A Game of Clones
fr.description: Dans Stealth Inc 2, vous jouez le rôle d'un clone échappant à une installation de test sinistre et high-tech. Stealth Inc 2 teste à la fois votre cerveau et vos réflexes sur 60 niveaux variés reliés entre eux dans un univers tentaculaire.

fr.title: Type:Rider
fr.description: Jouez 2 points et voyagez à travers les âges et styles des techniques typographiques. Des peintures rupestres de la préhistoire à l'art Pixel des années 2000, résolvez les énigmes en utilisant les polices les plus populaires dans un environnement captivant.

en.title: Type:Rider
en.description: Play as 2 dots and travel through the ages of typographic styles and techniques. From the rock paintings of prehistoric times to Pixel art of the 2000’s, solve all the riddles by riding the most popular fonts and characters in a captivating environment.

de.title: Type:Rider
de.description: Spielen Sie zwei Punkte und reisen Sie durch die Zeitalter und Stile der typografischen Techniken. Von prähistorischen Felsmalereien bis hin zur Pixelkunst der 2000er Jahre - lösen Sie Rätsel mit den beliebtesten Schriften in einer spannenden Umgebung.

it.title: Type:Rider
it.description: Gioca a due punti e viaggia attraverso le epoche e gli stili delle tecniche tipografiche. Dalle pitture rupestri preistoriche alla Pixel art degli anni 2000, risolvete i puzzle utilizzando i font più popolari in un ambiente emozionante.

es.title: Type:Rider
es.description: Juega dos puntos y viaja a través de las épocas y estilos de las técnicas tipográficas. Desde pinturas rupestres prehistóricas hasta el arte de los píxeles de los años 2000, resuelve rompecabezas utilizando las fuentes más populares en un entorno emocionante.

pt.title: Type:Rider
pt.description: Jogar dois pontos e viajar através das idades e estilos das técnicas tipográficas. De pinturas rupestres pré-históricas à arte Pixel dos anos 2000, resolva quebra-cabeças usando as fontes mais populares em um ambiente emocionante.

zt.title: Type:Rider
zt.description: 扮演2個點，穿越印刷樣式和技術的時代。 從史前的岩畫到2000年代的像素藝術，在迷人的環境中騎乘最受歡迎的字體和字符可以解決所有難題。

sl.title: Type:Rider
sl.description: Igrajte v 2 piki in potujte skozi dobe tipografskih stilov in tehnik. Od skalnih slik iz prazgodovine do umetnosti Pixel iz 2000-ih, rešite vse uganke tako, da vozite najbolj priljubljene pisave in like v očarljivem okolju.

zt.description: 維京兄弟將面臨最大的挑戰，在拯救米德加德的史詩之旅中！ 離開你的世界，踏入米德加德的領域，體驗一場充滿想像力的神奇冒險！
zt.title: 維京兄弟5
zt.short_description: The Viking Brothers face their greatest challenge yet in an epic journey to save Midgard! Step into this realm to experience a magical adventure of incredible imagination!

copyright: © 2021 Alawar. All Rights Reserved

fr.title: New Yankee 6: In Pharaoh's Court
fr.description: Voyagez dans le temps au pays des pharaons pour empêcher un imposteur de s'emparer du trône! Une journée de travail habituelle pour Sir John et Lady Mary - les Yankees qui voyagent dans le temps pour sauver le monde!
fr.short_description: Travel back in time to the land of the pharaohs to stop an imposter from seizing the throne! It's all in a day's work for Sir John and Lady Mary, the Yankees who travel through time to save the world!

en.title: New Yankee 6: In Pharaoh's Court
en.description: Travel back in time to the land of the pharaohs to stop an imposter from seizing the throne! It's all in a day's work for Sir John and Lady Mary – the Yankees who travel through time to save the world!
en.short_description: Travel back in time to the land of the pharaohs to stop an imposter from seizing the throne! It's all in a day's work for Sir John and Lady Mary, the Yankees who travel through time to save the world!

de.title: New Yankee 6: In Pharaoh's Court
de.description: Reisen Sie in der Zeit zurück in das Land der Pharaonen, um einen Hochstapler davon abzuhalten, den Thron zu besteigen! Es ist alles an einem Tag für Sir John und Lady Mary - die Yankees, die durch die Zeit reisen, um die Welt zu retten!
de.short_description: Travel back in time to the land of the pharaohs to stop an imposter from seizing the throne! It's all in a day's work for Sir John and Lady Mary, the Yankees who travel through time to save the world!

it.title: New Yankee 6: In Pharaoh's Court
it.description: Viaggia indietro nel tempo nella terra dei faraoni per impedire che un impostore si impossessi del trono! È tutto in una giornata di lavoro per Sir John e Lady Mary - gli Yankees che viaggiano nel tempo per salvare il mondo!
it.short_description: Travel back in time to the land of the pharaohs to stop an imposter from seizing the throne! It's all in a day's work for Sir John and Lady Mary, the Yankees who travel through time to save the world!

es.title: New Yankee 6: In Pharaoh's Court
es.description: Viaja en el tiempo a la tierra de los faraones para impedir que un impostor se haga con el trono. Todo es un día de trabajo para Sir John y Lady Mary, los yanquis que viajan en el tiempo para salvar el mundo.
es.short_description: Travel back in time to the land of the pharaohs to stop an imposter from seizing the throne! It's all in a day's work for Sir John and Lady Mary, the Yankees who travel through time to save the world!

pt.title: New Yankee 6: In Pharaoh's Court
pt.description: Viaje no tempo para a terra dos faraós para impedir que um impostor se apodere do trono! Está tudo num dia de trabalho para Sir John e Lady Mary - os ianques que viajam no tempo para salvar o mundo!
pt.short_description: Travel back in time to the land of the pharaohs to stop an imposter from seizing the throne! It's all in a day's work for Sir John and Lady Mary, the Yankees who travel through time to save the world!

zt.title: New Yankee 6: In Pharaoh's Court
zt.description: 時光倒流回到法老的土地，制止冒名頂替者登上王位！ 約翰爵士和瑪麗夫人（Lady Mary）都是一天的工作，他們需要時間來拯救世界！
zt.short_description: Travel back in time to the land of the pharaohs to stop an imposter from seizing the throne! It's all in a day's work for Sir John and Lady Mary, the Yankees who travel through time to save the world!

sl.title: New Yankee 6: In Pharaoh's Court
sl.description: Potujte v preteklost – v deželo faraonov – ter ustavite prevaranta, ki želi zasesti prestol. Vse to sir John in lady Mary uredita v enem dnevu – jenkija, ki potujeta skozi čas, da bi rešila svet!
sl.short_description: Travel back in time to the land of the pharaohs to stop an imposter from seizing the throne! It's all in a day's work for Sir John and Lady Mary, the Yankees who travel through time to save the world!

en.title: Asterix & Obelix XXL 3: The Crystal Menhir
en.description: Set off on an exciting adventure and immerse yourself in the world of Asterix! Alone or in co-op, explore the lands of the Roman empire and unravel the mystery of the Crystal Menhir and its incredible powers!
en.short_description: Alone or in co-op, explore the lands of the Roman empire and unravel the mystery of the Crystal Menhir and its incredible powers!

de.title: Asterix & Obelix XXL 3: The Crystal Menhir
de.description: Tauchen Sie ein in das Universum von Asterix und machen Sie sich auf in ein actiongeladenes Abenteuer! Allein oder mit Ihren Mitstreitern durchstreifen Sie das römische Reich in allen Himmelsrichtungen und ergründen dabei das Geheimnis des Kristall-Hinkelsteins mit seinen unglaublichen Kräften!
de.short_description: Alone or in co-op, explore the lands of the Roman empire and unravel the mystery of the Crystal Menhir and its incredible powers!

it.title: Asterix & Obelix XXL 3: The Crystal Menhir
it.description: Tuffati nel mondo di Asterix e partecipa a una frenetica avventura! In modalità singola o cooperativa, esplora le terre dell'Impero romano e svela il mistero del Menhir di Cristallo e dei suoi incredibili poteri!
it.short_description: Alone or in co-op, explore the lands of the Roman empire and unravel the mystery of the Crystal Menhir and its incredible powers!

es.title: Asterix & Obelix XXL 3: The Crystal Menhir
es.description: ¡Sumérgete en el universo de Astérix y embárcate en una trepidante aventura! ¡En solitario o en modo cooperativo, recorre las tierras del imperio romano y descubre el misterio del Menhir de Cristal y de sus increíbles poderes!
es.short_description: Alone or in co-op, explore the lands of the Roman empire and unravel the mystery of the Crystal Menhir and its incredible powers!

pt.title: Asterix & Obelix XXL 3: The Crystal Menhir
pt.description: Parta em uma aventura emocionante e mergulhe no mundo do Asterix! Sozinho ou em cooperação, explore as terras do Império Romano e desvende o mistério do Menir de Cristal e seus incríveis poderes!
pt.short_description: Alone or in co-op, explore the lands of the Roman empire and unravel the mystery of the Crystal Menhir and its incredible powers!

zt.title: Asterix & Obelix XXL 3: The Crystal Menhir
zt.description: 踏上激動人心的冒險之旅，沉浸在Asterix的世界中！ 獨自或在合作社中探索羅馬帝國的土地，解開水晶石之謎及其不可思議的力量的奧秘！
zt.short_description: Alone or in co-op, explore the lands of the Roman empire and unravel the mystery of the Crystal Menhir and its incredible powers!

sl.title: Asterix & Obelix XXL 3: The Crystal Menhir
sl.description: Odpravite se na razburljivo dogodivščino in se potopite v svet Asterixa! Sam ali v sodelovanju raziščite dežele rimskega imperija in razkrijte skrivnost kristalnega menhirja in njegovih neverjetnih moči!
sl.short_description: Alone or in co-op, explore the lands of the Roman empire and unravel the mystery of the Crystal Menhir and its incredible powers!

fr.title: Astérix & Obélix XXL 3: Le Menhir de Cristal
fr.description: Plongez dans l’univers d’Astérix et embarquez dans une trépidante aventure ! Seul ou en coopération, parcourez les terres de l’empire romain et percez le mystère du Menhir de Cristal et de ses incroyables pouvoirs !
fr.short_description: Alone or in co-op, explore the lands of the Roman empire and unravel the mystery of the Crystal Menhir and its incredible powers!

fr.title: God of Light: Remastered
fr.description: God of Light : Remastered est une version définitive du jeu original joué par plus de 15 millions de personnes. L'édition Remastered comprend des graphiques HD, des commandes de physique de la lumière sur mesure et une bande sonore remasterisée par UNKLE.
fr.short_description: Explore the levels, seek for game objects that reflect, split, combine, paint, bend and teleport rays of light energy to activate the Sources of Life and bring light back to the universe.

en.title: God of Light: Remastered
en.description: God of Light: Remastered is a definitive version of the original award-winning game played by over 15 million people. The Remastered edition features all-new HD graphics, tailored light-physics controls and a remastered soundtrack by UNKLE.

fr.title: Robin Hood: Country Heroes. Collector's Edition
fr.description:
Maître archer Robin est à votre disposition alors que vous affrontez le Shérif de Nottingham et ses laquais !

Il faudra que votre main et votre esprit soient rapides, mais le fait d'aider les opprimés sera votre récompense dans cette lutte difficile. Ne laissez pas le shérif percepteur s'en sortir avec ses vols ; devenez le héros de légende et récupérez ce qui appartient au peuple !
fr.short_description: Master archer Robin is at your disposal as you take on the Sheriff of Nottingham and his lackeys! The reward of helping the downtrodden will make your mission worth every challenging step!

en.title: Robin Hood: Country Heroes. Collector's Edition
en.description: Master archer Robin is at your disposal as you take on the Sheriff of Nottingham and his lackeys! You'll need a quick hand and an even quicker mind, but the reward of helping the downtrodden will make your mission worth every challenging step!
en.short_description: Master archer Robin is at your disposal as you take on the Sheriff of Nottingham and his lackeys! The reward of helping the downtrodden will make your mission worth every challenging step!

de.title: Robin Hood: Country Heroes. Collector's Edition
de.description: Meisterschütze Robin steht Ihnen zur Verfügung, wenn Sie es mit dem Sheriff von Nottingham und seinen Lakaien aufnehmen! Sie werden eine schnelle Hand und einen noch schnelleren Verstand brauchen, aber die Belohnung, den Unterdrückten zu helfen, wird Ihre Mission jeden herausfordernden Schritt wert machen!
de.short_description: Master archer Robin is at your disposal as you take on the Sheriff of Nottingham and his lackeys! The reward of helping the downtrodden will make your mission worth every challenging step!

it.title: Robin Hood: Country Heroes. Collector's Edition
it.description: Il maestro arciere Robin è a tua disposizione mentre affronti lo sceriffo di Nottingham e i suoi lacchè! Avrai bisogno di una mano veloce e di una mente ancora più veloce, ma la ricompensa di aiutare gli oppressi renderà la tua missione degna di ogni passo impegnativo!
it.short_description: Master archer Robin is at your disposal as you take on the Sheriff of Nottingham and his lackeys! The reward of helping the downtrodden will make your mission worth every challenging step!

es.title: Robin Hood: Country Heroes. Collector's Edition
es.description: El maestro arquero Robin está a tu disposición para enfrentarte al sheriff de Nottingham y sus lacayos. Necesitarás una mano rápida y una mente aún más rápida, pero la recompensa de ayudar a los oprimidos hará que tu misión merezca cada paso desafiante.
es.short_description: Master archer Robin is at your disposal as you take on the Sheriff of Nottingham and his lackeys! The reward of helping the downtrodden will make your mission worth every challenging step!

pt.title: Robin Hood: Country Heroes. Collector's Edition
pt.description: O mestre arqueiro Robin está à vossa disposição ao enfrentarem o Xerife de Nottingham e os seus lacaios! Vai precisar de uma mão rápida e de uma mente ainda mais rápida, mas a recompensa de ajudar os oprimidos fará com que a sua missão valha cada passo desafiante!
pt.short_description: Master archer Robin is at your disposal as you take on the Sheriff of Nottingham and his lackeys! The reward of helping the downtrodden will make your mission worth every challenging step!

sl.title: Robin Hood: Country Heroes. Collector's Edition
sl.description: Mojstrski lokostrelec Robin vam je na voljo, ko se borite proti šerifu iz Nottinghama in njegovim podrepnikom. Potrebovali boste urno roko in še hitrejši um, toda vaše poslanstvo bo vredno vsakega zahtevnega koraka, saj boste pomagali zatiranim.
sl.short_description: Master archer Robin is at your disposal as you take on the Sheriff of Nottingham and his lackeys! The reward of helping the downtrodden will make your mission worth every challenging step!

zt.description: 當您挑戰諾丁漢警長和他的走狗時，弓箭手羅賓隨時為您服務！ 你需要一個敏捷的手和一個更快的頭腦，但幫助被壓迫者的回報將使你的任務值得每一步具有挑戰性！

fr.title: Fort Boyard
fr.description: Entrez dans Fort Boyard et relevez les défis à travers plus de 10 épreuves mélangeant Action et Party Game ! Endurance, dextérité et persévérance seront vos meilleurs atouts pour récupérer les boyards.
fr.short_description: Enter Fort Boyard and take up the challenge with more than 10 activities that combine Action and Party Games! Endurance, dexterity, and perseverance will be your best assets.

en.title: Fort Boyard
en.description: Enter Fort Boyard and take up the challenge with more than 10 activities that combine Action and Party Games! Endurance, dexterity, and perseverance will be your best assets for collecting boyard coins.
en.short_description: Enter Fort Boyard and take up the challenge with more than 10 activities that combine Action and Party Games! Endurance, dexterity, and perseverance will be your best assets.

de.title: Fort Boyard
de.description: Betreten Sie das Fort Boyard und stellen Sie sich den Herausforderungen: es warten 10 Bewährungsproben in einer Mischung aus Action- und Party-Game auf Sie! Sie benötigen Ausdauer, Geschicklichkeit und Durchhaltevermögen, um so viele Boyard-Münzen wie möglich zu sammeln.
de.short_description: Enter Fort Boyard and take up the challenge with more than 10 activities that combine Action and Party Games! Endurance, dexterity, and perseverance will be your best assets.

it.title: Fort Boyard
it.description: Raccogli la sfida: entra a Fort Boyard e cimentati in oltre 10 prove, in un mix di giochi di Azione e Party Game! Resistenza, abilità e perseveranza saranno i tuoi migliori alleati per raccogliere le monete boyard…
it.short_description: Enter Fort Boyard and take up the challenge with more than 10 activities that combine Action and Party Games! Endurance, dexterity, and perseverance will be your best assets.

es.title: Fort Boyard
es.description: ¡Entra en Fort Boyard y supera sus desafíos a lo largo de más de 10 pruebas que mezclan Acción y Party Game! La resistencia, la destreza y la perseverancia serán tus mejores armas para conseguir boyards, la moneda del juego.
es.short_description: Enter Fort Boyard and take up the challenge with more than 10 activities that combine Action and Party Games! Endurance, dexterity, and perseverance will be your best assets.

pt.description: Entra no Fort Boyard e supera os desafios através de mais de 10 provas que combinam Action e Party Game! Resistência, destreza e perseverança serão os teus melhores trunfos para apanhares os boyards.
pt.short_description: Enter Fort Boyard and take up the challenge with more than 10 activities that combine Action and Party Games! Endurance, dexterity, and perseverance will be your best assets.

sl.description: Vstopite v Fort Boyard in sprejmite izziv z več kot 10 aktivnostmi, ki združujejo akcijske in zabavne igre! Vztrajnost, spretnost in vztrajnost bodo vaše najboljše premoženje za zbiranje boyard kovancev.

fr.title: The Evil Within 2
fr.description: L'inspecteur Sebastian Castellanos a tout perdu, y compris sa fille Lily. Pour la sauver, il doit replonger dans le monde cauchemardesque du STEM. Des menaces terrifiantes l'attendent à chaque recoin, et il devra réfléchir pour survivre. Pour se racheter, il n'a pas d'autre choix que de s'échapper.

en.title: The Evil Within 2
en.description: Detective Sebastian Castellanos has lost everything, including his daughter, Lily. To save her, he must descend into the nightmarish world of STEM. Horrifying threats emerge from every corner, and he must rely on his wits to survive. For his one chance at redemption, the only way out is in.

de.title: The Evil Within 2
de.description: Detective Sebastian Castellanos hat alles verloren, auch seine geliebte Tochter Lily. Doch in der albtraumhaften Welt des STEM liegt der Schlüssel zu ihrer Rettung. Sein Verstand ist seine mächtigste Waffe gegen die lauernden Schrecken – und Erlösung ist nur tief im Inneren des STEM zu finden.

it.title: The Evil Within 2
it.description: Il detective Sebastian Castellanos ha perso tutto, inclusa sua figlia Lily. Per salvarla, deve affrontare l'incubo dello STEM. Mostruose minacce sono in agguato nell'ombra e potrà contare solo sulla sua forza di volontà per farcela. Per potersi redimere, l'unica via d'uscita è entrare nell'incubo.

es.title: The Evil Within 2
es.description: El detective Sebastián Castellanos lo ha perdido todo, incluida su hija Lily. Para salvarla, debe descender al mundo de pesadilla de STEM. Amenazas terribles surgen de cada esquina y debe confiar en su ingenio para sobrevivir. Para redimirse, su única forma de salir es entrar.

pt.title: The Evil Within 2
pt.description: O detetive Sebastian Castellanos perdeu tudo, incluindo Lily, a sua filha. Para a salvar, terá de descer ao mundo de pesadelo de STEM. Ameaças aterradoras surgem a cada esquina e terá de ser astuto para sobreviver. Esta é a sua última oportunidade de redenção; a única solução é seguir em frente.

zt.title: The Evil Within 2
zt.description: 偵探塞巴斯蒂安·卡斯特拉諾斯 (Sebastian Castellanos) 失去了一切，包括他的女兒莉莉 (Lily)。 為了拯救她，他必須進入 STEM 的噩夢世界。 可怕的威脅從各個角落湧現，他必須依靠自己的智慧才能生存。 對於他一次救贖的機會，唯一的出路就是進去。

sl.title: The Evil Within 2
sl.description: Detektiv Sebastian Castellanos je izgubil vse, tudi svojo hčerko Lily. Da jo reši, se mora spustiti v košmarni svet STEM. Grozljive grožnje se pojavijo iz vseh kotov in za preživetje se mora zanesti na svojo pamet. Edini izhod je v njegovi edini možnosti za odkup.

fr.title: Outlast 2
fr.description: Outlast 2 introduit Sullivan Knoth et ses adeptes, qui ont décidé de quitter notre monde moderne corrompu et de se cacher de ce dernier pour fonder Temple Gate, ville perdue dans les étendues sauvages. Knoth et ses fidèles se préparent pour la fin des temps... et vous êtes en plein milieu de ces événements.

en.title: Outlast 2
en.description: Outlast 2 introduces you to Sullivan Knoth and his followers, who left our wicked world behind to give birth to Temple Gate, a town deep in the wilderness and hidden from civilization. Knoth and his flock are preparing for the tribulations of the end of times and you’re right in the thick of it.

de.title: Outlast 2
de.description: Outlast 2 macht dich mit Sullivan Knoth und seinen Anhängern bekannt. Er hat unsere sündhafte Welt hinter sich gelassen und tief in der Wildnis und fernab von jeglicher Zivilisation die Stadt Tempel Gate gegründet. Knoth und seine Gemeinde bereiten sich auf die Widrigkeiten des Endes der Zeiten vor und du bist mittendrin.

it.title: Outlast 2
it.description: In Outlast 2 fai la conoscenza di Sullivan Knoth e dei suoi seguaci, che si sono lasciati alle spalle il nostro mondo corrotto per fondare la cittadina di Temple Gate, nel cuore del deserto, lontana da qualsiasi segno di civiltà. Knoth si sta preparando insieme al suo gregge alle tribolazioni della fine dei tempi e tu ti ci ritrovi dentro fino al collo.

pt.title: Outlast 2
pt.description: Outlast 2 traz-te Sullivan Knoth e os seus seguidores, que abandonaram o nosso mundo cruel para fundar Temple Gate, uma cidade situada nas profundezas do deserto, longe da civilização. Knoth e o seu rebanho estão a preparar-se para as adversidades do fim dos tempos, e tu estás no centro do furacão.

zt.title: Outlast 2
zt.description: Outlast 2 向您介紹了 Sullivan Knoth 和他的追隨者，他們離開了我們邪惡的世界，誕生了聖殿之門，一個位於荒野深處，遠離文明的小鎮。 Knoth 和他的羊群正在為末日的苦難做準備，而您正處於困境之中。

sl.title: Outlast 2
sl.description: Outlast 2 vas seznani s Sullivanom Knothom in njegovimi privrženci, ki so za seboj pustili naš hudobni svet, da bi mu rodili Temple Gate, mesto globoko v divjini in skrito civilizaciji. Knoth in njegova čreda se pripravljata na stisko konca časov in ti si ravno v debelem.

name: Outlast 2
copyright: Outlast, Outlast: Whistleblower & Outlast 2 © 2017 Red Barrels Inc. Developed by Red Barrels, Inc. Outlast and all characters, their distinctive likenesses, and related elements are trademarks and material protected by copyright of Red Barrels Inc.© 2017. All Rights Reserved.

en.title: Dishonored®: Death of the Outsider™
en.description: From the award-winning developers at Arkane® Studios comes Dishonored®: Death of the Outsider, the first standalone adventure in the critically-acclaimed Dishonored® series. Be a badass supernatural assassin and take on the role of notorious Billie Lurk as she reunites with her mentor Daud in order to pull off the greatest assassination ever conceived.

pt.title: Dishonored®: Death of the Outsider™
pt.description: Da galardoada equipa de produção da Arkane® Studios chega Dishonored®: Death of the Outsider, a primeira aventura independente na aclamada série Dishonored®. Torna-te um assassino sobrenatural habilidoso e joga com a célebre Billie Lurk enquanto ela se junta ao seu mentor Daud para concretizar o maior assassinato alguma vez concebido.

zt.title: Dishonored®: Death of the Outsider™
zt.description: 來自 Arkane® Studios 屢獲殊榮的開發商推出了 Dishonored®：The Death of the Outsider，這是廣受好評的 Dishonored® 系列中的第一部獨立冒險。 扮演惡名昭彰的超自然刺客，扮演臭名昭著的比莉·勒克，與她的導師 Daud 重聚，以完成有史以來最偉大的暗殺行動。

sl.title: Dishonored®: Death of the Outsider™
sl.description: Med nagrajenimi razvijalci v Arkane® Studios prihaja Dishonored®: Death of the Outsider, prva samostojna pustolovščina v kritično priznani seriji Dishonored®. Bodite hudobni nadnaravni morilec in prevzemite vlogo zloglasne Billie Lurk, ko se ponovno sreča s svojim mentorjem Daudom, da bi izpeljala največji atentat, ki je bil kdajkoli zasnovan.

fr.title: Dishonored® : La mort de l'Outsider™
fr.description: Les développeurs maintes fois récompensés d'Arkane® Studios reviennent avec Dishonored® : La mort de l'Outsider, la première aventure indépendante de la célèbre série des Dishonored®. Devenez un assassin surnaturel en incarnant la célèbre Billie Lurk. Retrouvez votre mentor Daud et fomentez ensemble le plus grand assassinat jamais envisagé.

de.title: Dishonored®: Der Tod des Outsiders™
de.description: Das preisgekrönte Entwicklerstudio Arkane® Studios präsentiert Dishonored®: Der Tod des Outsiders, das erste Standalone der von Kritikern gefeierten Dishonored®-Reihe. Werden Sie zu einem übernatürlichen Assassinen und schlüpfen Sie in die Rolle der berüchtigten Billie Lurk, die sich mit ihrem Mentor Daud verbündet, um den schwierigsten Mord aller Zeiten zu vollbringen.

es.title: Dishonored®: La muerte del Forastero™
es.description: De la mano de Arkane® Studios, ganadores de numerosos premios, llega Dishonored®: La muerte del Forastero, la primera aventura independiente de la aclamada saga Dishonored®. Asume el papel de la infame Billie Lurk, una dura asesina sobrenatural que intenta reunirse con Daud, su mentor, para llevar a cabo el asesinato más importante jamás concebido.

it.title: Dishonored®: La morte dell'Esterno™
it.description: Dagli acclamati Arkane® Studios arriva Dishonored®: La morte dell'Esterno, la prima avventura a sé stante della premiata serie Dishonored®. Vesti i panni dell'assassina soprannaturale Billie Lurk, riunita con il suo vecchio mentore Daud per portare a termine il più grande omicidio mai concepito.

name: Dishonored Death Of The Outsider
copyright: Dishonored®: Death of the Outsider™ © 2017 ZeniMax Media Inc. Developed in association with Arkane Studios. Dishonored, Arkane, VOID Engine, Bethesda, Bethesda Softworks, ZeniMax and related logos are registered trademarks or trademarks of ZeniMax Media Inc. in the U.S. and/or other countries. All Rights Reserved.

fr.title: Dishonored®: Definitive Edition
fr.description: Dishonored est un jeu d'action / infiltration immersif, dans lequel vous incarnez un assassin aux pouvoirs surnaturels poussé par un désir de vengeance. Éliminez vos cibles grâce à un système de combat dynamique permettant de combiner les innombrables pouvoirs surnaturels, armes et gadgets à votre disposition.

en.title: Dishonored®: Definitive Edition
en.description: Dishonored is an immersive first-person action game that casts you as a supernatural assassin driven by revenge. With Dishonored’s flexible combat system, creatively eliminate your targets as you combine the supernatural abilities, weapons and unusual gadgets at your disposal.

de.title: Dishonored®: Definitive Edition
de.description: Dishonored: Die Maske des Zorns ist ein spannungsgeladener Action-Thriller in beklemmend realistischer Ego-Perspektive, in dem Sie in der Rolle eines Assassinen mit übernatürlichen Fähigkeiten schlüpfen.

it.title: Dishonored®: Definitive Edition
it.description: Dishonored è un coinvolgente gioco d'azione in prima persona in cui vesti i panni di un assassino soprannaturale votato alla vendetta. Elimina i tuoi nemici con creatività grazie al sistema di combattimento flessibile, ai poteri soprannaturali e agli insoliti gadget a tua disposizione.

es.title: Dishonored®: Definitive Edition
es.description: Dishonored es un juego de acción en primera persona al que te entregarás por completo encarnando a un asesino sobrenatural movido por la sed de venganza. Un sistema de combate flexible te permitirá combinar una gran variedad de poderes sobrenaturales, armas y enrevesados artilugios para eliminar a tus enemigos desplegando toda tu creatividad.

pt.title: Dishonored®: Definitive Edition
pt.description: Dishonored é um jogo de ação em primeira pessoa envolvente que apresenta você como um assassino sobrenatural movido por vingança. Com o sistema de combate flexível do Dishonored, elimine criativamente seus alvos enquanto combina as habilidades sobrenaturais, armas e dispositivos incomuns à sua disposição.

zt.title: Dishonored®: Definitive Edition
zt.description: Dishonored 是一款身臨其境的第一人稱動作遊戲，將你塑造成一個複仇驅動的超自然刺客。 借助 Dishonored 靈活的戰鬥系統，結合超自然能力、武器和不尋常的小玩意，創造性地消滅目標。

sl.title: Dishonored®: Definitive Edition
sl.description: Dishonored je izjemna akcijska igra v prvi osebi, ki vas postavi za nadnaravnega morilca, ki ga vodi maščevanje. S prilagodljivim bojnim sistemom Dishonored ustvarjalno odstranite cilje, ko kombinirate nadnaravne sposobnosti, orožje in nenavadne pripomočke, ki so vam na voljo.

name: Dishonored Definitive Edition
copyright: Dishonored® Definitive Edition © 2015 ZeniMax Media Inc. Developed in association with Arkane Studios. Dishonored, The Brigmore Witches, Void Walker’s Arsenal, The Knife of Dunwall, Dunwall City Trials, Revenge Solves Everything, Arkane, Bethesda, Bethesda Softworks, ZeniMax and related logos are registered trademarks or trademarks of ZeniMax Media Inc. in the U.S. and/or other countries. All Rights Reserved.

fr.title: Mechanic Escape
fr.description: Dans un monde opprimé par les machines, une forteresse résiste à la persécution. Vos amis perdus et le manque de ressources vous poussent à agir contre l'extinction. Bravez les dangers et allez retrouver vos camarades pour sauver votre espèce!
fr.short_description: In a world oppressed by machines, a stronghold full of die-hard TV-sets resists the persecution. Brave the dangers and go find your comrades to rescue your species!

en.title: Mechanic Escape
en.description: In a world oppressed by machines, a stronghold full of die-hard TV-sets resists the persecution. Your lost friends and the lack of resources drive you to take action against the extinction. Brave the dangers and go find your comrades to rescue your species!
en.short_description: In a world oppressed by machines, a stronghold full of die-hard TV-sets resists the persecution. Brave the dangers and go find your comrades to rescue your species!

de.title: Mechanic Escape
de.description: In einer von Maschinen unterdrückten Welt widersteht eine Festung der Verfolgung. Deine verlorenen Freunde und der Mangel an Ressourcen treiben dich dazu, gegen das Aussterben vorzugehen. Bewältige die Gefahren und rette deine Spezies!
de.short_description: In a world oppressed by machines, a stronghold full of die-hard TV-sets resists the persecution. Brave the dangers and go find your comrades to rescue your species!

it.title: Mechanic Escape
it.description: In un mondo oppresso dalle macchine, una roccaforte resiste alla persecuzione. I tuoi amici perduti e la mancanza di risorse ti spingono ad agire contro l'estinzione. Coraggiosi i pericoli e vai a trovare i tuoi compagni per salvare la tua specie!
it.short_description: In a world oppressed by machines, a stronghold full of die-hard TV-sets resists the persecution. Brave the dangers and go find your comrades to rescue your species!

es.title: Mechanic Escape
es.description: En un mundo oprimido por las máquinas, una fortaleza resiste la persecución. Tus amigos perdidos y la falta de recursos te llevan a tomar medidas contra la extinción. Enfréntate a los peligros y encuentra a tus camaradas para rescatar a tu especie!
es.short_description: In a world oppressed by machines, a stronghold full of die-hard TV-sets resists the persecution. Brave the dangers and go find your comrades to rescue your species!

pt.title: Mechanic Escape
pt.description: Num mundo oprimido pelas máquinas, uma fortaleza resiste à perseguição. Seus amigos perdidos e a falta de recursos o levam a agir contra a extinção. Enfrenta os perigos e vai encontrar os teus camaradas para resgatar a tua espécie!
pt.short_description: In a world oppressed by machines, a stronghold full of die-hard TV-sets resists the persecution. Brave the dangers and go find your comrades to rescue your species!

zt.title: Mechanic Escape
zt.description: 在一個被機器壓迫的世界裡，一個充滿頑固電視機的堡壘抵抗著迫害。您失去的朋友和資源的缺乏促使您採取行動對抗滅絕。勇敢面對危險，去尋找你的戰友來拯救你的物種！
zt.short_description: In a world oppressed by machines, a stronghold full of die-hard TV-sets resists the persecution. Brave the dangers and go find your comrades to rescue your species!

sl.title: Mechanic Escape
sl.description: V svetu, ki ga zatirajo stroji, se trdnjava, polna trmastih televizorjev, upira preganjanju. Izgubljeni prijatelji in pomanjkanje sredstev vas vodijo k ukrepanju proti izumrtju. Drznite se nevarnosti in pojdite poiskati tovariše, da rešite svojo vrsto!
sl.short_description: In a world oppressed by machines, a stronghold full of die-hard TV-sets resists the persecution. Brave the dangers and go find your comrades to rescue your species!

name: Mechanic Escape
copyright: Published by Tekneo / Created by Slak Games

fr.title: Victor Vran: Overkill Edition
fr.description: Incarnez Victor, chasseur de démons, et façonnez votre héros en délivrant la cité maudite de Zagoravia. Explorez Motörhead: Through the Ages, une virée sauvage dans l'univers mythique du groupe le plus puissant du monde, et voyagez jusqu'aux Mondes Fracturés, une dimension formée de fragments de royaumes brisés.
fr.short_description: Become Victor, hunter of demons. Forge your hero to liberate the cursed city of Zagoravia. But slaying demons doesn’t have to be a lonely affair: form a pack and find even greater strength in numbers!

en.title: Victor Vran: Overkill Edition
en.description:
Become Victor, hunter of demons. Forge your own hero on a quest to liberate the cursed city of Zagoravia.
Decide how you play at any moment, even in the heat of battle. Modify your demon slaying loadout as you dodge deadly attacks, leap from towering locations and take on hordes of hideous beasts and cunning boss monsters. Fedora or no fedora, you decide!
Slaying demons doesn’t have to be a lonely affair – Form a pack and find even greater strength in numbers, to explore the story of the dark world together.
en.short_description: Become Victor, hunter of demons. Forge your hero to liberate the cursed city of Zagoravia. But slaying demons doesn’t have to be a lonely affair: form a pack and find even greater strength in numbers!

de.title: Victor Vran: Overkill Edition
de.description: Erschaffe dir beim Befreien der verfluchten Stadt Zagoravia deinen eigenen Helden. Erkunde ‘Motörhead: Through the Ages’ - eine wilde Tour durch den Mythos der lautesten Band der Welt und reise in die Fractured Worlds, eine aus den Fragmenten zerbrochener Welten erschaffene Dimension.
de.short_description: Become Victor, hunter of demons. Forge your hero to liberate the cursed city of Zagoravia. But slaying demons doesn’t have to be a lonely affair: form a pack and find even greater strength in numbers!

it.title: Victor Vran: Overkill Edition
it.description: Crea il tuo eroe in una missione per liberare la città maledetta di Zagoravia. Esplora "Motörhead: Through the Ages", un selvaggio tour attraverso il mito della band più rumorosa al mondo ed entra nei Mondi Spezzati, una dimensione formata dai frammenti di regni distrutti.
it.short_description: Become Victor, hunter of demons. Forge your hero to liberate the cursed city of Zagoravia. But slaying demons doesn’t have to be a lonely affair: form a pack and find even greater strength in numbers!

es.title: Victor Vran: Overkill Edition
es.description: Crea a tu propio héroe y sumérgete en esta aventura para liberar a la ciudad maldita de Zagoravia. Explora "Motörhead: Through the Ages", un viaje impresionante por la mitología de una de las bandas más ruidosas del mundo. Y viaja a los mundos fracturados, una dimensión formada a partir de los fragmentos de reinos rotos.
es.short_description: Become Victor, hunter of demons. Forge your hero to liberate the cursed city of Zagoravia. But slaying demons doesn’t have to be a lonely affair: form a pack and find even greater strength in numbers!

pt.title: Victor Vran: Overkill Edition
pt.description: Invente seu herói numa jornada para libertar a cidade maldita de Zagoravia. Explore “Motörhead: Através das Eras”, uma turnê pelo mito da banda mais sonora do mundo, e entre nos Mundos Fendidos, uma dimensão formada pelos fragmentos dos reinos despedaçados.
pt.short_description: Become Victor, hunter of demons. Forge your hero to liberate the cursed city of Zagoravia. But slaying demons doesn’t have to be a lonely affair: form a pack and find even greater strength in numbers!

sl.title: Victor Vran: Overkill Edition
sl.description: Ustvarite svojega junaka in osvobodite prekleto mesto Zagoravia. Podajte se na divjo turnejo Motörhead: Through the Ages po mitih najglasnejše glasbene skupine na svetu in vstopite v dimenzijo, ki je nastala iz drobcev uničenih kraljestev.
sl.short_description: Become Victor, hunter of demons. Forge your hero to liberate the cursed city of Zagoravia. But slaying demons doesn’t have to be a lonely affair: form a pack and find even greater strength in numbers!

zt.description:
《獵魔奇俠：過度殺戮版》成為""惡魔獵人"" - 維克多。打造屬於你自己的英雄，解放被詛咒的查戈拉維亞城。
努力集結最強的武器、裝備與邪惡的惡魔力量、命運卡等，讓玩家打造出個人化的角色，使用組合技能與武器來消滅成群的怪物。玩家在遊戲中享受共同冒險的樂趣，一起探索黑暗世界的故事。
zt.title: 獵魔奇俠 : 過度殺戮版
zt.short_description: Become Victor, hunter of demons. Forge your hero to liberate the cursed city of Zagoravia. But slaying demons doesn’t have to be a lonely affair: form a pack and find even greater strength in numbers!

fr.title: Super Sports Blast
fr.description: Allez sur le terrain et préparez-vous à vous éclater ! Créez votre propre personnage et gravissez les échelons pour devenir le champion dans trois des sports les plus populaires au monde.
fr.short_description: Take to the field and prepare to have a blast! Create your own character and grind your way up to be the champion in three of the world's most popular sports.

en.title: Super Sports Blast
en.description: Take to the field and prepare to have a blast! Create your own character and grind your way up to be the champion in three of the world's most popular sports.
en.short_description: Take to the field and prepare to have a blast! Create your own character and grind your way up to be the champion in three of the world's most popular sports.

de.title: Super Sports Blast
de.description: Übernimm das Spielfeld und bereite dich auf einen Superspaß vor! Erschaffe deine eigene Figur und mach deinen Weg, um Champion in drei der beliebtesten Sportarten weltweit zu werden.
de.short_description: Take to the field and prepare to have a blast! Create your own character and grind your way up to be the champion in three of the world's most popular sports.

it.title: Super Sports Blast
it.description: Entra in campo e inizia a divertirti! Crea il tuo personaggio e impegnati a diventare campione in tre degli sport più popolari al mondo.
it.short_description: Take to the field and prepare to have a blast! Create your own character and grind your way up to be the champion in three of the world's most popular sports.

es.title: Super Sports Blast
es.description: ¡Salta al terreno de juego y prepárate para pasarlo en grande! Crea tu propio avatar y entrena para convertirte en el mejor jugador en tres de los deportes más populares del mundo.
es.short_description: Take to the field and prepare to have a blast! Create your own character and grind your way up to be the champion in three of the world's most popular sports.

pt.title: Super Sports Blast
pt.description: Entre em campo e prepare-se para se divertir muito! Crie o seu próprio personagem e jogue para ser o campeão em três dos esportes mais populares do mundo.
pt.short_description: Take to the field and prepare to have a blast! Create your own character and grind your way up to be the champion in three of the world's most popular sports.

sl.description: Pojdite na teren in se pripravite na eksplozijo! Ustvari si lastnega lika in si postavi prvak v treh najbolj priljubljenih športnih panogah na svetu.
sl.short_description: Take to the field and prepare to have a blast! Create your own character and grind your way up to be the champion in three of the world's most popular sports.

zt.description: 帶上球場，準備好盡情享受吧！ 創建你自己的角色，並努力成為世界上最受歡迎的三項運動的冠軍。

fr.title: Astérix & Obélix XXL 2
fr.description: Astérix & Obélix XXL 2 porte l'expérience du jeu original à un niveau inégalé. Les graphismes améliorés rendent hommage aux bandes dessinées et le gameplay a été totalement repensé pour rendre la lutte contre les Romains encore plus amusante !
fr.short_description: Explore Las Vegum with the inseparable Asterix and Obelix, not to forget their faithful companion Dogmatix, who will be no small help in facing the Roman legionaries. now with more than 200 characters !

en.title: Asterix & Obelix XXL 2
en.description: Asterix & Obelix XXL 2 brings the experience of the original game to an unparalleled level. The enhanced graphics pay tribute to the comic books and the gameplay has been totally redesigned to make fighting the Romans even more fun!
en.short_description: Explore Las Vegum with the inseparable Asterix and Obelix, not to forget their faithful companion Dogmatix, who will be no small help in facing the Roman legionaries. now with more than 200 characters !

de.title: Asterix & Obelix XXL 2
de.description: Asterix & Obelix XXL 2 bringt die Erfahrung des Originalspiels auf ein unvergleichliches Niveau. Die verbesserte Grafik zollt den Comicbüchern Tribut und das Gameplay wurde komplett neu gestaltet, um den Kampf gegen die Römer noch mehr Spaß zu machen!
de.short_description: Explore Las Vegum with the inseparable Asterix and Obelix, not to forget their faithful companion Dogmatix, who will be no small help in facing the Roman legionaries. now with more than 200 characters !

it.title: Asterix & Obelix XXL 2
it.description: Asterix & Obelix XXL 2 porta l'esperienza del gioco originale ad un livello senza precedenti. La grafica migliorata rende omaggio ai fumetti e il gameplay è stato completamente ridisegnato per rendere il combattimento con i romani ancora più divertente!
it.short_description: Explore Las Vegum with the inseparable Asterix and Obelix, not to forget their faithful companion Dogmatix, who will be no small help in facing the Roman legionaries. now with more than 200 characters !

es.title: Asterix & Obelix XXL 2
es.description: Astérix y Obélix XXL 2 lleva la experiencia del juego original a un nivel inigualable. Los gráficos mejorados rinden homenaje a los cómics y la jugabilidad ha sido totalmente rediseñada para que la lucha contra los romanos sea aún más divertida.
es.short_description: Explore Las Vegum with the inseparable Asterix and Obelix, not to forget their faithful companion Dogmatix, who will be no small help in facing the Roman legionaries. now with more than 200 characters !

pt.title: Asterix & Obelix XXL 2
pt.description: Asterix & Obelix XXL 2 leva a experiência do jogo original a um nível sem precedentes. Os gráficos melhorados prestam homenagem aos quadrinhos e a jogabilidade foi totalmente redesenhada para tornar a luta contra os romanos ainda mais divertida!
pt.short_description: Explore Las Vegum with the inseparable Asterix and Obelix, not to forget their faithful companion Dogmatix, who will be no small help in facing the Roman legionaries. now with more than 200 characters !

zt.title: Asterix & Obelix XXL 2
zt.description: Asterix & Obelix XXL 2 將原版遊戲的體驗提升到無與倫比的水平。 增強的圖形向漫畫書致敬，遊戲玩法經過完全重新設計，讓與羅馬人的戰鬥更加有趣！
zt.short_description: Explore Las Vegum with the inseparable Asterix and Obelix, not to forget their faithful companion Dogmatix, who will be no small help in facing the Roman legionaries. now with more than 200 characters !

sl.title: Asterix & Obelix XXL 2
sl.description: Asterix & Obelix XXL 2 doživlja izkušnje izvirne igre na neprimerljivo raven. Izboljšana grafika se poklanja stripom, igranje pa je popolnoma prenovljeno, da bo boj z Rimljani še bolj zabaven!
sl.short_description: Explore Las Vegum with the inseparable Asterix and Obelix, not to forget their faithful companion Dogmatix, who will be no small help in facing the Roman legionaries. now with more than 200 characters !
