en.title: Aurion : Legacy of the Kori-Odan
en.description: This is a 2D African Fantasy Action-RPG which seeks to innovate in the genre. The dynamic gameplay partly inspired by the old school "Tales of" series, focuses on 2D real-time combat while the narration and environment both draw deeply from African culture.
en.short_description: This is a 2D African Fantasy Action-RPG which seeks to innovate in the genre.

de.title: Aurion : Legacy of the Kori-Odan
de.description: Es ist ein afrikanisches Fantasy-Action-Spiel, das nach Innovationen strebt. Das Gameplay ist von der Serie "Tales of" inspiriert, die sich auf den Echtzeit-2D-Kampf konzentriert, während die Erzählung und die Umgebung aus der afrikanischen Kultur stammen.
de.short_description: This is a 2D African Fantasy Action-RPG which seeks to innovate in the genre.

it.title: Aurion : Legacy of the Kori-Odan
it.description: Si tratta di un gioco di African Fantasy Action che cerca di innovare. Il gameplay è ispirato alla serie "Tales of", che si concentra sul combattimento in 2D in tempo reale, mentre la narrazione e l'ambiente sono tratti dalla cultura africana.
it.short_description: This is a 2D African Fantasy Action-RPG which seeks to innovate in the genre.

es.title: Aurion : Legacy of the Kori-Odan
es.description: Es un juego africano de Fantasy Action que busca innovar. El juego se inspira en la serie "Tales of", que se centra en el combate en 2D en tiempo real, mientras que la narrativa y el entorno se inspiran en la cultura africana.
es.short_description: This is a 2D African Fantasy Action-RPG which seeks to innovate in the genre.

pt.title: Aurion : Legacy of the Kori-Odan
pt.description: É um jogo Africano Fantasia Ação que procura inovar. A jogabilidade é inspirada na série "Tales of", que se concentra no combate 2D em tempo real, enquanto a narrativa e o ambiente são extraídos da cultura africana.
pt.short_description: This is a 2D African Fantasy Action-RPG which seeks to innovate in the genre.

zt.title: Aurion : Legacy of the Kori-Odan
zt.description: 這是一款 2D 非洲奇幻動作角色扮演遊戲，力求在類型上進行創新。 動態遊戲部分靈感來自老派“故事”系列，專注於 2D 實時戰鬥，而敘事和環境都深深地借鑒了非洲文化。
zt.short_description: This is a 2D African Fantasy Action-RPG which seeks to innovate in the genre.

sl.title: Aurion : Legacy of the Kori-Odan
sl.description: Gre za 2D afriško fantazijsko akcijsko RPG, ki si prizadeva za novosti v žanru. Dinamično igranje, delno navdihnjeno s starošolsko serijo "Tales of", se osredotoča na 2D sprotni boj, medtem ko pripovedovanje in okolje močno izhajata iz afriške kulture.
sl.short_description: This is a 2D African Fantasy Action-RPG which seeks to innovate in the genre.

fr.title: Aurion : L'héritage des Kori-Odan
fr.description: Il s'agit d'un jeu Action Fantaisie Africain qui cherche à innover. Le gameplay est inspiré de la série "Tales of", qui met l'accent sur le combat en temps réel en 2D tandis que la narration et l'environnement sont tous deux tirés de la culture africaine.
fr.short_description: This is a 2D African Fantasy Action-RPG which seeks to innovate in the genre.

fr.title: The Last Tinker™: City of Colors
fr.description: The Last Tinker est un jeu d'action/aventure coloré (et pas un jeu de plates-formes, car il n'y a pas de bouton pour sauter). Koru, un garçon de Couleurville, doit affronter la Grisaille, une force mystérieuse désirant effacer toute joie. Utilisez couleurs et émotions ramener la vie à Couleurville.
fr.short_description: Koru, a boy from the slums of Colortown, must rise and stand against the Bleakness, a dark force intent on wiping out joy. Koru must use color and emotion to restore life to Colortown!

en.title: The Last Tinker™: City of Colors
en.description: The Last Tinker is a joyous action adventure and definitely no platformer, as there is no jump button. Koru, a boy from the slums of Colortown, must rise and stand against the Bleakness, a dark force intent on wiping out joy. Koru must use color and emotion to restore life to Colortown!
en.short_description: Koru, a boy from the slums of Colortown, must rise and stand against the Bleakness, a dark force intent on wiping out joy. Koru must use color and emotion to restore life to Colortown!

de.title: The Last Tinker™: City of Colors
de.description: The Last Tinker ist ein buntes, frohes Action Adventure und definitiv kein Plattformer. Koru, ein Junge aus den Slums von Farbstadt, muss der Bleiche entgegentreten, einer dunklen Macht, die der Welt die Freude nehmen will. Mit Farbe und Gefühlen muss Koru das Leben nach Farbstadt zurückbringen!
de.short_description: Koru, a boy from the slums of Colortown, must rise and stand against the Bleakness, a dark force intent on wiping out joy. Koru must use color and emotion to restore life to Colortown!

it.title: The Last Tinker™: City of Colors
it.description: The Last Tinker è un gioioso action adventure e di certo non un platform, dato che non c'è un pulsante per saltare. Koru, un giovane di Colortown, deve opporsi alla Monocromia, una presenza oscura decisa a eliminare la gioia. Koru dovrà usare colori ed emozioni per ridare la vita a Colortown!
it.short_description: Koru, a boy from the slums of Colortown, must rise and stand against the Bleakness, a dark force intent on wiping out joy. Koru must use color and emotion to restore life to Colortown!

es.title: The Last Tinker™: City of Colors
es.description: The Last Tinker es un alegre juego de acción y aventura (y no un plataformas, porque no tiene botón de salto). Koru, un joven de Colortown, se enfrentará  a la Monocromía, una oscura fuerza que quiere acabar con la alegría. ¡Koru debe usar el color y la emoción para devolver a Colortown a la vida!
es.short_description: Koru, a boy from the slums of Colortown, must rise and stand against the Bleakness, a dark force intent on wiping out joy. Koru must use color and emotion to restore life to Colortown!

pt.title: The Last Tinker™: City of Colors
pt.description: The Last Tinker é uma aventura de ação alegre e definitivamente não tem um jogo de plataformas, já que não há botão de pular. Koru, um garoto das favelas de Colortown, deve se levantar e se levantar contra a Desolação, uma força negra com a intenção de acabar com a alegria. Koru deve usar cor e emoção para restaurar a vida em Colortown!
pt.short_description: Koru, a boy from the slums of Colortown, must rise and stand against the Bleakness, a dark force intent on wiping out joy. Koru must use color and emotion to restore life to Colortown!

sl.title: The Last Tinker™: City of Colors
sl.description: Last Tinker je vesela akcijska pustolovščina in zagotovo ne platformer, saj ni gumba za skok. Koru, fant iz slumov Colortowna, se mora dvigniti in stati proti Bleaknessu, temni sili, ki namerava izbrisati veselje. Koru mora z barvo in čustvi obnoviti življenje v Colortownu!
sl.short_description: Koru, a boy from the slums of Colortown, must rise and stand against the Bleakness, a dark force intent on wiping out joy. Koru must use color and emotion to restore life to Colortown!

zt.description: The Last Tinker 是一款歡樂的動作冒險遊戲，絕對沒有平台遊戲，因為沒有跳躍按鈕。 Koru 是一個來自 Colortown 貧民窟的男孩，他必須站起來對抗 Bleakness，這是一種意圖抹去歡樂的黑暗力量。 Koru必須用色彩和情感來讓Colortown恢復生機！
zt.title: 最後的修補匠: 彩色之城
zt.short_description: Koru, a boy from the slums of Colortown, must rise and stand against the Bleakness, a dark force intent on wiping out joy. Koru must use color and emotion to restore life to Colortown!

name: The Last Tinker
copyright: © 2014 Daedalic Entertainment GmbH and Mimimi Productions UG. Daedalic and the Daedalic-Logo are trademarks of Daedalic Entertainment GmbH. All rights reserved.

fr.title: ATV Drift & Tricks
fr.short_description: DRIFT, TRICKS & KIFF !! Vous en avez marre des véhicules à 2 roues ? ATV Drift & Tricks est le jeu de QUAD qu’il vous faut !
fr.description: Vous en avez marre des véhicules à 2 roues ? ATV Drift & Tricks est le jeu de QUAD qu’il vous faut ! C’est la promesse de courses uniquement en quad: Enchainez les courses dans des modes de jeu aux défis hors norme sur des circuits variés et pas avariés : Déserts, Forêts, Montagnes, Lacs, Rivières, Oasis … Autant de panoramas qui vous arracheront la rétine ! Pas de doute, vous allez en voir de toutes les couleurs ! Des figures de folie & un max de drift: Envoyez-vous en l’air à chaque saut en réalisant des figures à rendre fous vos adversaires ! Retombez au sol et enquillez les dérapages. Les pneus vont prendre cher, ça tombe bien vos adversaires aussi !

en.title: ATV Drift & Tricks
en.short_description: DRIFT, TRICKS & FUN! Tired of 2-wheeled vehicles? ATV Drift & Tricks is the QUAD game for you! A racing game just for quads!!
en.description: DRIFT, TRICKS & FUN! Tired of 2-wheeled vehicles? ATV Drift & Tricks is the QUAD game for you! A racing game just for quads!!

de.title: ATV Drift & Tricks
de.short_description: DRIFT, TRICKS & SPASS! Zweiräder werden Ihnen langweilig? Dann ist ATV Drift & Tricks das QUAD-Spiel für Sie!
de.description:
Zweiräder werden Ihnen langweilig? Dann ist ATV Drift & Tricks das QUAD-Spiel für Sie! Ein Rennspiel nur für Quads, mit 3 Gründen für großen Spaß:

Kann einzeln oder mit mehreren Spielern in 8 rasanten Spielmodi gespielt werden:
Liga, Zeitfahren, Schnelles Rennen, Hotlap, König der Straße, Goldener Helm, Letzter Überlebender und Jäger. Fahren Sie eine Rennserie allein oder als Split-Screen mit Freunden in Spielmodi mit außergewöhnlichen Herausforderungen. Sie wollen noch mehr? Starten Sie ein Multiplayer-Rennen online mit 10 Teilnehmern und finden Sie heraus, wer sein ATV am besten unter Kontrolle hat.



Abwechslungsreiche Strecken, die Sie immer wieder befahren können:
Wüsten, Wälder, Berge, Seen, Flüsse, Oasen ... Landschaften, bei denen Ihnen die Augen übergehen! Sicher werden Sie alles zu sehen bekommen!

it.title: ATV Drift & Tricks
it.short_description: DRIFT, TRICKS & FUN! Sei stanco dei veicoli a 2 ruote? ATV Drift & Tricks è il gioco di QUAD per te!
it.description:
Sei stanco dei veicoli a 2 ruote? ATV Drift & Tricks è il gioco di QUAD per te! Un gioco di corse solo per quad, con 3 ragioni per divertirsi:

Giocabile da solo o in multiplayer con 8 folli modalità di gioco:
League, Time Trial, Quick Race, Hot Lap, King of the Road, Golden Helmet, Last One Standing e Hunter. Affronta corse da solo o in split-screen con amici in modalità di gioco straordinarie. Vuoi di più? Affronta una corsa multiplayer online con 10 partecipanti per vedere chi controlla meglio il suo QUAD



Svariati circuiti che puoi ripetere in continuazione:
Deserti, Foreste, Montagne, Laghi, Fiumi, Oasi... Scenari mozzafiato! Ne vedrai di tutti i colori!

es.title: ATV Drift & Tricks
es.short_description: ¡DRIFT, TRICKS Y A FLIPAR! ¿Cansado de los vehículos de 2 ruedas? ATV Drift & Tricks es el juego de QUAD que estabas buscando!
es.description:
¿Cansado de los vehículos de 2 ruedas? ATV Drift & Tricks es el juego de QUAD que estabas buscando! Un juego de carreras solo para quads, con 3 motivos para disfrutar:

Juega en modo individual o multijugador con 8 salvajes modos de juego:
Liga, Contrarreloj, Vuelta rápida, Rey de la pista, Casco de oro, Último superviviente y Cazador. Encadena carreras solo o en pantalla dividida con amigos en desafiantes modos de juego. ¿Quieres más? Compite online con 10 participantes y demuestra cómo dominas tu QUAD.



Circuitos variados para correr una y otra vez:
Desiertos, Bosques, Montañas, Lagos, Ríos, Oasis... ¡Escenarios que se te quedarán en la retina! ¡Sin duda las verás de todos los colores!

pt.title: ATV Drift & Tricks
pt.short_description: DRIFT, TRUQUES E DIVERSÃO! Cansado de veículos de 2 rodas? ATV Drift & Tricks é o jogo QUAD para você! Um jogo de corrida apenas para quadriciclos !!
pt.description: Cansado de veículos de 2 rodas? ATV Drift & Tricks é o jogo de ATV para você! Um jogo de corrida apenas para quadriciclos: Faça uma série de corridas nos modos de jogo com desafios extraordinários em pistas variadas que você pode fazer continuamente: Desertos, Florestas, Montanhas, Lagos, Rios, Oásis ... Configurações que irão encher seus olhos! Sem dúvida, você realmente verá tudo! Acrobacias e derrapagens loucas ao máximo: Salte bem alto cada vez que fizer uma manobra que deixará seus oponentes loucos! Volte para o chão e acumule os montes. Seus pneus pagarão o preço, assim como seus oponentes!

zt.title: ATV Drift & Tricks
zt.short_description: 漂移，技巧和樂趣！ 厭倦了兩輪車？ ATV Drift & Tricks 是一款適合您的 QUAD 遊戲！ 一款專為四驅而設的賽車遊戲!

sl.title: ATV Drift & Tricks
sl.short_description: DRIFT, TRIKI IN ZABAVA! Ste se naveličali dvokolesnih vozil? ATV Drift & Tricks je za vas QUAD igra! Dirkalna igra samo za štirikolesnike !!

name: ATV Drift & Tricks
copyright: ©2017 Microids Interactive SA. All rights reserved. Published by Microids SA. Microïds is a trademark of  Microids SA. All rights reserved. Unreal® is a trademark or registered trademark of Epic Games, Inc. in the United States of America and elsewhere. Unreal® Engine, Copyright 1998 – 2017, Epic Games, Inc. All rights reserved. Developed by Artefacts Studio.

fr.title: TOKI
fr.description: Toki le guerrier vit paisiblement dans la jungle en compagnie de sa bien-aimée Miho. Surgissant de nulle part, l’atroce sorcier vaudou Vookimedlo et l’ignoble démon Bashtar kidnappent Miho et transforment le pauvre Toki en chimpanzé ! Le voilà devenu poilu, lent et nonchalant ! Sa bien-aimée a du souci à se faire…
fr.short_description: Toki the warrior lived peacefully in the jungle with his sweetheart Miho. Appearing out of nowhere, the terrifying voodoo sorcerer Vookimedlo kidnap Miho and turn the poor Toki into a chimpanzee!

en.title: TOKI
en.description: Toki the warrior lived peacefully in the jungle with his sweetheart Miho. Appearing out of nowhere, the terrifying voodoo sorcerer Vookimedlo and heinous demon Bashtar kidnap Miho and turn the poor Toki into a chimpanzee! Unfortunately for his sweetheart, he has become a hairy, lethargic ape...
en.short_description: Toki the warrior lived peacefully in the jungle with his sweetheart Miho. Appearing out of nowhere, the terrifying voodoo sorcerer Vookimedlo kidnap Miho and turn the poor Toki into a chimpanzee!

de.title: TOKI
de.description: Toki der Krieger lebt zusammen mit seiner Geliebten Miho friedlich im Dschungel. Wie aus dem Nichts tauchen der schreckliche Zauberer Vookimedlo und der widerliche Dämon Bashtar auf, entführen Miho und verwandeln den armen Toki in einen Schimpansen! Mit einem Mal ist er behaart, träg und ziemlich schräg! Seine Geliebte hat allen Grund, sich Sorgen zu machen...
de.short_description: Toki the warrior lived peacefully in the jungle with his sweetheart Miho. Appearing out of nowhere, the terrifying voodoo sorcerer Vookimedlo kidnap Miho and turn the poor Toki into a chimpanzee!

it.title: TOKI
it.description: Toki il guerriero vive sereno nella giungla con la sua amata Miho. Il terribile stregone voodoo Vookimedlo e l’ignobile demone Bashtar, spuntati dal nulla, rapiscono Miho e trasformano il povero Toki in uno scimpanzé! Toki ora è peloso, lento e indolente, la sua bella avrà di che preoccuparsi...
it.short_description: Toki the warrior lived peacefully in the jungle with his sweetheart Miho. Appearing out of nowhere, the terrifying voodoo sorcerer Vookimedlo kidnap Miho and turn the poor Toki into a chimpanzee!

es.title: TOKI
es.description: Toki el guerrero lleva una vida apacible en la jungla en compañía de su amada Miho. Surgidos de ninguna parte, el terrible brujo vudú Vookimedlo y el abominable demonio Bashtar secuestran a Miho y transforman al pobre Toki en chimpancé. ¡Ahora es un ser peludo, lento e indolente! Su amada tiene motivos para preocuparse...
es.short_description: Toki the warrior lived peacefully in the jungle with his sweetheart Miho. Appearing out of nowhere, the terrifying voodoo sorcerer Vookimedlo kidnap Miho and turn the poor Toki into a chimpanzee!

pt.title: TOKI
pt.description: Toki, o guerreiro, vive pacificamente na selva na companhia da amada Miho. Surgindo do nada, o atroz feiticeiro vudu Vookimedlo e o ignóbil demónio Bashtar raptam Miho e transformam o pobre Toki em chimpanzé! Ei-lo agora peludo, lento e preguiçoso! A sua amada tem com que preocupar…
pt.short_description: Toki the warrior lived peacefully in the jungle with his sweetheart Miho. Appearing out of nowhere, the terrifying voodoo sorcerer Vookimedlo kidnap Miho and turn the poor Toki into a chimpanzee!

zt.title: TOKI
zt.description: 戰士時岐和他的心上人美穗在叢林中平靜地生活著。 可怕的巫毒巫師 Vookimedlo 和令人髮指的惡魔巴什塔突然出現，綁架了美穗，將可憐的 Toki 變成了黑猩猩！ 不幸的是，他的心上人變成了一隻毛茸茸的、昏昏欲睡的猿……
zt.short_description: Toki the warrior lived peacefully in the jungle with his sweetheart Miho. Appearing out of nowhere, the terrifying voodoo sorcerer Vookimedlo kidnap Miho and turn the poor Toki into a chimpanzee!

sl.title: TOKI
sl.description: *Bojevnik Toki je mirno živel v džungli s svojo ljubico Miho. Od nikoder se pojavljata grozljiv vudu čarovnik Vookimedlo in grozljivi demon Baštar ugrabijo Miho in ubogega Tokija spremenijo v šimpanza! Na žalost njegovega ljubimca je postal kosmat, letargičen opica...
sl.short_description: Toki the warrior lived peacefully in the jungle with his sweetheart Miho. Appearing out of nowhere, the terrifying voodoo sorcerer Vookimedlo kidnap Miho and turn the poor Toki into a chimpanzee!

name: Toki
copyright: ©1989 - 2019 TAD Corp. ©2019 Microids SA. Published by Microids SA. Microids is a registered trademark of Microids SA. All rights reserved.

fr.title: Clustertruck
fr.description:
ClusterTruck est un nouveau type de jeu de plate-forme se déroulant sur une autoroute !
Rivalisez d'agilité et d'acrobaties dans des niveaux déments dans un jeu "au sol de lave" sur le toit de camions au comportement imprévisible !
Le jeu se complique encore plus lorsque des dangers comme des marteaux volants, des lasers et des lance-flammes se joignent à la fête !

en.title: Clustertruck
en.description:
ClusterTruck is a chaotic physics based truckformer.
Jump your way through insane levels in a game of "the floor is lava" on top of speeding trucks driven by terrible drivers.
The game only gets harder when dangers such as swinging hammers, lasers and flamethrowers are added.

de.title: Clustertruck
de.description:
ClusterTruck ist ein neuer Platformer auf einer schnellen Autobahn!
Meister mit Agilität und Akrobatik die Level des Spiels wie auf einem Lavastrom auf unvorhersehbaren, schnellen Trucks!
Das Spiel wird immer härter, schwingender Hammer, Laser und Flammenwerfer kreuzen jetzt deinen Weg!

it.title: Clustertruck
it.description:
ClusterTruck è un nuova tipologia di gioco platform su un'autostrada ad alta velocità!
Usa l'agilità e le acrobazie all'interno di folli livelli in un gioco del tipo "il pavimento è fatto di lava" su imprevedibili camion che sfrecciano ad alta velocità!
Il gioco si fa ancora più impegnativo con l'aggiunta di pericoli come martelli oscillanti, laser e lanciafiamme!

es.title: Clustertruck
es.description:
ClusterTruck es un nuevo tipo de juego de plataformas que sucede sobre una autopista a toda velocidad.
Usa tu agilidad y acrobacias para sobrevivir en demenciales niveles, en un juego de tipo "el piso es lava" sobre impredecibles camiones que van a toda velocidad.
El juego se hace más difícil a medida que se agregan peligros como martillos que se hamacan, láseres y lanzallamas.

pt.title: Clustertruck
pt.description:
ClusterTruck é um novo jogo de plataformas numa autoestrada em alta velocidade!
Utiliza agilidade e acrobacias através de níveis loucos num jogo em que "o chão é lava", para além de camiões velozes e inesperados!
O jogo torna-se cada vez mais difícil à medida que são adicionados perigos como martelos dançantes, lasers e lança-chamas!

sl.title: Clustertruck
sl.description:
*ClusterTruck je izdelovalec tovornjakov, ki temelji na fiziki.
Skočite skozi noro raven v igri "tla so lava" na vrhu prehitrih tovornjakov, ki jih vozijo grozni vozniki.
Igra postane težja, ko so dodane nevarnosti, kot so kladiva, laserji in plamenci.

zt.description:
ClusterTruck 是一個基於混沌物理的卡車成型機。
在可怕的司機駕駛的超速卡車上，在“地板是熔岩”的遊戲中通過瘋狂的關卡。
當添加諸如揮舞錘子、激光和火焰噴射器之類的危險時，遊戲只會變得更難。
zt.title: 貨車不單行

name: ClusterTruck
copyright: © tinyBuild 2016

fr.title: Shift Quantum
fr.description: Shift Quantum est un plateformer utilisant une mécanique appelée SHIFTING, une façon de tordre votre environnement et d'inverser l'espace autour de vous. Pliez votre esprit pour atteindre la sortie de chaque niveau et dévoiler les secrets du programme.
fr.short_description: Shift Quantum is a platformer using a mechanic called SHIFTING. Bend your mind to reach the exit of each level and unveil the secrets of a strange program.

en.title: Shift Quantum
en.description: Shift Quantum is a platformer using a mechanic called SHIFTING, a way to twist your environment and invert space around you. Bend your mind to reach the exit of each level and unveil the secrets of a strange program.
en.short_description: Shift Quantum is a platformer using a mechanic called SHIFTING. Bend your mind to reach the exit of each level and unveil the secrets of a strange program.

de.title: Shift Quantum
de.description: Shift Quantum ist ein Platformer mit einem Mechaniker namens SHIFTING, einer Möglichkeit, Ihre Umgebung zu drehen und den Raum zu invertieren. Beugen Sie Ihren Verstand, um den Ausgang jeder Ebene zu erreichen und enthüllen Sie die Geheimnisse des Programms.
de.short_description: Shift Quantum is a platformer using a mechanic called SHIFTING. Bend your mind to reach the exit of each level and unveil the secrets of a strange program.

it.title: Shift Quantum
it.description: Shift Quantum è un platform che utilizza un meccanico chiamato SHIFTING, un modo per torcere il vostro ambiente e invertire lo spazio intorno a voi. Piegate la mente per raggiungere l'uscita di ogni livello e svelare i segreti di uno strano programma.
it.short_description: Shift Quantum is a platformer using a mechanic called SHIFTING. Bend your mind to reach the exit of each level and unveil the secrets of a strange program.

es.title: Shift Quantum
es.description: Shift Quantum es un juego de plataformas que utiliza un mecanismo llamado SHIFTING, una forma de torcer tu entorno e invertir el espacio a tu alrededor. Dobla tu mente para llegar a la salida de cada nivel y desvelar los secretos de un programa extraño.
es.short_description: Shift Quantum is a platformer using a mechanic called SHIFTING. Bend your mind to reach the exit of each level and unveil the secrets of a strange program.

pt.title: Shift Quantum
pt.description: Shift Quantum é um jogo de plataforma que utiliza um mecânico chamado SHIFTING, uma forma de torcer o seu ambiente e inverter o espaço à sua volta. Dobre sua mente para alcançar a saída de cada nível e desvendar os segredos de um programa estranho.
pt.short_description: Shift Quantum is a platformer using a mechanic called SHIFTING. Bend your mind to reach the exit of each level and unveil the secrets of a strange program.

zt.title: Shift Quantum
zt.description: Shift Quantum 是一個平台遊戲，它使用一種叫做 SHIFTING 的機制，這是一種扭曲環境並反轉你周圍空間的方法。彎曲你的頭腦到達每個關卡的出口，揭開一個奇怪程序的秘密。
zt.short_description: Shift Quantum is a platformer using a mechanic called SHIFTING. Bend your mind to reach the exit of each level and unveil the secrets of a strange program.

sl.title: Shift Quantum

fr.title: Shadow Tactics: Blades of the Shogun
fr.description:
Japon, 1615. Un nouveau shogun a pris le pouvoir au Japon et impose la paix à la nation entière.

Dans son combat contre la conspiration et la rébellion, il engage cinq spécialistes aux talents exceptionnels en assassinat, sabotage et espionnage. Mais jusqu'à quel point sont-ils prêts à se sacrifier au nom de la paix?
fr.short_description: A new Shogun seizes power over Japan and enforces nationwide peace. In his battle against conspiracy and rebellion, he recruits five specialists with extraordinary skills.

en.title: Shadow Tactics: Blades of the Shogun
en.description:
Japan, 1615. A new Shogun seizes power over Japan and enforces nationwide peace.

In his battle against conspiracy and rebellion, he recruits five specialists with extraordinary skills for assassination, sabotage and espionage. But how much are they really willing to sacrifice in the name of peace?
en.short_description: A new Shogun seizes power over Japan and enforces nationwide peace. In his battle against conspiracy and rebellion, he recruits five specialists with extraordinary skills.

de.title: Shadow Tactics: Blades of the Shogun
de.description:
Japan, 1615. Ein neuer Shogun herrscht über Japan und setzt den landesweiten Frieden durch.

Während seinem Kampf gegen Verschwörungen und Rebellionen, rekrutiert er fünf Spezialisten mit außergewöhnlichen Fähigkeiten, um Attentate, Sabotagen und Spionage auszuführen. Doch wie viel können und wollen sie wirklich im Namen des Friedens opfern?
de.short_description: A new Shogun seizes power over Japan and enforces nationwide peace. In his battle against conspiracy and rebellion, he recruits five specialists with extraordinary skills.

it.title: Shadow Tactics: Blades of the Shogun
it.description:
Giappone, 1615. Un nuovo shogun prende il potere in Giappone e porta la pace in tutto il paese.

Per affrontare gli innumerevoli complotti e rivolte, recluta cinque specialisti dotati di abilità straordinarie per quanto riguarda assassini, sabotaggi e spionaggio. Ma quanto saranno davvero disposti a sacrificare nel nome della pace?
it.short_description: A new Shogun seizes power over Japan and enforces nationwide peace. In his battle against conspiracy and rebellion, he recruits five specialists with extraordinary skills.

es.title: Shadow Tactics: Blades of the Shogun
es.description:
Japón, 1615. Un nuevo shogun se hace con el poder en Japón e impone la paz en toda la nación.

En su lucha contra las conspiraciones y las rebeliones, recluta a cinco especialistas con habilidades extraordinarias para matar, sabotear y espiar. Pero ¿cuánto están dispuestos a sacrificar en nombre de la paz?
es.short_description: A new Shogun seizes power over Japan and enforces nationwide peace. In his battle against conspiracy and rebellion, he recruits five specialists with extraordinary skills.

pt.title: Shadow Tactics: Blades of the Shogun
pt.description:
Japão, 1615. Um novo xogum toma o poder e impõe a paz por todo o Japão.

Nesta batalha contra a conspiração e a rebelião, ele recruta cinco especialistas com habilidades extraordinárias para o assassinato, a sabotagem e a espionagem. Mas o quanto eles estão realmente dispostos a se sacrificarem em nome da paz?
pt.short_description: A new Shogun seizes power over Japan and enforces nationwide peace. In his battle against conspiracy and rebellion, he recruits five specialists with extraordinary skills.

sl.title: Shadow Tactics: Blades of the Shogun
sl.description:
Japonska, 1615. Novi Shogun prevzame oblast nad Japonsko in uveljavi mir po vsej državi.

V svoji bitki proti zaroti in uporu zaposli pet strokovnjakov z izjemnimi veščinami za atentate, sabotažo in vohunjenje. Koliko pa so zares pripravljeni žrtvovati v imenu miru?
sl.short_description: A new Shogun seizes power over Japan and enforces nationwide peace. In his battle against conspiracy and rebellion, he recruits five specialists with extraordinary skills.

zt.description:
日本，1615 年。新的幕府將軍奪取了日本的權力並實現了全國和平。

在與陰謀和叛亂的鬥爭中，他招募了五名在暗殺、破壞和間諜方面具有非凡技能的專家。 但他們真的願意以和平的名義犧牲多少？
zt.title: 暗影戰略: 將軍之刃

fr.title: Rad Rodgers Radical Edition
fr.description: Rad est un garçon fougueux et intrépide qui a un peu trop joué aux jeux vidéo… Après s'être assoupi au bout d'une longue nuit de jeu, Rad se réveille en voyant sa vieille console de nouveau allumée. Un vortex apparaît alors et le voilà aspiré par sa propre télévision : il est devenu le héros de son jeu vidéo.
fr.short_description: Rad is a rambunctious but spirited young boy that is suddenly sucked into his TV, where he finds himself the star in his very own video game adventure.

en.title: Rad Rodgers Radical Edition
en.description: Rad is a rambunctious but spirited young boy who maybe plays too many video games. After dozing off at the tail end of a long night of gaming, Rad awakens to find his dusty old console has turned itself back on. Suddenly a vortex emerges and he's sucked into his TV, where he finds himself the star in his very own video game adventure.
en.short_description: Rad is a rambunctious but spirited young boy that is suddenly sucked into his TV, where he finds himself the star in his very own video game adventure.

de.title: Rad Rodgers Radical Edition

de.short_description: Rad is a rambunctious but spirited young boy that is suddenly sucked into his TV, where he finds himself the star in his very own video game adventure.

it.title: Rad Rodgers Radical Edition
it.description: Rad è un ragazzo vivace ma turbolento, che forse usa un po' troppo i videogiochi.
it.short_description: Rad is a rambunctious but spirited young boy that is suddenly sucked into his TV, where he finds himself the star in his very own video game adventure.

es.title: Rad Rodgers Radical Edition

es.short_description: Rad is a rambunctious but spirited young boy that is suddenly sucked into his TV, where he finds himself the star in his very own video game adventure.

pt.title: Rad Rodgers Radical Edition
pt.description: Rad e Dusty são uma ótima dupla, mas só Dusty pode entrar no Pixelverso eletrificado - uma perigosa zona que rompe o espaço-tempo e existe por trás do mundo dos jogos. Dusty entra no Pixelverso quando precisa corrigir bugs no mundo virtual, permitindo que sua jornada com Rad continue.
pt.short_description: Rad is a rambunctious but spirited young boy that is suddenly sucked into his TV, where he finds himself the star in his very own video game adventure.

sl.title: Rad Rodgers Radical Edition
sl.description: Rad je razuzdan, a živahen fant, ki morda igra preveč video iger. Potem ko je zadremal na koncu dolge igralne noči, se Rad zbudi in ugotovi, da se je njegova prašna stara konzola spet vklopila. Naenkrat se pojavi vrtinec in vpije se v televizor, kjer se znajde kot zvezda v svoji lastni avanturi z video igrami.
sl.short_description: Rad is a rambunctious but spirited young boy that is suddenly sucked into his TV, where he finds himself the star in his very own video game adventure.

zt.description: Rad 是一個脾氣暴躁但精力充沛的小男孩，他可能玩了太多的電子遊戲。 在漫長的一夜遊戲結束後打瞌睡後，Rad 醒來發現他佈滿灰塵的舊控制台重新開啟。 突然一個漩渦出現，他被吸入了電視，在那裡他發現自己成為了自己的視頻遊戲冒險中的明星。
zt.title: 拉德羅傑斯激進版

fr.title: Pure Farming 2018
fr.description: Utilisez des machines sous licence pour gérer toutes les facettes de l'agriculture moderne, des labours à l'élevage en passant par l'énergie verte. Sillonnez le monde pour planter des cultures spécifiques à chaque continent comme le chanvre, les cerises et les olives à l'aide de véhicules dédiés. Faites progresser vos fermes dans trois modes conçus pour les vétérans comme pour les néophytes.
fr.short_description: Use licensed machines to manage all aspects of modern farming, from cultivating land and growing crops, to breeding livestock and producing green energy.

en.title: Pure Farming 2018
en.description: Use licensed machines to manage all aspects of modern farming, from cultivating land and growing crops, to breeding livestock and producing green energy. Travel between continents to plant region-specific crops such as hemp, cherries, and olives using dedicated vehicles. Farm your way with three modes tailored to both simulation veterans and newcomers to farming games.
en.short_description: Use licensed machines to manage all aspects of modern farming, from cultivating land and growing crops, to breeding livestock and producing green energy.

de.title: Pure Farming 2018
de.description: Kümmern Sie sich mit lizenzierten Geräten um alle Aspekte der modernen Landwirtschaft, wie z. B. Landkultivierung, Nutzpflanzen und -vieh und die Erzeugung von Ökostrom. Bauen Sie auf verschiedenen Kontinenten mithilfe von Spezialgeräten regionale Nutzpflanzen wie Hanf, Kaffee, Kirschen und Oliven an. Drei unterschiedliche Spielmodi garantieren Spielspaß für Simulationsveteranen wie auch Neulinge.
de.short_description: Use licensed machines to manage all aspects of modern farming, from cultivating land and growing crops, to breeding livestock and producing green energy.

it.title: Pure Farming 2018
it.description: Usa macchinari concessi su licenza e gestisci tutti gli aspetti di una fattoria moderna, dalla coltivazione all'allevamento, fino all'energia sostenibile. Viaggia tra i continenti per piantare colture specifiche di ogni regione, come canapa, caffè, ciliegie e olive, usando macchinari appositi. Scegli fra tre modalità, adatte sia ai veterani delle simulazioni che ai principianti.
it.short_description: Use licensed machines to manage all aspects of modern farming, from cultivating land and growing crops, to breeding livestock and producing green energy.

es.title: Pure Farming 2018
es.description: Usa maquinaria con licencia para gestionar todos los aspectos de una granja moderna, desde arar la tierra y sembrar los cultivos hasta criar ganado y producir energía verde. Viaja entre continentes para plantar cultivos regionales como cáñamo, cerezas y aceitunas con vehículos especializados. Juega a tres modos desarrollados tanto para veteranos de la simulación como granjeros noveles.
es.short_description: Use licensed machines to manage all aspects of modern farming, from cultivating land and growing crops, to breeding livestock and producing green energy.

pt.title: Pure Farming 2018
pt.description: Usa máquinas licenciadas para gerir todos os aspetos da agricultura moderna, do cultivo às colheitas, criação de gado e produção de energia ecológica. Viaja entre continentes para fazer plantações regionais como cânhamo, cerejas e azeitonas com a ajuda de veículos específicos. Cultiva à tua maneira com três modos adequados tanto para veteranos em jogos agrícolas como para novatos.
pt.short_description: Use licensed machines to manage all aspects of modern farming, from cultivating land and growing crops, to breeding livestock and producing green energy.

sl.title: Pure Farming 2018
sl.description: Uporabljajte licenčne stroje za upravljanje vseh vidikov sodobnega kmetovanja, od obdelovanja zemlje in gojenja poljščin do gojenja živine in pridelave zelene energije. Potujte med celinami, da z namenskimi vozili sadite posevke, specifične za regijo, kot so konoplja, češnje in oljke. Kmetijo s tremi načini, prilagojenimi tako simulacijskim veteranom kot novincem v kmečkih igrah.
sl.short_description: Use licensed machines to manage all aspects of modern farming, from cultivating land and growing crops, to breeding livestock and producing green energy.

zt.description: 使用獲得許可的機器來管理現代農業的各個方面，從耕種土地和種植農作物，到飼養牲畜和生產綠色能源。 使用專用車輛在各大洲之間旅行，種植特定地區的作物，如大麻、櫻桃和橄欖。 用三種模式以自己的方式耕種，既適合模擬老手也適合耕種遊戲的新手。
zt.title: 純粹農場2018
zt.short_description: Use licensed machines to manage all aspects of modern farming, from cultivating land and growing crops, to breeding livestock and producing green energy.

fr.title: Rune Lord
fr.description: Un portail s'est ouvert et la magie noire s'y est engouffrée ! Vous êtes le seul à pouvoir fermer les portes et vaincre le Golem de glace maléfique. En créant des associations d'au moins trois runes, vous récupérerez de la magie qui vous permettra de jeter des sorts et de nettoyer vos terres de ce vilain fléau. Mais vous devez vous dépêcher : le temps presse !
fr.short_description: A portal has opened and dark magic is pouring through! Only you can close the gateway and defeat the evil Ice Golem. But you'll need to hurry: time is short!

fr.title: Offroad Racing - Buggy X ATV X Moto
fr.description:
Roulez en dehors des sentiers battus !

Offroad Racing offre un vaste de choix de véhicules tout-terrain pour vous éloigner du train-train quotidien. Bombardez en quad, en buggy ou en Motocross et évadez-vous pour de bon à travers des circuits offroad plus dépaysants les uns que les autres !
fr.short_description: Bomb along in a quad bike, buggy or motocross race and enjoy the change of scenery as you explore immersive offroad tracks.

Ride off the beaten track!

Offroad Racing offers a huge choice of all-terrain vehicles to get away from everyday life. Bomb along in a quad bike, buggy or motocross race and enjoy the change of scenery as you explore immersive offroad tracks.
en.short_description: Bomb along in a quad bike, buggy or motocross race and enjoy the change of scenery as you explore immersive offroad tracks.

pt.description:
Conduz fora dos circuitos habituais!

Offroad Racing oferece uma vasta escolha de veículos todo-o-terreno para te afastares do ritmo diário. Lança-te numa corrida de motoquatro, buggy ou motocross e desfruta das mudanças de cenário ao escapares por circuitos offroad!
pt.short_description: Bomb along in a quad bike, buggy or motocross race and enjoy the change of scenery as you explore immersive offroad tracks.

zt.title: Offroad Racing - Buggy X ATV X Moto
zt.description:
遠離人跡罕至的地方！

越野賽車提供了大量的全地形車輛選擇，讓您遠離日常生活。 在四輪摩托車、越野車或越野摩托車比賽中一路狂奔，在探索身臨其境的越野賽道時欣賞風景的變化。
zt.short_description: Bomb along in a quad bike, buggy or motocross race and enjoy the change of scenery as you explore immersive offroad tracks.

sl.title: Offroad Racing - Buggy X ATV X Moto
sl.description:
Odpeljite se z utripale poti!

Offroad Racing ponuja veliko izbiro terenskih vozil, da se izognete vsakdanjem življenju. Bombujte skupaj s štirikolesnikom, buggyjem ali motokrosom in uživajte v spremembi pokrajine, ko raziskujete potapljajoče offroad steze.
sl.short_description: Bomb along in a quad bike, buggy or motocross race and enjoy the change of scenery as you explore immersive offroad tracks.

name: Offroad Racing - Buggy X ATV X Moto

fr.title: Titeuf Mega Party
fr.description:
La veille de la rentrée, Titeuf apprend qu’il est possible de cloner des moutons en choisissant parmi les meilleurs spécimens. Effrayé par la perspective d’être dupliqué à l’infini, Titeuf fait part de ses inquiétudes à ses copains.
Heureusement, Hugo a toujours une solution. Si seuls les meilleurs sont destinés à être clonés, il suffit de faire le plus de bêtises possibles afin de ne pas être choisi!
fr.short_description: Tootuff heard that it was possible to clone sheep by selecting the very best specimens. Tootuff and his friends embark on a race to get up to as much crazy mischief as possible to avoid being cloned.

en.title: MEGAPARTY a Tootuff Adventure
en.description:
The day before school started back, Tootuff heard that it was possible to clone sheep by selecting the very best specimens. Terrified about the idea of being infinitely duplicated, Tootuff shares his concerns with his friends.
Fortunately, Hugo always has a solution. If only the best are destined to be cloned, you just have to be as naughty as possible to avoid being chosen!
en.short_description: Tootuff heard that it was possible to clone sheep by selecting the very best specimens. Tootuff and his friends embark on a race to get up to as much crazy mischief as possible to avoid being cloned.

de.title: MEGAPARTY a Tootuff Adventure
de.description:
Am Tag vor Schulbeginn erfuhr Tootuff, dass es möglich sei, Schafe zu klonen, indem man die allerbesten Exemplare auswählte. Aus Angst vor der Vorstellung, unendlich dupliziert zu werden, teilt Tootuff seine Bedenken mit seinen Freunden.
Zum Glück hat Hugo immer eine Lösung. Wenn nur die Besten geklont werden sollen, müssen Sie nur so unartig wie möglich sein, um nicht ausgewählt zu werden!
de.short_description: Tootuff heard that it was possible to clone sheep by selecting the very best specimens. Tootuff and his friends embark on a race to get up to as much crazy mischief as possible to avoid being cloned.

it.title: MEGAPARTY a Tootuff Adventure
it.description:
Il giorno prima dell'inizio della scuola, Tootuff ha sentito che era possibile clonare le pecore selezionando gli esemplari migliori. Terrorizzato dall'idea di essere infinitamente duplicato, Tootuff condivide le sue preoccupazioni con i suoi amici.
Fortunatamente, Hugo ha sempre una soluzione. Se solo i migliori sono destinati a essere clonati, devi solo essere il più cattivo possibile per evitare di essere scelto!
it.short_description: Tootuff heard that it was possible to clone sheep by selecting the very best specimens. Tootuff and his friends embark on a race to get up to as much crazy mischief as possible to avoid being cloned.

es.title: MEGAPARTY a Tootuff Adventure
es.description:
El día antes de que comenzaran las clases, Tootuff se enteró de que era posible clonar ovejas seleccionando los mejores ejemplares. Aterrado de ser infinitamente duplicado, Tootuff comparte sus preocupaciones con sus amigos.
Afortunadamente, Hugo siempre tiene una solución. Si solo los mejores están destinados a ser clonados, ¡solo tienes que ser lo más travieso posible para evitar ser elegido!
es.short_description: Tootuff heard that it was possible to clone sheep by selecting the very best specimens. Tootuff and his friends embark on a race to get up to as much crazy mischief as possible to avoid being cloned.

pt.title: MEGAPARTY a Tootuff Adventure
pt.description:
Um dia antes do início das aulas, Tootuff soube que era possível clonar ovelhas selecionando os melhores espécimes. Aterrorizado com a ideia de ser infinitamente duplicado, Tootuff compartilha suas preocupações com seus amigos.
Felizmente, Hugo sempre tem uma solução. Se apenas os melhores estão destinados a serem clonados, você apenas tem que ser o mais travesso possível para evitar ser escolhido!
pt.short_description: Tootuff heard that it was possible to clone sheep by selecting the very best specimens. Tootuff and his friends embark on a race to get up to as much crazy mischief as possible to avoid being cloned.

zt.title: MEGAPARTY a Tootuff Adventure
zt.description:
開學前一天，Tootuff 了解到可以通過選擇最好的標本來克隆綿羊。 由於害怕被無限複製，Tootuff 與他的朋友們分享了他的擔憂。
幸運的是，雨果總有辦法。 如果只有最好的注定要被克隆，那麼您只需盡可能頑皮，以免被選中！

sl.title: MEGAPARTY a Tootuff Adventure
sl.description:
Dan pred začetkom šole se je Tootuff naučil, da je ovce mogoče klonirati z izbiro najboljših osebkov. Prestrašen, da ga neskončno podvajajo, Tootuff svoje skrbi deli s prijatelji.
Na srečo ima Hugo vedno rešitev. Če je namenjeno kloniranju le najboljših, morate biti le čim bolj poredni, da se izognete izbiri!
sl.short_description: Tootuff heard that it was possible to clone sheep by selecting the very best specimens. Tootuff and his friends embark on a race to get up to as much crazy mischief as possible to avoid being cloned.

name: Titeuf Mega Party
copyright: © 2019 Microids SA. Published by Microids SA. Microids is a registered trademark of Microids SA. All rights reserved. Developed by Vetasoft. Balio Studio is a registered trademark of Vetasoft. All rights reserved. Titeuf par Zep - © Zep - © Éditions Glénat

fr.title: Shantae and the Seven Sirens
fr.description: Shantae revient dans une toute nouvelle aventure tropicale ! Pour sa cinquième aventure, l'héroïne demi-génie obtient des capacités de magie de fusion pour explorer une vaste cité engloutie, rencontrer de nouvelles amies demi-génies et combattre les Sept Ensorceleuses dans son aventure la plus trépidante à ce jour ! Mettant en vedette plusieurs villes et plus de labyrinthes que jamais, un voyage aquatique impressionnant plein de dangers et de découvertes vous attend!
fr.short_description: Shantae is back in an all-new tropical adventure! In her fifth outing, the Half-Genie hero gains new Fusion Magic abilities to explore a vast sunken city.

en.title: Shantae and the Seven Sirens
en.description: Shantae is back in an all-new tropical adventure! In her fifth outing, the Half-Genie hero gains new Fusion Magic abilities to explore a vast sunken city, makes new Half-Genie friends, and battles the Seven Sirens in her biggest, most thrilling quest yet!
en.short_description: Shantae is back in an all-new tropical adventure! In her fifth outing, the Half-Genie hero gains new Fusion Magic abilities to explore a vast sunken city.

de.title: Shantae and the Seven Sirens
de.description: Shantae ist zurück in einem brandneuen tropischen Abenteuer! In ihrem fünften Abenteuer erhält die Halb-Djinn-Heldin neue Fähigkeiten der Fusionsmagie, um eine riesige versunkene Stadt zu erkunden, neue Halb-Djinn-Freunde zu finden und die sieben Sirenen in ihrer bisher größten und aufregendsten Aufgabe zu bekämpfen! Mit mehreren Städten und mehr Labyrinthen als je zuvor erwartet dich eine fantastische Wasserreise voller Gefahren und Entdeckungen!
de.short_description: Shantae is back in an all-new tropical adventure! In her fifth outing, the Half-Genie hero gains new Fusion Magic abilities to explore a vast sunken city.

it.title: Shantae and the Seven Sirens
it.description: Shantae è tornata in una nuovissima avventura tropicale! Nella sua quinta uscita, l'eroe Metà-Genio acquisisce nuove abilità di Fusione Magica per esplorare una vasta città affondata, fare nuove amicizie Metà-Genio e combattere le Sette Streghe di Mare, nella sua più grande ed emozionante avventura! Con più città e più labirinti che mai, ti aspetta un fantastico viaggio acquatico pieno di pericoli e scoperte!
it.short_description: Shantae is back in an all-new tropical adventure! In her fifth outing, the Half-Genie hero gains new Fusion Magic abilities to explore a vast sunken city.

es.title: Shantae and the Seven Sirens
es.description: Shantae regresa con una nueva aventura tropical. En su quinta aventura, la heroína medio-genio usa sus habilidades mágicas de fusión para explorar una enorme ciudad sumergida. Shantae hace nuevas amigas medio-genio y lucha contra las siete ninfas en su misión más importante y emocionante hasta el momento. Te espera un increíble viaje acuático lleno de peligros, descubrimientos, varios pueblos y más laberintos que nunca.
es.short_description: Shantae is back in an all-new tropical adventure! In her fifth outing, the Half-Genie hero gains new Fusion Magic abilities to explore a vast sunken city.

pt.title: Shantae and the Seven Sirens
pt.description: Shantae está de volta em uma aventura tropical totalmente nova! Em sua quinta aventura, a heroína Meio-gênio ganha novas habilidades com a nova Magia de Fusão para explorar uma vasta cidade submersa, fazer novos amigos Meio-gênios, e luta contra as Sete Sereias em sua mais empolgante aventura! Com muitas cidades e mais labirintos do que nunca, uma incrível jornada aquática cheia de perigos e descobertas está à espera!
pt.short_description: Shantae is back in an all-new tropical adventure! In her fifth outing, the Half-Genie hero gains new Fusion Magic abilities to explore a vast sunken city.

sl.title: Shantae and the Seven Sirens
sl.description: Shantae se vrača v povsem novo tropsko pustolovščino! V svojem petem izletu junak Half-Genie pridobi nove sposobnosti Fusion Magic za raziskovanje velikega potopljenega mesta, spozna nove prijatelje Half-Genie in se v svojem največjem, najbolj vznemirljivem iskanju doslej spopade s sedmimi sirenami! Z več mesti in več labirinti kot kdaj koli prej, čaka čudovito vodno potovanje, polno nevarnosti in odkritij!
sl.short_description: Shantae is back in an all-new tropical adventure! In her fifth outing, the Half-Genie hero gains new Fusion Magic abilities to explore a vast sunken city.

zt.description: Shantae 回歸全新的熱帶冒險！ 在她的第五次郊遊中，半精靈英雄獲得了新的融合魔法能力，可以探索一個巨大的沉沒城市，結交新的半精靈朋友，並在她迄今為止最大、最激動人心的任務中與七隻海妖戰鬥！ 擁有多個城鎮和比以往更多的迷宮，一場充滿危險和發現的精彩水上之旅正等待著您！
zt.title: 桑塔與七海妖
zt.short_description: Shantae is back in an all-new tropical adventure! In her fifth outing, the Half-Genie hero gains new Fusion Magic abilities to explore a vast sunken city.

name: Shantae and the Seven Sirens
copyright: © 2020 WayForward Technologies Inc. All rights reserved. Shantae and the Shantae logo ™ BOZON.

fr.title: Shantae: Half-Genie Hero Ultimate Edition
fr.description: L'édition ultime de Shantae: Half-Genie Hero vous est proposée avec tous les DLC, modes et costumes sortis jusqu'à présent dans une collection épique !  Comprend un maillot de bain bleu exclusif pour le mode plage !
fr.short_description: The ultimate edition of Shantae: Half-Genie Hero comes with all of the previously released DLC, Modes, and Costumes in one epic collection!

en.title: Shantae: Half-Genie Hero Ultimate Edition
en.description: The ultimate edition of Shantae: Half-Genie Hero comes with all of the previously released DLC, Modes, and Costumes in one epic collection!  Includes an exclusive Blue Bathing Suit for use in Beach Mode!
en.short_description: The ultimate edition of Shantae: Half-Genie Hero comes with all of the previously released DLC, Modes, and Costumes in one epic collection!

de.title: Shantae: Half-Genie Hero Ultimate Edition
de.description: Die ultimative Ausgabe von Shantae: Half-Genie Hero enthält alle zuvor veröffentlichten DLCs, Modi und Kostüme in einer epischen Sammlung! Enthält einen exklusiven blauen Badeanzug für den Strand-Modus!
de.short_description: The ultimate edition of Shantae: Half-Genie Hero comes with all of the previously released DLC, Modes, and Costumes in one epic collection!

it.title: Shantae: Half-Genie Hero Ultimate Edition
it.description: L'ultima edizione di Shantae: Half-Genio Hero contiene tutti i DLC, le modalità e i costumi lanciati precedentemente in un' unica epica raccolta! È incluso un esclusivo Costume da Bagno Blu da utilizzare in Modalità Spiaggia!
it.short_description: The ultimate edition of Shantae: Half-Genie Hero comes with all of the previously released DLC, Modes, and Costumes in one epic collection!

es.title: Shantae: Half-Genie Hero Ultimate Edition
es.description: ¡La edición definitiva de Shantae: Half-Genie Hero llega con todos los DLC anteriormente publicados, Modos y Trajes en una colección épica! ¡Incluye un exclusivo Traje de Baño Azul para usarlo en el Modo Playa!
es.short_description: The ultimate edition of Shantae: Half-Genie Hero comes with all of the previously released DLC, Modes, and Costumes in one epic collection!

pt.title: Shantae: Half-Genie Hero Ultimate Edition
pt.description: A última edição de Shantae: Half-Genie Hero vem com todos os Conteúdos para Download, Modos e Fantasias já lançados em uma coleção épica! Inclui uma Roupa de Banho Azul exclusiva para uso no Modo Praia!
pt.short_description: The ultimate edition of Shantae: Half-Genie Hero comes with all of the previously released DLC, Modes, and Costumes in one epic collection!

sl.title: Shantae: Half-Genie Hero Ultimate Edition
sl.description:
Ta all-inclusive različica prihaja z vsemi prej izdanimi DLC, načini in kostumi!

Rešite dan kot trebušni ples pol-duh Shantae! Osvojite deželo z bleščicami kot zlobni tvegani škornji v "Pirate Queen's Quest"! Zamenjajte med Sky, Bolo in Rottytops v "Prijatelji do konca"! In končno, skočite v steno kot Ninja Shantae, namočite sonce kot Beach Shantae, služite pravičnosti kot častnik Shantae!

Vključuje tudi kostume Tinkerbat Transformation, Blue Shantae in Classic Risky!
sl.short_description: The ultimate edition of Shantae: Half-Genie Hero comes with all of the previously released DLC, Modes, and Costumes in one epic collection!

zt.description:
這個包羅萬象的版本帶有之前發布的所有 DLC、模式和服裝！

作為肚皮舞半精靈 Shantae 拯救這一天！ 在“海盜女王的任務”中以邪惡的冒險靴征服亮片土地！ 在“Friends to the End”中在 Sky、Bolo 和 Rottytops 之間切換！ 最後，作為忍者山泰跳牆，作為沙灘山泰沐浴陽光，作為山泰警官伸張正義！

還包括 Tinkerbat Transformation、Blue Shantae 和 Classic Risky 服裝！
zt.title: 桑塔: 半精靈英雄終極版
zt.short_description: The ultimate edition of Shantae: Half-Genie Hero comes with all of the previously released DLC, Modes, and Costumes in one epic collection!

name: Shantae: Half-Genie Hero Ultimate Edition
copyright: © 2018 WayForward Technologies. Shantae and the Shantae logo ™ Bozon.

fr.title: Skelattack
fr.description:
Jouez à Skelattack et sauvez l'Underworld dans ce jeu d'action-plateforme !

Vous incarnez Skully, un récent défunt, et avec Imber, votre fidèle amie chauve-souris, vous allez devoir sauter, trancher et voler à travers l'Underworld pour repousser les humains !
fr.short_description: You are Skully, member of the newly deceased and together with your best bat friend Imber, you will need to jump, slash, and flap your way though the Underworld and stop the human threat!

en.title: Skelattack
en.description:
Play Skelattack and save the Underworld in this fun action platformer!

You are Skully, member of the newly deceased and together with your best bat friend Imber, you will need to jump, slash, and flap your way though the Underworld and stop the human threat!
en.short_description: You are Skully, member of the newly deceased and together with your best bat friend Imber, you will need to jump, slash, and flap your way though the Underworld and stop the human threat!

de.title: Skelattack
de.description:
Spiele Skelattack und rette die Underworld in diesem witzigen Action-Jump-and-Run!

Du bist Skully, neulich erst verstorben, und zusammen mit deiner besten Fledermaus-Freundin Imber musst du die Underworld springend, schlitzend und flatternd vor den Menschen retten!
de.short_description: You are Skully, member of the newly deceased and together with your best bat friend Imber, you will need to jump, slash, and flap your way though the Underworld and stop the human threat!

it.title: Skelattack
it.description:
Gioca a Skelattack e salva l’Underworld in questo divertente platform d’azione!

Tu sei Skully, un neo-defunto, e con la tua migliore amica pipistrello, Imber, dovrai saltare, distruggere e svolazzare per farti strada nell’Underworld e fermare la minaccia degli umani!
it.short_description: You are Skully, member of the newly deceased and together with your best bat friend Imber, you will need to jump, slash, and flap your way though the Underworld and stop the human threat!

es.title: Skelattack
es.description:
¡Juega Skelattack y salva al Inframundo en este plataformero de acción!

¡Eres Skully, miembro de los recién muertos y junto con tu mejor amiga murciélago Imber, necesitarás saltar, atacar y blandir tu camino a través del Underworld y detener la amenaza humana!
es.short_description: You are Skully, member of the newly deceased and together with your best bat friend Imber, you will need to jump, slash, and flap your way though the Underworld and stop the human threat!

pt.title: Skelattack
pt.description:
Joga Skelattack e salva o Underworld neste divertido jogo de plataformas!

És Skully, memoro dos recém-falecidos e juntamente com Imber, a tua melhor amiga morcega, terás de saltar, cortar e esvoaçar pelo Underworld e parar a ameaça humana!
pt.short_description: You are Skully, member of the newly deceased and together with your best bat friend Imber, you will need to jump, slash, and flap your way though the Underworld and stop the human threat!

zt.title: Skelattack
zt.description:
在这个有趣的动作平台游戏中玩 Skelattack 并拯救黑社会！

您是 Skully，新死者的一员，与您最好的蝙蝠朋友 Imber 一起，您将需要在地狱中跳跃、猛击和扑腾，并阻止人类的威胁！
zt.short_description: You are Skully, member of the newly deceased and together with your best bat friend Imber, you will need to jump, slash, and flap your way though the Underworld and stop the human threat!

sl.title: Skelattack
sl.description:
Igrajte Skelattack in shranite Underworld v tej zabavni akcijski platformi!

Vi ste Skully, član na novo pokojnega in skupaj s svojim najboljšim prijateljem netopirjem Imber boste morali skočiti, sekati in zavihati pot skozi Podzemlje in ustaviti človeško grožnjo!
sl.short_description: You are Skully, member of the newly deceased and together with your best bat friend Imber, you will need to jump, slash, and flap your way though the Underworld and stop the human threat!

name: Skelattack
copyright: ©2020 Konami Digital Entertainment, Inc.

fr.title: ABRACA - Imagic Games
fr.description: Imagi est un pays où vivent des personnages de contes de fées, avec ses méchants et ses demoiselles en détresse. Devenir prince charmant est un chemin difficile ! Jusqu'à 4 joueurs prétendent tous être des princes qui doivent survivre aux défis!
fr.short_description: Up to 4 players all pretend to be princes who must survive a series of challenges!

en.title: ABRACA - Imagic Games
en.description: Imagi is a country where fairy tale characters live, with its bad guys and damsels in distress. Becoming prince charming is a treacherous path where the gloves really come off! Up to 4 players all pretend to be princes who must survive a series of challenges!
en.short_description: Up to 4 players all pretend to be princes who must survive a series of challenges!

de.title: ABRACA - Imagic Games
de.description: Imagi ist ein Land, in dem Märchenfiguren leben, mit ihren Bösewichten und Jungfrauen in Not. Prinz-Charming zu werden ist ein harter Weg! Bis zu 4 Spieler geben sich alle als Prinzen aus, die Herausforderungen überstehen müssen!
de.short_description: Up to 4 players all pretend to be princes who must survive a series of challenges!

it.title: ABRACA - Imagic Games
it.description: Imagi è un paese dove vivono personaggi fiabeschi, con i suoi cattivi e le sue damigelle in difficoltà. Diventare principe azzurro è un percorso difficile! Fino a 4 giocatori tutti fingono di essere principi che devono sopravvivere alle sfide!
it.short_description: Up to 4 players all pretend to be princes who must survive a series of challenges!

es.title: ABRACA - Imagic Games
es.description: Imagi es un país donde viven personajes de cuentos de hadas, con sus chicos malos y damiselas en apuros. Convertirse en príncipe azul es un camino difícil! Hasta 4 jugadores pretenden ser príncipes que deben sobrevivir a los desafíos!
es.short_description: Up to 4 players all pretend to be princes who must survive a series of challenges!

pt.title: ABRACA - Imagic Games
pt.description: Imagi é um país onde vivem personagens de contos de fadas, com os seus vilões e donzelas em perigo. Tornar-se príncipe encantado é um caminho difícil! Até 4 jogadores fingem ser príncipes que devem sobreviver aos desafios!
pt.short_description: Up to 4 players all pretend to be princes who must survive a series of challenges!

zt.title: ABRACA - Imagic Games
zt.description: Imagi 是一個童話人物生活的國家，壞人和女孩都處於困境中。 成為白馬王子是一條真正脫掉手套的危險之路！ 最多 4 名玩家都偽裝成王子，必須在一系列挑戰中倖存下來！
zt.short_description: Up to 4 players all pretend to be princes who must survive a series of challenges!

sl.title: ABRACA - Imagic Games
sl.description: Imagi je dežela, v kateri živijo pravljični liki, njeni slabi fantje in dekleta v stiski. Postati očarljiv princ je zahrbtna pot, na kateri se rokavice res snamejo! Do 4 igralci se pretvarjajo, da so knezi, ki morajo preživeti vrsto izzivov!
sl.short_description: Up to 4 players all pretend to be princes who must survive a series of challenges!

name: ABRACA - Imagic Games
copyright: © 2016 Ankama. All rights reserved.

fr.title: Riptide GP: Renegade
fr.description: Expérimentez les courses d’hydro-jets illicites nouvelle génération, où les pilotes blindés effectuent des cascades périlleuses par-dessus des chutes d'eau immenses, évitent les flics en passant par des voies navigables publiques et filent à toute allure sur des vagues déferlantes.
fr.short_description: Experience the future of illicit hydrojet racing, where armored riders kick out death-defying stunts over massive waterfalls and boost at breakneck speeds across surging waves.

en.title: Riptide GP: Renegade
en.description: Experience the future of illicit hydrojet racing, where armored riders kick out death-defying stunts over massive waterfalls, dodge cops through public waterways, and boost at breakneck speeds across surging waves.
en.short_description: Experience the future of illicit hydrojet racing, where armored riders kick out death-defying stunts over massive waterfalls and boost at breakneck speeds across surging waves.

de.title: Riptide GP: Renegade
de.description: Erlebe die Zukunft des illegalen Hydrojet-Racing. Gepanzerte Fahrer wagen todesmutige Stunts über enormen Wasserfällen, weichen auf den öffentlichen Wasserstraßen der Polizei aus und flitzen mit halsbrecherischer Geschwindigkeit durch die brechenden Wellen.
de.short_description: Experience the future of illicit hydrojet racing, where armored riders kick out death-defying stunts over massive waterfalls and boost at breakneck speeds across surging waves.

it.title: Riptide GP: Renegade
it.description: Vivi gare clandestine di moto d'acqua futuristiche con piloti corazzati che eseguono acrobazie pericolosissime su cascate impressionanti, schivano poliziotti lungo corsi d'acqua pubblici e corrono a tutta velocità cavalcando onde impetuose.
it.short_description: Experience the future of illicit hydrojet racing, where armored riders kick out death-defying stunts over massive waterfalls and boost at breakneck speeds across surging waves.

es.title: Riptide GP: Renegade
es.description: Experimenta el futuro de las carreras ilegales de motos acuáticas, en las que pilotos con armadura realizan acrobacias que desafían a la muerte sobre enormes cataratas, escapan de la policía a través de los canales públicos y aceleran a velocidades de vértigo por las encrespadas olas.
es.short_description: Experience the future of illicit hydrojet racing, where armored riders kick out death-defying stunts over massive waterfalls and boost at breakneck speeds across surging waves.

pt.title: Riptide GP: Renegade
pt.description: Experimente o futuro da corrida ilícita de motos aquáticas, onde pilotos em armaduras dão acrobacias que desafiam a morte sobre imensas cachoeiras, desviam-se de policiais em rotas aquáticas públicas e passam em velocidades alucinantes pelas ondas que vão surgindo.
pt.short_description: Experience the future of illicit hydrojet racing, where armored riders kick out death-defying stunts over massive waterfalls and boost at breakneck speeds across surging waves.

sl.title: Riptide GP: Renegade
sl.description: Doživite prihodnost nezakonitih vodnih dirk, kjer oklepni kolesarji izstrelijo smrt, ki je v nasprotju z masivnimi slapovi, dodge policaja po javnih plovnih poteh, in povečanje hitrosti BreakNecka po vezanih valovih.
sl.short_description: Experience the future of illicit hydrojet racing, where armored riders kick out death-defying stunts over massive waterfalls and boost at breakneck speeds across surging waves.

zt.title: 激流快艇 : 叛逆者
zt.description: 駕駛水上摩托車, 來場瘋狂的特技演出吧! 扮演裝甲騎手, 馳乘穿梭在巨大的瀑布中, 表演出危險特技, 飛越公共水道並避開警察, 在洶湧的海浪中用你最快的速度前進 !
zt.short_description: Experience the future of illicit hydrojet racing, where armored riders kick out death-defying stunts over massive waterfalls and boost at breakneck speeds across surging waves.

name: Riptide GP Renegade
copyright: Riptide GP: Renegade Copyright © 2016 Vector Unit Inc. All rights reserved. Vector Unit and Riptide GP are registered trademarks of Vector Unit Inc in the U.S. and other countries.

en.title: Escape Game Fort Boyard
en.short_description: You will need all your endurance and dexterity to escape an old fort lost in the sea by passing all its obstacles and beating the trial.
en.description:
You will need all your endurance and dexterity to escape an old fort lost in the sea by passing all its obstacles and beating the trial.
Team up with your friends or family, gather all the clues and keys to solve the final enigma.
Be careful!
If you don’t make it out on time, you will be imprisoned!

de.title: Escape Game Fort Boyard
de.short_description: You will need all your endurance and dexterity to escape an old fort lost in the sea by passing all its obstacles and beating the trial.
de.description:
Sie werden Ihre ganze Ausdauer und Geschicklichkeit benötigen, um einer alten, mitten im Meer gelegenen Festung zu entkommen. Überwinden Sie alle Hindernisse und stellen Sie sich den Herausforderungen.
Schließen Sie sich mit Ihren Freunden oder Ihrer Familie zusammen, sammeln Sie alle Hinweise und Schlüssel und lösen Sie das letzte Rätsel.

it.title: Escape Game Fort Boyard
it.short_description: You will need all your endurance and dexterity to escape an old fort lost in the sea by passing all its obstacles and beating the trial.

es.title: Escape Game Fort Boyard
es.short_description: You will need all your endurance and dexterity to escape an old fort lost in the sea by passing all its obstacles and beating the trial.
es.description:
Necesitarás toda tu resistencia y destreza para escapar de un antiguo fuerte perdido en el mar pasando todos sus obstáculos y superando la prueba.
Forma equipo con tus amigos o familiares, reúne todas las pistas y claves para resolver el enigma final.
¡Ten cuidado!
¡Si no llega a tiempo, será encarcelado!

pt.title: Escape Game Fort Boyard
pt.short_description: You will need all your endurance and dexterity to escape an old fort lost in the sea by passing all its obstacles and beating the trial.
pt.description:
Dovrai fare leva su tutta la tua destrezza e resistenza per evadere dal vecchio forte sperduto nell'oceano.
Forma un team con amici o familiari e raccogli tutti gli indizi e le chiavi per risolvere l'enigma finale.

zt.title: Escape Game Fort Boyard
zt.short_description: You will need all your endurance and dexterity to escape an old fort lost in the sea by passing all its obstacles and beating the trial.
zt.description:
你將需要你所有的耐力和靈巧，通過克服所有障礙並擊敗考驗，才能逃離沉沒在海中的古老堡壘。
與您的朋友或家人組隊，收集所有線索和鑰匙以解開最終謎團。
當心！
不按時出獄，會被關押！

sl.title: Escape Game Fort Boyard
sl.short_description: You will need all your endurance and dexterity to escape an old fort lost in the sea by passing all its obstacles and beating the trial.
sl.description:
Potrebovali boste vso vzdržljivost in spretnost, da se boste izognili stari trdnjavi, izgubljeni v morju, tako da boste premostili vse njene ovire in premagali sojenje.
Povežite se s prijatelji ali družino, zberite vse namige in ključe, da rešite zadnjo enigmo.
Bodi previden!
Če tega ne storite pravočasno, boste zaprti!

fr.title: Fort Boyard - Nouvelle Edition
fr.short_description: You will need all your endurance and dexterity to escape an old fort lost in the sea by passing all its obstacles and beating the trial.
fr.description:
Vous aurez besoin de toute votre dextérité et votre concentration pour triompher des 26 épreuves qui se présentent à vous.
Partez seul à l’aventure, ou faites équipe avec votre famille ou vos amis pour collecter toutes les clés, résoudre l’énigme finale et collecter des Boyards !

name: Escape Game Fort Boyard
copyright: ©2020 ADVENTURE LINE PRODUCTIONS / ©2020 Microids SA. All rights reserved. Published by Microids SA. All rights reserved. Developed by Appeal.

fr.title: Fight of Gods
fr.description: Vos prières ont été exaucées ! Pour la toute première fois, des dieux, des esprits saints et des personnages mythologiques du monde entier et à travers l'histoire s'affronteront dans un combat 2D explosif où le monde entier est en jeu!
fr.short_description: For the first time ever, gods, holy spirits and mythological characters from around the globe and throughout history will clash in an explosive 2D fighter where the entire world is at stake!

en.title: Fight of Gods
en.description: Your prayers have been answered! For the first time ever, gods, holy spirits and mythological characters from around the globe and throughout history will clash in an explosive 2D fighter where the entire world is at stake!
en.short_description: For the first time ever, gods, holy spirits and mythological characters from around the globe and throughout history will clash in an explosive 2D fighter where the entire world is at stake!

de.title: Fight of Gods
de.description: *Ihre Gebete wurden erhört! Zum ersten Mal treffen Götter, heilige Geister und mythologische Charaktere aus der ganzen Welt und aus der ganzen Geschichte in einem explosiven 2D-Kämpfer aufeinander, bei dem die ganze Welt auf dem Spiel steht!
de.short_description: For the first time ever, gods, holy spirits and mythological characters from around the globe and throughout history will clash in an explosive 2D fighter where the entire world is at stake!

it.title: Fight of Gods
it.description: *Le tue preghiere sono state esaudite! Per la prima volta in assoluto, divinità, spiriti santi e personaggi mitologici di tutto il mondo e nel corso della storia si scontreranno in un esplosivo combattente 2D in cui è in gioco il mondo intero!
it.short_description: For the first time ever, gods, holy spirits and mythological characters from around the globe and throughout history will clash in an explosive 2D fighter where the entire world is at stake!

es.title: Fight of Gods
es.description: *¡Tus oraciones han sido escuchadas! ¡Por primera vez, dioses, espíritus santos y personajes mitológicos de todo el mundo y a lo largo de la historia se enfrentarán en un explosivo luchador en 2D en el que el mundo entero está en juego!
es.short_description: For the first time ever, gods, holy spirits and mythological characters from around the globe and throughout history will clash in an explosive 2D fighter where the entire world is at stake!

pt.title: Fight of Gods
pt.description: *Suas orações foram respondidas! Pela primeira vez, deuses, espíritos sagrados e personagens mitológicos de todo o mundo e ao longo da história entrarão em conflito em um lutador 2D explosivo onde o mundo inteiro está em jogo!
pt.short_description: For the first time ever, gods, holy spirits and mythological characters from around the globe and throughout history will clash in an explosive 2D fighter where the entire world is at stake!

sl.title: Fight of Gods
sl.description: Vaše molitve so uslišane! Prvič se bodo bogovi, sveti duhovi in mitološki liki z vsega sveta in skozi zgodovino spopadli v eksplozivnem 2D borcu, kjer je na kocki ves svet!
sl.short_description: For the first time ever, gods, holy spirits and mythological characters from around the globe and throughout history will clash in an explosive 2D fighter where the entire world is at stake!

zt.description: 你的祈禱得到了回應！ 有史以來第一次，來自世界各地和歷史上的諸神、聖靈和神話人物將在一場危及整個世界的爆炸性 2D 戰鬥機中發生衝突！
zt.title: 眾神之鬥
zt.short_description: For the first time ever, gods, holy spirits and mythological characters from around the globe and throughout history will clash in an explosive 2D fighter where the entire world is at stake!

name: Fight of Gods (uncensored)
copyright: Copyright © Digital Crafter. All rights reserved. Published by Digital Crafter.

fr.title: Fight of Animals: Arena
fr.description: Les animaux meme frappent encore !! Que la bataille des memes passe au NEXT LEVEL !! Avec des étapes variées, des objets et un support jusqu'à 4 joueurs, "Fight of Animals: Arena" vous apportera une toute nouvelle expérience de bagarreur !! Que le combat commence !!

en.title: Fight of Animals: Arena
en.description: Meme animals strike again!! Let the meme battle goes into NEXT LEVEL!! With varied stages, items and support up to 4 players, “Fight of Animals: Arena” will bring you a brand new Brawler experience!! Let the fight begin!!

de.title: Fight of Animals: Arena
de.description: *Meme Tiere schlagen wieder zu!! Lass die Meme-Schlacht ins NÄCHSTE LEVEL gehen!! Mit abwechslungsreichen Bühnen, Gegenständen und Unterstützung für bis zu 4 Spieler bietet dir „Fight of Animals: Arena“ ein brandneues Brawler-Erlebnis!! Lass den Kampf beginnen!!

it.title: Fight of Animals: Arena
it.description: *Gli animali meme colpiscono ancora!! Lascia che la battaglia dei meme entri nel LIVELLO SUCCESSIVO!! Con vari livelli, oggetti e supporto fino a 4 giocatori, "Fight of Animals: Arena" ti offrirà una nuovissima esperienza Brawler!! Che la lotta abbia inizio!!

es.title: Fight of Animals: Arena
es.description: Meme animales atacan de nuevo !! ¡¡Deja que la batalla de memes pase al SIGUIENTE NIVEL !! ¡Con diferentes escenarios, elementos y soporte para hasta 4 jugadores, "Fight of Animals: Arena" te traerá una nueva experiencia de Brawler! ¡Que comience la pelea!

pt.title: Fight of Animals: Arena
pt.description: *Animais meme atacam novamente !! Deixe a batalha dos memes entrar no PRÓXIMO NÍVEL !! Com estágios variados, itens e suporte para até 4 jogadores, “Fight of Animals: Arena” trará a você uma nova experiência Brawler !! Deixe a luta começar !!

sl.title: Fight of Animals: Arena
sl.description: Meme živali spet udarijo !! Naj bo bitka z memi prešla na naslednjo stopnjo !! Z različnimi fazami, predmeti in podporo do 4 igralcem vam bo “Fight of Animals: Arena” prinesel povsem novo izkušnjo Brawlerja !! Naj se boj začne !!

zt.description: 迷因動物們再度出擊！戰鬥的激情再度昇華《動物之鬪:競技場》是一款支援四人連線的大亂鬥作品，本作品再次集結了《動物之鬪》所有角色，扮演ㄎ一ㄤ爆了的動物們，在不同的舞台中再次決鬥吧 !
zt.title: 動物之鬪 : 競技場

name: Fight of Animals Arena
copyright: Copyright © Digital Crafter. All rights reserved. Published by Digital Crafter.

fr.title: Flashback
fr.description: 2142. Après s’être enfuit d’un vaisseau spatial, le jeune scientifique Conrad B. Hart, se réveille amnésique sur Titan, un satellite colonisé de la planète Saturne. Ses ennemis et kidnappeurs sont à ses trousses. Il devra trouver son chemin pour rentrer sur Terre, se défendre face aux dangers et démanteler un gigantesque complot extraterrestre qui menace la planète…

en.title: Flashback
en.short_description: The young scientist Conrad B. Hart awakens on Titan, a colonised moon of the planet Saturn. His enemies and kidnappers are snapping at his heels. He must find a way back to Earth.
en.description: 2142. After fleeing from a space ship but stripped of all memory, the young scientist Conrad B. Hart awakens on Titan, a colonised moon of the planet Saturn. His enemies and kidnappers are snapping at his heels. He must find a way back to Earth, defending himself against the dangers he encounters and unravelling an insidious extra-terrestrial plot that threatens the planet…

de.title: Flashback
de.description: 2142. Nach seiner Flucht von einem Raumschiff erwacht der junge Wissenschaftler Conrad B. Hart ohne jegliche Erinnerung auf dem Titan, einem kolonialisierten Mond des Planeten Saturn. Seine Feinde und Entführer sind ihm hart auf den Fersen; er muss einen Weg zurück auf die Erde finden, während er sich gegen die Gefahren verteidigt, die ihm begegnen, und muss eine heimtückische außerirdische Verschwörung aufdecken, die den Planeten bedroht ...

it.title: Flashback
it.description: 2142. Dopo essere fuggito da un'astronave, il giovane scienziato Conrad B. Hart si risveglia, privo di memoria, su Titano, una luna colonizzata del pianeta Saturno, con i suoi nemici e sequestratori alle calcagna. Deve trovare il modo di tornare sulla Terra, difendendosi dai pericoli che incontra e sventando un subdolo piano extraterrestre che minaccia il pianeta...

es.title: Flashback
es.description: 2142. Tras escapar de la nave espacial, el joven científico Conrad B. Hart, se despierta con amnesia en Titán, un satélite colonizado del planeta Saturno, con sus enemigos y secuestradores pisándole los talones. Deberá encontrar un modo de regresar a la Tierra, defenderse de los peligros que encuentre por el camino y desmantelar una gigantesca trama alienígena que amenaza al planeta...

pt.title: Flashback
pt.description: 2142. Após fugir de uma nave espacial mas desprovido de qualquer memória, o jovem cientista Conrad B. Hart acorda em Titã, uma lua colonizada de Saturno. Os seus inimigos e sequestradores estão no seu encalço. Ele tem de encontrar uma forma de regressar à Terra,  defendendo-se dos perigos que encontra pelo caminho e desmascarando uma pérfida conspiração extraterrestre que ameaça o planeta…

zt.title: Flashback
zt.description: 2142. 年輕的科學家康拉德 B. 哈特在逃離太空飛船但被剝奪了所有記憶後，在土星的殖民衛星泰坦上醒來。 他的敵人和綁架者正在緊跟其後。 他必須找到一條回到地球的路，保護自己免受他遇到的危險，並解開威脅地球的陰險的外星陰謀……

sl.title: Flashback
sl.description: 2142. Po begu z vesoljske ladje, vendar brez vsakršnega spomina, se mladi znanstvenik Conrad B. Hart prebudi na Titanu, kolonizirani luni planeta Saturn. Njegovi sovražniki in ugrabitelji mu trgajo za petami. Mora najti pot nazaj na Zemljo, se braniti pred nevarnostmi, s katerimi se srečuje, in razkriti zahrbtno zunajzemeljsko zavezo, ki ogroža planet ...

name: Flashback 25th Anniversary Edition (EFIGS)

fr.title: Les Sisters - Show Devant!
fr.description: Embarquez avec Marine, Wendy et tous leurs amis dans leur nouvelle aventure en jeu vidéo ! Défiez-vous dans des mini-jeux délirants et explorez toute la ville des Sisters !

en.title: The Sisters - Party of the Year
en.short_description: Join Maureen, Wendy and all their friends in this new video game adventure! Challenge your friends in crazy mini-games and explore the Sisters' city.
en.description: Join Maureen, Wendy and all their friends in this new video game adventure! Challenge your friends in crazy mini-games and explore the Sisters' city.

de.title: The Sisters - Party of the Year
de.description: Begeben Sie sich mit Marine, Wendy und all ihren Freunden auf ein ganz neues Abenteuer im Videospiel-Format! Treten Sie in irrwitzigen Minispielen gegeneinander an und erkunden Sie die Stadt der Schwestern!

it.title: The Sisters - Party of the Year
it.description: Embarquez avec Marine, Wendy et tous leurs amis dans leur nouvelle aventure en jeu vidéo ! Défiez-vous dans des mini-jeux délirants et explorez toute la ville des Sisters ! 	Join Maureen, Wendy and all their friends in this new video game adventure! Challenge your friends in crazy mini-games and explore the Sisters' city. 	Begeben Sie sich mit Marine, Wendy und all ihren Freunden auf ein ganz neues Abenteuer im Videospiel-Format! Treten Sie in irrwitzigen Minispielen gegeneinander an und erkunden Sie die Stadt der Schwestern!	Parti con Marina, Wendy e tutti i loro amici in una nuova avventura in formato videogioco! Sfida i tuoi amici in tanti minigiochi uno più pazzo dell’altro e esplora tutta la città delle Sisters!

es.title: The Sisters - Party of the Year
es.description: ¡Acompaña a Marina, Wendy y todos sus amigos en esta nueva aventura en videojuego! ¡Enfréntate a minijuegos delirantes y recorre toda la ciudad de las Sisters!

pt.title: The Sisters - Party of the Year
pt.description: Embarca com a Marina, a Wendy e todos os seus amigos numa nova aventura em jogo de vídeo! Desafia os teus amigos em mini jogos delirantes e explora toda a cidade das Sisters!

zt.title: The Sisters - Party of the Year
zt.description: 與莫琳、溫蒂和她們的好友一同在這個全新的電子遊戲中冒險！通過一個個瘋狂的迷你遊戲挑戰您的好友，探索Sisters的城市。

sl.title: The Sisters - Party of the Year
sl.description: Pridružite se Maureen, Wendy in vsem njihovim prijateljem v tej novi pustolovščini video iger! Izzivajte svoje prijatelje v norih mini igrah in raziščite mesto sester.
