fr.title: Professor Rubik's Brain Fitness
fr.description: Ce cher Rubik est de retour dans un nouveau format! Remettez votre cerveau en forme avec le professeur Rubik dans un nouveau programme d'entraînement cerébral. Il vous mettra au défi quotidiennement avec des mini-jeux rapides et amusants pour découvrir de quoi votre cerveau est capable!
fr.short_description: Good old Rubik’s is back in a brand new shape! With professor Rubik’s, get your brain back on track in a new brain fitness game.

en.title: Professor Rubik's Brain Fitness
en.description: Good old Rubik’s is back in a brand new shape! With professor Rubik’s, get your brain back on track in a new brain fitness game. He is ready to test you with fast and playful mini-games daily and see how much brain power you have!
en.short_description: Good old Rubik’s is back in a brand new shape! With professor Rubik’s, get your brain back on track in a new brain fitness game.

de.title: Professor Rubik's Brain Fitness
de.short_description: Good old Rubik’s is back in a brand new shape! With professor Rubik’s, get your brain back on track in a new brain fitness game.

it.title: Professor Rubik's Brain Fitness
it.description: Il caro, vecchio Rubik è tornato, con una nuova forma! Il Professor Rubik è pronto ad allenare il tuo cervello: metterà alla prova la tua intelligenza con rapidi e divertenti minigiochi giornalieri!
it.short_description: Good old Rubik’s is back in a brand new shape! With professor Rubik’s, get your brain back on track in a new brain fitness game.

es.title: Professor Rubik's Brain Fitness
es.description: ¡Volvió el clásico Rubik en un nuevo formato! Pon a trabajar el ingenio con el profesor Rubik en un nuevo juego de aptitud mental. ¡Te retará con minijuegos diarios rápidos y divertidos para comprobar tu capacidad intelectual!
es.short_description: Good old Rubik’s is back in a brand new shape! With professor Rubik’s, get your brain back on track in a new brain fitness game.

pt.title: Professor Rubik's Brain Fitness
pt.description: O velho Rubik está de volta e melhor do que nunca! Volta a exercitar a mente com um novo jogo de exercício da mente do Professor Rubik. Está pronto a desafiar-te com minijogos rápidos e lúdicos. Vê o nível de poder da tua mente!
pt.short_description: Good old Rubik’s is back in a brand new shape! With professor Rubik’s, get your brain back on track in a new brain fitness game.

zt.title: Professor Rubik's Brain Fitness
zt.description: 好玩的老版鲁比克魔方以全新的面貌回来啦！和鲁比克教授一起，让你的大脑通过新的大脑锻炼游戏重回正轨。他已经准备好快速又好玩的每日小游戏来测试你，看看你的脑力水平究竟如何！
zt.short_description: Good old Rubik’s is back in a brand new shape! With professor Rubik’s, get your brain back on track in a new brain fitness game.

sl.title: Professor Rubik's Brain Fitness
sl.description: Dobri stari Rubikovi so se vrnili v popolnoma novi obliki! S profesorjem Rubikom pripeljite svoje možgane nazaj v novo igro za fitnes možganov. Pripravljen vas je vsak dan preizkusiti s hitrimi in ludičnimi mini igrami in preveriti, koliko moči imate!
sl.short_description: Good old Rubik’s is back in a brand new shape! With professor Rubik’s, get your brain back on track in a new brain fitness game.

fr.title: Silence
fr.description: Saurez-vous sauver Silence, le monde fabuleux situé entre la vie et la mort ? Aidez Noah à retrouver sa petite sœur Renie dans ces terres en péril. Saurez-vous éviter les pièges et la ramener chez elle ? Explorez Silence et accompagnez ces deux enfants dans un voyage riche en péripéties.
fr.short_description: Can you save Silence, the grim, but also serene world between life and death? Can you help Noah find his little sister Renie in this suffering world? Can you bring her home?

en.title: Silence
en.description: Can you save Silence, the grim, but also serene world between life and death? Can you help Noah find his little sister Renie in this suffering world? Can you bring her home? Explore Silence and join the siblings on their adventurous journey.
en.short_description: Can you save Silence, the grim, but also serene world between life and death? Can you help Noah find his little sister Renie in this suffering world? Can you bring her home?

de.title: Silence
de.description: Kannst du Silence retten, die ebenso düstere wie malerische Welt zwischen Leben und Tod? Kannst du Noah helfen, seine kleine Schwester Renie in der von Not geplagten Welt zu finden und sie heil nach Hause zu bringen? Entdecke Silence und begleite die Geschwister auf ihrer abenteuerlichen Reise.
de.short_description: Can you save Silence, the grim, but also serene world between life and death? Can you help Noah find his little sister Renie in this suffering world? Can you bring her home?

it.title: Silence
it.description: Sarai in grado di salvare Silence, il sinistro ma sereno mondo che si trova tra la vita e la morte? Saprai aiutare Noah a trovare la sua sorellina Renie in questo mondo sofferente? Riuscirai a riportarla a casa? Esplora Silence e unisciti ai due fratelli in questo fantastica avventura!
it.short_description: Can you save Silence, the grim, but also serene world between life and death? Can you help Noah find his little sister Renie in this suffering world? Can you bring her home?

es.title: Silence
es.description: ¿Te atreves a salvar Silencio, un mundo que vive entre la armonía y la oscuridad, entre la vida y la muerte ? ¿Quieres ayudar a Noah a encontrar a su hermana Renie en este lugar tan sombrío y llevarla de vuelta a casa? Explora el mundo de Silencio y únete a los hermanos en un viaje lleno de aventuras.
es.short_description: Can you save Silence, the grim, but also serene world between life and death? Can you help Noah find his little sister Renie in this suffering world? Can you bring her home?

pt.title: Silence
pt.description: Você pode salvar o Silêncio, o mundo sombrio, mas também sereno entre a vida e a morte? Você pode ajudar Noah a encontrar sua irmãzinha Renie neste mundo de sofrimento? Você pode trazê-la para casa? Explore Silence e junte-se aos irmãos em sua jornada de aventuras.
pt.short_description: Can you save Silence, the grim, but also serene world between life and death? Can you help Noah find his little sister Renie in this suffering world? Can you bring her home?

sl.title: Silence
sl.description: Ali lahko rešite Tišino, mračni, a tudi vedri svet med življenjem in smrtjo? Ali lahko Noahu pomagate najti svojo mlajšo sestro Renie v tem trpečem svetu? Ji jo lahko pripeljete domov? Raziščite Silence in se pridružite bratom in sestram na njihovem pustolovskem potovanju.
sl.short_description: Can you save Silence, the grim, but also serene world between life and death? Can you help Noah find his little sister Renie in this suffering world? Can you bring her home?

zt.description:
您能拯救這個冷酷沉寂的生死世界嗎？
您能幫助諾亞在這個苦難的世界裡找到他的妹妹蕾妮並帶她回家嗎？
探索風語世界 : 沉寂, 加入這對兄妹的冒險之旅!
zt.title: 風語世界 : 沉寂
zt.short_description: Can you save Silence, the grim, but also serene world between life and death? Can you help Noah find his little sister Renie in this suffering world? Can you bring her home?

fr.title: Steel Rats
fr.description: Enfourchez votre moto pour tout démolir dans cette révolution du genre action arcade en 2,5D. Des combats à moto aussi destructifs qu'explosifs et des cascades à couper le souffle font partie du gameplay se déroulant dans un monde rétro-futuriste. Alternez entre 4 personnages aux capacités uniques, et éclatez tout sur votre passage à travers niveaux regorgeant de Ferrailleurs impitoyables!
fr.short_description: Wreck and ride in a visceral and ground-breaking evolution of the 2.5D action arcade genre, fusing destructive, octane-fueled, motorbike combat and death-defying stunt gameplay.

en.title: Steel Rats
en.description: Wreck and ride in a visceral and ground-breaking evolution of the 2.5D action arcade genre, fusing destructive, octane-fueled, motorbike combat and death-defying stunt gameplay, set in a visually stylized retro future world. Switch between 4 characters, each with unique abilities, as you wreak havoc fighting deadly Junkbots!
en.short_description: Wreck and ride in a visceral and ground-breaking evolution of the 2.5D action arcade genre, fusing destructive, octane-fueled, motorbike combat and death-defying stunt gameplay.

de.title: Steel Rats
de.description: Fahre deine Gegner in dieser nervenaufreibenden und bahnbrechenden Weiterentwicklung des 2,5D-Action-Arcade-Titels zu Klump! Du erlebst destruktive und oktangetriebene Motorradkämpfe sowie todesverachtende Stunts in einer grafisch ansprechenden Retro-Zukunftswelt. Wechsele zwischen 4 Charakteren mit individuellen Fähigkeiten und mach diese tödlichen Schrottboter richtig fertig!
de.short_description: Wreck and ride in a visceral and ground-breaking evolution of the 2.5D action arcade genre, fusing destructive, octane-fueled, motorbike combat and death-defying stunt gameplay.

it.title: Steel Rats
it.description: Salta sulla tua moto e scorrazza per le innovative ambientazioni di questo gioco d'azione arcade in 2.5D. Una perfetta fusione tra potenza distruttiva, combattimenti ad alto numero di ottani e acrobazie, il tutto all'interno di un mondo retrofuturistico. Scegli tra 4 personaggi diversi, ciascuno con abilità uniche e combatti contro i letali Ammassi di ferraglia!
it.short_description: Wreck and ride in a visceral and ground-breaking evolution of the 2.5D action arcade genre, fusing destructive, octane-fueled, motorbike combat and death-defying stunt gameplay.

es.title: Steel Rats
es.description: Monta a toda velocidad y acaba con todo en este visceral e innovador juego que rompe los moldes del género arcade de acción en 2,5 D. Destructivos combates en moto de alto octanaje con acrobacias letales ambientados en un elegante mundo futurista con tintes retro. Cambia entre 4 personajes con habilidades exclusivas mientras siembras el caos en tu lucha contra los chatarreros.
es.short_description: Wreck and ride in a visceral and ground-breaking evolution of the 2.5D action arcade genre, fusing destructive, octane-fueled, motorbike combat and death-defying stunt gameplay.

pt.title: Steel Rats
pt.description: Destrói e conduz numa evolução visceral e inovadora do jogo de ação em 2.5D, misturando o combate destruidor e acelerado em motas com gameplay de acrobacias mortíferas, decorrendo num mundo retro e visualmente estilizado. Alterna entre 4 personagens, cada uma com capacidades únicas, semeando o caos e lutando contra os mortíferos Junkbots!
pt.short_description: Wreck and ride in a visceral and ground-breaking evolution of the 2.5D action arcade genre, fusing destructive, octane-fueled, motorbike combat and death-defying stunt gameplay.

sl.title: Steel Rats
sl.description: Razbitine in vožnja v visceralnem in revolucionarnem razvoju 2.5D akcijskega arkadnega žanra, ki združuje uničujoč, oktanski pogon, boj z motorji in kaskaderstvo, ki kljubuje smrti, v vizualno stiliziranem retro prihodnjem svetu. Preklapljajte med štirimi liki, od katerih ima vsak edinstvene sposobnosti, ko se borite proti smrtonosnim Junkbotom!
sl.short_description: Wreck and ride in a visceral and ground-breaking evolution of the 2.5D action arcade genre, fusing destructive, octane-fueled, motorbike combat and death-defying stunt gameplay.

zt.description: Steel Rats 鋼鐵鼠 是一款飆車炫技，馳騁破壞的開創性2.5D視角動作街機類遊戲，設定在復古風的未來世界中，融合了毀滅性、辛烷加速、摩托戰鬥、玩命特技的獨特遊戲玩法。跟隨四位各具特色的角色，一起縱橫肆虐吧！
zt.title: 鋼鐵鼠
zt.short_description: Wreck and ride in a visceral and ground-breaking evolution of the 2.5D action arcade genre, fusing destructive, octane-fueled, motorbike combat and death-defying stunt gameplay.

en.title: The Bluecoats: North & South
en.description: Reunite with Sergeant Cornelius M. Chesterfield and Corporal Blutch in this remastered game that combines turn-based strategy and real-time action. Initially released on the Amiga at the end of the 1980s, this version will delight fans of the original game!
en.short_description: Reunite with Sergeant Cornelius M. Chesterfield and Corporal Blutch in this remastered game that combines turn-based strategy and real-time action.

de.title: The Bluecoats: North & South
de.description: Freuen Sie sich auf ein Wiedersehen mit Sergent Cornélius M. Chesterfield und Korporal Blutch in der überarbeiteten Fassung dieses rundenbasierten und actiongeladenen Echtzeitstrategiespiels. Das Spiel wurde Ende der 80er Jahre zuerst für den Amiga entwickelt und diese Neuinterpretation wird den Fans von damals einen Riesenspaß bereiten!
de.short_description: Reunite with Sergeant Cornelius M. Chesterfield and Corporal Blutch in this remastered game that combines turn-based strategy and real-time action.

it.title: The Bluecoats: North & South
it.description: Riscopri il sergente Cornelius M. Chesterfield e il caporale Blutch in questa versione rimasterizzata di un gioco, inizialmente uscito per Amiga alla fine degli anni ’80, che mescola strategia, gioco a turni e azione in tempo reale e farà la gioia dei suoi fan della prima ora!
it.short_description: Reunite with Sergeant Cornelius M. Chesterfield and Corporal Blutch in this remastered game that combines turn-based strategy and real-time action.

es.title: The Bluecoats: North & South
es.description: Acompaña al sargento Cornelius M. Chesterfield y al cabo Blutch en esta remasterización, que combina la estrategia por turnos con la acción en tiempo real. La remasterización de este videojuego, inicialmente publicado para Amiga a finales de los ochenta, hará las delicias de los aficionados de toda la vida.
es.short_description: Reunite with Sergeant Cornelius M. Chesterfield and Corporal Blutch in this remastered game that combines turn-based strategy and real-time action.

pt.title: The Bluecoats: North & South
pt.description: Encontra o sargento Cornélius M. Chesterfield e o cabo Blutch neste remaster que mistura estratégia por turnos e ação em tempo real. Inicialmente lançado para a consola Amiga em finais dos anos 1980, este remaster vai encantar os fãs no primeiro minuto!
pt.short_description: Reunite with Sergeant Cornelius M. Chesterfield and Corporal Blutch in this remastered game that combines turn-based strategy and real-time action.

zt.title: The Bluecoats: North & South
zt.short_description: Reunite with Sergeant Cornelius M. Chesterfield and Corporal Blutch in this remastered game that combines turn-based strategy and real-time action.

sl.title: The Bluecoats: North & South
sl.description: Ponovno se združite s narednikom Corneliusom M. Chesterfieldom in desetnikom Blutchom v tej prenovljeni igri, ki združuje strategijo po vrsti in akcijo v realnem času. Sprva izdana na Amigi konec osemdesetih let, bo ta različica navdušila ljubitelje izvirne igre!
sl.short_description: Reunite with Sergeant Cornelius M. Chesterfield and Corporal Blutch in this remastered game that combines turn-based strategy and real-time action.

fr.title: Les Tuniques Bleues: Nord & Sud
fr.description: Retrouvez le sergent Cornélius M. Chesterfield et le caporal Blutch dans ce remaster mélangeant stratégie, tour par tour et action en temps réel. Initialement sorti sur Amiga à la fin des années 1980, ce remaster ravira les fans de la 1ère heure!
fr.short_description: Reunite with Sergeant Cornelius M. Chesterfield and Corporal Blutch in this remastered game that combines turn-based strategy and real-time action.

fr.title: Beach Buggy Racing 2
fr.description: Opposez vos talents de pilote de kart à ceux de différents rivaux tandis que vous explorez une île mystérieuse pleine d’anciens temps, de châteaux infestés de dragons et de stands de glaces post-apocalyptiques. Débloquez et améliorez des buggies lunaires, des monster trucks et plus encore. Obtenez et maîtrisez plus de quarante power-ups dans une course épique pour le trophée ultime.
fr.short_description: Match your kart racing skills against a rag-tag crew of rivals as you explore a mysterious island packed with ancient temples, dragon-infested castles, and post apocalyptic ice cream stands.

en.title: Beach Buggy Racing 2
en.description: Match your kart racing skills against a rag-tag crew of rivals as you explore a mysterious island packed with ancient temples, dragon-infested castles, and post apocalyptic ice cream stands. Unlock and upgrade moon buggies, monster trucks and more. Collect and master over forty unique powerups in an epic race for the ultimate trophy.
en.short_description: Match your kart racing skills against a rag-tag crew of rivals as you explore a mysterious island packed with ancient temples, dragon-infested castles, and post apocalyptic ice cream stands.

de.title: Beach Buggy Racing 2
de.description: Tritt mit deinen Kart-Fähigkeiten gegen eine bunte Truppe von Gegnern an, während du eine geheimnisvolle Insel mit uralten Tempeln, drachenverseuchten Burgen und postapokalyptischen Eisdielen erkundest. Schalte Mondautos, Monstertrucks und mehr frei und verbessere sie. Sammle über vierzig einzigartige Powerups in einem epischen Rennen um die ultimative Trophäe.
de.short_description: Match your kart racing skills against a rag-tag crew of rivals as you explore a mysterious island packed with ancient temples, dragon-infested castles, and post apocalyptic ice cream stands.

it.title: Beach Buggy Racing 2
it.description: Metti alla prova le tue capacità alla guida contro una masnada di nemici ed esplora un'isola misteriosa piena di antichi templi, castelli infestati da draghi e chioschi di gelati post apocalittici. Sblocca e potenzia buggy lunari, monster truck e altro ancora. Raccogli e impara a usare oltre quaranta potenziamenti unici in una gara epica per il trofeo definitivo.
it.short_description: Match your kart racing skills against a rag-tag crew of rivals as you explore a mysterious island packed with ancient temples, dragon-infested castles, and post apocalyptic ice cream stands.

es.title: Beach Buggy Racing 2
es.description: Enfrenta tus habilidades de carreras de karts contra un equipo de oponentes variados mientras exploras una isla misteriosa con templos antiguos, castillos plagados de dragones y puestos de helados postapocalípticos. Desbloquea y mejora buguis lunares, monster trucks y más. Colecciona y domina más de cuarenta powerups únicos en una carrera épica por el trofeo máximo.
es.short_description: Match your kart racing skills against a rag-tag crew of rivals as you explore a mysterious island packed with ancient temples, dragon-infested castles, and post apocalyptic ice cream stands.

pt.title: Beach Buggy Racing 2
pt.description: Testa as tuas capacidades de corrida de kart contra uma equipa de rivais desastrados enquanto exploras uma ilha misteriosa repleta de templos ancestrais, castelos infestados de dragões e barracas de gelados pós-apocalípticas. Desbloqueia e aperfeiçoa buggies lunares, monster trucks e muito mais. Coleciona e torna-te mestre de quarenta reforços exclusivas numa corrida épica rumo ao grande troféu.
pt.short_description: Match your kart racing skills against a rag-tag crew of rivals as you explore a mysterious island packed with ancient temples, dragon-infested castles, and post apocalyptic ice cream stands.

zt.title: Beach Buggy Racing 2
zt.description: 將您的卡丁車賽車技能與Rag-tag乘坐競爭對手的賽車隊相匹配，因為您探索著古老的寺廟，龍侵染城堡和後期冰淇淋架的神秘島嶼。 解鎖和升級月球短管，怪物卡車等等。 在最終獎杯中收集和掌握四十個獨特的電力。
zt.short_description: Match your kart racing skills against a rag-tag crew of rivals as you explore a mysterious island packed with ancient temples, dragon-infested castles, and post apocalyptic ice cream stands.

sl.title: Beach Buggy Racing 2
sl.description: Ujemite svoje kart Racing Skills proti Con-tagskemu osebju tekmecev, ko raziskujete skrivnostni otok, pakirano s starimi templji, zloženimi gradovi in post apokaliptični sladoled stojala. Odklepanje in nadgradnja luna Buggies, Monster Tovornjaki in drugo. Zbirajte in obvladati več kot štirideset edinstvenih powerups v epski dirki za končni trofejo.
sl.short_description: Match your kart racing skills against a rag-tag crew of rivals as you explore a mysterious island packed with ancient temples, dragon-infested castles, and post apocalyptic ice cream stands.

fr.title: Koh-Lanta: Les Aventuriers
fr.description: Koh-Lanta est un jeu qui mettra la dextérité, la diplomatie et les nerfs du joueur à rude épreuve : la vie sur une île n’est pas une partie de plaisir, et chaque jour apportera son lot de surprises…Gérez bien votre quotidien, les épreuves en équipe ou en solo, mais surtout vos relations avec les autres insulaires pour poursuivre l’aventure jusqu’au bout et être le dernier aventurier de l’île !
fr.short_description: Koh-Lanta is a challenging game which will put the players skills under pressure: life on an island is not a walk in the park, and each day will bring its amount of surprises.

en.description:
Koh-Lanta is a challenging game which will put the players skills under pressure: life on an island is not a walk in the park, and each day will bring its amount of surprises.

Manage your daily life on the camp, have success in solo and team trials… and keep up the good relationships with the other survivors until the end to be the last one standing!
en.title: Koh-Lanta
en.short_description: Koh-Lanta is a challenging game which will put the players skills under pressure: life on an island is not a walk in the park, and each day will bring its amount of surprises.

de.description:
Koh-Lanta ist ein herausforderndes Spiel, das die Fähigkeiten der Spieler unter Druck setzt: Das Leben auf einer Insel ist kein Spaziergang im Park und jeder Tag bringt viele Überraschungen mit sich.

Manage dein tägliches Leben im Camp, sei erfolgreich in Solo- und Team-Trials… und pflege die guten Beziehungen zu den anderen Überlebenden bis zum Ende, um der letzte zu sein, der übrigbleibt!
de.title: Koh-Lanta
de.short_description: Koh-Lanta is a challenging game which will put the players skills under pressure: life on an island is not a walk in the park, and each day will bring its amount of surprises.

it.description:
Koh-Lanta è un gioco impegnativo che metterà sotto pressione le abilità dei giocatori: la vita su un'isola non è una passeggiata nel parco, e ogni giorno porterà la sua quantità di sorprese.

Gestisci la tua vita quotidiana al campo, vinci nelle prove in solitario e in squadra... e mantieni i buoni rapporti con gli altri sopravvissuti fino alla fine per essere l'ultimo in piedi!
it.title: Koh-Lanta
it.short_description: Koh-Lanta is a challenging game which will put the players skills under pressure: life on an island is not a walk in the park, and each day will bring its amount of surprises.

pt.description:
Koh-Lanta é um jogo desafiador que vai colocar as habilidades dos jogadores sob pressão: a vida em uma ilha não é um passeio no parque, e cada dia trará muitas surpresas.

Administre sua vida diária no acampamento, tenha sucesso em testes solo e em equipe ... e mantenha o bom relacionamento com os outros sobreviventes até o fim para ser o último sobrevivente!
pt.title: Koh-Lanta
pt.short_description: Koh-Lanta is a challenging game which will put the players skills under pressure: life on an island is not a walk in the park, and each day will bring its amount of surprises.

es.description:
Koh-Lanta es un juego desafiante que pondrá bajo presión las habilidades de los jugadores: la vida en una isla no es un paseo por el parque, y cada día traerá su cantidad de sorpresas.

Administre su vida diaria en el campamento, tenga éxito en las pruebas en solitario y en equipo ... ¡y mantenga las buenas relaciones con los otros sobrevivientes hasta el final para ser el último en pie!
es.title: Koh-Lanta
es.short_description: Koh-Lanta is a challenging game which will put the players skills under pressure: life on an island is not a walk in the park, and each day will bring its amount of surprises.

zt.description:
Koh-Lanta 是一款具有挑戰性的遊戲，它將給玩家的技能帶來壓力：島上的生活不是在公園裡散步，每一天都會帶來許多驚喜。

管理你在營地的日常生活，在單人和團隊試煉中取得成功……並與其他倖存者保持良好的關係直到最後成為最後一個！
zt.title: Koh-Lanta
zt.short_description: Koh-Lanta is a challenging game which will put the players skills under pressure: life on an island is not a walk in the park, and each day will bring its amount of surprises.

sl.description:
Koh-Lanta je zahtevna igra, ki bo pritisnila na sposobnosti igralcev: življenje na otoku ni sprehod po parku in vsak dan bo prinesel veliko presenečenj.

Upravljajte svoje vsakdanje življenje v taboru, imejte uspeh v samostojnih in skupinskih preizkušnjah ... in ohranite dobre odnose z drugimi preživelimi do konca, da boste zadnji!
sl.title: Koh-Lanta
sl.short_description: Koh-Lanta is a challenging game which will put the players skills under pressure: life on an island is not a walk in the park, and each day will bring its amount of surprises.

fr.title: Yooka-Laylee
fr.description: Explorez des mondes vastes et mirifiques, rencontrez (et affrontez) des êtres inoubliables et amassez des trésors lors d'une aventure épique avec Yooka (la bestiole verte) et Laylee (la chauve-souris) pour contrecarrer l'abominable Capital B!
fr.short_description: Explore huge, beautiful worlds, meet an unforgettable cast of characters and horde a vault-load of collectibles our buddy-duo embark on an epic adventure to thwart corporate creep Capital B!

en.description: Explore huge, beautiful worlds, meet (and beat) an unforgettable cast of characters and horde a vault-load of collectibles as buddy-duo Yooka (the green one) and Laylee (the bat) embark on an epic adventure to thwart corporate creep Capital B!
en.short_description: Explore huge, beautiful worlds, meet an unforgettable cast of characters and horde a vault-load of collectibles our buddy-duo embark on an epic adventure to thwart corporate creep Capital B!

it.title: Yooka-Laylee
it.description: Esplora mondi immensi e bellissimi, incontra (e affronta) un cast unico di personaggi e raccogli tanti oggetti con gli inseparabili Yooka (quello verde) e Laylee (la pipistrellina), che vivranno un’avventura epica per fermare l’inquietante magnate Capital B!
it.short_description: Explore huge, beautiful worlds, meet an unforgettable cast of characters and horde a vault-load of collectibles our buddy-duo embark on an epic adventure to thwart corporate creep Capital B!

es.title: Yooka-Laylee
es.description: ¡Explora mundos vastos y preciosos, conoce a un reparto inolvidable de personajes y acumula un montón de coleccionables mientras Yooka (el verde) y Laylee (la murciélago) se embarcan en una aventura para acabar con el malvado empresario Capital B!
es.short_description: Explore huge, beautiful worlds, meet an unforgettable cast of characters and horde a vault-load of collectibles our buddy-duo embark on an epic adventure to thwart corporate creep Capital B!

pt.title: Yooka-Laylee
pt.description: Explora mundos enormes, conhece (e derrota) outras personagens e recolhe colecionáveis na pele do duo de amigos, Yooka (o verde) e Laylee (o morcego), e embarca numa aventura para derrotar o vilão Capital B!
pt.short_description: Explore huge, beautiful worlds, meet an unforgettable cast of characters and horde a vault-load of collectibles our buddy-duo embark on an epic adventure to thwart corporate creep Capital B!

zt.title: Yooka-Laylee
zt.description: 探索巨大而美麗的世界，結識（並擊敗）一群令人難忘的角色，並在好友組合尤卡（綠色那個）和萊莉（蝙蝠）展開史詩般的冒險以挫敗企業蠕變資本時，收藏大量收藏品 乙！
zt.short_description: Explore huge, beautiful worlds, meet an unforgettable cast of characters and horde a vault-load of collectibles our buddy-duo embark on an epic adventure to thwart corporate creep Capital B!

sl.title: Yooka-Laylee
sl.description: Raziščite ogromne, lepe svetove, spoznajte (in premagajte) nepozabno zasedbo likov in se zgrnite v zbirko zbirateljskih predmetov, ko se bosta dvojica Yooka (zelena) in Laylee (netopir) podala na epsko pustolovščino, da bi preprečila preplašeno podjetje B!
sl.short_description: Explore huge, beautiful worlds, meet an unforgettable cast of characters and horde a vault-load of collectibles our buddy-duo embark on an epic adventure to thwart corporate creep Capital B!

fr.title: Peaky Blinders: Mastermind
fr.description: Inspiré de la série TV à succès, Peaky Blinders : Mastermind est un jeu de puzzle et d’aventure. Prenez le contrôle des Peaky Blinders et exécutez des plans parfaitement synchronisés.
fr.short_description: Peaky Blinders: Mastermind is a puzzle-adventure game, based on the multi-award-winning TV show. Become the Mastermind as you control key characters and pull off perfectly synchronized plans.

en.description: Peaky Blinders: Mastermind is a puzzle-adventure game, based on the multi-award-winning TV show. Become the Mastermind as you control key characters and pull off perfectly synchronized plans.

de.title: Peaky Blinders: Mastermind
de.description: Peaky Blinders: Mastermind ist ein Puzzle-Adventure-Spiel, das auf der prämierten TV-Serie basiert. Werde zum Mastermind, kontrolliere die Hauptcharaktere und schmiede perfekt synchronisierte Pläne.
de.short_description: Peaky Blinders: Mastermind is a puzzle-adventure game, based on the multi-award-winning TV show. Become the Mastermind as you control key characters and pull off perfectly synchronized plans.

it.description: Peaky Blinders: Mastermind è un gioco enigma e di avventura ispirato alla pluripremiata serie TV.

es.description: Peaky Blinders: Mastermind es un juego de aventuras y lógica basado en la galardonada serie. Conviértete en una mente maestra, controlando a personajes clave y ejecutando planes sincronizados.
es.short_description: Peaky Blinders: Mastermind is a puzzle-adventure game, based on the multi-award-winning TV show. Become the Mastermind as you control key characters and pull off perfectly synchronized plans.

pt.title: Peaky Blinders: Mastermind
pt.description: Peaky Blinders: Mastermind é um jogo de enigmas/aventura baseado na galardoada série da TV. Sê o Mastermind e controla personagens-chave e concretiza planos perfeitamente sincronizados.
pt.short_description: Peaky Blinders: Mastermind is a puzzle-adventure game, based on the multi-award-winning TV show. Become the Mastermind as you control key characters and pull off perfectly synchronized plans.

zt.title: Peaky Blinders: Mastermind
zt.description: Peaky Blinders: Mastermind 是一款基於屢獲殊榮的電視節目的解謎冒險遊戲。 在您控制關鍵角色並完成完美同步的計劃時成為策劃者。
zt.short_description: Peaky Blinders: Mastermind is a puzzle-adventure game, based on the multi-award-winning TV show. Become the Mastermind as you control key characters and pull off perfectly synchronized plans.

sl.title: Peaky Blinders: Mastermind
sl.description: Peaky Blinders: Mastermind je puzzle pustolovska igra, ki temelji na večkrat nagrajeni televizijski oddaji. Postanite mojster, ko nadzirate ključne like in izdelujete popolnoma sinhronizirane načrte.
sl.short_description: Peaky Blinders: Mastermind is a puzzle-adventure game, based on the multi-award-winning TV show. Become the Mastermind as you control key characters and pull off perfectly synchronized plans.

fr.title: Fight of Animals
fr.description: Les mèmes d'animaux tels que Power Hook Dog, Mighty Fox, Magic Squirrel et bien d'autres sont maintenant devenus des combattants !! Contrôles simples, animaux drôles et batailles passionnantes !!! Choisissez votre animal préféré et rejoignez le combat !! Les joueurs peuvent se battre en mode arcade pour devenir le roi des animaux !
fr.short_description: Animal memes such as Power Hook Dog, Mighty Fox, Magic Squirrel and more have become Fighters!! Simple Controls & Funny Animals & Exciting Battles!!! Choose your favorite animal and join the fight!!

en.title: Fight of Animals
en.description: Animal memes such as Power Hook Dog, Mighty Fox, Magic Squirrel and more have become Fighters!! Simple Controls & Funny Animals & Exciting Battles!!! Choose your favorite animal and join the fight!! Players are able to fight through arcade mode to become the King of Animals!
en.short_description: Animal memes such as Power Hook Dog, Mighty Fox, Magic Squirrel and more have become Fighters!! Simple Controls & Funny Animals & Exciting Battles!!! Choose your favorite animal and join the fight!!

de.title: Fight of Animals
de.description: Tiermemes wie Power Hook Dog, Mighty Fox, Magic Squirrel und mehr werden jetzt zu Kämpfern !! Einfache Steuerung & lustige Tiere & spannende Schlachten !!! Wähle dein Lieblingstier und schließe dich dem Kampf an!! Spieler können im Arcade-Modus kämpfen und der König der Tiere werden!
de.short_description: Animal memes such as Power Hook Dog, Mighty Fox, Magic Squirrel and more have become Fighters!! Simple Controls & Funny Animals & Exciting Battles!!! Choose your favorite animal and join the fight!!

it.title: Fight of Animals
it.description: Meme animali come Power Hook Dog, Mighty Fox, Magic Squirrel e altri sono ora diventati Fighters!! Comandi semplici e animali divertenti e battaglie emozionanti!!! Scegli il tuo animale preferito e unisciti alla lotta!! I giocatori possono combattere in modalità arcade e diventare il re degli animali!
it.short_description: Animal memes such as Power Hook Dog, Mighty Fox, Magic Squirrel and more have become Fighters!! Simple Controls & Funny Animals & Exciting Battles!!! Choose your favorite animal and join the fight!!

es.title: Fight of Animals
es.description: ¡Los memes de animales como Power Hook Dog, Mighty Fox, Magic Squirrel y más ahora se han convertido en Fighters! Controles simples y animales divertidos y emocionantes batallas !!! ¡Elige tu animal favorito y únete a la lucha! ¡Los jugadores pueden luchar a través del modo arcade y convertirse en el rey de los animales!
es.short_description: Animal memes such as Power Hook Dog, Mighty Fox, Magic Squirrel and more have become Fighters!! Simple Controls & Funny Animals & Exciting Battles!!! Choose your favorite animal and join the fight!!

pt.title: Fight of Animals
pt.description: Memes de animais como Power Hook Dog, Mighty Fox, Magic Squirrel e mais agora se tornaram lutadores !! Controles simples e animais engraçados e batalhas emocionantes !!! Escolha o seu animal favorito e entre na luta !! Os jogadores podem lutar no modo arcade para se tornar o Rei dos Animais!
pt.short_description: Animal memes such as Power Hook Dog, Mighty Fox, Magic Squirrel and more have become Fighters!! Simple Controls & Funny Animals & Exciting Battles!!! Choose your favorite animal and join the fight!!

zt.title: Fight of Animals
zt.description: 動力鉤狗、強大的狐狸、魔法松鼠等動物模因現在變成了戰士！！ 簡單的控制和有趣的動物和激動人心的戰鬥！！！ 選擇你最喜歡的動物並加入戰鬥！！ 玩家可以通過街機模式進行戰鬥，成為動物之王！
zt.short_description: Animal memes such as Power Hook Dog, Mighty Fox, Magic Squirrel and more have become Fighters!! Simple Controls & Funny Animals & Exciting Battles!!! Choose your favorite animal and join the fight!!

sl.title: Fight of Animals
sl.description: Živalski memi, kot so Power Hook Dog, Mighty Fox, Magic Squirrel in drugi, so zdaj postali borci !! Preprost nadzor in smešne živali ter vznemirljivi boji !!! Izberite svojo najljubšo žival in se pridružite boju !! Igralci se lahko v arkadnem načinu borijo za kralja živali!
sl.short_description: Animal memes such as Power Hook Dog, Mighty Fox, Magic Squirrel and more have become Fighters!! Simple Controls & Funny Animals & Exciting Battles!!! Choose your favorite animal and join the fight!!

fr.title: Fight of Gods
fr.description: Vos prières ont été exaucées ! Pour la toute première fois, des dieux, des esprits saints et des personnages mythologiques du monde entier et à travers l'histoire s'affronteront dans un combat 2D explosif où le monde entier est en jeu !
fr.short_description: For the first time ever, gods, holy spirits and mythological characters from around the globe and throughout history will clash in an explosive 2D fighter where the entire world is at stake!

en.title: Fight of Gods
en.description: Your prayers have been answered! For the first time ever, gods, holy spirits and mythological characters from around the globe and throughout history will clash in an explosive 2D fighter where the entire world is at stake!
en.short_description: For the first time ever, gods, holy spirits and mythological characters from around the globe and throughout history will clash in an explosive 2D fighter where the entire world is at stake!

de.title: Fight of Gods
de.description: Ihre Gebete wurden erhört! Zum ersten Mal treffen Götter, heilige Geister und mythologische Charaktere aus der ganzen Welt und aus der ganzen Geschichte in einem explosiven 2D-Kämpfer aufeinander, bei dem die ganze Welt auf dem Spiel steht!
de.short_description: For the first time ever, gods, holy spirits and mythological characters from around the globe and throughout history will clash in an explosive 2D fighter where the entire world is at stake!

it.title: Fight of Gods
it.description: Le tue preghiere sono state esaudite! Per la prima volta in assoluto, divinità, spiriti santi e personaggi mitologici di tutto il mondo e nel corso della storia si scontreranno in un esplosivo combattente 2D in cui è in gioco il mondo intero!
it.short_description: For the first time ever, gods, holy spirits and mythological characters from around the globe and throughout history will clash in an explosive 2D fighter where the entire world is at stake!

es.title: Fight of Gods
es.description: ¡Tus oraciones han sido escuchadas! ¡Por primera vez, dioses, espíritus santos y personajes mitológicos de todo el mundo y a lo largo de la historia se enfrentarán en un explosivo luchador en 2D en el que el mundo entero está en juego!
es.short_description: For the first time ever, gods, holy spirits and mythological characters from around the globe and throughout history will clash in an explosive 2D fighter where the entire world is at stake!

pt.title: Fight of Gods
pt.description: Suas orações foram respondidas! Pela primeira vez, deuses, espíritos sagrados e personagens mitológicos de todo o mundo e ao longo da história entrarão em conflito em um lutador 2D explosivo onde o mundo inteiro está em jogo!
pt.short_description: For the first time ever, gods, holy spirits and mythological characters from around the globe and throughout history will clash in an explosive 2D fighter where the entire world is at stake!

zt.title: Fight of Gods
zt.description: 你的祈禱得到了回應！ 有史以來第一次，來自世界各地和歷史上的諸神、聖靈和神話人物將在一場危及整個世界的爆炸性 2D 戰鬥機中發生衝突！
zt.short_description: For the first time ever, gods, holy spirits and mythological characters from around the globe and throughout history will clash in an explosive 2D fighter where the entire world is at stake!

fr.title: My Universe: Cooking Star Restaurant
fr.short_description: You are an ambitious chef looking to open his/her first restaurant. But things won't be easy: customers are looking for delicious meals, and you will have to manage everything to make them satisfied.
fr.description: Intègre le monde de la haute gastronomie et développe ton restaurant à ta manière : de la préparation au service, c'est à toi de jouer ! Satisfais tes clients en leur proposant tes meilleurs plats, apprends les recettes des plus grand chefs du monde et deviens une véritable star de la cuisine.

en.title: My Universe: Cooking Star Restaurant
en.short_description: You are an ambitious chef looking to open his/her first restaurant. But things won't be easy: customers are looking for delicious meals, and you will have to manage everything to make them satisfied.
en.description:
You are an ambitious chef who wants to open his/her first restaurant. But things will not be easy: customers are looking for delicious meals, and you will have to manage everything to make them satisfied.
While making progress and welcoming more and more clients, you will have the opportunity to meet famous chefs from all over the world, representing major global cuisine tendencies: the USA, India, Italia, Japan and France.

de.title: My Universe: Cooking Star Restaurant
de.short_description: You are an ambitious chef looking to open his/her first restaurant. But things won't be easy: customers are looking for delicious meals, and you will have to manage everything to make them satisfied.
de.description: Tritt ein in die Welt der Spitzengastronomie und übernimm die komplette Leitung deines eigenen Restaurants: Gästeservice, Küche, Bedienung – hier ist dein umfassendes Können gefragt! Lerne von den besten Köchen der Welt, mache mit den köstlichsten, von dir zubereiteten Gerichten deine Gäste glücklich und werde ein Stern am kulinarischen Himmel.

it.title: My Universe: Cooking Star Restaurant
it.short_description: You are an ambitious chef looking to open his/her first restaurant. But things won't be easy: customers are looking for delicious meals, and you will have to manage everything to make them satisfied.
it.description: Entra nel mondo dell'alta gastronomia e gestisci il tuo ristorante dalla A alla Z: ospitalità, cucina, servizio a tavola, fai tutto tu! Impara dai migliori chef del mondo, prepara i piatti più prelibati per fare felici i tuoi clienti e diventare una vera star della cucina.

es.title: My Universe: Cooking Star Restaurant
es.short_description: You are an ambitious chef looking to open his/her first restaurant. But things won't be easy: customers are looking for delicious meals, and you will have to manage everything to make them satisfied.
es.description: Entra en el mundo de la gastronomía de élite y administra todas las facetas de tu propio restaurante: recepción, cocina, servicio de mesas, ¡tú lo haces todo! Aprende de los mejores chefs del mundo y prepara las comidas más deliciosas para hacer felices a tus clientes y convertirte en una verdadera estrella de la cocina.

pt.title: My Universe: Cooking Star Restaurant
pt.short_description: You are an ambitious chef looking to open his/her first restaurant. But things won't be easy: customers are looking for delicious meals, and you will have to manage everything to make them satisfied.
pt.description: Entra no mundo da gastronomia de elite e gere o teu próprio restaurante de A a Z: receção, cozinha, serviço de mesa... és tu quem decide tudo! Aprende com os melhores chefs do mundo, prepara refeições deliciosas para satisfazeres os teus clientes e torna-te numa verdadeira estrela da cozinha.

zt.title: My Universe: Cooking Star Restaurant
zt.short_description: You are an ambitious chef looking to open his/her first restaurant. But things won't be easy: customers are looking for delicious meals, and you will have to manage everything to make them satisfied.
zt.description: 進入精英美食的世界，從頭到尾管理您自己的餐廳：款待、烹飪、侍應生，一應俱全！ 向世界上最好的廚師學習，準備最美味的飯菜，讓您的顧客開心，成為真正的烹飪明星。

sl.title: My Universe: Cooking Star Restaurant
sl.short_description: You are an ambitious chef looking to open his/her first restaurant. But things won't be easy: customers are looking for delicious meals, and you will have to manage everything to make them satisfied.
sl.description: Vstopite v svet elitne gastronomije in upravljajte svojo restavracijo od A do Ž: gostoljubje, kuhanje, natakarjenje, vi naredite vse! Učite se od najboljših kuharjev na svetu, pripravite najbolj okusne obroke, da bodo vaše stranke zadovoljne in postanite prava kuharska zvezda.

name: My Universe Cooking Star Restaurant
copyright: © 2020 Microids SA. All rights reserved. Developed by Old Skull Games. Published by Microids SA. All rights reserved.

fr.title: Urban Trial Tricky™ Deluxe Edition
fr.short_description: Grab your seat and pull off the most savage tricks and combos on your motorbike. Ride freely, spin around in the air, go back and forth and let yourself be carried away by the fast-paced gameplay.
fr.description: Lancez-vous et réalisez les combos et les figures les plus dingues sur votre moto ! Roulez librement, sautez dans les airs, entraînez-vous et laissez-vous emporter par un gameplay déjanté, des graphismes colorés et des contrôles de jeu intuitifs.

en.title: Urban Trial Tricky™ Deluxe Edition
en.short_description: Grab your seat and pull off the most savage tricks and combos on your motorbike. Ride freely, spin around in the air, go back and forth and let yourself be carried away by the fast-paced gameplay.
en.description: Grab your seat and pull off the most savage tricks and combos on your motorbike. Ride freely, spin around in the air, go back and forth and let yourself be carried away by the fun, fast-paced gameplay, colorful visuals and smooth controls.

de.title: Urban Trial Tricky™ Deluxe Edition
de.short_description: Grab your seat and pull off the most savage tricks and combos on your motorbike. Ride freely, spin around in the air, go back and forth and let yourself be carried away by the fast-paced gameplay.
de.description: Schnapp dir dein Motorrad und vollführe die wildesten Tricks und Kombos in deinem Repertoire. Fahre Freestyle, drehe dich in der Luft, vor und zurück – lass dich einfach leiten von den lustigen, rasanten Spielmechaniken, der bunten Grafik und der flüssigen Steuerung.

it.title: Urban Trial Tricky™ Deluxe Edition
it.short_description: Grab your seat and pull off the most savage tricks and combos on your motorbike. Ride freely, spin around in the air, go back and forth and let yourself be carried away by the fast-paced gameplay.
it.description: Monta in sella ed esegui alcune delle combo e dei trick più assurdi a cavallo della tua moto. Guida senza limiti, rotea in aria in ogni direzione e lasciati trasportare dal gameplay fulmineo e divertente, dalla grafica colorata e dai comandi fluidi.

es.title: Urban Trial Tricky™ Deluxe Edition
es.short_description: Grab your seat and pull off the most savage tricks and combos on your motorbike. Ride freely, spin around in the air, go back and forth and let yourself be carried away by the fast-paced gameplay.
es.description: Súbete a la moto y márcate las acrobacias y combos más salvajes. Monta a tu ritmo, gira en el aire, ve adelante y atrás y déjate llevar por la diversión, el ritmo de juego rápido, los vistosos gráficos y los fluidos controles.

pt.title: Urban Trial Tricky™ Deluxe Edition
pt.short_description: Grab your seat and pull off the most savage tricks and combos on your motorbike. Ride freely, spin around in the air, go back and forth and let yourself be carried away by the fast-paced gameplay.
pt.description: Puxa uma cadeira e saca os truques e combinações mais radicais na tua mota. Conduz livremente, gira em pleno ar, vai para trás e para a frente e deixa-te levar pela diversão, mecânica de jogo rápida, gráficos coloridos e controlos fluidos.

zt.title: Urban Trial Tricky™ Deluxe Edition
zt.short_description: Grab your seat and pull off the most savage tricks and combos on your motorbike. Ride freely, spin around in the air, go back and forth and let yourself be carried away by the fast-paced gameplay.
zt.description: 坐穩了，準備拿出最野蠻的摩托車花招和連續技吧！自由騎乘、空中迴旋、來回馳騁，恣意享受快節奏的趣味遊戲、多采多姿的視覺效果，以及行雲流水的操控。

sl.title: Urban Trial Tricky™ Deluxe Edition
sl.short_description: Grab your seat and pull off the most savage tricks and combos on your motorbike. Ride freely, spin around in the air, go back and forth and let yourself be carried away by the fast-paced gameplay.
sl.description: Zgrabite svoj sedež in izvedite najbolj divje trike in kombinacije na svojem motorju. Svobodno se vozite, se vrtite v zraku, pojdite naprej in nazaj in se prepustite zabavnemu, hitremu igranju, barvitim vizualnim slikam in gladkim kontrolam.

name: Urban Trial Tricky
copyright: Urban Trial Tricky ©2021 Tate Multimedia S.A., all rights reserved. Published and developed by Tate Multimedia S.A. Urban Trial Tricky is a registered trademark of Tate Multimedia S.A.

fr.title: Urban Trial Playground
fr.short_description: This new installment of the stunt bike racing series is moving the action from city streets, straight to the sunny and colorful beaches of California.
fr.description: Dans ce nouvel épisode de la célèbre série de jeux de courses de motos, l’action passe d’un milieu urbain aux plages ensoleillées et hautes en couleur de Californie, et vous met au défi de réaliser tricks, flips et combos plus spectaculaires que jamais. Mais pour ce qui est de gagner, la recette ne change pas : vitesse, équilibre et style avant tout!

en.title: Urban Trial Playground
en.short_description: This new installment of the stunt bike racing series is moving the action from city streets, straight to the sunny and colorful beaches of California.
en.description: This new installment of the stunt bike racing series is moving the action from city streets, straight to the sunny and colorful beaches of California, mixing in even crazier tricks, flips and combos than ever before. It’s a game of speed, balance and style!

de.title: Urban Trial Playground
de.short_description: This new installment of the stunt bike racing series is moving the action from city streets, straight to the sunny and colorful beaches of California.
de.description: In der neue Folge der Stuntbike-Serie geht's mit einer Mischung aus noch verrückteren Tricks, Flips und Kombos direkt von den Straßen der Großstadt an die sonnigen und bunten Strände Kaliforniens. Ein Spiel von Geschwindigkeit, Gleichgewicht und Stil!

it.title: Urban Trial Playground
it.short_description: This new installment of the stunt bike racing series is moving the action from city streets, straight to the sunny and colorful beaches of California.
it.description: Questa nuova puntata della serie di gare motociclistiche acrobatiche sposta l'azione dalle strade di città alle spiagge soleggiate e colorate della California, aggiungendo nuovi trick, nuove acrobazie e nuove combo. Si tratta di un gioco di velocità, equilibrio e stile!

es.title: Urban Trial Playground
es.short_description: This new installment of the stunt bike racing series is moving the action from city streets, straight to the sunny and colorful beaches of California.
es.description: Esta nueva entrega de la serie de carreras de motos acrobáticas traslada la acción desde las calles de la ciudad hasta las soleadas y coloridas playas de California combinando los trucos, giros y combos más espectaculares hasta la fecha. ¡Es un juego de velocidad, equilibrio y estilo!

pt.title: Urban Trial Playground
pt.short_description: This new installment of the stunt bike racing series is moving the action from city streets, straight to the sunny and colorful beaches of California.
pt.description: O novo título da série de jogos de corrida e manobras de motocicleta está levando a ação dos ambientes urbanos às praias ensolaradas e coloridas da Califórnia, trazendo manobras e combos mais insanos do que nunca. É um jogo de velocidade, equilíbrio e estilo!

zt.title: Urban Trial Playground
zt.short_description: This new installment of the stunt bike racing series is moving the action from city streets, straight to the sunny and colorful beaches of California.
zt.description: 特技自行車賽車系列的新一期將動作從城市街道轉移到加利福尼亞陽光明媚、色彩繽紛的海灘，混合了比以往任何時候都更瘋狂的技巧、翻轉和組合。 這是一場速度、平衡和風格的遊戲！

sl.title: Urban Trial Playground
sl.short_description: This new installment of the stunt bike racing series is moving the action from city streets, straight to the sunny and colorful beaches of California.
sl.description: Ta novi del serije kaskaderskih kolesarskih dirk premika dogajanje z mestnih ulic naravnost na sončne in barvite plaže Kalifornije ter združuje še bolj nore trike, prevračanja in kombinacije kot kdaj koli prej. To je igra hitrosti, ravnotežja in sloga!

name: Urban Trial Playground
copyright: © and published 2019 by Tate Multimedia S.A. Developed by Tate Multimedia S.A. and Teyon. All rights reserved. Urban Trial Playground logo is a registered Trademark of Tate Multimedia S.A.

fr.title: Fast & Furious: Spy Racers Rise of SH1FT3R
fr.short_description: Use innovative gadgets and tear up the tracks in a globe-trotting tournament. Play as Tony Toretto and the Spy Racers in a bid to stop SH1FT3R from winning the ultimate high-tech vehicle!
fr.description: The elite criminal racing organization, SH1FT3R, is back, and only the most talented drivers and spy weapon combat can stop them! Race as your favorite characters, including Tony Toretto, Echo, Cisco, Layla Gray, or even race as the notorious SH1FT3R gang during multiplayer mode. Use innovative gadgets and tear up the tracks in a globe-trotting tournament in story mode, couch co-op, or online multiplayer.

fr.title: A Plague Tale: Innocence
fr.description: Vivez le récit déchirant d’Amicia et de son petit frère Hugo, livrés à eux-mêmes au cœur des heures les plus sombres de l’Histoire. Pourchassés par l'Inquisition et cernés par l'avancée inexorable des hordes de rats, Amicia et Hugo vont apprendre à se connaître et à compter l'un sur l'autre. Submergés par l’adversité, ils devront lutter pour survivre et trouver leur rôle dans ce monde impitoyable.

en.title: A Plague Tale: Innocence
en.description: Follow the grim tale of young Amicia and her little brother Hugo, in a heartrending journey through the darkest hours of history. Hunted by Inquisition soldiers and surrounded by unstoppable swarms of rats, Amicia and Hugo will come to know and trust each other. As they struggle to survive against overwhelming odds, they will fight to find purpose in this brutal, unforgiving world.

de.title: A Plague Tale: Innocence
de.description: Folge den Spuren der jungen Amicia und ihres kleinen Bruders Hugo auf ihrer erschütternden Reise durch die dunkelste Zeit in der Geschichte Europas. Verfolgt von der Inquisition und von erbarmungslosen Rattenschwärmen umgeben müssen Amicia und Hugo lernen, sich gegenseitig zu verstehen und zu vertrauen. Allen Widrigkeiten zum Trotz kämpfen sie in dieser erbarmungslosen Welt ums nackte Überleben.

it.title: A Plague Tale: Innocence
it.description: Segui la cupa storia della giovane Amicia e del suo fratellino Hugo in un tormentato viaggio nell'epoca più nera di sempre. In fuga dall'Inquisizione, circondati da inarrestabili orde di ratti, Amicia e Hugo impareranno a conoscersi e a fidarsi l'uno dell'altra. Lottando contro ogni probabilità per la propria vita, si batteranno per trovare uno scopo in questo mondo brutale e spietato.

es.title: A Plague Tale: Innocence
es.description: Sigue la lúgubre historia de la joven Amicia y su hermano pequeño Hugo en un viaje por los momentos más oscuros de la historia. Perseguidos por la Inquisición y rodeados de imparables enjambres de ratas, Amicia y Hugo aprenderán a entenderse y a confiar el uno en el otro, y lucharán contra viento y marea por sobrevivir y encontrar un propósito en este mundo cruel y despiadado.

pt.title: A Plague Tale: Innocence
pt.description: Segue o conto sombrio da jovem Amicia e do seu irmãozinho Hugo, numa viagem pelos momentos mais negros da história. Perseguidos pelos soldados da Inquisição e rodeados por enxames de ratos imparáveis, Amicia e Hugo vão aprender a confiar um no outro. À medida que se debatem para sobreviver contra probabilidades esmagadoras, lutarão para encontrar sentido neste mundo brutal e impiedoso.

zt.title: A Plague Tale: Innocence
zt.description: 跟著年輕的阿米夏與弟弟雨果展開令人揪心的旅程，體驗他們在歷史最黑暗之時的險境。在遭到宗教法庭士兵追捕，以及潮水般鼠患的包圍下，阿米夏和雨果將逐漸了解彼此，繼而相互信賴。當兩人在逆境中竭力抓住微弱的生存希望，也將在這殘忍無情的世界中找到生命的意義。

sl.title: A Plague Tale: Innocence
sl.description: Sledite mračni zgodbi mlade Amicie in njenega mlajšega brata Huga na srce parajočem potovanju skozi najtemnejše ure zgodovine. Amicia in Hugo, ki ju lovijo inkvizicijski vojaki in obkrožajo neustavljivi roji podgan, se bosta spoznala in si zaupala. Ko se borijo za preživetje v nasprotju z velikimi težavami, se bodo borili, da bi našli namen v tem brutalnem, neprizanesljivem svetu.

name: A Plague Tale: Innocence

en.title: Ice Age Scrat's Nutty Adventure!
en.short_description: Scrat has lost his prized acorn, and only the legendary Crystal Nuts can unlock it! Battle fierce creatures, survive comical calamities, and explore the Ice Age universe. It’s one nutty adventure!
en.description:
Scrat’s brand new quest!
Scrat’s prized acorn is locked inside an ancient Scratazon Temple – and finding the legendary Crystal Nuts is the only way to get it back! Help Scrat battle prehistoric creatures, survive comical calamities, and explore the Ice Age universe. It’s one nutty quest!

sl.title: Ice Age Scrat's Nutty Adventure!
sl.short_description: Scrat has lost his prized acorn, and only the legendary Crystal Nuts can unlock it! Battle fierce creatures, survive comical calamities, and explore the Ice Age universe. It’s one nutty adventure!
sl.description:
Scratova povsem nova naloga!
Scratov cenjeni želod je zaklenjen v starodavnem templju Scratazon – in iskanje legendarnih kristalnih oreščkov je edini način, da ga dobite nazaj! Pomagajte Scratu v boju s prazgodovinskimi bitji, preživeti komične nesreče in raziskati vesolje ledene dobe. To je ena nora naloga!

fr.title: L’Âge de Glace : La folle aventure de Scrat!
fr.short_description: Scrat has lost his prized acorn, and only the legendary Crystal Nuts can unlock it! Battle fierce creatures, survive comical calamities, and explore the Ice Age universe. It’s one nutty adventure!
fr.description:
La toute nouvelle quête de Scrat !
Le précieux gland de Scrat est enfermé dans un ancien temple Scratazon – et trouver les légendaires Glands en Cristal est le seul moyen de le récupérer ! Aide Scrat à combattre des créatures préhistoriques, à survivre à des hilarantes catastrophes, et à explorer l’univers de l’Âge de Glace. C’est une quête de dingue !

de.title: Ice Age – Scrats nussiges Abenteuer!
de.short_description: Scrat has lost his prized acorn, and only the legendary Crystal Nuts can unlock it! Battle fierce creatures, survive comical calamities, and explore the Ice Age universe. It’s one nutty adventure!
de.description:
Scrats brandneue Quest!
Scrats wertvolle Eichel steckt im Inneren eines uralten Scratazon-Tempels fest – und nur die legendären Kristallnüsse bieten einen Weg hinein! Hilf Scrat im Kampf gegen prähistorische Kreaturen, komische Katstrophen zu überleben und das Ice-Age-Universum zu erkunden. Das wird eine harte Nuss!

es.title: Ice Age: Una Aventure de Bellotas
es.short_description: Scrat has lost his prized acorn, and only the legendary Crystal Nuts can unlock it! Battle fierce creatures, survive comical calamities, and explore the Ice Age universe. It’s one nutty adventure!
es.description:
¡Una nueva misión para Scrat!
La preciada bellota de Scrat está guardada en un antiguo templo Scratazon, ¡y encontrar las legendarias Bellotas de Cristal es la única manera de recuperarla! Ayuda a Scrat a pelear con criaturas prehistóricas, a sobrevivir a divertidas calamidades, y a explorar el universo de la Edad de Hielo. ¡Es una misión muy bellotera!

it.title: L’Era Glaciale: La strampalata avventura di Scrat!
it.short_description: Scrat has lost his prized acorn, and only the legendary Crystal Nuts can unlock it! Battle fierce creatures, survive comical calamities, and explore the Ice Age universe. It’s one nutty adventure!
it.description:
La nuovissima missione di Scrat!
La ghianda preferita di Scrat si trova rinchiusa dentro un antico Tempio Scratazon. Trovare le leggendarie Ghiande di cristallo è il solo modo per riprenderla! Aiuta Scrat a battersi contro creature preistoriche, sopravvivere a esilaranti calamità e ad esplorare l’universo de L’Era Glaciale. È proprio una missione strampalata!

pt.title: Idade do Gelo, a louca aventura do Scrat!
pt.short_description: Scrat has lost his prized acorn, and only the legendary Crystal Nuts can unlock it! Battle fierce creatures, survive comical calamities, and explore the Ice Age universe. It’s one nutty adventure!
pt.description:
A mais nova missão do Scrat!
A bolota premiada de Scrat está trancada dentro de um antigo Templo de Scratazon - e encontrar as lendárias Crystal Nuts é a única maneira de recuperá-la! Ajude Scrat a enfrentar criaturas pré-históricas, sobreviva a calamidades cômicas e explore o universo de Era do Gelo. É uma missão maluca!

zt.title: 冰原歷險記——鼠奎特的瘋狂松果大冒險！
zt.short_description: Scrat has lost his prized acorn, and only the legendary Crystal Nuts can unlock it! Battle fierce creatures, survive comical calamities, and explore the Ice Age universe. It’s one nutty adventure!
zt.description:
鼠奎特的最新任務！
對鼠奎特來說極其珍貴的松果，被鎖在古老的史奎塔松廟中——尋找傳說中的水晶堅果，就是唯一能夠取回松果的方法！馬上幫助鼠奎特對抗史前野獸、在各種引人發笑的災難中存活過來，並探索冰原歷險記的奇妙世界。這是無比瘋狂的任務！

fr.title: Eco Mahjong
fr.description: La ville de Greenville, jadis magnifique et florissante, est au bord de la catastrophe écologique depuis qu'Evil Inc. y exploite des gisements minéraux récemment découverts. En arrivant sur les lieux, la famille Walker découvre l'étendue des dégâts : un nuage de pollution constamment présent, une rivière et un bassin pollués par les déchets industriels, des animaux sauvages en détresse et une flore qui se meurt. Terminez les niveaux de mahjong très colorés pour aider les Walker à sauver la nature et redonner vie à la ville.

en.title: Eco Mahjong
en.description: The once beautiful and thriving town of Greenville is on the edge of an ecological catastrophe! The Walkers, the traveling animal family well-known to fans of the Travel Mosaic series, won’t allow the town to turn into a desert!  Join the Walkers and hurry to Greenville to survey the damage.  Help restore the town and save the wildlife by removing the pollution, planting vegetation, and completing well-crafted mahjong puzzles!

de.title: Eco Mahjong
de.description: Die einst schöne und blühende Stadt Greenville steht am Rande einer ökologischen Katastrophe! Die Walkers, die den Fans der Travel Mosaic-Reihe bekannte reisende Tierfamilie, werden nicht zulassen, dass die Stadt in eine Wüste verwandelt wird! Schließen Sie sich den Walkers an und eilen Sie nach Greenville, um den Schaden zu begutachten. Helfen Sie mit, die Stadt wiederherzustellen und die Tierwelt zu retten, indem Sie die Umweltverschmutzung beseitigen, Vegetation pflanzen und gut ausgearbeitete Mahjong-Rätsel lösen!

it.title: Eco Mahjong
it.description: La città un tempo bella e fiorente di Greenville è sull'orlo di una catastrofe ecologica! I Walker, la famiglia di animali itineranti ben nota ai fan della serie Travel Mosaic, non permetteranno che la città si trasformi in un deserto! Unisciti ai Walker e corri a Greenville per esaminare i danni. Aiuta a ripristinare la città e salvare la fauna selvatica rimuovendo l'inquinamento, piantando vegetazione e completando puzzle mahjong ben realizzati!

es.title: Eco Mahjong
es.description: ¡La otrora hermosa y próspera ciudad de Greenville está al borde de una catástrofe ecológica! Los Caminantes, la familia de animales itinerantes conocida por los fanáticos de la serie Travel Mosaic, no permitirán que la ciudad se convierta en un desierto. Únase a los Caminantes y apresúrese a Greenville para inspeccionar los daños. ¡Ayuda a restaurar la ciudad y salva la vida salvaje eliminando la contaminación, plantando vegetación y completando acertijos de mahjong bien elaborados!

pt.title: Eco Mahjong
pt.description: A outrora bela e próspera cidade de Greenville está à beira de uma catástrofe ecológica! Os Walkers, a família de animais viajantes bem conhecida pelos fãs da série Travel Mosaic, não permitirão que a cidade se transforme em um deserto! Junte-se aos Walker e corra para Greenville para examinar os danos. Ajude a restaurar a cidade e salvar a vida selvagem removendo a poluição, plantando vegetação e completando quebra-cabeças de mahjong bem elaborados!

zt.title: Eco Mahjong
zt.description: 曾經美麗而繁榮的格林維爾小鎮正處於生態災難的邊緣！ 旅行馬賽克系列粉絲所熟知的旅行動物家族 The Walkers 不會讓小鎮變成沙漠！ 加入步行者隊並趕往格林維爾調查損壞情況。 通過清除污染、種植植被和完成精心製作的麻將拼圖，幫助恢復小鎮並拯救野生動物！

sl.title: Eco Mahjong
sl.description: Nekoč lepo in uspešno mesto Greenville je na robu ekološke katastrofe! The Walkers, družina potujočih živali, dobro znana ljubiteljem serije Potovalni mozaik, ne bo dovolila, da bi se mesto spremenilo v puščavo! Pridružite se sprehajalcem in pohitite v Greenville, da pregledate škodo. Pomagajte obnoviti mesto in rešiti divje živali tako, da odstranite onesnaževanje, posadite vegetacijo in dokončate dobro izdelane mahjong uganke!

name: Eco Mahjong
copyright: Copyright © 2019 JetDogs Studios

fr.title: RIDE 4
fr.short_description: Are you ready to live the best gaming experience that a motorcycle fan can get? RIDE 4 will spark your competitive soul with hundreds of bikes, dozens of tracks and a whole new level of realism.
fr.description: Êtes-vous prêt à vivre la meilleure expérience de pilotage qui soit ? RIDE 4 va réveiller votre âme de compétiteur avec ses centaines de motos, ses dizaines de circuits et un niveau de réalisme encore jamais atteint.

en.title: RIDE 4
en.short_description: Are you ready to live the best gaming experience that a motorcycle fan can get? RIDE 4 will spark your competitive soul with hundreds of bikes, dozens of tracks and a whole new level of realism.
en.description: Are you ready to live the best gaming experience that a motorcycle fan can get? RIDE 4 will spark your competitive soul with hundreds of bikes, dozens of tracks and a whole new level of realism.

de.title: RIDE 4
de.short_description: Are you ready to live the best gaming experience that a motorcycle fan can get? RIDE 4 will spark your competitive soul with hundreds of bikes, dozens of tracks and a whole new level of realism.
de.description: Sind Sie bereit für das beste Spielerlebnis, das es für Motorradfans gibt? RIDE 4 wird mit Hunderten von Motorrädern, Dutzenden von Strecken und einem ganz neuen Maß an Realismus Ihren Wettbewerbsgeist wecken.

it.title: RIDE 4
it.short_description: Are you ready to live the best gaming experience that a motorcycle fan can get? RIDE 4 will spark your competitive soul with hundreds of bikes, dozens of tracks and a whole new level of realism.
it.description: Sei pronto per la miglior esperienza di gioco per gli appassionati di due ruote? RIDE 4 stimolerà la tua anima competitiva con centinaia di moto, decine di piste e un nuovo livello di realismo.

es.title: RIDE 4
es.short_description: Are you ready to live the best gaming experience that a motorcycle fan can get? RIDE 4 will spark your competitive soul with hundreds of bikes, dozens of tracks and a whole new level of realism.
es.description: ¿Estáis listos para vivir la mejor experiencia posible para un aficionado a las motocicletas? RIDE 4 avivará vuestra llama competitiva con cientos de motos, docenas de circuitos y un nuevo nivel de realismo.

pt.title: RIDE 4
pt.short_description: Are you ready to live the best gaming experience that a motorcycle fan can get? RIDE 4 will spark your competitive soul with hundreds of bikes, dozens of tracks and a whole new level of realism.
pt.description: Estás pronto para viver a melhor experiência de jogo que um fã de motas pode ter? RIDE 4 vai despertar a tua alma competitiva com centenas de motas, dezenas de pistas e todo um novo nível de realismo.

zt.title: RIDE 4
zt.short_description: Are you ready to live the best gaming experience that a motorcycle fan can get? RIDE 4 will spark your competitive soul with hundreds of bikes, dozens of tracks and a whole new level of realism.
zt.description: 準備好體驗摩托車迷至今所能獲得的最佳遊戲體驗了嗎？ RIDE 4中數百輛的摩托車、數十條賽道和前所未有的真實感，將點燃您的競速之魂。

sl.title: RIDE 4
sl.short_description: Are you ready to live the best gaming experience that a motorcycle fan can get? RIDE 4 will spark your competitive soul with hundreds of bikes, dozens of tracks and a whole new level of realism.
sl.description: Ste pripravljeni doživeti najboljšo igralno izkušnjo, ki jo lahko dobi ljubitelj motornih koles? RIDE 4 bo vašo tekmovalno dušo vzbudil s stotinami koles, desetinami stez in povsem novo stopnjo realizma.
